[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde AMH zhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D347}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pu N+ya ba la a ba dA na/_bod skad du/_bsod nams kyi stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas 
[\[1b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[1b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum dang ldan na sbyin pa dag mi 
[\[1b.4\]]sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed la/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas par mi byed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar chags pa dang ser sna dang bag med pa rnams 
[\[1b.5\]]te/_dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum po 'di dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la/_tshul khrims yang dag 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]par blangs te gnas par ma byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa chos gsum dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams 
[\[2a.2\]]dag byed la tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar ma chags pa dang /_ser sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang /_bag yod pa rnams so/_/dge slong dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa dag 
[\[2a.3\]]sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas la/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar 
[\[2a.4\]]gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/_de'i 'og tu gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/gang phyir ser sna bag med pas/_/sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed de/_/de phyir bsod nams 'dod pa yi/_/shes pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya/_/
[\[2a.5\]]ser sna can gyi 'jigs pa ni/_/bkres dang skom pa 'di yin na/_/gang gis 'jigs pas 'dir ma byin/_/de nyid ma byin 'jigs pa ste/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/de yi byis pa gos par 'gyur/_/gang dag ser sna 
[\[2a.6\]]spangs nas kyang /_/dus su sbyin pa sbyin byed na/_/shi yang de ni shi ma yin/_/rgyags bzang ba yi 'dron po bzhin/_/gang dag shin tu gtang dka' ba/_/nyung ngu'am mang po gtong byed na/_/gtang dka' gtong ba de dag ni/_/dka' 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]ba'i las dag byed pa yin/_/dam pa min pas mi rtogs te/_/dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed/_/de phyir dam pa dam pa byin/_/'di nas shi bar gyur pa na/_/dam pa ma yin dmyal bar 'gro/_/dam pa dag ni mtho ris 'gro/_/rga bas gtses pa la ni skyabs 
[\[2b.2\]]med de/_/tshe thung bas na srog khyer dus kyang nye/_/'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di mthong rnams kyis ni/_/bsod nams der sbyor bdag ni bya ba'i rigs/_/bud med spangs 'dir bor bas 'tsho ba gang /_/dga' bas sbyin pa nyung ngu byin na yang /_/stong gi mchod sbyin brgya stong 
[\[2b.3\]]byed pas ni/_/de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/ci phyir mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/_/mchod sbyin 'thun pa de yi lam mi 'gro/_/ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang /_/de yi bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na/_/byis pa la la gsod cing 'ching byed 'dir/_/
[\[2b.4\]]gzhan nor sbyin byed ya ngar brlag par 'gyur/_/mchi ma'i gdong bcas chad par bcas pa yi/_/yon de'i mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam mi 'gro/_/de ltar mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/_/mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la/_/de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang /_/
[\[2b.5\]]de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/la la gang dag gzu lums ma yin pa/_/chos bzhin nor rnams thob pa gtong byed cing /_/de dag gtang dka' de rnams btang bas na/_/rang gi bsod nams kyis ni lha gnas 'gro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[2b.6\]]stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/_nags stug po ga la ba de logs su gshegs so/_/gshegs nas nags stug po'i nang du zhugs te/_nyin par gnas pa'i phyir shing zhig gi drung na gnas shing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong mang po dag 
[\[2b.7\]]'dun khang du 'dus shing 'khod pa'i skabs su tshul 'di lta bur tshe dang ldan pa dag mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa gang yin zhes gtam du glengs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung sru'i bu tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnams kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag byad gzugs ni mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[3a.2\]]ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag brtson 'grus ni mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bzo ni mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras 
[\[3a.3\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no zhes glengs nas de dag 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag kun mi 'thun par gyur te/_'di ltar tha dad par brtags kyis/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste don 'di 
[\[3a.4\]]nyid zhu la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ci skad du lung ston pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes zer nas tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ni/_ston pa thugs rje chen po ste/_/thams cad mkhyen pa tha tshom bsal/_/de ni som nyi gcod pa ste/_/nyi mas mun pa bsal 
[\[3a.5\]]ba bzhin/_/sdug bsngal dra bas glags pa dang /_/log pa'i lam la gnas pa yi/_/srog chags rnams kyi skyabs gcig ste/_/bu rnams kyi ni pha mchog bzhin/_/de phyir chos kun dbang phyug po/_/sems can kun gyi don brtson pa/_/thub pa the tshom gcod 
[\[3a.6\]]de la/_/bdag cag kun gyis zhu bar bya/_/som nyi mdud pa chen po ni/_/gang phyir rgyal ba gcod par 'gyur/_/de phyir thams cad dong nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs la zhu bar bya/_/zhes byas nas dge slong mang po de dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar 
[\[3a.7\]]chas pa las/_bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa'i phyir nags stug po'i nang na bzhugs pa'i bar skabs su dge slong mang po dge 'dun khang du 'dus shing 'khod de/_skabs su tshul de lta bu'i gtam glengs pa/_lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas gsan to/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gsan nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te 'dun khang ga la 'dug par gshegs so/_/gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[3b.2\]]dge slong dag dge slong mang po 'dun khang du 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyis skabs kyi gtam ci zhig glengs/_da ltar khyed gtam ji lta bu zhig gi phyir 'dus shing 'khod/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po 'dun khang 'dir 'dus shing mchis pa rnams 
[\[3b.3\]]kyis skabs su tshul 'di lta bur tshe dang ldan pa dag mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa gang lags zhes bka' mchid bgyis so/_/de la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i mchid nas ni tshe dang ldan pa dag byad gzugs mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa lags so zhes mchi/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[3b.4\]]pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i mchid nas ni tshe dang ldan pa dag brtson 'grus mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa lags so zhes mchi/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i mchid nas ni tshe dang ldan pa dag bzo mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa lags so zhes mchi/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[3b.5\]]bu'i mchid nas ni tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa lags so zhes mchi ste/_btsun pa bdag cag rnams 'di snyam bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag kun mi 'thun par gyur te/_'di ltar tha dad par brtags kyis bdag cag bcom 
[\[3b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te don 'di nyid zhus la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ji skad du lung ston pa de bzhin gzung bar bgyi'o snyam bgyid do/_/btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po 'dun khang du 'dus shing mchis pa rnams kyis skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di glengs te/_da 
[\[3b.7\]]ltar bdag cag bka' mchid 'di'i slad du 'dus shing mchis lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gzhi las tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang bzo/_/brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab gzhan/_/bsod nams dag las byung bas 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]na/_/de phyir bsod nams dam pa yin/_/zhes gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ci yang rung ste/_lan 'ga' tsam du zad kyi dus thams cad du kun nyams su dpen pa ma yin no/_/bsod nams ni dus thams cad du srog 
[\[4a.2\]]chags thams cad kyi nyams su dpen pa yin te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar bsod nams bzhin du sems can rnams kyi nyams su dben pa'i chos gcig kyang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal 
[\[4a.3\]]po'i pho brang 'khor zhig na/_rgyal po gsal stobs zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ngo /_/rgyal po de'i btsun mo rnam par spa ba zhes bya ba gzugs bzang 
[\[4a.4\]]zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/_phyi zhig na btsun mo rnam par spa ba dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa de las bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_
[\[4a.5\]]lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas pa na btsas ston byas so/_/btsas ston byas nas gzugs stobs zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/de bzhin du rim gyis de'i 'og tu de'i bu gsum btsas te/_de dag gi nang na gcig ni brtson 'grus ldan zhes bya/_
[\[4a.6\]]gnyis pa ni bzo ldan zhes bya/_gsum pa ni shes rab ldan zhes bya'o/_/phyis re zhig na yang btsun mo rnam par spa ba la bu chags te/_gang gi nyin par de'i bu chags pa de nyid kyi nyin par glo bur du pho brang 'khor du gser rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab bo/_/btsun mo de'i steng du yang 
[\[4a.7\]]lha'i bla re chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal stobs kyis ya mtshan de mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_ltas pa rnams la smras pa/_kye sngon ma byung ba'i ya mtshan byung ba 'di ci zhig_/ltas pa rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha btsun 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mo'i lhums su sras zhugs pa gang lags pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi che bar grags pa zhig ste/_sems can de'i mthu lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na btsun mo de 'di lta bur yid la 'dod pa skyes te/_kye ma bdag 
[\[4b.2\]]seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing steng du gdugs dkar po thogs la rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can yang thogs na ci ma rung snyam ste/_des rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_grong khyer rgya cher mdzes par byed du bcug nas de bzhin du thams cad 
[\[4b.3\]]byed du bcug ste/_de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas yang de'i yid la kye ma bdag gser dngul gyi phung po'i steng du 'dug la rang gi lag gis sbyin pa rnams sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_nor med pa rnams nor dang ldan par byed na ci ma rung 
[\[4b.4\]]snyam du 'dod pa skyes te/_des rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos de bzhin du byed du bcug nas de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas yang de'i yid la kye ma btson thams cad btang na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas rgyal pos 
[\[4b.5\]]de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa bsal ba'i phyir btson thams cad gtong du bcug ste/_de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas yang de'i yid la kye ma bdag skyed mos tshal dag mthong na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas de rgyal 
[\[4b.6\]]pos skyed mos tshal mdzes pa dag bltar bcug ste/_de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas yang de'i yid la kye ma bdag gis skye bo mang po'i mdun du tshul 'di lta bur bden pa'i tshig brjod de/_ji ste bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa 
[\[4b.7\]]yod ce na/_de las lha'i seng ge'i khri gang la 'dug na/_skye bo mang po la chos ston cing bdag gi gtam gyi rjes la yang ya mtshan 'ga' 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu lha rnams kyis myur du bdag la phul na ci ma rung snyam du 'dod pa skyes te/_des rgyal po la gsol to/_/
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]de nas rgyal pos btsun mo 'khor dang grong khyer rgya cher mdzes par byed du bcug go/_/grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad kyang gos gtsang ma dang /_rgyan bgos nas/_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa lag na thogs te 'dus 
[\[5a.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas btsun mo rnam par spa ba rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te/_bud med kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas lha'i bu mo bzhin du skye bo dag gi mig dang /_yid 'phrog cing skye bo mang po de dag gi nang du song ste/_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams 
[\[5a.3\]]pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas nam mkha' la lta zhing bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byed de tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_mi dbang lha yi rnam par grub pa yi/_/bsod nams stobs 'phags ji ste bdag la yod/_/bden pa des na deng du lha rnams kyis/_/myur du bdag gi seng 
[\[5a.4\]]ge'i khri shoms shig_/de nas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bsod nams dag gi mthu ston pa'i lha rnams kyis glo bur du seng ge'i khri phul te/_lha'i me tog gi char yang phab bo/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis lha dang mi mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar 
[\[5a.5\]]rmad du gyur pa mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu che ste/_'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas lha rnams kyang bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bkug ste/_mi rnams kyi ngag nyan pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/
[\[5a.6\]]de nas btsun mo rnam par spa ba yid rab tu dga' ste/_tsham tshom med par seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go/_/btsun mo de 'dug ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_seng ge'i khri yangs las mi bdun gyi srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[5a.7\]]seng ge'i khri de'i steng du lha'i bla re rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag bsod nams kyi mthu mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis btsun mo la yang legs par mchod nas thal mo sbyar 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]te/_de'i ngag nyan cing sems btud nas mdun du 'khod do/_/rgyal po gsal stobs kyang bsod nams kyi rlabs shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas sems kyi rgyud yang dag par dga' bar gyur te/_'khor dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas 'khod do/_/de nas btsun mo 
[\[5b.2\]]rnam par spa bas de'i tshe sngon ma byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur/_/de'i phyir mis ni bsod nams bya/_/de yang yang dang yang du bya/_/de nyid la ni 'dun par bya/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras ma thag tu bar 
[\[5b.3\]]snang las legs par smras so/_/mchog tu legs par smras so zhes sgra byung ngo /_/lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag kyang sgrogs so/_/lha'i gos shin tu spa ba'i char chen po yang bab bo/_/de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos ma thag tu rgyal po gsal stobs dang /_skye bo phal 
[\[5b.4\]]po che de dag dga' bar gyur to/_/nam mkha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang tsham tshom med par rang gi lus las bla gos dang rgyan rnams phud nas btsun mo rnam par spa ba dang /_seng ge'i khri la bkab ste/_tshig 'thun par legs par smras so/_/legs 
[\[5b.5\]]par smras so zhes sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas btsun mo de seng ge'i khri de las dal gyis babs te sa la 'dug nas lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams ni zhi bar gyur/_mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra ni sgrogs so/_/de nas rgyal po de dang skye bo phal po che dga' bar gyur nas/_bkur sti chen 
[\[5b.6\]]pos mchod cing btsun mo'i 'khor du bskyal te/_btsun mo nang du song nas seng ge'i khri de mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas skye bo phal po che dag gis bsod nams kyi rnam par g.yo ba de mthong ste/_sems yang dag par dga' bar gyur nas/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi che ba 
[\[5b.7\]]nyid/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi 'bras bu dngar ba zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas btsun mo de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de med par gyur nas/_phyis re zhig na zla ba dgu tshang nas/_btsun mo rnam par spa ba nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi skabs su bu btsas te/_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de'i skabs su yang sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_nam mkha' las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi char chen po btsun mo'i 'khor du bab bo/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad 
[\[6a.2\]]du yang gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab bo/_/rgyal po de'i yul thams cad du yang lha'i me tog mchog tu yid du 'ong ba'i char bab bo/_/me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams 'thon to/_/char zim bu yang thams cad du bab 
[\[6a.3\]]bo/_/phyogs bzhi nas kyang ser bu bsil ba langs so/_/de nas gzhon nu btsas ma thag pa phyogs gang na 'dug pa der rgyal po chen po bzhis lha'i seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pas brtol te glo bur du phul lo/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang bdag nyid lag 
[\[6a.4\]]dar te/_gzhon nu'i steng du lha'i gdugs rtsibs brgya pa dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can 'dzin to/_/de'i steng na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams lha'i gos kyi bla re 'grems so/_/la la ni rin po che 'thor ro/_/la la ni rgyan 'thor ro/_/la la ni gos 'thor ro/_/
[\[6a.5\]]la la ni me tog 'thor ro/_/la la ni phye ma 'thor ro/_/la la ni spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams 'thor ro/_/la la ni lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams legs par sgrogs so/_/lha'i bu las sna tshogs can gyis ni grong khyer de thams cad rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_
[\[6a.6\]]gyo mo rnams med par byas te bzhag nas dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni btags/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan ni bsgreng /_tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/_bdug pa'i dri zhim po'i snod ni btags/_me tog sna tshogs ni gtor te/_lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal 
[\[6a.7\]]dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba dang 'dra bar yid du 'ong bar byas so/_/glang po che'i mchog brgya ni nags khung chen po nas rang 'ongs te glang po che'i bres na gnas par gyur to/_/rgod ma brgya yang rte'u 'brangs/_'bru thams cad kyang ma rmos ma btab par mthu dang ldan par ni smin 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]to/_/seng ge'i khri de'i 'og nas kyang gter chen po lnga rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par yongs su gang ba rnams kyis kha bstan te god par byas kyang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can phan tshun 'khod pa rnams kyang de'i yud tsam la byams pa'i sems 
[\[6b.2\]]su gyur to/_/gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de btsas ma thag tu tshe rabs dran te/_phyogs bzhir bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur/_/de phyir mi yis bsod nams bya/_/de yang yang dang yang du bya/_/
[\[6b.3\]]de nyid la ni 'dun par bya/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gis bsod nams dag gi shin tu rmad du byung ba shin tu yid du 'ong ba rnam par g.yo ba de mthong nas sems yang dag par dga' bar gyur te/_bsod nams dag 
[\[6b.4\]]gi che ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsod nams dag gi g.yo ba ltos/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang por bcas/_/bsod nams kyis ni de'i dbang byas/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po de btsun mo'i 
[\[6b.5\]]'khor dang /_sras dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang bcas pas phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas ya mtshan gyis mig rgyas par gyur te/_mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/_kye ma gzhon nu'i bsod nams kyi stobs/_kye ma 
[\[6b.6\]]gzhon nu'i bsod nams kyis cher grags pa 'di ltar 'di mir gyur du zin kyang 'di lta bur lha'i 'byor pa rgyas pa byung bar gyur pa 'di ni ya mtshan che'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas rgyal po sems rab tu dga' zhing bu snying du sdug nas dkor pa rnams la bsgo ste/_
[\[6b.7\]]bka' snyan gsol pa rnams kyi phyir rgyal po'i ra bar gser dngul gyi phung po spungs nas sbyin pa dag byin te bsod nams dag byas so/_/nor med pa du ma ni nor dang ldan pa la bkod do/_/de nas re zhig na 'byor pa chen po rgyas pas de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_gzhon nu'i ming cir gdags zhes zer ro/_/de nas blon po dag gis gsol pa/_lha gang gi slad du sras 'di bsod nams kyi stobs rgyas shing /_de btsas pa na 'di lta bur lha'i 'byor pa byung bar gyur pas na/_
[\[7a.2\]]de'i phyir sras 'di'i mtshan ni bsod nams stobs zhes gdags pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro/_/de nas de'i ming bsod nams kyi stobs zhes btags so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_
[\[7a.3\]]dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te rdzing bu'i 
[\[7a.4\]]pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_des yi ge mthar phyin nas/_de rgyal po rgyal rigs dag gi gnas lnga rnams kyi bar gang yin pa de dag la byang bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs de yang dad pa dang 
[\[7a.5\]]ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba thams cad 
[\[7a.6\]]sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/_'di ltar dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams la tha na rang gi sha'i bar du des ma byin pa dang /_yongs su ma 
[\[7a.7\]]btang ba ci yang med do/_/de la slong ba dag 'ongs te slong na de'i tshe de dag la byams pa'i sems kyis nye bar gnas te/_nam mkha' la bltas nas kye ma 'di ltar gser ram/_dngul lam/_gos sam/_bza' ba'am/_bca' ba'am/_btung ba'am/_mal stan 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nam/_gzhan yang gang ci yang rung ste ci 'dod pa de dang de dag nam mkha' las bdag la 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed de/_des sems bskyed na de la 'ong bar 'gyur la/_su yang don de mi shes so/_/des yo byad de dag gis slong ba dag gi bsam pa yongs 
[\[7b.2\]]su rdzogs par byas nas phyir 'dong ngo /_/de'i grags pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur te/_'og tu klu'i 'jig rten thams cad nas steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags so/_/de nas phyis re zhig na gzhon nu bsod nams stobs phu bo 
[\[7b.3\]]bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'byor ba mchog gis skyed mos tshal du 'khyam du dong ngo /_/de'i bar gyi lam du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mchu khab tsam la lto ri rab tsam ste/_keng rus bsgreng ba 'dra zhing lus shin tu 'bar ba thal mo sbyar ba stong phrag du ma dag gis yongs su bskor te/_gzhon nu bsod 
[\[7b.4\]]nams stobs ma gtogs par sus kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag mi mthong ngo /_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gis gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa/_snying rje chen po yin na/_bdag cag bkres shing skom pas nyam 
[\[7b.5\]]thag pa rnams la zas dang skom byin cig_/bdag cag ni ser sna'i dbang du gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skyes pas lo brgya phrag du mar chu yang mi rnyed na kha zas lta ga la mthong /_de skad ces smras nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi sems snying rjes kun 
[\[7b.6\]]tu bskyod nas skyen par nam mkha' la bltas te/_kye ma lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba bdag la 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de nas glo bur du lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba nam mkha' las 'ongs so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams 
[\[7b.7\]]lha'i bza' ba dang btung bas yang dag par tshim par bya ba la zhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gis sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas bza' ba dang /_btung ba de dag ma mthong nas 'di skad ces smras te/_gzhon nu khyod snying rje can zhig ces grags na/_ci'i phyir bdag cag 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]tshim par mi byed/_gzhon nus smras pa/_lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag byin pa yin na/_kha zas 'di dag las ci nyes te mi za/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu bdag cag ni sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas lha'i bza' ba dang 
[\[8a.2\]]btung ba de dag mi mthong ngo /_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs mi dga' nas/_kye ma ser sna'i rnam par g.yo ba snyam du yid la bsams te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag la byams pas khyab par byas nas sems bskyed de tshig tu smras pa/_ji ste bsod nams dag gi mthu yod 
[\[8a.3\]]na bden pa de dang /_bden pa'i tshig des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di dag gis lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing za ba'i mthu yod par gyur cig ces gzhon nus tshig tu brjod ma thag tu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba de dag log 
[\[8a.4\]]par mi mthong zhing de dag gi kha yang tha mal du gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs yid rab tu dga' bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag lha'i bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par byas te/_de dag gis bza' ba dang btung ba sngon ma myong ba thob nas bkres pa dang 
[\[8a.5\]]skom pa shin tu mi bzad pa chen po'i dbang du gyur pas ha cang mang du zos te/_gsus pa rdol nas de dag gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la sems mngon par dga' bzhin du shi ste/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la gzhon nu 
[\[8a.6\]]khyod kyis bdag cag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su bkod kyis mchog tu dga' ba skyed cig_/da ni khyod nyid las brten te sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas legs so zhes 
[\[8a.7\]]smras te/_skyed mos tshal nyid du song ngo /_/de nas skyed mos tshal der 'dug nas mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i gtam 'di lta bu glod cing nges par byed do/_/de nas gzhon nu gzugs dang ldan pa na re 'di la gdod brtag tu ci yod/_'di ni 'jig 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]rten gyis rtogs pa kho na ste/_'di ltar byad gzugs ni mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byad gzugs dang ldan pa mthong na sngon ma mthong ba'i skye bo yang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur la mngon par dga' ba ma yin pa rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[8b.2\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/sngon gyi drang srong dag gis kyang byad gzugs bzang ba 'di ni rnyed pa rnams kyi phyed do zhes smras pa yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod kyis ltos dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong ba tsam gyis mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/_dam pa rnams kyis chos kyi 
[\[8b.3\]]mchog la bya ba bzhin du snying nas bkur bar byed do/_/de nas gzugs dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di thos nas brtson 'grus can gyis smras pa/_gzugs dag gis byar ci yod de/_brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byad 
[\[8b.4\]]gzugs dang ldan la brtson 'grus med pa la ni tshe 'di'am tshe phyi ma'i 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ci yang mi snang mi grag ste/_byad gzugs nyams su dpen zhes bya ba 'di ni byis pa skye bo rmongs par byed par zad pa'i phyir ro/_/brtson 'grus ni tshe 'di nyid la yang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[8b.5\]]'grub par byed de/_'di lta ste zhing rmed pa rnams kyi 'bru dang /_tshong pa rnams kyi khe dang /_zhabs 'bring byed pa rnams kyi 'tsho ba dang /_mi stod rims rnams kyi bstan bcos rtogs par bya ba dang /_bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu thob par 
[\[8b.6\]]bya ba dang /_de la sogs pa brtson 'grus kyi tshe 'di'i 'dod pa'i 'bras bu snang ngo /_/tshe phyi ma'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste/_bde 'gro dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang /_longs spyod chen po dang /_thar pa thob pa dang /_de la sogs pa brtson 'grus kyi tshe phyi ma'i 'bras bu yang 
[\[8b.7\]]snang ngo /_/gzhan yang brtson 'grus ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa dang /_gnod pa rnams zlog pa yin te/_brtson 'grus la ni bsgrub dka' ba ci yang med do zhes brtson 'grus can gyis de skad ces smras pa la bzo dang ldan pas bgad de smras pa/_khyod kyi 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bden zhing mang la rnam pa sna tshogs ni smra mod kyi nga'i sems ni ma mgu'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzo dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bu ci yang 'grub pa ma mthong gi_/bzo dang ldan pa ni 'bras bu yod par mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na bzo 
[\[9a.2\]]'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bzo bo ni rigs dma' bar skyes su zin kyang rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis gdon mi za bar bkur ro/_/sna tshogs las can lha rnams dang /_/mi rnams 
[\[9a.3\]]kyis kyang legs par bkur/_/de bzhin ma rabs bzo bo'i phyir/_/mi dang lha rnams kyis kyang bkur/_/zhes bzo dang ldan pas smras pa la shes rab can gyis yid tsam gyis bgad de smras pa/_shes rab bzhin du mi rnams kyi nyams su byad gzugs kyang dpen pa ma yin/_
[\[9a.4\]]brtson 'grus kyang dpen pa ma yin/_bzo yang dpen pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab 'chal pa ni gzugs bzang ba mthong na yang rkyen du 'bab par 'dzem pa ma yin la/_brtson 'grus kyis kyang don du skye bar mi 'gyur/_bzo yang shes rab med na shes par mi nus pa'i phyir 
[\[9a.5\]]ro/_/de bas na shes rab 'ba' zhig don thams cad bsgrub pa la mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/gzhan yang shes rab kyis ni gzugs dang bzo/_/brtson 'grus nor yang thob par 'gyur/_/mi rnams legs dang bde ba che/_/shes rab kyis ni thams cad 'thob/_/ces shes rab 
[\[9a.6\]]can gyis de skad smras pa la gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis bzhin 'dzum dmul nas bsod nams dag gi stobs dngos su kha nas byung bzhin du smras pa/_shes rab dang bral ba'i gzugs dang /_bzo dang /_brtson 'grus thams cad ni nyams su dpen pa ma yin la/_shes rab kyis yongs su 
[\[9a.7\]]zin pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas shing nyams su dpen pa yin te/_de ni bden pa kho na mod kyi 'on kyang shes rab de yang bsod nams med par 'thob par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na bsod nams 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin no/_/bsod nams zhes bya ba ni gcig tu sdug pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]rnams dang /_phangs pa'i 'bras bu rnams dang /_dga' ba'i 'bras bu rnams dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams dang /_yid dang 'thad pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyi gtso bo yin te/_yon tan ma lus par ngas brjod mi nus mod kyi/_khyod khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams dag 
[\[9b.2\]]gi yon tan phyogs gcig tsam bshad par byas nyon cig_/bsod nams dag gis byad gzugs 'thob/_/bsod nams kyis ni tshul khrims ldan/_/bsod nams dag gis dpal 'thob cing /_/de bzhin longs spyod can du 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis shes rab 'thob/_/snyan 
[\[9b.3\]]dngags sbyor mchog bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis yid gzhungs 'thob/_/bsod nams dag gis bzang 'gro 'thob/_/bsod nams kyis ni rigs mthor skye/_/bsod nams kyis ni skye ba dran/_/bsod nams dag gis grags pa thob/_/bsod nams dag gis ngang 
[\[9b.4\]]tshul can/_/bsod nams dag gis gtong ldan 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis dbang po tshang /_/bsod nams dag gis bde ba 'thob/_/bsod nams dag gis mkhas pas mchod/_/bsod nams dag gis stobs thob cing /_/dam pa 'phrad pa bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams 
[\[9b.5\]]dag gis don kun 'thob/_/'dir ni yon gnas su yang rung /_/ci ste zhing las tshong yang rung /_/mi ni skyid 'dod phyir byed na/_/cung zad byas pas bsod nams kyis/_/longs spyod rgya chen tshogs kyang 'thob/_/bsod nams byed rnams bsod nams kyis/_/bsams pa tsam gyis nam mkha' 
[\[9b.6\]]las/_/gos dang zas skom rin chen rnams/_/thams cad bde bar 'thob par 'gyur/_/yid 'ong khyim rnams bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis bud med mchog_/bsod nams chen pos nor dang 'bru/_/de yi 'dod dgu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis 'gro ba 
[\[9b.7\]]na/_/sa ni sdong dum tsher ma med/_/bsod nams ji ltar ldan pa bzhin/_/mnyam gnas yang na gos kyang bting /_/ji ltar reg pa tsam gyis na/_/nad pa dag ni sos 'gyur bzhin/_/bsod nams dag gis reg gyur na/_/zas skom de bzhin gnyi ga dang /_/gos dang rin chen 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'bru dag kyang /_/rtag tu zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha klu lha min gnod sbyin dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lto 'phye mi rnams kyang /_/bsod nams bdag nyid che ba'i phyir/_/dug dang gnod pa rnams las srung /_/bsod nams dag gis bsnyen bkur 'thob/_/skye bo mang dga' 
[\[10a.2\]]bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis grags ldan 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis skal bzang 'thob/_/bsod nams dag gis tshig kyang btsan/_/bsod nams dag gis sdug gur 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'thob bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams kyis ni 
[\[10a.3\]]lus mdog sdug_/bsod nams dag gis tshig kyang bzang /_/dran ldan mdza' ldan gtso bor 'gyur/_/de dang der ni mkhas par 'ong /_/mi phyed pa yi 'khor dang ldan/_/bsod nams can ni nad med cing /_/smon pa'i gnas 'gyur bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams rnyed ldan gzi 
[\[10a.4\]]byin yod/_/bsod nams dag gis rgyal srid 'thob/_/'gran zla med cing gnod pa med/_/longs spyod mi nyams bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis gter yang rnyed/_/'khor los sgyur 'gyur bsod nams kyis/_/rin chen bdun ni mdun du 'gro/_/nam mkha'i bar 
[\[10a.5\]]nas kun tu rgyu/_/nyi zla dang yang gzi byin mnyam/_/zla ba nyid 'thob bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams kyis 'thob nyi ma nyid/_/tshangs pa nyid 'thob bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams kyis 'thob brgya byin nyid/_/gzhal med khang na rgyu ba yi/_/bsod nams kyis ni lhar yang 'gyur/_/
[\[10a.6\]]bsod nams de bzhin lha yi bu/_/lha min dbang po stobs po che/_/bsod nams dag gis ngan 'gro spong /_/bsod nams kyis ni bde 'gror 'gro_/shin tu yid 'ong rab dkon pa'i/_/me tog bsod nams dag gis rnyed/_/bsod nams dag gis grub pa 'thob/_/'gro ba snang byed 
[\[10a.7\]]bsod nams kyis/_/lha dang lha min mi rnams kyis/_/yang dag mchog 'gyur bsod nams kyis/_/zhes gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis de skad ces smras na/_'on kyang rang rang gi phyogs 'dzin pas khas mi len to/_/de nas bsod nams stobs kyis de dag la yang smras 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]pa/_kye tshur shog bdag cag shin tu ring ba gzhan gyi yul zhig tu dong ste/_cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod na/_'di ltar ci gzugs mi rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa yin nam/_'on te brtson 'grus sam/_bzo'am/_shes rab bam/_bsod nams nyams su dpen pa 
[\[10b.2\]]shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhon nu de dag gis de ltar bya'o zhes byas nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi ltar mnyan te/_yab la ma gsol bar tsham tshom med par shin tu ring ba rgyal khams gzhan dang /_yul gzhan du dong nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gzhan zhig tu zhugs 
[\[10b.3\]]te/_cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod do/_/de nas gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong na yid du 'ong bas bsdus pa'i skye bo dag gis bshugs pa'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tsho'o/_/brtson 'grus can gyis ni chu klung shugs drag cing mgyogs la shin tu zab cing mthong nas 'jigs pas 
[\[10b.4\]]tsan dan gyi shing chen po khyer ba na/_gzhan dag gis blang bar mi nus pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen pos drangs nas 'tshong zhing de las byung ba'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tsho'o/_/bzo dang ldan pa yang bzo ston pa las byung ba'i longs spyod tsam gyis 'tsho'o/_/shes rab can gyis kyang 
[\[10b.5\]]tshong dpon gnyis 'khon byung nas yun ring du lon pa shes rab kyi mkhas pas mdza' bar byas te/_de nas de gnyis yongs su mgu bas nor byin pa tsam gyis bde bar 'tsho'o/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang bdag gis bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi che ba nyid bsgrags pa'i phyir mi 
[\[10b.6\]]shin tu dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas/_de gang gi nyin par khyim der zhugs pa de'i nyin par nyid du gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams kyi mthus khyim de nyid kyi nang du 'byor pa chen po byung ste/_khyim der nor dang /_'bru dang /_gser dngul mang pos yongs su gang 
[\[10b.7\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas mi dbul po de 'di ci zhig snyam du ya mtshan dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_sngon ma byung ba'i 'byor pa 'di ga las 'ongs snyam du sems so/_/de yang 'di snyam du khyim 'dir longs spyod 'byor pa byung ba 'di ni sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di bdag gi khyim du 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]'ongs pa de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis longs spyod 'byor pa de dag mi dbul po de la ci bder spyod du bcug ste/_de'i tshe mi dbul po de phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che bar gyur to/_/de nas 'di snyam du rtog 
[\[11a.2\]]ste/_bdag sngon shin tu dbul zhing 'dug 'dug pa las/_da bdag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po 'byor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni gzhon nu 'di la brten to/_/gang gi phyir gang gi nyin mo gzhon nu 'di bdag gi khyim du 'ongs pa de'i nyin par nyid du bdag gi khyim du dpal byung 
[\[11a.3\]]bar gyur pa las na/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa zhig gis bkur sti bya ba'i rigs so snyam ste/_de nas des de la rgyun mi 'chad par bkur sti shin tu chen pos bkur sti byas nas mi dbul po che ge mo zhig gi khyim du gzhon nu sngon ma byung ba zhig 'ongs te/_de'i mthus 
[\[11a.4\]]khyim der dpal byung bar gyur to zhes kun tu sgra grags so/_/skye bo mang po dag gis de thos nas/_gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la mngon par dga' bar gyur te/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthus zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de'i tshe ljongs der yang gzhon nu bsod nams 
[\[11a.5\]]stobs kyi mthus me tog dang /_'bras bu'i shing rnams rtag tu rgyas par gyur to/_/lha yang dus dus su legs par 'thun par char gyi rgyun 'bebs te/_'bru shin tu phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to/_/de nas skye bo mang po bsod nams dag gis sems dga' bar 
[\[11a.6\]]byas te/_ltad mo lta 'dod par gyur nas de lta ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis skye bo lhags pa de dag bsdu bar 'dod de/_kye ma bdag la khyim rin po che thams cad kyis gang zhing 'tshog chas rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan la/_bran dang bran mo dang 
[\[11a.7\]]las byed pas gang ba rnam pa sna tshogs blta na yid du 'ong ba zhig byung na ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed do/_/dge slong de dag sems bskyed ma thag tu gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi khyim chen po rin po che thams cad kyis gang zhing 'tshog chas rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan la/_bran dang 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bran mo dang las byed pas gang ba rnam pa sna tshogs blta ba yid du 'ong ba glo bur du byung ngo /_/de mthong nas kyang skye bo mang po dag mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bsod nams dag la gces su 'dzin pa yang dag par skyes nas/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi 'bras bu ni dngar ro zhes 
[\[11b.2\]]rtogs nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis kyang skye bo mang po de dag sems dga' bar gyur par shes nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag gis ci rigs par kha cig ni sbyin pas bsdus/_kha cig ni tshig snyan 
[\[11b.3\]]pas bsdus/_kha cig ni don spyod pas bsdus/_kha cig ni don 'thun pas bsdus te de'i grags pas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyis re zhig na rgyal po gzhan zhig la sman chos gsol ba'i mi zhig gshed ma dag gis yan lag 
[\[11b.4\]]bcad de bzhag nas de'i lus las khrag shin tu mang po zags te des na de'i kha skams par gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang sa phyogs der phyin te/_de nas mi des de mthong nas nyam thag pa'i nga ros ngu zhing jo co gzhon nu bdag la yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes 
[\[11b.5\]]smras so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis de mthong nas snying rje'i sems bskyed de/_bdag gis thabs ji lta bu zhig gis 'di yongs su bskyab par bya snyam du bsams nas deng bdag gis bsod nams dag gi mthu 'jig rten gyi mngon sum du bstan to snyam du de'i blo skyes 
[\[11b.6\]]so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis de'i lus kyi nyam drod rtogs nas snying rjes sems brlan te/_rang gi lus las rtsa gtar nas khrag gzag ste/_mi de la blud nas des mi de'i kha skams pa thams cad zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis 
[\[11b.7\]]de'i rkang lag bcad pas shin tu mi bzad par na ba mthong nas sdug bsngal de bdag gi nyams la bab par sems shing bdag nyid kyi rkang lag bcad de/_mi de'i rkang lag gi gnas gnas su sbyar nas nam mkha' la bltas te/_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pa'i sems bskyed nas/_bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus 'di skyes tshun chad mi dge ba'i las ci yang byas par mi dran pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis mi 'di la bdag gi rkang lag 'di dag gnas gnas su 'byor par gyur cig_/sngon gyi lus ji lta 
[\[12a.2\]]ba bzhin du yang gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis de skad smras ma thag tu mi de la rkang lag bcad pa de dag gnas gnas su 'byor par gyur te/_mi de sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du yang gyur nas rma sos shing sgros mi mngon par gyur to/_/
[\[12a.3\]]de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis mi de sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du gyur par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ste/_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas bdag nyon mongs pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs so snyam du bsams so/_/gzhan yang ji ltar mi 'di 
[\[12a.4\]]bdag gis rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas nas rang gi rkang lag gis bstud de bden pas bskul nas sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cing /_srog phangs pa dang ldan par byas pa bzhin du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[12a.5\]]mi 'di dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis yang dag par tshim par byas te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhog par gyur cig ces byas nas/_de'i skabs su yang sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yo ba des dbang po chen po'i pho brang kun tu 
[\[12a.6\]]g.yos nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_sa g.yo ba 'di sus byas snyam mo/_/re zhig na gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis shin tu dka' ba'i las byas pa de mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas kyang ya mtshan gyis sems dad par gyur nas 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di 
[\[12a.7\]]ci'i phyir 'di ltar shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa de bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bdag nyid bram ze'i cha lugs su sprul nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas nas babs te gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi thad du song nas/_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bsod nams stobs khyod kyis bdag nyid kyi rkang lag med par byas te bzhag pa 'di ci'i phyir byas zhes smras so/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis ngo ma shes te/_skabs 'di rgyas par bsnyad nas yang smras pa/_grogs po bdag ni gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[12b.2\]]sdug bsngal lo/_/bdag ni gzhan dag gi bde bas mchog tu bde ste/_de bas na bdag gis mi 'di sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nyam thag pa de mthong nas/_sdug bsngal de bdag gi nyams la bab par bsams te/_rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su btang nas 
[\[12b.3\]]mi 'di bden pas bskul bas sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go//_//bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas nas rang 
[\[12b.4\]]bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/_gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su btang bar byas pa'am yongs su gtong ba na sems gzhan du gyur pa'am 'gyod par ma gyur grang /_gzhon nu bsod nams stobs 
[\[12b.5\]]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag ni rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams yongs su btang bar byas pa'am yongs su gtong ba na sems gzhan du gyur pa'am 'gyod par gyur pa yang med do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_de cis mngon/_bsod nams stobs kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[12b.6\]]'o na bden pa'i tshig bya yis nyon cig_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/_phyogs bzhir bltas nas bden pas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rang gi yan lag mkhrig ma gcod pa na/_/
[\[12b.7\]]ji ste de ring 'gyod par ma gyur na/_/bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ni gang yin pas/_/bdag gi lus ni snga mkho bzhin gyur cig_/ces tshigs su bcad pa smras ma thag pa'i rjes la bdag nyid chen po de'i lus 'phral du sngon bzhin du gyur te/_nam mkha' las kyang lha'i me tog gi char 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bab bo/_/lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyang sgrogs so/_/ser bu 'jam po yang langs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i bsod nams dag gi shin tu rmad du byung ba de tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po mthong nas mchog tu 
[\[13a.2\]]ngo mtshar che bas sems kyi rgyud dang bar gyur te/_gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod 'bad pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/_bsod nams stobs kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag ni 'bad pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs nas sems can 
[\[13a.3\]]thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bton te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/_grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod par 'dod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_gzhon nu bsod nams stobs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ri rab bzhin du mi 
[\[13a.4\]]g.yo bar rig nas mgu bar gyur te smras pa/_sems can chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi smon lam ni rgya che'o/_/khyod kyi 'bad pa ni bskyod par mi nus so/_/'bad pa 'dis khyod ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[13a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes smras te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la mngon par bstod nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/phyis re zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[13a.6\]]'khor de'i rgyal po bu med par dus las 'das so/_/de nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_grong khyer gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams 'dus nas/_kye bdag cag gi rgyal por gang zhig dbang bskur bar bya zhes gros byed pa la zhugs 
[\[13a.7\]]so/_/de nas kha cig na re su bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa'i sems can de rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de dag thams cad kyis blo gcig brda skad gcig tu byas nas bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa/_rgyal por 'os pa'i sems 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]can tshol ba la zhugs te tshol ba'i mi kun tu bkye'o/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bskul nas de'i tshe sten grogs dag dang lhan cig tu phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo /_/song nas de la bkra shis pa'i ltas 
[\[13b.2\]]rnams byung ste/_nam mkha' las chu'i rgyun mgo bor bab cing /_bya kha dog sna tshogs pa dag g.yas phyogs nas skor bar byed la/_khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang rgyal ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed de/_sems spro ba dang bcas shing yid bde bar gyur pas gnas so/_/gzhon nu de yang ba 
[\[13b.3\]]spu'i khung bu thams cad zing zhes byed do/_/sa gzhi yang rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par gyur to/_/de'i lus kyang shin tu yang bar gyur to/_/dga' zhing yid dang 'thad pa'i sgra yang thos so/_/de ltas kyi dpyad la mkhas pa yin te/_de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag la ltas rnams byung 
[\[13b.4\]]bas deng ni gdon mi za bar bdag rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams so/_/de nas de mthar gyis skyed mos tshal gyi nang du song ste/_skyed mos tshal gyi bde ba nyams su myong nas shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig gi drung du nyal te gnyid kyis log go/_/
[\[13b.5\]]de'i grogs po de dag kyang me tog dang 'bras bu la sems g.yengs nas skyed mos tshal de phan tshun kun tu 'khyam pa la zhugs so/_/de'i bar skabs su gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams kyi mthus klu rnams kyis lha'i pad ma chen po shin tu mchog tu yid du 'ong la kha dog dang 
[\[13b.6\]]dri dang ldan pa 'dab ma stong pa shin tu dga' bar byed pa zhig sa la brtol te 'thon par byas nas/_pad ma chen po de la gzhon nu bsod nams stobs mthar gyis dal nas bteg ste bzhag nas de ci nas sad par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur yang byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas nyi ma gung las yol 
[\[13b.7\]]te zan za ba'i dus las 'das nas shing gzhan dag gi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol zhing /_shar phyogs su 'bab ste/_shar phyogs su bab na/_shing mya ngan 'tshang de'i grib ma ni gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi lus mi gtong ngo /_skyed mos tshal de'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing gang yin pa 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]de dag thams cad kyang shing mya ngan 'tshang de gang na 'dug pa de logs su mngon par 'dud par gyur to/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya mthong na yid du 'ong zhing /_bkra shis par bya ba rnams kyang spyod lam zhi ba'i tshul gyis kun nas bskor te 'khod do/_/gzhon nu bsod nams 
[\[14a.2\]]stobs gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du yang bdag nyid mi gtsang ba'i phung po chen po'i steng na 'dug pa rmis so/_/bdag nyid mi gtsang bas yog par yang rmis so/_/bdag nyid nam mkha' la lces ldag pa yang rmis so/_/bdag nyid pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa yang rmis so/_/
[\[14a.3\]]bdag nyid ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pa yang rmis so/_/skye bo phal po che bdag la phyag 'tshal ba yang rmis so/_/de nas de'i skabs su grong khyer gyi mi dang /_blon po dang /_yul gyi mi de dag gis tshol ba'i mi bkye ba rnams kyang gzhan dang gzhan dag tu kun tu 'khor 'khor te phyogs der 
[\[14a.4\]]phyin to/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi lha'i 'byor pa de lta bu mthong nas/_yang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa zhig go snyam du rig nas shin tu rings par grong khyer gyi mi dang /_blon po dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyi thad 
[\[14a.5\]]du dong nas skabs de rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de'i skabs su gzhon nu bsod nams stobs sad nas de rmi ltas kyi dpyad la mkhas pas rmi lam de dag gi dpyad sems pa la zhugs te/_bdag gis mi gtsang ba'i phung po chen po'i steng na bdag nyid 'dug pa rmis pa de ni bdag rgyal srid chen po'i 
[\[14a.6\]]dbang phyug gi bdag po la gnas par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bdag gi mi gtsang bas bdag nyid yog par rmis pa de ni seng ge'i khri chen po la 'dug par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/bdag nyid ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pa rmis pa de ni thams cad kyi steng na 'dug par 'gyur ba 
[\[14a.7\]]de'i snga ltas yin no/_/skye bo phal po che phyag 'tshal ba rmis pa de ni skye bo phal po ches bdag la bkur sti byed par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/_/'di ltar bdag gis 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa dang /_'di lta bu'i ltas mthong ba dag las na gdon mi za bar deng nyid du bdag rgyal por 'gyur 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]ro snyam mo/_/yang de'i skabs su grong khyer gyi mi dang /_blon po dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis tshol ba'i mi rnams la thos nas mgu bar gyur te/_thams cad 'dus nas rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba'i yo byad khyer te skyed mos tshal der dong ngo /_/de nas re zhig na lha'i 'byor pa de dag 
[\[14b.2\]]mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang de dag mthong nas lha'i pad ma chen po de dag nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/de nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams dag gis bskul nas rgyal po chen po bzhis che ba la 
[\[14b.3\]]'os pa'i lha'i seng ge'i khri phul lo/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni gdugs dkar po dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can 'bul lo/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ni lha'i bla re rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'grems so/_/rlung gtong ba dang bar snang la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni 
[\[14b.4\]]lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni lha'i rin po che'i char 'bebs shing lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyang sgrogs so/_/gos kyang 'thor ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal du bcas pa de dag thams 
[\[14b.5\]]cad kyang rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas te bzhag go/_/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng /_dar gyi lda ldi'i chun po ni kun tu bres/_dri zhim po'i bdug pa'i snod ni btags/_me tog sna tshogs ni gtor te lha'i gnas 'dra zhing /_lha'i bu las sna tshogs can gyis ni gzhon 
[\[14b.6\]]nu bsod nams stobs yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir brgya byin gyi bkas skyed mos tshal der lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig sprul to/_/de nas grong khyer gyi mi dang /_blon po dang /_yul gyi mi de dag gis lha'i 'byor pa de dag mthong 
[\[14b.7\]]nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te/_gus par bsgrim pas tsham tshom med par gzhon nu bsod nams stobs lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs su gsol nas bkur sti chen pos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/_/dge slong dag dbang bskur ma thag tu gzhon nu bsod nams 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]stobs kyi lus las snang ba gang gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od med par byas te/_thad kar dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug khyab pa de lta bu'i lha'i 'od byung bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i ming gzhon nu bsod nams stobs zhes bya ba de med par gyur nas ming rgyal po snang 
[\[15a.2\]]byed rgyal po snang byed ces bya bar gyur to/_/de na la las ni rgyal po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar shes so/_/la las ni rgyal po snang byed ces bya bar shes so/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs lha dang mi'i 'byor pa de dag dang bcas par rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der song ngo /_/
[\[15a.3\]]de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha rnams kyis rgyal po bsod nams stobs la tshul bzhin du yang dag par rim gro byas nas dong ngo /_/rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyang rgyal po'i pho brang de na rgyal po byed de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_
[\[15a.4\]]skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug pa dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_bu gcig pa la bya ba 
[\[15a.5\]]bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni rtag tu rgyas so/_/lha yang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs te/_'bru shin tu legs par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na gtam de de'i phu bo de dag gis thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag mchog 
[\[15a.6\]]tu ya mtshan du gyur te gcig la gcig smras pa/_bsod nams stobs kyis ni 'di ltar dam bcas pa dang /_dbang phyug dang rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis bdag cag pham par byas te/_gang gi phyir de bsod nams dag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po'i bdag por grub par byas pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[15a.7\]]tshur shog bdag cag la des ma rmas pa'i snga rol du bdag cag zad par dong ste/_rgyal po bsod nams stobs yang dag par mnyes par bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs ga la 'dug pa de logs su dong ngo /_/dong nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs la rgyal bar gyur 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]cig_/sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs la smras pa/_lha legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis dam bcas pa ni brtan pa lags so/_/'di ltar khyod kyis bdag cag dam 
[\[15b.2\]]bcas pa dang /_dbang phyug gis pham par byas te/_gang gi phyir bsod nams dag gis khyod kyi don byas pa bzhin du rgyal srid chen po'i dbang phyug gi bdag por bcug pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs gus pa dang bcas pas la gor du seng ge'i khri 
[\[15b.3\]]las langs nas phu bo de dag la legs par bsti stang byas te/_che ba la 'os pa'i khri dag la 'dug tu bcug nas de dag gis dad pa phul te phyir seng ge'i khri la 'dug go_/'dug nas phu bo de dag la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi yang dag par glod pa nges par byed pas phyir mgu bar byas 
[\[15b.4\]]te/_bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas nas longs spyod chen po dag gis bgo skal byin no/_/de nas phyi zhig na phu bo de dag dang /_skye bo mang po de dag bsod nams dag la gzud par 'dod nas 'khor chen po 'dus pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsod nams min pas mi bzad 
[\[15b.5\]]pa'i/_/sdug bsngal kun rgyas dmyal bar 'gro/_/bsod nams min pas brlag pa yi/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas mi bzad 'gro/_/bsod nams min pas bkres skom gyi/_/shin tu gzir ba'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gro/_/bsod nams min pas rtag tu ni/_/shin tu sdug bsngal bran du 'gyur/_/
[\[15b.6\]]bsod nams min pas lkugs par 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas 'on par 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas glen par 'gyur/_/shes rab 'chal cing yid mi bde/_/bsod nams min pas log par shes/_/byad ngan por yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas 'jig 
[\[15b.7\]]rten pa/_/kun gyis smad pa'i rigs dmar 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas sems 'khrul dang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten sdang bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas de bzhin smyo/_/bsod nams min pas dgra rnams 'byung /_/bsod nams min pas don rnams kun/_/'bad de 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]brtsams pa chud zar 'gyur/_/de bzhin bsod nams ma yin pas/_/lus ni rtsub cing gas par 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas rtag tu yang /_/gzi byin med cing mdangs med 'gyur/_/sems med pa yi dngos po yang /_/bsod nams min pas dgra ru 
[\[16a.2\]]'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lto 'phye srin rnams kyang /_/bsod nams min pas myur du gsod/_/bsod nams min pas phan pa'i sman/_/shin tu gnod pa dag tu 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas dbul bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas brnyas par 'gyur/_/bsod nams 
[\[16a.3\]]min pas skye bo dag_/skur pa rab 'jigs btab par 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas rtag tu ni/_/'khor dag dang yang 'bye bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas mig med 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas sdug bsngal 'grogs/_/bsod nams min pas nad mang zhing /_/
[\[16a.4\]]bsod nams min pas gso dkar 'gyur/_/bsod nams min pas gzugs mi sdug_/bsod nams min pas gdangs mi snyan/_/bsod nams min pas lag sor rdum/_/thang po de bzhin tshig mi btsan/_/bsod nams min pas rgyal po dang /_/chom rkun me yis 
[\[16a.5\]]longs spyod bshig_/bsod nams min pas mi snyan thos/_/bsod nams min pas rtag tu 'jigs/_/bsod nams min pas 'gro ba na/_/sa ni sdong dum tsher mas gang /_/ji ste longs spyod 'dod pa'i mi/_/mi glas yang na tshong byed kyang /_/bsod nams min 
[\[16a.6\]]pas rtag tu ni/_/chud za de yi nor mi 'gyur/_/gang dag ci yang 'jig rten na/_/mi dga' mi sdug mi phan gang /_/de bzhin log par ltung ba kun/_/'di kun bsod nams min las gyur/_/bsod nams kyis ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis 
[\[16a.7\]]brtson par 'gyur/_/bsod nams kyis ni tsha grang skyob/_/log 'bab char zlog bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams 'dod bzho ba bzhon yin/_/yid bzhin nor bzang bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis dpag bsam shing /_/yid 'ong 'dod kun 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]'bras bur smin/_/bsod nams dag gis bsod pa 'thob/_/bsod nams kyis ni yid 'ong dpal/_/bsod nams dag gis yid brtan 'gyur/_/bsod nams can ni rigs mthor skye/_/bsod nams dag gis grags pa 'thob/_/bsod nams kyis ni 
[\[16b.2\]]mang thos 'gyur/_/rgya che yid 'ong bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams dag gis thos pa 'dzin/_/nad med 'chi ba bsod nams kyis/_/bsod nams kyis ni 'chi bdag bcom/_/'chi bdag mchog tu 'jigs pa yis/_/bsod nams dag gis 'jigs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[16b.3\]]gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyang /_/lha yi bde sten bsod nams kyis/_/sum cu gsum pa bsod nams kyis/_/de bzhin bsod nams 'thab bral lha/_/dga' ldan lha rab bsod nams kyis/_/'phrul dga' dag kyang de bzhin te/_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug bsod 
[\[16b.4\]]nams kyis/_/dbang byed lhar yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/bsod nams de bzhin tshangs pa che/_/lha rnams bye ba dag gis rjed/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/_/dbang byed pa yi mnga' bdag 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gis 'dod dgu yi/_/phun sum tshogs 
[\[16b.5\]]dgu rtag tu gnas/_/sems med pa yi dngos po yang /_/bsod nams dag gis dbang du gyur/_/rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang dag par ston pa yid 'phrog pa'i tshig de skad ces brjod pa na/_skye bo phal po che de dag bsod nams la brten par 
[\[16b.6\]]gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis skye bo phal po che de dag la yang shas cher bsod nams dag la gces su 'dzin pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la bltas te sems bskyed nas tshig tu smras pa/_kye ma bdag la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'di'i phyi nang du bcas par 
[\[16b.7\]]lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dang /_gos kyi char rab tu 'bab kyang ci ma rung zhes byas so/_/dge slong dag rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis sems bskyed ma thag tu nam mkha' las lha'i gos che ba la 'os pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab bo/_/de'i rjes la lha'i me tog yid du 'ong 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]ba'i char yang bab bo/_/de'i rjes la lha'i rin po che'i char bab ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyis khebs par gyur nas tser lhang zhing 'dug go/_/de nas lha dang mi rnams dga' bar byed pa'i bsod nams dag gi rnam par g.yo 
[\[17a.2\]]ba'i rmad du byung ba de mthong nas skye bo mang po de dag thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas bsod nams dag la gces su 'dzin pa yang dag par skyes te dga' bar gyur nas/_kye ma lha bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams dag gi che ba nyid ces ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/
[\[17a.3\]]de nas re zhig na skabs kyi gtam de nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas bdag nyid chen po de ni bsod nams kyis che bar grags pa zhig ste/_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i 'os so zhes zer nas thams cad 'dus te dpung gi tshogs 
[\[17a.4\]]yan lag bzhi glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go bskon nas/_rgyal po bsod nams stobs la phu dud bya ba'i phyir song ste/_bzhon pa dag las babs nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[17a.5\]]la btugs te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/_lha khyod ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis che bar grags pa lags te/_khyod kyis ni rgyal po mdzod cig_/bdag cag ni zhabs 'bring 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis che ba la 'os pa'i rin po 
[\[17a.6\]]che dag gis ci 'dod par yang dag par 'tshengs par byas nas 'khor dang bcas par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod de/_rang rang gi yul du bkye'o/_/de nas rim gyis gtam de rgyal po gsal stobs kyis thos so/_/thos nas kyang thog ma kho nar pho nya btang 
[\[17a.7\]]nas shin tu rings par dpung chen po thams cad dang chas te/_bar zhig gis rgyal po bsod nams stobs la phu dud du bya ba'i phyir song nas snying bu la gdung bas brgyal te mchi mas brnang zhing ngu ka phyung la mig mchi mas kun du gang ste/_glang po che'i rgyab nas babs nas tsham tshom 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]med par rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi mgul nas 'khyud de/_mgo bor yang bsnams nas/_yun ring rab tu brtags te smras pa/_bu gzhon nu da ci zer ba shes par gyis shig_/nga ni da rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs te rgyal srid kyi khur khyer mi nus kyis/_rgyal srid kyi 
[\[17b.2\]]khur long shig ces smras nas rgyal po gsal stobs kyis rang gi mgo las dar thod dang /_cod pan dang /_dbu rgyan phud do/_/de nas rim gyis rgyal po bsod nams stobs 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/des 'dzam bu'i 
[\[17b.3\]]gling na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad ci 'dod par gser dngul gyis 'tshengs par byas nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na su yang dbul po'am nad pa med do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad bde bar gyur te/_nad med 
[\[17b.4\]]cing stobs dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po rnams rgyas pa dang /_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba dang /_nor dang 'tshog chas mang ba dang /_bdog pa mang ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_gser dngul dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba rnams kyi tshogs mang bar gyur to/_/
[\[17b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad kyang 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_
[\[17b.6\]]bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_tsher ma dang /_rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo rnams ni med par gyur/_me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni rtag tu rgyas te/_lha yang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing 'bru shin tu rgyal bar 
[\[17b.7\]]gyur to/_/de nas skye bo mang po thams cad kyang dga' ba skyes nas bsod nams la brten par gyur te/_rtag tu sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed do/_/bsnyen gnas la gnas shing tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du mir gyur pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]las 'chi ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad lus dang bral nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_phal cher ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyang sems can dpag tu med pa rnams tshe 'di dang /_tshe phyi ma'i 
[\[18a.2\]]don rnams la bkod nas 'khor sems can stong phrag du ma dag dang shi 'phos te lha'i ris dga' ldan du skyes so/_/dge slong dag khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/_de ltar mi blta'i nga nyid de'i tshe 
[\[18a.3\]]de'i dus na byang chub sems dpar gyur to/_/rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyi yab rgyal po gsal stobs zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gsal stobs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/btsun mo rnam par spa ba zhes bya bar gyur pa 
[\[18a.4\]]gang yin pa de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di nyid yin no/_/gzhon nu gzugs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni sru'i bu dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no/_/brtson 'grus dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid yin no/_/bzo dang ldan pa gang yin 
[\[18a.5\]]pa de ni dge slong ma 'gags pa 'di nyid yin no/_/shes rab can gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/_/rgyal po shi 'phos nas bsod nams stobs rgyal sar zhugs pa gang 
[\[18a.6\]]yin pa de ni bdud sdig can 'di nyid yin no/_/sngon mi dbul po gang gi khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams stobs zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong sgra gcan zin 'di nyid yin no/_/rgyal pos mi rkang lag med par byas nas gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyis rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas 
[\[18a.7\]]shing /_rang gi rkang lag gis bstud de bden pas bskul nas sngon gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kau Di n+ya 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po la sman chos gsol ba'i mir gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na bsod nams gang yin pa de ni rnam grangs 'di nyid kyi dus 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]thams cad dang /_rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi nyams su dpen pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di skad du bsod nams ltar sems can rnams kyi nyams su dpen pa gzhan ci yang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes nga smra'o zhes bka' 
[\[18b.2\]]stsal nas/_dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di ltar rgyal po dbang che bar grags par gyur la/_lha dang mi 
[\[18b.3\]]rnams kyis rgyal por stsol cing ci bsams pa dang /_ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis nam mkha' las 'bab cing de btsas pa'i tshe yang sa g.yos par gyur te/_lha'i rin po che'i char pus mo nub pa tsam bab la lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag cing lha'i dbang po 
[\[18b.4\]]brgya byin gyis rang nyid lag dar te/_lha'i gdugs bzung zhing gter mi zad pa yang byung bar gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po bsod nams stobs nyid kyis tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon 
[\[18b.5\]]mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_dge slong dag bsod nams stobs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam 
[\[18b.6\]]par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[18b.7\]]lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_phyi zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[19a.2\]]sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'das te/_de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten rgyal po zhig gis brtsigs 
[\[19a.3\]]nas dus ston gyi lugs bcas so/_/phyis re zhig na mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa'i tshe gaN DI yang brdungs/_rnga yang brdungs te/_dung sgril ma bus nas dge slong zhig 'khor phal po che'i nang na 'dug cing /_phyed yol tsam na srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa dag la nyin mo chos ston 
[\[19a.4\]]to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na rgyan po pa rgyal ba po zhes bya ba rgyan po la shin tu zhen pa zhig gnas te/_de'i chung ma ni rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya bu ni rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas re zhig na rgyan po pa rgyal ba po de ras zung cig gyon pa dang /_gdugs dang mchil 
[\[19a.5\]]lham zung cig dang pa Na lnga'i 'gron bu rnams ma gtogs par ci bdog pa khyim na 'dug pa dang /_phyi rol na 'dug pa thams cad rgyan skugs su yal nas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mi bzad pas gdungs te/_kyi hud bsod nams ma byas pa dang dbul ba ni tha chad mi bzad 
[\[19a.6\]]pa yin no zhes smras nas dbugs tsha ba rgyun ring po'i shugs kyang phyung ste/_mchil lham gnyis ni bgos/_pa Na lnga dang gdugs kyang khyer nas rgyan po'i sa nas song ste/_mthar gyis chos nyan pa gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs der phyin nas de 'byor pa de lta bu dang /_skye bo phal 
[\[19a.7\]]po che thal mo sbyar te chos nyan pa de dag mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/_re zhig chos ji lta bu zhig 'chad pa blta'o snyam du bsams nas/_de nyid kyi phyogs gcig tu gdugs bzhag ste/_mchil lham gnyis phud nas rna blags shing thal mo sbyar te chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]phyir 'dug go/_/de nas re zhig na chos smra bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod de/_bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur/_/de phyir mis ni bsod nams bya/_/de yang yang dang yang du bya/_/de nyid la ni 'dun par bya/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas des tshigs su bcad 
[\[19b.2\]]pa 'di thos nas bsod nams bsags pas bde bar 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin te/_gang gi phyir bdag 'di kho na ltar mchog tu mi bzad par dkos thag cing 'dug pa las na/_bdag gis tshe snga ma la gor ma chag par bsod nams dag ma byas kyis bdag gis bsod nams [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[19b.3\]]cig bya'o snyam du bsams so/_/de nas de ltar bsams nas bdag la ci bdog pa rtog pa la zhugs so/_/re zhig na ras zung cig gyon pa dang /_gdugs dang /_mchil lham gnyis dang /_pa Na lnga'i 'gron bu lus pa rnams mthong ste/_gzhan thams cad rgyan skugs 
[\[19b.4\]]su yal nas de sems pa la zhugs te/_ci ste pa Na lnga dang bla gos sbyin na ni ltogs te 'chi bar yang 'gyur la/_'on te ma sbyin na ni bsod nams med par 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro dgos te/_der yang dang yang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal tha dad du 'gyur na gang gis ltogs te 
[\[19b.5\]]'chi bar yang mi 'gyur la/_bsod nams kyis bgod par yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam ste/_yang bsams pa/_bsod nams med par 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba bas ni ltogs te shi yang slas/_pa Na lnga dang bla gos 'di dag ni nges par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_de 
[\[19b.6\]]de snyam du sems pa'i skabs su yang chos smra bas tshigs su bcad pa tha dad pa 'di brjod de/_/bsod nams dal nas byed na ni/_/sdig la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/_/de phyir dge ba smyur te bya/_/sdig pa las ni sems kyang bzlog_/ces smras so/_/de nas des 
[\[19b.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas bsams pa/_bsod nams smyur te bya'o zhes bshad pas na la gor du sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyan po pa dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dad pa'i shugs drag pos seng ge'i khri la chos smra ba 'dug pa'i spyi bo'i steng du gdugs bzung 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]nas mchil lham gnyis rkang pa'i drung du bzhag ste/_paN lnga'i 'gron bu de dag gis chos smra ba'i rkang pa la gtor nas rang gi lus las bla gos phud de chos smra ba'i rkang pa la bkab nas ba spu thams cad zing zhes byas nas dad par gyur te/_rkang pa gnyis la gtugs 
[\[20a.2\]]nas dad pa'i shugs drag pos smon lam 'debs pa la zhugs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_chos kyi phyir sbyin pa yongs su btang ba 'dis na bdag tshe 'di nyid phan chad dbul por ma gyur cig_/skye ba thams cad du yang bsod nams kyis che bar grags par 
[\[20a.3\]]gyur cig_/lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang bdag rgyal por bcug par gyur cig_/ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'grub par gyur cig_/bdag btsa' ba na yang ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba mang po dag 'byung bar gyur cig_/gter mi zad pa'i rin po che 
[\[20a.4\]]mang po dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par yongs su gang ba dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces des de ltar smon lam btab pa'i skabs su chos smra bas kyang kha ton du yongs su bsngo ba byas te 'khor thams cad dong ngo /_/rgyan po pa rgyal ba po yang chos kyi phyir sbyin pa de nyid yid 
[\[20a.5\]]la sems shing ras gcig pu gyon bzhin du bdag gi khyim du song nas chung ma dang bus mthong ngo /_/de nas chung ma dang bus bsams pa/_'dis ga shed du bla gos dang rgyan skugs su yal bar byas zhig gu snyam ste/_mi dga' bar gyur nas/_da ni bdag cag gnyis lus su zad de/_
[\[20a.6\]]bdag cag gnyis kyang yal bar byed du 'ong gis 'dong ngo zhes smras so/_/de yang ngo tsha nas bdag ni dbul ba'i nyes pas 'di ltar sma bab po snyam bsams nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ci zhig sdug bsngal dbul ba sdug bsngal yin/_/ci zhig shin tu sdug bsngal dbul de nyid/_/
[\[20a.7\]]dbul ba dag ni shi ba dang yang mtshungs/_/bdag ni shi ba 'dam gyi dbul ba min/_/zhes smras nas/_dbugs tsha ba rgyun rings po'i shugs phyung ste cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas de'i khyim gyi ra ba na khron pa zhig yod de/_de'i chung mas chu bcu ba'i phyir bum pa thag pas btags nas 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]de'i nang du btang ste chu yar dbyung snyam pa dang /_re zhig na yar dbyung bar ma nus nas des rgyal ba po la/_jo bo bum pa 'di yar dbyung bar mi nus na tshur spyon te gzigs zhes bos so/_/de nas des kyang yar dbyung bar brtsams so/_/re zhig na des kyang yar dbyung ma nus 
[\[20b.2\]]nas de gnyis kyis bu la bos so/_/de nas de gsum char gyis sha dang pags pa ral te/_'bad pa chen pos de'u ma phyin te phyin to/_/re zhig na bltas na bum pa de'i 'og na zangs zung lnga gser dngul gyis yongs su gang ba thogs shing 'dug pa mthong ste/_de nas rgyan po pa rgyal ba pos tshe 
[\[20b.3\]]'di'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas ya mtshan gyis mig rgyas te/_snying rab tu dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma nyes pa kun spangs pa/_/yon tan ngo bo nyid kyi zhing /_/da lta bdag gis sa bon btab/_/da ltar nyid du 'bras bur smin/_/ces 
[\[20b.4\]]smras so/_/de nas de'i chung ma de yang ya mtshan gyis mig rgyas te smras pa/_jo bo 'di ci zhig la dgongs te gsungs/_des skabs 'di rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas des tshe 'di nyid la bsod nams dag gis 'bras bu mchog tu yid du 'ong ba smin pa'i rmad du byung ba de mthong nas ya mtshan du 
[\[20b.5\]]gyur to/_/gtam de yang gcig nas gcig tu thos pas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag kun du grags so/_/de thos pas skye bo phal po che ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur nas phan tshun du kye ma ngo mtshar to/_/kye ma bsod nams dag gi che ba nyid ces 'dzin to/_/de nas glo bur du phyug cing 
[\[20b.6\]]nor mang la longs spyod che bar gyur te bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong nas/_des sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la dad pa drag pos shas cher bkur sti byas so/_/de nas de nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa rgya cher byed do/_/
[\[20b.7\]]chos kyang nyan to/_/dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas bzang pos yang dag par tshim par byed do/_/dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_nad pa dang /_slong ba gzhan dag kyang nor gyis ci 'dod par yang dag par 'tshengs par byed do/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gtsug lag khang chen po yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba yang byed du bcug ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas de'i grags pas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de kun du rgyas par gyur to/_/phyis re zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de'i 
[\[21a.2\]]rgyal po bu med par dus las 'das so/_/de nas grong khyer gyi mi dang blon po rnams kyis rgyan po pa rgyal ba po bsod nams kyis che bar grags par shes nas rgyal por bcug go/_/de nas de'i ming rgyan po pa rgyal ba po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni med par gyur te/_rgyal 
[\[21a.3\]]po rgyal ba po rgyal po rgyal ba po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po rgyal ba pos tshe de nyid la bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mchog tu yid du 'ong ba mthong nas dad pa skyes te/_shas cher bsod nams la brten par gyur to/_/de rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin 
[\[21a.4\]]pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas so/_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_blon po dang grong khyer gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang skye bo'i tshogs gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dag la yang dag par btsud do/_/phyi zhig na 
[\[21a.5\]]rgyal po rgyal ba po 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/_lha'i rgyal po dbang byed kyi bur skyes so/_/de skyes pa na nam mkha' las lha'i rin po che'i char dang gos kyi char rnam par mdzes pa bab bo/_/
[\[21a.6\]]de'i lus las kyang gang gis dbang byed kyi pho brang de dag thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_dbang byed kyi lha gzhan dag gi 'od kyang 'od med par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung bar gyur to/_/de'i bsod nams dag gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de mthong nas 
[\[21a.7\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/dge slong dag khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po pa rgyal ba por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzin na de de ltar mi blta'i/_rgyal po bsod nams stobs de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po pa rgyal ba por gyur to/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]dam pa'i chos thos nas sems dad par gyur pa des chos smra ba la gdugs dang mchil lham gnyis dang bla gos dang pa Na lnga'i 'gron bu rnams phul ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe de nyid la gter lnga yang byung ngo /_/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por yang bcug 
[\[21b.2\]]go/_/las de nyid kyi rnam par smin pas lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan sum cu 
[\[21b.3\]]rtsa drug gi bar du dga' ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'thab bral ba rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la 
[\[21b.4\]]dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/lan brgya phrag du mar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i 
[\[21b.5\]]rin po che sna bdun ni rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yin te/_'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang bdun pa ste blon po rin po che rnams so/_/de'i bu stong tham pa yod de dpa' 
[\[21b.6\]]ba dang /_rtul phod pa dang /_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag go/_/des sa chen po rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa 'di nyid ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med de/_chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med 
[\[21b.7\]]la/_chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang gis bdag nyid chen po yi/_/bdag por 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'di yin/_/sangs rgyas phan 'dogs de dag gis/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]'jig rten du ni 'di gsungs so/_/rdzu 'phrul rgya che 'di dag dang /_/ngo mtshar 'di dag thos gyur na/_/mkhas dang nag po'i rigs skyes pa'ang /_/su zhig dad par byed mi 'gyur/_/de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing /_/bdag nyid chen po 'dod pas 
[\[22a.2\]]'dir/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas la/_/dam pa'i chos ni bla mar bya/_/dge slong dag de bas na dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/rim gror bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag dam pa'i chos la bkur sti byed/_bla mar 
[\[22a.3\]]byed/_rim gro byed/_mchod pa byed cing brten te gnas par bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs 
[\[22a.4\]]pa brjod pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D348}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsan+d+ra pra b+ha a ba dA naM/_bod skad du/_zla 
[\[22a.5\]]'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis phung po'i 
[\[22a.6\]]lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gang dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis gtso bo de
