[\[22a.7\]]mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ma bzod nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i thog mar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]gyi bu gnyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams las rnam par grol 
[\[22b.2\]]ba na/_gtso bo mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi bzod nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i thog mar mya ngan las 'das pa ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_gang 'das pa'i dus na dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 'dod chags dang bcas 
[\[22b.3\]]pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa dang bcas pa na yang nga la gcig tu sems mngon par 
[\[22b.4\]]dad pas gtso bo 'chi ba mthong bar mi bzod nas dus byas te/_'dod pa'i khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na byang phyogs na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba 
[\[22b.5\]]'byor pa/_rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/_mi dang skye bo'i tshogs mang pos gang ba/_chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis kun nas gru bzhi par gyur te/_shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/_rta babs dang skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can mthon po dang 
[\[22b.6\]]rab tu ldan pa dang /_tshong zong dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyis kun du gang ba/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_yul 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis yongs su gang ba/_mi rnams gzhung lugs la gnas pa/_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rnga dang /_sgra 
[\[22b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_dung gi sgra rnams kyi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'o/_/dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang de na ta ga ru'i dri dang /_a ga ru'i dri dang /_tsan dan gyi dri dang /_phye ma'i dri dang /_gur gum gyi dri dang /_me tog gi dri zhim pa rnams te/_dus 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]thams cad du 'di lta bu'i dri sna tshogs pa rlung gis bskyod nas lam dang srang bar dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su ldang zhing rgyu ba dang /_glang po dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /_
[\[23a.2\]]bzhon pa dang /_theg pa dang /_srang dang /_lam po che nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_zla ba phyed pa btags pas lha'i gnas bzhin du nye 
[\[23a.3\]]bar mdzes par gyur pa dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_ri'i rgyal po las mngon par 'thon pa'i mtsho dang /_rdzing bu dang /_lteng ka dang /_chu mig dang /_'bab chus nye bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa dang /_ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI kas 
[\[23a.4\]]kun du khebs pa/_shing sA la dang /_ta la dang /_ta ma la dang /_dong ka dang a sho ka dang /_ti la ka dang /_pur Na ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_ba ku la dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_ta ma la'i me tog gis kun du khebs pa dang ldan pa dang /_nags tshal gyi phyogs na ka la 
[\[23a.5\]]ping ka dang /_ne tso dang /_sha ri ka dang /_khu byug dang /_rma bya dang /_shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs par gyur pa dang /_shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pas nyams dga' bar byas pa dang /_skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba mdun na yod de/_dge slong dag rdo 
[\[23a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa skye ba dran pa/_lha'i mig dang ldan pa/_gling gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/_chos dang 
[\[23a.7\]]ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po/_/'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gyur to/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od rang la 'od yod pas 'gro na yang mun pa med par gyur te/_nor bu rin po che'i 'od dam/_mar me'i 'od dam/_sgron ma mdun du mi 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]khyer gyi/_dge slong dag gzhan du na rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus las 'od byung bar gyur te/_dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las 'od 'byung ba bzhin du 'di'i lus la 'od byung ste rgyu 'dis na rgyal po zla 'od zla 'od ces ming du gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[23b.2\]]na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong byung bar gyur te/_'byor pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo mang po dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang rgyal po zla 'od kyi 'dzam 
[\[23b.3\]]bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/_dpya dang /_sho gam dang /_gru btsas med de/_zhing gi 'byor pa dang ldan pa/_skye bo rnams zhi ba dang khyim bya'i sgra dang ldan pa/_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang rgyal po dang rgyal rigs dang ldan par gyur to/_/dge slong 
[\[23b.4\]]dag yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad lo bzhi khri bzhi stong par gyur to/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od ni byang chub sems dpar gyur te/_thams cad ster ba/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/_des rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas byung ste/_grong 
[\[23b.5\]]khyer gyi shar phyogs su gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/_gser gyi rnga bo che yang dag par brdungs nas sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/de bzhin du grong khyer gyi lho dang /_nub dang /_byang du'ang sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/sum mdo'i 
[\[23b.6\]]dbus su'ang sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed de/_'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_mar me dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_rgyab rten dang /_skye bo rnams kyi 
[\[23b.7\]]gnas dang /_gdugs dang /_shing rta dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan dang /_gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang /_dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang /_gser gyi rwa btags pa'i ba lang rnams dang /_khar ba'i bzho snod rnams dang /_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa rnams kyang sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/gos kha dog sna tshogs pa yul sna tshogs pa las byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la 'di lta ste/_dar la dang /_rgya'i dar dang /_rin che ba'i 
[\[24a.2\]]gos dang /_du gu la dang /_mri gA pA na dang /_bag le pa dang /_la ba dang /_rin po che dang /_gser dang /_gos gser gyi rgyan can dang /_ka shi ka'i dar dang /_gos dar la sogs pa rnams kyang sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/dge slong dag rgyal 
[\[24a.3\]]po zla 'od kyis sbyin pa ji snyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang /_nor che ba dang /_longs spyod che bar gyur pa de snyed rab tu gtong ngo /_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis gang glang po dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_gdugs la sogs pa'i sbyin pa ji 
[\[24a.4\]]snyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na mi gcig kyang rkang gis 'gro ba med pa de snyed rab tu gtong ste/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad kyang glang po'i rgyab dang /_rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta steng nas gser dang dngul gyi gdugs 'dzin pa dang ldan pa dang /_skyed mos 
[\[24a.5\]]tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang /_yul 'khor nas yul 'khor dang /_grong khyer nas grong khyer du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de nas yang rgyal po zla 'od 'di ltar sems par gyur te/_ngas sbyin pa 'di tsam zhig byin pa tsam gyis ci zhig bya ste/_gos dang 
[\[24a.6\]]rgyan dang /_cha bzhag rnams nga nyid ci 'dra ba 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rab tu byin ni 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse zhing rol par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad la cod pan 
[\[24a.7\]]dang /_dar dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_cha bzhag rnams byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang /_rgyal po la 'os pa rnams sbyin pa rab tu byin no/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]'od kyis rgyal po la 'os pa/_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_cod pan dang /_dar rnams rab tu byin pa gang gis ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad cod pan thogs shing dar dpyangs 'ching bar gyur te/_rgyal po zla 'od rnam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams 
[\[24b.2\]]cad kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur te/_de ltar rab tu byin no/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]dril bsgrags te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi khyed thams cad nga ci srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse zhing rol cig ces bsgrags so/_dge slong 
[\[24b.3\]]dag de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis dril bsgrags pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis thos pa dang /_thams cad rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse ba la zhugs te/_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar rnga dang /_sgra [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /_rnga [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rdza rnga dang /_
[\[24b.4\]]dung stong phrag dang /_sil snyan brgya snyed kyi sgra'i rol mo brdung zhing dpung rgyan dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig gi rgyan rnams dang /_rna cha thogs pa dang /_rgyan gyis brgyan la bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal srid kyi dpal la rjes su 
[\[24b.5\]]spyod par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na mi rnams rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rol te/_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar rnga dang /_sgra [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_dung gi sgras grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du 
[\[24b.6\]]sgra bsgrags pa dang /_gang yang rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che rnams brdungs pa na 'di lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i grong khyer de na glu dang /_gar dang /_
[\[24b.7\]]rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i sgras gcig tu bde ba la 'jog cing shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bye ba stong dung phyur bdun 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]cu rtsa gnyis kyi mi rnams gnas so/_/yang dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od chos nyid kyis gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa ste/_gzhan yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dga' bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang bud med 
[\[25a.2\]]rnams kyis mthong ba na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba 'thob bo/_/dus gang gi tshe rgyal po zla 'od grong khyer nas byung ste sbyin gtong gi gnas su song ba na srog chags bye ba brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams lta zhing 'di skad kyang smra ste/_kye ma rgyal po zla 'od 'di ni lha zhig 
[\[25a.3\]]'ongs nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po byed pa yin gyi/_rgyal po zla 'od kyi gzugs dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs de lta bu ni 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la yod pa ma yin no/_/de gang dang gang du bltas pa de dang de dag tu bud med stong phrag gis bltas te/_bud 
[\[25a.4\]]med gang 'di khyor rnyed pa de ni skal ba can yin no/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_sems dag pa rnams kyis rnyed kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin te/_rgyal po zla 'od 'di ni lha dang 'dra bar blta'o/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyi blon po stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum 
[\[25a.5\]]yod de/_de rnams kyi nang na blon po gnyis ni blon po thams cad las khyad du 'phags pa yin te/_blon po zla ba bzang po dang sa 'dzin zhes bya ba gnyis mkhas par grags pa blo dang ldan pa las thams cad la dbang byed pa/_rgyal po'i gces spras byed pa/_rgyal po yongs su 
[\[25a.6\]]skyong ba/_rgyal po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad la sems las chung ngur byed pa dang /_blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po ni 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di yang dag par blangs la gnas par gyis shig ces 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi 
[\[25a.7\]]thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyor bar byed de/_dge slong dag blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po'i gdams ngag rjes su ston pa 'di lta bu byed par gyur to/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zla 'od ni blon po'i mchog zla ba chen 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]po la sdug par gyur pa dang /_dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur te/_gzhan yang de'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang dbyibs la 'dis bltas pa na ngoms pa med de/_skad cig kyang de mi spong bar gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po'i rmi lam du du 
[\[25b.2\]]ba'i mdog can gyi sha za rnams kyis rgyal po zla 'od kyi cod pan phrogs par rmis te sad nas de 'jigs skrag pas rengs par gyur cing spu zing zhes byed de/_nges par rgyal po zla 'od kyi dbu slong ba zhig 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram/_lha ni thams cad stsol ba/_thams cad yongs 
[\[25b.3\]]su gtong ba yin te/_'di la ni dman pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_slong ba rnams la mi stsol ba dang /_yongs su mi gtong ba ni gzhan ci yang mi mnga' bas na/_rgyal po zla 'od la rmi lam 'di mi zhu'i gzhan du na rin po che'i mgo 
[\[25b.4\]]rnams byas la/_mdzod dang bang bar bcug la bzhag ste/_gal te 'ga' zhig lha'i dbu slong ba 'ongs par gyur na/_de la rin po che'i mgo 'di rnams kyis brid par bya'o snyam nas rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'i mgo byas te mdzod dang bang ba rnams su bzhag par gyur to/_/de 
[\[25b.5\]]nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe blon po'i mchog sa 'dzin gyi rmi lam du rgyal po zla 'od kyi rin po che rnams kyi mgo rnam pa brgyar lhags par rmis pa dang /_yang 'jigs shing skrag la kun du skyo nas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/_
[\[25b.6\]]yang bram ze ltas mkhan mkhas pa rnams bos nas bdag gis 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis na/_rmi lam de'i 'bras bu ci lta bu yin pa lung ston cig_/ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_rmi lam mthong ba'i 'di ji lta ba las ni ring po mi thogs par lha'i dbu slong ba 'ga' zhig 'ong bar 
[\[25b.7\]]'gyur te/_'di 'dra bar ston pa yin no/_/de skad thos pa dang yang blon po'i mchog sa 'dzin lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/_shin tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur te/_rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]mnyes gshin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe blon po stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum po rnams kyis rmi lam 'di ltar mthong ste/_rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas khang bzhi ru gnod sbyin 
[\[26a.2\]]lag na thod pa thogs pa rnams kyis gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams bsgyel ba dang /_gser gyi rnga bo che'ang bcag par rmis pa dang /_yang 'jigs shing skrag la sems skyo nas rgyal po zla 'od sa chen po skyong ba/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang 
[\[26a.3\]]ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs kyis phyin par mi 'gyur ram/_bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig pa las gnas pa las tha dad par 'gyur ba dang /_so so ba dang /_bye ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ram/_'dzam bu'i gling pa 
[\[26a.4\]]rnams skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par mi 'gyur ram/_de rgyal po zla 'od kyis kyang thos pa dang /_yang grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du dril bsgrags te/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse zhing rol cig_/khyed rnams sgyu ma lta 
[\[26a.5\]]bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya/_rgyal po zla 'od kyis dril bsgrags pa thos pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad sil snyan chen po dang /_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar rnga dang /_sgra [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[26a.6\]]dang /_dung stong phrag snyed kyi rol mo brdung zhing rtse bar brtsams pa dang /_gser gyi dbu rgyan dang do shal dang se mo do'i nor bu'i rna rgyan thogs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te rgyal po'i dpal la rjes su spyod par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i 
[\[26a.7\]]dus na 'dzam bu'i gling na glu dang /_gar dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du gling bu nges par 'bud pa dang /_gang yang sbyin gtong gi gnas chen po bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che brdungs pa las snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar gyur te/_des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du sgra grags 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]par gyur te/_dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na glu dang /_gar dang rol mo'i sgra grags pa bzhin no/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na ri spos ngad ldang na bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya ba mig 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa zhig gnas pa dang /_bram ze drag po'i mig 
[\[26b.2\]]gis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba thams cad ster bar thos so/_/thos nas kyang bdag nyid kyis bsams pa/_bdag song la mgo bslang na/_gal te thams cad gtong bar gyur pa yin na ni bdag la yang mgo ster bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na gang sdug pa 
[\[26b.3\]]dang /_phongs pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_mngon par dga' bar bya ba yan lag gi mchog mgo yongs su gtong ba 'di ni dka' ba dang /_'di ni gnas med pa dang /_'di ni go skabs med do snyam nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang las babs so/_/de nas spos kyi ngad ldang na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[26b.4\]]mo zhig ngu bar rtsom ste/_kyi hud rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa na sdug bsngal lo/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bas mun nag tu gyur te/_
[\[26b.5\]]'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs sreg pa dang /_bar snang la lha rnams mya ngan byed par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na sna tshogs bshes gnyen zhes bya ba'i drang srong mngon 
[\[26b.6\]]par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa zhig 'khor lnga brgyas bskor nas gnas te/_de nas drang srong des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par mthong ba dang /_'khor rnams la 
[\[26b.7\]]smras pa/_gang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad da ltar du bas mun nag tu gyur te/_'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang lam me ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin pa bu khyed rnams kyis shes sam/_nges par skyes bu chen po 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang nags kyi lha rnams ngu /_/nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ni dmod par byed/_/zla ba gzi med nyi ma dag kyang 'od med gyur/_/deng ni rol mo brdungs kyang sgra ni grag ma 
[\[27a.2\]]gyur/_/me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing tshogs 'di dag kyang /_/rlung gis ma bskyod bzhin du sa la lhung bar gyur/_/ji ltar 'jigs pa'i sgra 'di'ang kun du thos pas na/_/grong khyer du ni sdug bsngal mi zad 'byung bar gsal/_/rgyu des grong khyer gnas pa'i skye bo ma 
[\[27a.3\]]lus pa/_/sems la sdug bsngal kun du gtugs nas 'jog pa dang /_cho nges 'debs shing lag pa snying la rdebs par byed/_/skra rnams rab tu grol zhing tshig ni rnam par 'gag_/zla ba'i gdong can bud med rnams ni rab tu ngu /_/grong khyer gnas pa kun kyang 
[\[27a.4\]]snying brtses ngu bar byed/_/sprin 'di rnams kyang char mi 'bab par sgra sgrogs la/_/chu yi gnas rnams nye bar skams pa nyid du gyur/_/ri dang nags rnams kyang ni mi bzad me yis bsregs/_/mi rnams so so'i khyim na shin tu 'khrugs pas ngu /_/chu la rlung gis 
[\[27a.5\]]bskyod pa'i gru bzhin sa rnams g.yos pa dang /_/shin tu rtsub pa'i rdul dang 'dre ba'i rlung ldang gyur/_/bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma ni/_/da ltar 'di na rnam mang ste/_/de bas bdag cag shis pa yi/_/phyogs su 'gro ba shin tu rigs/_/gzhan yang bu rnams rgyal po zla 
[\[27a.6\]]'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che brdungs na yang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar ma gyur pas/_nges par rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der nye bar 'tshe ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze drag po'i mig gis rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]phyin to/_/de nas grong 
[\[27a.7\]]khyer na gnas pa'i lha mos bram ze drag po'i mig rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ba dang /_rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang 'di lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de ring lha'i dbu slong ba/_'tshe ba rnam par tho 'tsham pa/_glags lta ba zhig 'ong 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bar 'gyur te/_de lha'i dbu slong bar 'gyur gyis/_de la lhas sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag nyid yongs su bsrung bar mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis mgo slong bar thos pas yid rab tu dga' zhing ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs pa dang /_lha mo la 
[\[27b.2\]]smras pa/_lha mo ma 'jigs par song shig_/gal te 'ong bar gyur na ngas 'di'i yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de nas lha mo des rgyal po zla 'od rtsol ba'i tshul de lta bu shes pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar de nyid du mi snang bar gyur 
[\[27b.3\]]to/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag gis dbyig dang /_gser dang /_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin pa ni ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_gang yang bdag gis slong ba rnams la rang nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas bram ze drag po'i mig 
[\[27b.4\]]grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs pa dang /_grong khyer gyi lha mos bzlog ste/_bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par slar song shig_/skyes bu gti mug can khyod da ltar rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_yon tan dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[27b.5\]]pa/_'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong bar byed pa/_nyes pa med pa/_gnod pa mi byed pa/_mgo drag po'i sems kyis ci ltar gcod par byed/_bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par phyir song shig_/rnam pa 'di dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis thos so/_/thos nas kyang nga'i slongs mo pa lha 
[\[27b.6\]]mos grong khyer gyi sgo na bkag go snyam nas/_yang blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po la smras pa/_gang 'di zla ba chen pos shes par gyis shig_/nga'i slongs mo pa lha mos grong khyer gyi sgo na bkag gis song la nga'i thad du rings par khyer la shog shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes blon po'i 
[\[27b.7\]]mchog zla ba chen pos rgyal po zla 'od kyi tshig mnyan nas grong khyer gyi sgor song ba dang /_grong khyer gyi lha mo de bzlog ste/_gang 'di lha mo shes par gyis shig_/lha bram ze 'di 'gugs kyis bram ze 'di thong shig_/de nas grong khyer na gnas pa'i lha mos zla ba chen po la 'di skad ces 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]smras so/_/gang yang zla ba chen po shes par gyis shig_/bram ze 'di ni gtum pa'i sems dang /_snying rje med pa'i sems dang /_mi bzad pa'i sems kyis rgyal po zla 'od brlag pa'i phyir rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'ongs na/_khyed la rang bzhin ngan pa 'dis 
[\[28a.2\]]ci zhig bya/_rgyal po zla 'od kyi thad du song nas mgo slong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos lha mo la smras pa/_lha mo gang gis bram ze 'dis lha'i dbu len par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs zhig bsams pa nga la yod do/_/de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos bram ze 
[\[28a.3\]]drag po'i mig khrid de/_de grong khyer du zhugs nas rin po che'i mdzod pa la smras pa/_khyod kyis rin po che las byas pa'i mgo rnams khyer la shog shig dang /_bram ze 'di la ngas sbyin par bya'o/_/mdzod pas kyang rgyal po'i sgor rin po che'i mgo rnams kyi phung po chen po byas pa dang /_
[\[28a.4\]]blon po'i mchog zla ba chen pos bram ze drag po'i mig la rin po che las byas pa'i mgo rnams nye bar bstabs te/_bram ze chen po rin po che'i mgo mang po long shig dang /_dbyig dang /_gser rnams kyis kyang ci tsam dgos pa khyod la sbyin gyis khyer cig_/'dis ni khyod kyi bu 
[\[28a.5\]]dang tsha bo'i bar gyi 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi/_lha'i dbu klad pa dang /_rus pa dang /_ngar snabs dang zhag gis yongs su gang bas ci zhig bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze drag po'i mig gis zla ba chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang 'di zla ba chen po shes par gyis shig_/
[\[28a.6\]]nga la ni rin po che'i mgo rnams dgos pa med de/_gser dang dbyig kyang dgos pa med kyi/_gzhan du na sa chen po skyong ba/_thams cad gtong ba 'di'i mgo slong ba'i phyir 'di'i thad du 'ongs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang /_sa 'dzin gnyis lag pa 'gram 
[\[28a.7\]]pa la gtad de/_da ni dus kyis phyin to snyam nas shin tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis rnam pa de dag nye bar thos nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang /_sa 'dzin gnyis pho nyas bos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze de nga'i gan du khyer la shog 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]shig_/ngas 'di la yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang sa 'dzin gnyis po de yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong gis snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing smras pa/_lha byams pa'i 
[\[28b.2\]]bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_yon tan dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_ye shes la mkhas pa/_lha'i mig dang ldan pa 'di mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/bdag cag rnams deng lha 
[\[28b.3\]]dang lhan cig pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang /_so sor 'gyur ba dang /_bral ba dang /_bye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_shin tu khyad par can gtong zhing yongs su 
[\[28b.4\]]gtong bar 'dod nas ring po nas bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze tshur shog_/khyod gang slong ba de khyer cig_/de nas bram ze drag po'i mig rgyal po zla 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po zla 'od la rgyal ba dang /_tshe spel ba brjod nas rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[28b.5\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad gtong la nges dga' 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge khyod dri med chos la gnas/_/dam pa kun mkhyen mngon par bzhed pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/thugs rje'i bdag nyid thugs ldan bdag la dbu stsol cig_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[28b.6\]]zla 'od kyis bram ze las de lta bu'i tshig brjod pa thos pa dang /_yid rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' bas mig gdangs te/_bram ze drag po'i mig la smras pa/_ji ltar yab kyi bu gcig nga yin yang /_/de lta na yang nga yi mgo 'di khyer/_/khyod kyis bsams pa 'bras bur bcas gyur cing /_
[\[28b.7\]]mgo bo byin pas byang chub thob par shog_/nga'i mgo klad pa khrag dang zhag 'di yis/_/khyod kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba ci yang mi byed kyang /_/khyer te khyod la nga yi mgo gang dgos gyur pa'i/_/yid la re ba 'bras bcas khyod ni dga' bar shog_/bram ze chen po khyod kyis nga'i yan lag gi mchog 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]mgo 'di bar chad med par legs par khyer cig ces smras nas rang nyid kyis cod pan phud do/_/dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis mgo la yod pa'i cod pan phud ma thag tu/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad kyis mgo la yod pa'i cod pan rnams kyang lhung bar gyur to/_/
[\[29a.2\]]rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]phyogs bzhir skar mda' rnams lhung bar gyur te/_grong khyer gyi lha mos rgyal po zla 'od 'di'i mgo bram ze sdig pa can gyis gcod par 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang sa 'dzin gnyis rgyal po zla 'od tshul 'di lta bur 
[\[29a.3\]]rang nyid kyi lus yongs su gtong bar shes nas/_de yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong can gyis rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/_gang lha yang mthong ba 'di ni 'jig rten na skyes bu skal ba can yin no zhes smra zhing de gnyis de la sems mngon par dad pas lta zhing yu bus bram ze drag po'i mig 
[\[29a.4\]]la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_lha'i mi rtag pa nyid la lta bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas skad cig ma de nyid la dus byas te/_'dod pa'i khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi 'bad pa'i tshul 'di lta bu 
[\[29a.5\]]shes nas sa la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_bar snang las rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams cho nges 'debs par brtsams te/_kyi hud da ni rgyal po zla 'od kyi lus yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te sdug bsngal lo/_/de nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor srog chags brgya stong du ma 'dus par gyur to/_/
[\[29a.6\]]de nas bram ze drag po'i mig gis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de mthong nas rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te lhas gnang bar mdzad na/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i mdun du lha'i dbu len rngo mi thogs so/_/gal te khyod dbu yongs su gtong bar mdzad na/_khyed dang bdag dben pa 
[\[29a.7\]]zhig tu gshegs 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze drag po'i mig la smras pa/_bram ze chen po de bzhin du bya yis/_khyed kyi kun du rtog pa 'byor cing rang gi yid la re ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]nang na nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa/_nyams dga' ba ne tso dang /_sha ri ka dang /_khu byug dang /_rma bya dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ka la ping ka rnams yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs pas nags tshal gyi tshogs nyams dga' 
[\[29b.2\]]ba'i skyed mos tshal de'i dbus kyi stegs bu de'i dbus su tsam pa ka'i shing zhig skyes pa yod do/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal po'i stan las langs te/_/ral gri rnon po thogs nas nor bu dang /_rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od 'bad pa'i 
[\[29b.3\]]tshul 'di lta bu la zhugs pa mthong ba dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]grong khyer na srog chags brgya stong du ma cho nges 'debs shing rjes bzhin du 'brang ba dang /_rgyal po zla 'od kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de cho nges 'debs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ba dang yang dbugs dbyung ba'i 
[\[29b.4\]]phyir smras pa/_khyed rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig ces mdor bsdus nas chos bstan te/_bram ze drag po'i mig khrid nas nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs so/_/rgyal po zla 'od nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs 
[\[29b.5\]]ma thag tu rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal gyi sgo bcad nas bram ze la smras pa/_bram 
[\[29b.6\]]ze chen po nga'i yan lag gi mchog 'di khyer cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze drag po'i mig gis rgyal po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbu bdag gis gcod par rngo mi thogs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po zla 'od ral gri rnon po thogs nas/_skyed 
[\[29b.7\]]mos tshal der gang na dus thams cad pa'i tsam pa ka'i shing yod pa der song ngo /_/de nas skyed mos tshal de'i lha mos rgyal po zla 'od tshul 'di lta bur rang nyid yongs su gtong ba la zhugs par shes nas cho nges 'debs par rtsom zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/bram ze sdig pa can khyod de ltar 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rgyal po zla 'od nyes pa med pa gnod pa med pa/_yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa 'di'i mgo ji ltar gcod par byed/_de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo de phyir bzlog ste/_lha mo nga'i mgo slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha mo sngon 
[\[30a.2\]]byung ba na nga'i yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la lha mo zhig gis bar chad byas pas lha mo de'i bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyes la/_ngas kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes yun ring po zhig gis 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo ngas nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal 'di nyid 
[\[30a.3\]]du mgo stong snyed yongs su gtong ba byas na/_nga la sus kyang bar chad ma byas so/_/de bas na lha mo khyod kyis nga'i yan lag gi mchog slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig_/lha mo gang du ngas stag mo la bdag nyid yongs su btang ste/_lus yongs su gtong ba gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[30a.4\]]byams pa bskal pa bzhi bcur zhugs pa phyir 'dums par byas pa'i sa phyogs ni 'di yin no/_/de nas lha mo de rgyal po zla 'od kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po de mthong nas/_rgyal po de la sems mgu ba chen po skyes te/_cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po zla 'od yang dag pa'i smon lam byed pa 
[\[30a.5\]]la zhugs te/_gang skyed mos tshal gyi tshogs na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci khyed rnams gson cig_/bdag skyed mos tshal 'dir rab tu gtong ba dang gtong ba'i yang shin tu gtong ba rang gi mgo yongs su gtong ba'i gtong ba byed de/_bdag 
[\[30a.6\]]gi mgo yongs su gtong ba de yang rgyal po'i phyir ma yin/_mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/_brgya byin gyi phyir ma yin/_bdud kyi phyir ma yin/_tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/_'khor los sgyur ba'i yul gyi phyir ma yin gyi/_gzhan du na 'dir ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[30a.7\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can ma dul ba gdul ba dang /_ma bsgral ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/bden pa dang 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bden pa'i tshig 'dis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cig_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gdung 'byung bar gyur cig_/nor bu dang rin po che'i skyed mos tshal 'di'i dbus su yang mchod rten chen po/_mchod rten thams cad las khyad par 
[\[30b.2\]]du 'phags pa byung bar gyur nas/_sems can gang lus ngal ba mchod rten chen po la phyag 'tshal du 'ong bar gyur cig_/de rnams kyis mchod rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sku gdung 'jog pa de mthong bas ngal ba med par gyur cig_/ngal ba med par gyur nas nga'i 
[\[30b.3\]]mchod rten la skye bo'i tshogs 'ongs nas mchod pa byed na/_mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhol bar yang gyur cig ces smras nas/_tsam pa ka'i shing la gtsug phud bcings nas/_bram ze la bos te smras pa/_bram ze chen po tshur shog_/bgegs ma byed par nga'i mgo bregs la khyer cig_/
[\[30b.4\]]de nas rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus kyi mthu dang stobs yang dag par skyes nas/_bram ze de la snying rje chen po lhan cig tu 'gro ba dang 'byung ba'i byams pa'i sems bskyed nas mgo bcad de/_bram ze drag po'i mig la byin to/_/dus byas pa dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las shin tu 'das nas 
[\[30b.5\]]phul du byung ba'i dge rgyas kyi lha'i ris kyi nang du skyes so/_/dge slong dag de nas mgo yongs su btang ma thag tu yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/g.yos rab tu g.yos te/_nam mkha'i dkyil na mngon par gnas 
[\[30b.6\]]pa'i lha rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/bar snang gi lha rnams kyang lha'i ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka rnams 'thor zhing /_a ga ru'i phye ma rnams dang /_ta ga ru'i phye ma rnams dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams dang /_lha rnams kyi me tog man 
[\[30b.7\]]dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po rnams 'thor ba dang /_gos rnams kyi char yang 'bebs so/_/lha rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra yang yang dag par rdung ngo /_/de nas bram ze drag po'i mig mgo khyer te nor bu dang /_rin po che'i snying po'i skyed mos tshal nas byung ba dang /_srog chags brgya 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]stong du mas kyi hud lha bsad de sdug bsngal lo zhes sgra phyung ste/_de na kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog go/_/kha cig ni lag pa brkyang ste cho nges 'debs so/_/bud med rnams kyang skra bshig nas ngu'o/_/srog chags brgya stong du ma yang 'dus te de na gcig tu gnas 
[\[31a.2\]]te de nyid du gnas nas/_bsam gtan rnams bskyed de/_de nyid du dus byas nas rgyal po zla 'od dang skal ba mnyam par dge rgyas kyi lha rnams su skyes so/_/kha cig ni bsam gtan bskyed nas gnas de nyid du dus byas te 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/gzhan rnams ni 
[\[31a.3\]]'dus nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi lus dri thams cad dang ldan pa'i ro sreg pa'i shing byas te bsregs so/_/rus pa de rnams kyang gser gyi bum par bcug ste/_lam po che'i bzhi mdor sku gdung gi mchod rten rab tu bzhag ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs te/_
[\[31a.4\]]dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos kyi phye ma dang /_rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas rgyal po zla 'od la gcig tu sems mngon par dad pas de bzhin du skyo bas bsam gtan bskyed de/_bsam gtan bskyed pa des dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/la la ni rgyal po zla 
[\[31a.5\]]'od ma mthong bas mya ngan gyis zil gyis mnan te dus byas nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug tu skyes so/_/gang der dus byas pa de dag thams cad kyang mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhol bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na byang phyogs na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gyur pa de gzhan 
[\[31a.6\]]yin par mi blta ste/_rdo 'jog 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_gang rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba de ni nga yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs te de nyid kyis nor bu dang rin po che'i snying po'i skyed 
[\[31a.7\]]mos tshal du bram ze drag po'i mig la mgo yongs su btang ngo /_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_gang bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya ba de ni lha sbyin yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze drag po'i mig tu gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/_gang de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po'i mchog zla ba chen 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]po dang /_sa 'dzin de gnyis ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu 'di gnyis yin no/_/'di gnyis kyis nga yang mya ngan las 'das pa ma bzod nas nga nyid 'chi ba ma mthong bar thog ma nyid du dus byas so/_/da ltar yang nga mya ngan las 'das pa ma bzod de nga mya ngan las 'das pa ma 
[\[31b.2\]]mthong bar de thog ma nyid du mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal po zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[31b.3\]]po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/_dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa//[ {D349}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI se na a ba dA naM/_bod skad du/_
[\[31b.4\]]dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam 
[\[31b.5\]]par smin pa yang shes bzhin du/_sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni de ltar na kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yin pa de las kyang gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na/_de la ma 
[\[31b.6\]]byin nam bgo bsha' ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/_de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes bzhin du sems can rnams 
[\[31b.7\]]kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas ni de'i phyir de dag ni kun du 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa'am/_bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/_de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dug 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad du gsungs nas/_gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin/_/ji ltar don chen gyur pa de/_/drang srong che rnams 
[\[32a.2\]]gsungs pa bzhin/_/sems can rnams kyis shes na ni/_/ma byin bar du mi za zhing /_/ser sna can du mi 'gyur la/_/de dag kun du 'dzin pa'i sems/_/nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na/_/gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/_/bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes 
[\[32a.3\]]pas/_/de phyir kun du 'dzin sems kyis/_/rtag tu ma byin za bar byed/_/de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang /_/sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bshad pa de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cing /_bcom ldan 
[\[32a.4\]]'das nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu mthong ba na ngo mtshar skyes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis 
[\[32a.5\]]par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag cho 
[\[32a.6\]]'phrul 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ba'i rgyu nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo 
[\[32a.7\]]legs pa/_skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/_chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/_zheng du dpag tshad bdun pa/_gru bzhi pa/_rnam par 'byes pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rta babs sgreng ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ba stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug gi bdag po byed pa zhig byung bar 
[\[32b.2\]]gyur to/_/rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthus shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bur ldan zhing lha rnams dus dus su char yang dag par 'bebs la/_lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/sems can rnams kyang nad med par gyur te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[32b.3\]]kyang phan tshun byams pa'i sems kyis gnas so/_/rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang ba/_yul gyi bzang mo rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang /_
[\[32b.4\]]sdug pa dang /_phangs pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang sho gam dang gru btsas med de/_zhing gi 'byor pa dang ldan pa/_skye bo rnams zhi ba/_khyim bya rnams dang ldan pa'i yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[32b.5\]]rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde byang chub sems dpar gyur te/_thams cad ster ba/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba dang /_gtong ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang 
[\[32b.6\]]gi sha yang gtong ste/_des ma byin pa dang /_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med do/_/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha'i shar phyogs kyi grong khyer mthar sbyin gtong gi gnas byas te/_sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/lho dang nub dang byang gi grong 
[\[32b.7\]]khyer gyi sgor sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/sum mdo'i dbus na yang sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed do/_/'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_mar me dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dri dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_rgyab rten dang /_gnas dang /_gzugs rnams dang /_shing rta dang /_glang po dang /_rta dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gser gyi snod dngul gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang /_dngul gyi snod gser gyi phye 
[\[33a.2\]]mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang /_ba lang gser gyi rwa dang /_dngul gyi rmig pa btags pa/_khar ba'i bzho snod dang /_ras zung gis bkab pa rnams dang /_gzhon nu ma rnams dang /_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas sbyin pa ni gtong /_bsod nams ni byed de/_dge slong dag ji tsam du 
[\[33a.3\]]rgyal po dpal gyi sdes ci tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang /_nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod che bar gyur pa de tsam du sbyin pa rnams byin no/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha'i grong khyer na bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/_rgyal po dpal gyi 
[\[33a.4\]]sde de dag thams cad kyi sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob bo/_/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis yod de/_blon po de rnams kyi mchog blo gros chen po zhes 
[\[33a.5\]]bya ba mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_blo dang ldan pa/_thams cad la dbang byed pa/_rgyal po yongs su skyong bar byed pa/_rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang /_phangs par gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/des 'di'i gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs mthong 
[\[33a.6\]]ba na ngoms pa med de/_skad cig kyang 'di dang mi 'bral lo/_/dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyar te/_shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rten cig_/dge ba 
[\[33a.7\]]bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par zung shig ces dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par sbyor te/_dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde de lta bu'i gdams ngag rjes su ston par gyur to/_/'di lta ste 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i dus su gang 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi gang la la 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]dus byas te lus zhig nas de lha'i ris drug tu skye bar gyur to/_/gang phal cher ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ngo /_/de nas der go skabs med par 
[\[33b.2\]]gyur pa dang /_blta na sdug gi phyi rol yongs 'du dang /_shing rta sna tshogs can dang /_dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to/_/de nas sngon skyes pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong ste/_rab tu dga' 
[\[33b.3\]]nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid lha'i bu de dag gis gang ste lha'i tshogs ni 'phel bar gyur/_lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib par gyur pa'i ngo mtshar 'di la gzigs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i 
[\[33b.4\]]bu rnams las thos nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na ri'i rgyal po ri rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyed cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam 
[\[33b.5\]]nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i mthu yin par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig_/'dzam gling dbang 
[\[33b.6\]]phyug rgyal po ni/_/dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa/_/rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang /_/rgyal po chen po chos la gnas/_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge zhing /_/sems can kun la phan par dga'/_/gtso bo mi rnams dge ba la/_rtag tu yang dag sbyor bar byed/_/rtag tu snying rje'i 
[\[33b.7\]]bdag nyid can/_/phyi rol dngos po rab gtong zhing /_/de ni sha yang slong ba la/_/rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis ster/_/nang ngam yang na phyi rol la/_/de ni yongs su 'dzin med par/_/rjes brtse nyid kyi gtong byed cing /_/byang chub mthar dbyung ba la brtson/_/des ni rnam dag gser bzhin du/_/
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubs pas/_/rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni/_/thams cad mtho ris la gzhol 'gyur/_/rgyal po blo gros che de yi/_/mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang ni dud 'gro yi/_/skye gnas rnams su skye mi 'gyur/_/
[\[34a.2\]]de yi gzi brjid mthu yis ni/_/thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims dga' 'gyur bar/_/dga' ba'i tshal na dga' bas rtse/_/dpal gyi sde la rjes bsten par/_/gus dang bcas par gyur pa 'di/_/lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar/_/de yang 
[\[34a.3\]]dga' bas rnam par snang /_/de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig de thos pa dang yid dga' ba dang /_sems rangs par gyur te/_dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang rgyal po 'di yan lag dang nying lag kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod par rtsol ba ni 
[\[34a.4\]]ngo mtshar che'o/_/'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/_bdag dang mnyam par phangs pa gzhan med pas de ji ltar na bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par gtong bar gyur te/_'di ni 
[\[34a.5\]]rjes su dpag par nus pa ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed rnams de skad ma smra shig_/rgyal po 'di ni mthu che ste rdzu 'phrul che ba/_snying rje che bas tha na rang gi sha yang gtong ste/_'di la yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med do/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe btsun 
[\[34a.6\]]mo rgyal ba'i 'od stan chen po la nyal ba na tho rangs kyi dus su rmi lam bzhi rmis te/_dpal gyi sde stan las bdag nyid phab nas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang /_rang gi mig phyung ste slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad de sa la lhung ba yang skyes par 
[\[34a.7\]]mthong ba dang /_mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rdo bcag pa'i mdog 'dra ba zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung ste/_phrogs nas slar yang skye bar rmis so/_/gnyid sad pa dang 'jigs par gyur/_dngangs par gyur/_spu zing zhes byed de/_nga'am lha la sdug 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bsngal 'ba' zhig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/_des rgyal po dpal gyi sde la smras so/_/de rmi ltas la byang ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/_'dis rmi lam ji lta bu mthong ba las na ring po mi thogs par chung ma 'di nyid slong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas smras 
[\[34b.2\]]pa/_ma 'jigs shig_/sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya/_dpal gyi sde stan la bdag nyid gnas par khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_mig mi nyams par de bzhin du 'dug pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang /_nga'i yang dpung pa g.yon pa 
[\[34b.3\]]gnas bzhin pa nyid ces des dbugs phyung ba dang /_cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/ji tsam na mtshan mo gnyis pa la blon po'i mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i rmi lam du rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mod la zhig pa dang /_rin po che de 
[\[34b.4\]]rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang /_slar yang khang [{]bzangs so [,]bzang ngo  [}]sor sbyar bar rmis so/_/sad pa dang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_yi mug ste spu zing zhes byed pa dang /_bsams pas sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa dang /_
[\[34b.5\]]lha dpal gyi sde'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur grang /_lha yang thams cad stsol ba/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par gtong ste/_'di lta ste dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa rnams la 'di yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med do/_/
[\[34b.6\]]rgyal po dpal gyi sde la ni zhu bar mi bya ste/_shin tu spro ba skye bar mi 'gyur grang /_de nas des gsang ste mtshan mkhan bos nas dam bsgo ste zhes smras pa/_shes ldan ngas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bur 'gyur ba khyod kyis lung ston cig_/mtshan mkhan gyis 
[\[34b.7\]]smras pa/_rmi lam ci 'dra ba 'di las ring po mi thogs par lha'i sku lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang /_blon po chen po blo gros chen po sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing mig mchi mas gang ba dang /_lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]khong du chud pas gnas nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches so/_/de nas nub gsum pa la blon po stong phrag 
[\[35a.2\]]bcu gnyis rmi lam lnga rmis te/_khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang cod pan phrogs te slar yang byin pa dang skye bo thams cad kyi mgo bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi mig phyung nas slar yang skyes pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 
[\[35a.3\]]thams cad kyi rkang pa dang lag pa rnams bcad nas slar yang skyes pa dang rgyal po dpal gyi sde seng ge'i khri las bab nas slar yang 'dzeg par rtsom par rmis pa dang /_'jigs shing skrag la yi mug nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde sa chen po skyong ba mdzad pa/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can 
[\[35a.4\]]snying rje che ba/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa la mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grang /_bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig gnas pa las tha dad par gyur pa dang /_so so ba dang bral ba dang bye bral mi 'gyur grang /_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i skyabs dang dpung 
[\[35a.5\]]gnyen med par mi 'gyur grang /_de rnams kyis mtshan mkhan rnams bos nas smras pa dang /_de rnams kyis ji tsam na thams cad 'di bzhin du 'gyur zhes lung bstan to/_/'di lta bu'i rmi lam bstan pa thos pa dang /_grong khyer a riSh+Tha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams nyam thag 
[\[35a.6\]]pa'i nga ros ngu bar brtsams so/_/thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad mya ngan drag po'i sdug bsngal gyis bcom nas shin tu smre sngags 'don par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa de rgyal po dpal gyi sdes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang bsams pa/_
[\[35a.7\]]nga'i lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_mgu bar gyur to/_/shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi khyed rnams bde ba dang phebs pas dge ba la gzhol bar gyis shig_/khyed rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya zhes 'dzam 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bu'i gling pa thams cad du dril bsgrags so/_/de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes dril bsgrags pa de thos pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad dbugs phyin par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha'i byang phyogs rgyang grags tsam gyis phyogs na ri bo zhig 
[\[35b.2\]]yod de/_de na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas so/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe de rnams kyi don du 'jug pa drang srong gcig don gyi bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Thar 'ongs so/_/yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po dpal gyi sde lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od dang lhan cig tu nang du zhugs 
[\[35b.3\]]nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo /_/drang srong des rgyal ba dang tshe ring ba'i brjod pa byas pa dang /_drang srong des lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mthong ste/_'di ltar yang de'i skye ba snga ma'i chung mar gyur pa yang yin pas sngon gyi chags pa dang 'brel pa'i dbang gis tshul 
[\[35b.4\]]bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa skyes par gyur te/_de yid la sems shing lam de nas song ste/_lam de nas 'das pa dang ji tsam na drang srong de rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer a riSh+Thar bya ba'am/_byed pa thams cad byas te yongs su rdzogs pa dang bsti gnas su song ngo /_/ji tsam na dus 
[\[35b.5\]]gzhan zhig gi tshe drang srong des bram ze'i khye'u gcig rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_des mkhan po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_mkhan po la nor ji lta bu dbul bar bgyi/_mkhan pos bka' stsol cig_/drang srong gis smras pa/_de bas na bu rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i 
[\[35b.6\]]btsun mo'i mchog btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od slongs la nga'i bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang /_bla ma la mchod par bya ba'i phyir byin cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u de gnad du bsnun pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te 
[\[35b.7\]]mchog tu yi mug pa dang /_bsams pa gnas 'di ni 'byung bar dka' ba dang rnyed par dka' na/_ji ltar yang bram ze nyon mongs pa dag lta bus rgyal po la btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di byin cig_/ces ji ltar smra bar nus/_'di ltar bslang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i dngos po 'di la kun 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]du sbyor ba gang yin pa des na/_mkhan po nges par bdag la dmod pa byed par 'dod pa yin no/_/de nas drang srong des de'i bzhin rnam par 'gyur bas nang gi bsam pa rtogs nas smras pa/_bu ma 'jigs shig ji ltar na sems 'di ltar khong du chud/_rgyal 
[\[36a.2\]]po 'di ni bdag nyid che ba/_thams cad ster ba/_thams cad yongs su gtong zhing chags pa med par yongs su gtong bas tha na rang gi sha yang gtong ste/_'di la yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med do/_/bu des na rgyal pos btsun mo'i mchog ster bar 'gyur gyis yi mug par ma 
[\[36a.3\]]byed cig_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te ma song na ni gang dmod pa byed pa'i gnas de yod pas 'gro snyam nas de dmod pas 'jigs pas smras pa/_mkhan po gal te de lta na mchi'o zhes des de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas song ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Thar phyin to/_/
[\[36a.4\]]de bzhin du shing shun gyi gos gyon zhing dbyig pa dang /_ril ba lag na thogs la sa rdul gyis lus la gos pa dang /_rgyal po dpal gyi sde ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde la rgyal ba dang /_tshe spel ba byas nas bsams pa/_ci bslang ngam 'on te mi bslang ster bar 
[\[36a.5\]]'gyur ram mi ster bar 'gyur/_nga'i yid la re ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ram/_'bras bu med par 'gyur snyam nas bdag nyid smod bzhin du rgyal po'i mdun na dman pa'i bzhin gyis cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sdes bsams pa/_'di ni nga la slong du 
[\[36a.6\]]'ongs so snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze khyod kyi dgos pa gang yin pa de smros/_de ring khyod kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u de mi 'jigs pa skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_de legs 
[\[36a.7\]]kyis lha ri ga ge mo na bdag gi mkhan po drang srong 'don du 'jug pa 'khor lnga brgya dang gnas te de las bdag gis rig byed 'don pa yongs su rdzogs pas rgyal po chen po da thugs brtse bas btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od bdag la stsol cig_/mkhan po la mkhan po'i nor dang /_bla ma mchod 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]pa'i phyir bdag gis mkhan po la dbul bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po dpal gyi sde brtse ba'i dbang gis yid mi dga' bar gyur te/_btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di nga dang bral na ji ltar srog 'dzin par nus/_'khor de dag thams cad kyang rgya mtsho zab mo'i sgra mi 
[\[36b.2\]]g.yo ba dang /_gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pas rtabs bag tu 'di ci 'di ci zhes skyo bas rab tu gdungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas skad cig cang mi smra bar gnas te bsams pa/_bu dang chung ma la sogs pa byin pa med pas ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[36b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir bram ze 'di la dga' bas chung ma 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas gnyen sdug pa dang bral bas zhum pa'i sems yang dag par blangs te/_'phral du seng ge'i khri las babs nas byang chub tu smon pa'i sems 
[\[36b.4\]]kyis btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od lha'i bu mo bzhin du rnam par mdzes pa/_khyo dang bral ba'i gdung bas shin tu dbugs ring po phyung ste/_mchi mas gang ba'i mig dang /_mun par g.yang sa chen por lhung ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdong phab pa lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/_
[\[36b.5\]]lag pa g.yas pas gser gyi bum pa thogs nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze chen po tshur shog_/tshur shog_/bram ze'i dam pa gzugs bzang ba/_/sdug pa'i chung ma 'di long shig_/sbyin pa 'di yis myur du ni/_/byang chub dam pa thob par shog_/ces 
[\[36b.6\]]smras nas byang chub sems dpas bram ze de'i lag par chu'i rgyun blugs so/_/de nas yang dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes chu'i rgyun blugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de'i tshe 'phral du sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba dang /_
[\[36b.7\]]gtong ba las kyang shin tu gtong ba/_shin tu dka' ba de mthong ba dang /_mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/nam mkha'i ngos na gnas pa'i lha brgya stong rnams kyis kyang ca co'i sgra bton to/_/de ma thag tu yang skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs 'bar ba dang /_bar snang gi lha yang rnga rdung 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rgyal po 'gyod par ma gyur grang snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par bstod de/_bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od khyer te rings pa rings par bsti gnas su song ste/_mkhan po la 
[\[37a.2\]]byin pa dang /_btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od nya chu las bton pa bzhin du sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs shing nyam thag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyid la mngon par sems shing 'gro ba thams cad mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa bzhin du shes shing kyi hud rgyal 
[\[37a.3\]]po chen po kyi hud rgyal po chen po zhes mchog tu gdung ba'i sems dang zas bcad pa la zhugs so/_/sa g.yos pa des brgya byin gyi gnas g.yos par gyur to/_/chos nyid kyis lha rnams kyi shes pa 'og tu mthong ba 'jug gi gong du ni ma yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[37a.4\]]byin gyis bsams pa/_shin tu grags par sa g.yos pa/_/mtshan ma 'di ni su'i mthu yin/_/gang gi mthu ni ci 'dra ba/_/shin tu gsal bar 'di shes bya/_/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu mchog 
[\[37a.5\]]tu dka' ba'i las byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed cag rnams rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i las la ltos/_gang zhig 'di ltar sdug pa dang /_'di ltar yid 
[\[37a.6\]]du 'ong ba dang /_'di ltar phangs pa'i chung ma la mi sems te rtswa bzhin du yongs su gtong ngo /_/grogs po dag rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang phangs pa med par gtong ba yin no/_/lha rnams 
[\[37a.7\]]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka bu dang bu mo ni de bas yongs su gtong bar byed kyi/_'di lta ste/_yan lag dang nying lag ster ba 'di ni dad par bya ba ma yin te shin tu dka'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po dag zhog zhog_/spu'i rtse mo'i 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]chu'i thigs pas rgya mtsho ma gzhal cig_/nam mkha' 'dom gyis ma gzhal cig_/nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer 'od ma snyom cig_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang yungs 'brur ma snyom cig_/gzhan yang ngas khyed cag rnams kyi mngon sum du bya yis/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[37b.2\]]gyis de nyid kyi nam nangs pa na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/_kye ma'o grogs po dag shes par gyis shig ces smras te/_nang par nyid langs nas lha'i bu bzhi dang thabs cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas las babs te grong khyer a riSh+Tha dang ha cang mi ring ba'i nags 
[\[37b.3\]]kyi tshang tshing du zhugs nas bram ze rgan po'i cha byad du byas nas rang gi lus kyi lte ba man chad sog les bcad pa bzhin du ston cing kun nas khrag 'dzag pa khri bskyod nas lha'i bu bzhi bram ze'i cha byad 'dzin pas pha dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa ltar nyam thag pa'i nga ros cho 
[\[37b.4\]]nges 'debs shing bteg par mngon par sprul te/_nga'i lus 'di'i phyed stag gis bcad de zos so zhes 'di ltar bstan par bya'o snyam nas yid la bsams pa bzhin du/_nyi ma shar ba'i dus su nags tshang tshing de nas byung ste/_grong khyer du mngon par phyogs nas kun du chas so/_/
[\[37b.5\]]khrag gi dri de la yang steng nas khwa dang chu skyar dang /_bya rgod rnams rjes su 'brang ngo /_/'og nas kyang khyi dang wa rnams rjes su 'brang bzhin du rings pa rings par grong khyer gyi sgor song ngo /_/de yang 'di ltar snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa/_skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis mthong nas snying 
[\[37b.6\]]rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis gcig la gcig smra ba/_grogs dag bram ze 'di rked par chad nas 'di'i dbang po yang ma 'khrugs pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_'di mi ma yin gyi sha za mi'i cha byad kyis bdag cag bza' ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/_mi rked 
[\[37b.7\]]par chad pa ni 'tsho ba med do/_/de skad ces thos pa dang skyes bu sdar ma ni 'jigs pas bros par brtsams so/_/skyes bu dpa' bo gzhan zhig 'di snyam du 'di ni sha za zhig ste/_de lta na yang tshor bas nyen bzhin du 'di ltar dbang po rnams bde bar snang na de ji lta bu yin/_bdag 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]gis 'di la mi ma yin nam sha zar gyur pa yin par dri bar byas na 'dis tshig thon par dka' mod kyi/_gal te tshig thon na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na gzhan zhig ltad mo skyes nas smras pa/_bram ze khyod ci mi yin nam/_'on te sha za yin 
[\[38a.2\]]khyod kyi lus 'di rked par sus bcad nas gnas skabs 'di lta bur byas/_khyod ni ga las 'ongs/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid 'di ltar khri'i steng du 'dug cing sdug bsngal drag po'i tshor bas nyen pa bzhin du nye bar ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[38a.3\]]so/_/shi bi pa khyed ma 'jigs shig_/bram ze nga yin srin po min/_/sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/_/gnas skabs 'di 'dra thob par gyur/_/'di nyid du ni kun bshad na/_/dus ni kun du 'da' bar 'gyur/_/'chi bdag myur du 'ongs nas ni/_/srog ni 'phrog par 
[\[38a.4\]]'gyur du 'ong /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni/_/'di dag kun kyang bshad par bya/_/sngon gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/de ring nga la 'bras bcas gyur/_/yon tan kun gyis rnam mdzes la/_/zla ba lta bur zhi ba dang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims la dga' ba'i/_/gtso 
[\[38a.5\]]bo gang du mthong bar 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho bzhin du zab gyur cing /_/ri rab lta bur mi g.yo ba/_/'jig rten kun gyi gtsor gyur pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po gang na bzhugs/_/'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs/_/slong ba rnams ni bgrod bya'i mchog_/snyan smra sbyin dang 
[\[38a.6\]]tshul khrims ldan/_/bdag nyid che de gang na bzhugs/_/bdag mdun 'chi ba nyer 'ong gis/_/shi bi pa rnams myur du smros/_/thugs rje can de ma gtogs par/_/gang la lus phyed su zhig ster/_/de ltar rgyal po'i lam nas snying rje ba dang /_dman pa dang zhum pa'i 
[\[38a.7\]]tshig smra zhing rim gyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i pho brang sgor song ba dang /_srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyang ngo mtshar skyes nas rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brangs so/_/yang bar skabs der lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]tshogs rnams kyis da rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i phyis 'byung ba'i rgud pa chen po de dang /_lus kyi tshor ba drag po de shes nas sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te cho nges 'debs pa la zhugs so/_/kyi hud rgyal po dpal gyi sde byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa sems can thams 
[\[38b.2\]]cad la mnyes gshin pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/de thos pa dang skye bo'i tshogs rnams smre sngags 'don par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_du bas mun par gyur pa la 
[\[38b.3\]]skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs sreg pa dang /_bar snang la lha rnams rnga rdung bar yang gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe ri la gnas pa'i drang srong des btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od 'di ltar khyo dang bral ba'i gdung bas dbugs shin tu ring por 'byin cing zas mi za la/_'du shes med par 
[\[38b.4\]]mthong nas snying rjes sems 'dar nas bsams pa/_ma la ngas rgyal po dpal gyi sde la dbul bar bya'o snyam nas btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od dbugs phyung ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[38b.5\]]la smras pa/_bram ze'i bu 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di phyogs thams cad du bas mun par gyur la 'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang lham me ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin pas nges par na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun mi ring ba nyid 
[\[38b.6\]]du skyes bu chen po 'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mi 'am ci yi tshogs dang nags kyi lha rnams dang /_/nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ni smod par byed/_/zla ba 'od med nyi mas mun pa sel mi byed/_/
[\[38b.7\]]de ring rol mo brdungs na sgra ni grag ma gyur/_/shing tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_/rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa la lhung gyur la/_/ji ltar 'jigs shing rtsub pa'i sgra kun grag pas na/_/grong khyer dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad 'byung bar gsal/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]grong khyer a riSh+Tha na gnas dga'i skye bo 'di kun shin tu sdug bsngal zhing /_/phan tshun so sor mya ngan zug rngus nges bcom sgra rnams rab tu grol ba'i bzhin/_/lha mo lta bu'i bzhin ldan bud med 'di dag khang pa'i mchog na smre sngags 'don/_/'di na mi dag 
[\[39a.2\]]drag pos rab tu ngu dang der ni dur khrod 'jigs bzhin no/_/nam mkhar gnas pa'i sprin 'di chu med par sgra sgrogs/_/sa la gnas pa'i chu rnams kyang ni skams par gyur/_/rma bya rnams kyang nags kyis bcom bzhin sgra bsgrags te/_/mi rnams kyang ni 'khrug bcas 
[\[39a.3\]]khyim du rnam par rgyu/_/chu la rlung gis bskyod pa'i gru bzhin sa rnams g.yos/_/phyag dar dang 'dres rlung ni mkha' la rab tu lding /_/a riSh+Tha na 'jigs skyed mtshan ma mang bas ni/_/bram ze khye'u 'di las kyi rjes 'thun yul du deng /_/bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma ni/_/
[\[39a.4\]]da lta 'di na rnam mang ste/_/de bas bdag cag shis pa yi/_/phyogs su 'gro ba shin tu rigs/_/bram ze'i khye'u rnams gzhan yang ji ltar shing 'di dag thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha ga la ba der 'dud par gyur te/_de bas na kye ma bram ze'i khye'u rnams nges par de ring nyid 
[\[39a.5\]]rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Thar nye bar 'tshe ba dang gnod pa'i 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la gnas pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i cho nge'i sgra thos pa dang /_rings pa rings par rin po che las byas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[39a.6\]]las babs nas seng ge'i khri chen po la 'dug ste/_shin tu rtabs bag gis shes ldan dag 'di ci yin 'di ci yin zhes dris so/_/bar skabs der lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu bzhi po de rnams kyis 'phral du rgyal po'i khab tu khyer te/_mod la khri sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang /_khri la bskyon pa 
[\[39a.7\]]lus kyi phyed bcad pa de las khrag kun nas 'dzag cing rab tu 'dzag pa dang /_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste snying rje rje skad du byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas mchi mas khengs pa'i mig dang /_rang gi lus kyi phyed nye bar ston cing byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'jig rten na khyod snying rje can/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal/_/nyid kyi sku yi phyed stsal bas/_/gtso bo bdag ni bskyab tu gsol/_/de skad ces thos pa dang /_blon po chen po'i mchog blo gros chen pos smras pa/_lha 'di mi ma lags kyi sha za'am sha zas byin 
[\[39b.2\]]gyis brlabs par gyur pa zhig ste/_mi ni rked par bcad pa 'tsho zhing sngon ji ltar gnas pa bzhin tshig tu smra ba ni mi srid do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_shi bi pa khyed cag rnams ma 'jigs shig_/nga ni sha za ma yin gyi gzhan du na nga ni 
[\[39b.3\]]bram ze yin mod kyi/_dbul bas bdag gis bu dang chung ma bzhag ste/_nor gyi bsam pas rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i thad du chas nas rim gyis song ba na rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir nyi ma nub pa na phyin pa dang grong khyer gyi sgo rnams bcad par gyur to/_/de nas grong khyer dang ha cang mi ring ba 
[\[39b.4\]]na bsod nams khang yod par bdag song ste/_nub mo gnas pa na lam gyis dub pas gnyid mthug pos non pa dang /_sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas nub mo gcan gzan stag 'ongs nas bdag gi lus kyi phyed sog le lta bu'i mche ba shin tu rnon pos bcad nas khyer te song 
[\[39b.5\]]ngo /_/der bdag tshor ba drag pos kun du bcom pas gnyid sad pa dang /_ji tsam na bdag gi lus kyi ro smad phyed po stag gis sog les dras pa ltar bcad pas bdag tshor ba drag pos kun du bcom yang sngon byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis kun du bzung bas shi bar ni ma 
[\[39b.6\]]gyur gyi/_gcig tu sdug bsngal ba dang /_gcig tu drag pa dang /_gcig tu rtsub pa dang /_gcig tu tsha ba dang /_gcig tu yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong zhing nyam thag pa'i nga ros smre bar gyur te/_bdag de ltar nyam thag pa'i smre sngags thos pa dang nam mkha'i dkyil na 
[\[39b.7\]]gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag gis bdag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/_ma 'jigs ma 'jigs bram ze'i mchog_/khyod ni tshe ni ring bar mthong /_/a riSh+Thar ni myur song na/_/khyod ni legs pa dag tu 'gyur/_/de na kun ster rgyal po ni/_/dpal gyi sde zhes rnam grags pa/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]de yi lus kyi phyed bslangs na/_/de ni nges par khyer la ster/_/zhes smras nas lha mo de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bdag gis lha mo'i tshig thos pa dang /_'tsho bar re ba kun du skyes te/_'tshe ba yang chung bar gyur to/_/de na bdag gi 
[\[40a.2\]]lus kyi phyed ro smad med pas langs yang ma nus na 'gro bar lta ga la nus snyam nas yang yi mug par gyur pa dang /_stes dbang gis nyi ma shar ba'i tshe gnyen 'di bzhi 'ongs par gyur to/_/'di dag gis kyang bdag nyam nga bar zhugs pa mthong ba dang /_'di 'chi ba nyid do snyam nas ngu 
[\[40a.3\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas bdag gis de rnams la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir lha mo'i tshig rgyas par smras so/_/de nas bdag 'di rnams kyis khri la bskyon te 'dir khyer te 'ongs so/_/de skad ces smras nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gdong mchi ma'i rlabs kyis gang ba lta bur bdag nyid nye bar 
[\[40a.4\]]ston cing byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po/_bdag ni dbul zhing na ba dang /_/rgan pa dang ni bram ze nyid/_/rang gi sku phyed stsal ba yis/_/rnyed dka'i srog ni stsal du gsol/_/bdag gi srog ni sgrub byed pa'i/_/sbyin pa thugs rjes stsal du gsol/_/
[\[40a.5\]]don gyi mchog phyir sbyin pa ni/_/sku phyed sbyin par stsal du gsol/_/nyid kyi sku yi phyed stsal bas/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho ltar rgya che/_/de bzhin mkha' ltar mtha' med pa'i/_/bsod nams khyod kyis thob par 'gyur/_/bdag gi tshor ba drag po dang /_/bkres skom mi 
[\[40a.6\]]bzad la gzigs nas/_/mchog tu thugs rje mdzad nas ni/_/sku yi phyed ni bdag la stsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge khyod chos la gnas/_/gal te thams cad mkhyen nyid mnyam bzhed na/_/bdag la sku phyed 'dir stsol de ring ni/_/shin tu rnyed dka'i srog ni thob par 
[\[40a.7\]]mdzod/_/rgyal po chen po'i sku yi phyed/_/shin tu gtang dka' bdag stsol la/_/chos dang de bzhin grags pa yis/_/'gro ba kun la khyab par mdzod/_/de nas tshig 'di thos pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sngon goms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags blo la bsgos pas snying 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rjes sems 'dar zhing slong ba de dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/_bram ze chen po ma 'jigs shig_/da ring po mi thogs par lus 'di rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/_g.yo med pa'i sems kyis khyod la lus kyi phyed sbyin par bya'o zhes smras 
[\[40b.2\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' yid rab tu dga' ba dang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma rang gi lus slong ba/_/yun mi ring bar blta bar bya/_/nga yi yan lag gtang ba ni/_/dka' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ji ltar yab kyi bu gcig nga yin yang /_/de lta na yang nga yi lus 'di khyer/_/
[\[40b.3\]]lus ni byin pas byang chub rnyed gyur cing /_/'gro 'di shin tu sdug bsngal las grol shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpas brgya byin bram ze'i cha byad 'dzin pa rnam pa 'di lta bu'i tshig smra ba thos pa dang /_yid rab tu mgu zhing dga' bas mig gdangs bzhin du bram ze de la smras pa/_
[\[40b.4\]]bram ze lus 'di'i phyed legs par byin gyis bar chad med par legs par long shig ces smras nas 'khor de dag thams cad la bltas te skyes bu gzhan zhig la smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyod rings par song la sog le shin tu rno ba khyer la shog shig_/de nas skyes bu de brgya byin gyis kun tu 
[\[40b.5\]]rmongs par byas pas shin tu rings pa rings par sog le nye bar khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/_lha sog le 'tshal te mchis so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rings pa rings par blon po la smras pa/_khyed cag rnams kyis ji srid du bram ze 'di 'chi bdag gis 'jig rten pha rol du ma 
[\[40b.6\]]khyer ba de srid du nga'i ro smad sog les myur du chod cig dang /_ngas bram ze 'di la sbyin pa bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu mi bzad pa'i tshig smras pa thos pas rdo rje lhung bas kun du skrag pa bzhin du grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad shin tu yi mug par gyur te/_
[\[40b.7\]]sdug bsngal lo/_/sdug bsngal lo zhes gsang mthon pos ngu bar gyur to/_/de nas blon po chen po blo gros chen po zug rngus gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du sdug bsngal drag pos nyam thag ste/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sku la chags pa med par yongs su gtong ngo snyam bsams nas gdong 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]la mchi ma char ltar bab pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la btud de byang chub sems dpa' bzlog pa'i phyir smras pa/_lha 'di mi srid de/_'di lta ste lus sog les bcad nas bcad pa'i lus ni nges par 'chi bar 'gyur te/_'chi na las su mi rung ba'i ror gyur la/_
[\[41a.2\]]las su mi rung bas ni bram ze la yang byas pa don ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gang gzhan gyi yan lag bcad pa gzhan gyi yan lag la 'byor bar 'gyur ba 'di yang gnas ma mchis so/_/de lta na ni lha'i ngal ba yang don ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na bzod par mdzod la bdag 
[\[41a.3\]]nyid don ma mchis par gsod par mi mdzad cing nyid kyi srog yongs su mi gtong bar gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas blon po chen po blo gros chen po dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/_blo gros chen po zhog zhog_/ngas nam zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob 
[\[41a.4\]]nas 'khor bar rgyu ba'i sems can bsgral bar bya'o zhes yid la re ba 'di la nga'i byang chub kyi bar chad ma byed cig_/bu dag gzhan yang shin tu yun ring por sdug pa dang yang dag par 'dus par gyur pa yang nges par 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes 
[\[41a.5\]]smras nas byang chub sems dpas sog le la bltas te/_sog le 'dis nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phyogs gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes rjes su sems shing yang blon po la smras pa/_ji srid du bram ze 'di srog dang bral bar ma gyur gyi bar du khyod kyis nga'i 
[\[41a.6\]]lus kyi phyed ro smad myur du chod cig_/bram ze 'di shi na nga'i bsam pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar blon po chen po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i de lta bu'i rang gi lus yongs su gtong ba'i bsam pa shes nas de mchi ma char bzhin du bab pa'i gdong dang /_byang chub 
[\[41a.7\]]sems dpa'i rkang pa nas bzung ste/_gdong gi mchus 'o byas nas snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don par gyur te/_kyi hud ji ltar na 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong ba mdzad pa/_snying rje che ba/_yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa'i lha la de ring nyid du mi 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas par gyur/_kye ma'o mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/gang 'jig rten du lha yang mthong ba'i skyes bu de rnams ni skal ba can yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gdong la shin tu yun ring du mig mi 'dzums par bltas nas lha'i mi rtag pa nyid la blta mi 
[\[41b.2\]]nus so zhes bsams nas skad cig de nyid la mig btsums nas brgyal nas sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu shing mkhan gzhan gnyis shig la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'dir nga'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i grogs bya ba'i phyir 
[\[41b.3\]]khyed cag gnyis kyis sog le thogs te/_nga'i lus kyi phyad ro smad myur du chod cig_/bram ze'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/nga'i byang chub rnyed pa'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shing mkhan de gnyis yul rmus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong can gyis 
[\[41b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_lha 'di skad gsung ba ni rigs pa ma lags te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te gzhan 'ga' zhig lha'i thugs su mi byon pa bgyid na de la yang bdag cag gis bzlog par bgyi ba lags na/_lha nyid kyi sku la mtshon gyis 'debs par 
[\[41b.5\]]ji ltar rngo thogs/_lha gzhan yang gal te bdag cag gnyis kyis thugs rje che ba/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong bar mdzad pa khyed kyi sku la sog les gcod par bgyid na nges par 'phral du rang gi las 
[\[41b.6\]]kyis dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bu dag nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bdud rtsi tha ma'i bar chad khyed cag ma byed cig_/de bas na tshur shog_/ji srid du bram ze 'di gson pa de srid du nga'i byang chub la grogs bya ba'i phyir myur du nga'i lus kyi 
[\[41b.7\]]phyed ro smad chod cig_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis skyes bu shing mkhan gnyis ji ltar de la kun du 'jug par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/yang bar skabs der srog chags brgya stong du ma 'dus pa rnams dang /_nam mkha'i ngos na lha brgya stong du ma rnams byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]de'i shin tu dka' ba dang /_ba spu ldang ba'i las de blta bar 'dod nas 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bsi rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar 'dod nas slong ba de la byams pas khyab par byas te 'phral du seng ge'i khri las babs
