[\[42a.2\]]so/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi sde seng ge'i khri las babs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan de dag thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang a riSh+Tha ga la ba der 'dud par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer a 
[\[42a.3\]]riSh+Tha'i phyogs bzhir skar mda' ltung ba dang /_grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba'i nyam thag pas sgra bsgrags pa/_bram ze sdig pa can 'dis rgyal po dpal gyi sde gsod par 'gyur gyis myur du grong khyer 'di nas phyir phyung shig_/de nas 
[\[42a.4\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar sgra sus kyang ma thos pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs shing skye bo'i tshogs de rmongs par byas so/_/bar snang dang sa la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus la ltos pa med par shes nas sdug bsngal drag po rnams kyis gdungs 
[\[42a.5\]]nas nyam thag pa'i nga ros cho nges 'debs par brtsams te/_kyi hud rgyal po dpal gyi sde 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/_thams cad nas thams cad du lus gtong bar gyur to/_/de nas yang pho brang gi nang na gnas 
[\[42a.6\]]pa'i lha zhig byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar shes nas cho nges 'debs par rtsom zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/ji ltar da ltar 'di lta bu'i slongs mo pa 'ongs nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde yon tan du ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas thams cad du mi 'tsho 
[\[42a.7\]]bar gyur/_de nas byang chub sems dpas phyogs bzhir bltas te yang dag pa'i smon lam 'debs pa la zhugs pa gang grong khyer 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi'am ci rnams bdag la gson cig_/bdag 'dir gtong bar byed de/_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]gtong ba shin tu gtong ba rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed kyis bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ba de yang rgyal po'i phyir ma yin/_mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/_brgya byin gyi phyir ma yin/_tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i phyir ma yin gyi/_
[\[42b.2\]]gzhan du na bdag gis ci nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang /_
[\[42b.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cig_/bdag mngon par byang chub nas kyang mtshan ma cung zad cig 'byung bar gyur cig ces smras te bram ze de la smras pa/_des 
[\[42b.4\]]pa khyod kyi kun du rtog pa 'byor par gyur cig_/khyod kyi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/nga'i yang bla na med pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nye du'i skye bo rnams dang /_grong khyer pa'i skye bo rnams la bzod par byas shing 
[\[42b.5\]]dman pa dang /_nad pa rnams dbugs phyung nas skyes bu shing mkhan de gnyis la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tshur shog_/ji srid du bram ze 'di dus ma byas kyi bar du sog le zung la nga'i lus lte ba yan cad chod cig_/'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis zin pa 'di dag thams cad kyang 
[\[42b.6\]]ngas yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes byams pas khyab par byas nas skyes bu gcig gis rgyab nas brten te/_'phral du rkang pa gnyis sa la brkyang nas gan rkyal du phab bo/_/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' phab ma thag yang sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[42b.7\]]btsun mo bud med rnams kyis de lta bu'i gtam thos nas mya ngan drag pos gdungs te/_kyi hud 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes gdong las mchi ma char bzhin du 'bab cing skra rnams bkrol te brang rdung zhing rtabs bag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lha mo lta bu sdug pa dang 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bral nas rtabs bag tu byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don par rtsom pa na/_kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong bar mdzad pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_snying rje che ba/_yon tan du 
[\[43a.2\]]ma dang ldan pa'i lha la deng nyid du mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas pa 'di sdug bsngal lo/_/deng 'dir bdag cag lha dang lhan cig pa las tha dad par gyur te/_so so ba dang /_bye ba dang bral bar gyur to/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_lha bzod par mdzod cig_/
[\[43a.3\]]nyid kyi srog med par mdzad pas 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad mgon med par mi mdzad du gsol/_lha btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang /_mdzod dang bang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyas shing yongs su gang ba la gzigs su gsol/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[43a.4\]]gi skye bo'i tshogs rtag tu rab tu dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la yang gzigs su gsol/_lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal lta bu'i grong khyer a riSh+Tha bzang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par skye bo rab tu dga' ba rnams bsten pa la yang gzigs su gsol/_/mgon 
[\[43a.5\]]po khyod kyis rnam kun du/_/sras ltar yongs su bskyangs pa rnams/_/khyod bral me yis nges gdungs nas/_/lus can ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/_/khyod dang bral na bdag cag kun/_/shin tu 'chi bdag dbang du 'gyur/_/mgon po khyod dang rnam bral na/_/bdag 
[\[43a.6\]]cag 'tsho bar mi nus so/_/btsun mo mya ngan gyis gdungs dang /_/sems can gcig tu sdug bsngal na/_/thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs rje yis/_/mi dbang de ni gzigs su gsol/_/sems can rnams la mnyes gshin lha/_/bzod mdzod srog ni mi gtong gsol/_/
[\[43a.7\]]mgon po dpa' bo khyod gshegs na/_/su zhig 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas de rnams kyi snying rje rje skad du de ltar smre sngags 'don pa thos pa dang /_snying rjes gdungs pa'i yid kyis de rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/_khyed cag rnams kyi mya 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ngan gyis chog gis/_shin tu yun ring por sdug pa dang phrad par gyur pa yang nges par tha mar 'bral ba'i mtha' nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin te/_khyed cag rnams kyis rtag tu dge ba'i chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig ces smras nas shing mkhan de gnyis 
[\[43b.2\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag rings par shog la lus yun ring po mi thogs par chod cig ces smras pa tsam gyis de gnyis kyang brgya byin gyis kun du rmongs par byas pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus lte ba man chad la 'phral du sog les btab ste/_ring por 
[\[43b.3\]]ma thogs par chod par gyur to/_/de nas blon po chen po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dran pa'i mya ngan drag pos kun du skrag pa'i yid kyis rtabs bag tu shing mkhan gnyis bzlog cing 'di skad ces smras 
[\[43b.4\]]so/_/kyi hud kyi hud khyed cag gnyis kyi rtsol ba 'di ci zhig_/'di ltar khyed cag gnyis kyis byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/_'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyong ba/_skyon med pa/_gnod pa mi byed 
[\[43b.5\]]pa 'di ji ltar gsod/_mi gti mug can khyed cag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po ji ltar gsod par spro/_khyed cag gnyis sa chen po'i lha mo 'dis ji ltar 'jog_/khyed cag gnyis la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[43b.6\]]dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams ji ste ma bsnun/_khyed cag gnyis 'di lta bu'i 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las byed na lus rnam pa stong du ji ltar ma 
[\[43b.7\]]lhags/_khyed cag gnyis rang gi lus kyis 'phral du dmyal bar ji ltar ma lhung /_mi gti mug can khyed cag gnyis bdag nyid chen po 'dis bu bzhin ma bskyangs sam zhes 'di dang gzhan yang rnam pa mang po smras nas kyi hud lha zhes blon po chen po blo gros chen po rings par stan 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]las langs te/_lag pa gnyis kyis sog le bzung nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus la mchi ma 'dzag pas brlan par byas te zlog par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas zhum pa'i yid de la dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa/_bu zhog zhog mya ngan ma 
[\[44a.2\]]byed cig_/sdug pa dang phangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mngon par dga' ba thams cad nges par tha dad par gyur te/_so so ba dang bye ba dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang bu/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/_/phrad 
[\[44a.3\]]pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/de'i phyir khyod lus slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros chen po sngon byung ba na nga'i lus slong ba na lha mo rnams kyis bar chad byas te/_de rnams kyis nga'i bar chad byas pas nga'i bla 
[\[44a.4\]]na med pa'i byang chub la bar chad byas la bdag nyid kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyes so/_/gal te nga'i lus slong ba la lha mo rnams kyis bar chad ma byas par gyur na ni yun ring po mi thogs par ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[44a.5\]]bu gzhan yang sa phyogs 'di nyid du stag mo zhig bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mang pos lus gdungs pas bu za 'dod pa mthong ba dang /_mchog tu snying rje'i dbang du song ba'i yid kyis yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir de ma thag bdag nyid yongs su btang bas byang chub sems 
[\[44a.6\]]dpa' byams pa bskal pa bzhi bcur zhugs pa phyir lus par byas so/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po nga shi bi pa'i rgyal por gyur pa na yang bram ze rgan po zhig slong ba mthong ste/_snying rjes bskyod pa'i yid kyis slong ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rang nyid kyi ud 
[\[44a.7\]]pa la sngon po'i lo ma lta bu dri ma med pa/_shin tu mdzes pa/_sems can skye bo'i mig dang yid 'phrog pa ma nyams pa'i mig gnyis 'phral du khrag dang bcas par phyung nas byin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang nga rgyal po zla 'od du gyur pa na yang bram ze drag po'i 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]mig mgo slong ba la mchog tu snying rjes bsgos pa'i yid kyis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grub pa dang /_rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams dang /_lha brgya stong du ma 
[\[44b.2\]]rnams kyis bkag kyang ngas 'gro ba 'di dag mgon med par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste/_sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las thar bar bya snyam nas byams pas khyab par byas te/_rang gi 
[\[44b.3\]]nor bu dang gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang rdo rje dang in dra nI la dang /_mar gad kyis kun du brgyan pa/_ud pa la sngon po'i lo ma lta bu'i ral gris rang gi mgo rtswa bzhin du bcad cing bcad cing byin no/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang nga shi bi pa'i rgyal por gyur pa na 
[\[44b.4\]]phug ron skyabs med pa zhig khras 'jigs shing skrag la sdug bsngal zhing bzhin rmogs pa/_skyabs med pa skyabs su 'ongs pa mthong ste/_mchog tu snying rjes 'dar ba'i yid kyis bya phug ron khra las yongs su bsrung zhing blu ba'i phyir rang gi sha bcad cing bcad cing byin no/_/gzhan 
[\[44b.5\]]yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'dod par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'di nyid du rkang pa dang lag pa dang bu dang chung ma stong phrag yongs su btang ba byas na yang sus kyang bar chad ma byas so/_/de'i phyir 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_nga'i lus slong ba la khyod bar chad ma 
[\[44b.6\]]byed cig_/de nas blon po chen po blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa chen po skyes te/_de nas cang mi smra bar gyur cing mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis yang dang yang du gdong khebs bzhin du bsams pa/_kyi hud 'jig rten pa 
[\[44b.7\]]'di dag ni skal ba ngan pa ste/_myur ba nyid du chos kyi rgyal po 'dis bor bar 'gyur ro/_/kyi hud chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sgron ma shi bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sgron ma mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnga chag par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho skams par 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi ri bo rnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi grong khyer choms par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi gru zhig par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi shing phyung ba ni kyi hud sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi pha/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/dus kyi 
[\[45a.2\]]'khor los bcom nas ni/_/rgyal po chen po med par 'gyur/_/gang phyir mi bzad dus 'dir ni/_/rnam pa stong du ma gas pa/_/snying gi bdag nyid chen po ni/_/rdo rje chen po bzhin gyur tam/_/shis pa'i dus ni kun du 'das/_/mi bzad dus ni nye bar gnas/_/shes 
[\[45a.3\]]rab ldan mi mang po dang /_/'jig rten dag kyang brlag par 'gyur/_/ji lta ji ltar mthong gyur pa'i/_/sa yi mtshan ma du ma yis/_/nges par yun ni mi ring bar/_/rgyal po seng ge med par 'gyur/_/dri med mi yi nyi ma 'di/_/shin tu rnyed dka' de nub 'gyur/_/yun mi ring 
[\[45a.4\]]bar 'jig rten 'dir/_/mi snang ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun la phan pa yi/_/rgyal po chen po 'di med de/_/phyi nas 'jig rten mi snang na/_/su zhig 'jig rten skyong bar 'gyur/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar rmongs par byas pa de ltar mya 
[\[45a.5\]]ngan chung bar gyur nas sog les btab par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas shing mkhan de gnyis la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge khyed cag gnyis kyis sog le myur du drongs la nga'i lus kyi phyed ro smad chod cig_/bram ze 'di shi bar gyur na nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur grang /_de 
[\[45a.6\]]nas shing mkhan de gnyis brgya byin gyi mthus kun du rmongs pas nyam thag pa'i nga ros cho nges 'debs shing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkag bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus la sog les 'dra bar brtsams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub yid la smon cing 
[\[45a.7\]]dga' ba'i yid kyis slong ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bsams nas cang mi smra bar gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi lte bar sog les bcad pa las khrag gi tshogs chen po 'bab par gyur to/_/de nas blon po blo gros chen po 'di ltar sog les 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bcad pa tshor ba drag pos nyen pa'i khrag 'bab pa mthong ba dang /_lha bkrongs pa ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bsams nas re thag chad par gyur te/_'phral du brgyal nas sa'i steng du 'gyel bar gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[45b.2\]]dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang mya ngan drag pos gdungs te ngu bar brtsams te/_de rnams kyis ngu ba'i mchi ma blags so/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'di ci zhig yin snyam nas 
[\[45b.3\]]steng du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na lha brgya stong du ma rnams ngu bar mthong ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po shas cher mya ngan drag pos gdungs te byang chub sems dpa' gnas skabs 'di lta bur shin tu sdug bsngal bar mthong nas/_kyi hud lha bkrongs pa ni 
[\[45b.4\]]sdug bsngal lo zhes bsams nas kun du rmongs par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de srog chags brgya stong du ma 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pas shin tu snying rje zhing zhum pa mthong ba dang myur bar snying rje'i yid kyis bsams pa bdag 
[\[45b.5\]]nyid che ba/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_snying rje can thams cad ster ba 'di'i lus la 'di ltar tshor ba drag po'i las kun du sbyor ba ni bzang po ma yin no/_/gzhan du na da ni ji ltar srog mi 'jig par gyur pa de ltar bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[45b.6\]]shing mkhan de gnyis kyis sog les drud cing sog le rnon pos lus bcad pa'i tshor ba drag pos gdungs pa dang /_brtan pa'i stobs dang ldan pas slong ba la byams pa'i sems skyes nas bsams pa/_ngas 'khor ba'i skyon gyi rang bzhin shes nas brtson 'grus sra zhing brtan pa 
[\[45b.7\]]dang ldan pas lus phyogs gcig bcad pa 'di las 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal skye na/_sems can snga ma rnams phal cher dmyal bar skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba rnams kyis gdungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]byams pa'i sems rnam par bzhag ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o zhes seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/_sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa'i 
[\[46a.2\]]rang gi sems spro bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa/_'jig rten sdug bsngal ltos la yid khyod skyon spangs te/_/shin tu brtan pa rgya che bskyed pa nyid du gyis/_/'gro ba skye rga na 'chi sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i/_/'di ni skyabs gyur yid kyis bzod nyid brtan par gyis/_/gzhan 
[\[46a.3\]]yang kye sems can/_gang phyir 'gro kun 'khor ba yi/_/rgya mtsho las rgal rgyu yin gyis/_/de bas khyod ni gnod pa rnams/_/mi bzod pa ni rigs ma yin/_/de ltar rang gi sems yang dag par bzhag nas sems can thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'i snying rje nye bar bzhag ste 
[\[46a.4\]]bsams pa/_kye ma'o 'khor ba na gnas pa'i sems can gyi sdug bsngal ni kye ma mi bzad pa yin la/_'khor ba'i sems can de rnams kyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad mnags par spro bar byas kyis sems can 'ga' yang sdug bsngal ba'i skal ba can du ma gyur 
[\[46a.5\]]cig_/dge slong dag sems bskyed ma thag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bcad pa'i tshor ba 'phral du rgyun chad par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_ci'i phyir nga'i lus bcad pa'i tshor ba 'gags par gyur/_sog le 'ga' zhig gis bton par ma gyur grang 
[\[46a.6\]]snyam nas sog le de la bltas so/_/bltas nas kyang mchog tu yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'dar bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/_nyam chung nad pa ji bzhin du/_/rgyal po ci phyir 'dar bar byed/_/bdag gi lus phyed bcad na yang /_/sems 
[\[46a.7\]]ni mi 'dar ba la la ltos/_/khyod ni thams cad ster ba zhes/_/sa steng kun du grags pa la/_/'gyod par byed pa mi rigs te/_/khyod tshig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du ma gyur tam/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bram ze don de'i phyir lus 'dar ba ma yin la/_'gyod par gyur 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]pa 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang sog le 'dis nga'i lus kyi phyed smad tshabs cher zhugs kyang ma chod pa dang /_de la nga 'di snyam du sems te/_nga'i sbyin pa ma rdzogs par mi 'gyur grang /_nga la slong ba'i yid la re ba yang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur grang zhes 
[\[46b.2\]]don de rjes su sems shing lus 'dar te sog les drag tu gcod par mi 'dod pa ma yin no/_/de la de skad ces smras pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas cang mi smra bar gnas so/_/bar skabs der mi de gnyis brgya byin gyis kun du rmongs par byas pas 
[\[46b.3\]]de gnyis kyis sog le rnon pos byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed ro smad bcad ma thag tu sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang 'gul bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus bcad pa'i sdug bsngal mi sems par [{]rings [,]ring [}]bag nyid du skyes bu de gnyis la 'di skad smras 
[\[46b.4\]]so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyod cag gnyis kyis myur du nga'i lus 'di rings pa rings par bram ze'i lus la sbyor cig_/de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin du byas so/_/sbyar ba tsam gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar skad cig ma de nyid la rma kun du 'byor cing mnyam par 
[\[46b.5\]]gnas pa dang /_mdog 'dra bar snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/_skad cig ma de la ston cing yang byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba'i phyir lha'i dbang po brgya byin khri las langs te 'chag pa dang langs pa dang 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar 
[\[46b.6\]]slong ba po'i lus yongs su rdzogs shing yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par mthong ba dang mchog tu dga' bas kun du rgyas pa'i yid kyis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur cing yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bsams pa/_ji ltar ngas bram ze 'di la 
[\[46b.7\]]rang gi lus byin te/_sdug pa'i srog gis bskyabs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'di ltar nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bram ze 'di 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bslangs te/_shin tu 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par gyur cig ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba drag pos gdungs pa dang /_yid kyis byang chub tu smon pa byas nas mig btsums te brgyal bas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[47a.2\]]gyis de ma thag tu rings pa rings par byang chub sems dpa'i lus la 'phral du stobs bskyed pa yang 'tsho ba'i sman gyis yang dag par gsos so/_/dge slong dag de nas rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la yang de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[47a.3\]]'di lan rnam pa gsum du g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu yongs su gtong ba nyid dang /_rmad du byung ba'i yongs su gtong ba nyid sa chen po 'dis ma theg pas sgra 
[\[47a.4\]]shin tu sgrogs te/_'di lta ste khar ba'i snod chen po kun du brdungs nas sgra 'byin pa bzhin du de'i tshe de'i dus na sa chen po 'di nyid shin tu sgra sgrogs par gyur to/_/ri dang ri sul dang chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams las kyang 'jigs pa'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/_/phyogs bzhi 
[\[47a.5\]]nas kyang 'jigs su rung ba'i du ba'i sprin chen po byung bar gyur to/_/kun nas skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs sreg pa dang /_bar snang la yang lha'i bu rnams rnga rdung bar gyur te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad mun pa mun nag tu gyur to/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[47a.6\]]dkyil na 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pas ca co'i sgra bton to/_/bar snang las kyang lha rnams byang chub sems dpa'i steng nas lha'i ud pa la rnams 'thor zhing pad ma dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_a ka ru'i phye ma dang /_ta ga ru'i phye ma 
[\[47a.7\]]dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha rnams kyi me tog man dA ra ba rnams kyang 'thor ro/_/gos rnams kyang 'thor bar byed do/_/lha'i rol mo yang rab tu rdung ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad der yud tsam zhig mchog tu rmongs par gyur te/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]grong khyer na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa mthong ba dang /_sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs te/_kyi hud lha bsad pa ni sdug bsngal lo zhes sgra gcig tu bsgrags so/_/de nas la la ni sa la 'gre ldog 
[\[47b.2\]]go/_/la la ni dpung pa brkyang nas cho nges 'debs so/_/la la ni mchi ma'i rlabs kyis skad 'dzer bar tshig 'don mi nus te/_skad chen po dang brang rdung ngo /_/la la ni mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs dang ldan zhes sems sdug bsngal dang bcas shing yid mi bde ba dang ldan 
[\[47b.3\]]pas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ri rab ltar shin tu mi g.yo bar shes shing byang chub sems dpa'i rmad du byung ba yongs su gtong la/_de yang ba spu ldang ba ni shin tu dga' zhing 
[\[47b.4\]]phul du dbyung ba mthong ba dang /_ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs te lha'i bu de bzhi dang lhan cig tu bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs kyis gnas te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lags kyi bram ze ma lags 
[\[47b.5\]]so/_/rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/kye ma'o khyod kyi brtson 'grus/_kye ma'o ma bcos par brtan pa/_kye ma'o rang gi lus la ma chags par yongs su gtong ba/_kye ma'o sems can rnams la snying brtse ba/_kye ma'o sbyin pa la dga' ba legs so legs so/_/
[\[47b.6\]]rgyal po chen po khyod gang du sdug bsngal drag pos bcom yang snying rjes rang gi lus sbyin pa la sems mi ldog pa de ni legs so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod la dri yis khyod shin tu dka' ba'i brtson pa 'di lta bus ci zhig don du gnyer/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kau shi ka nga'i lus kyi 
[\[47b.7\]]sbyin pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sems can rnams 'khor ba las bsgral bar bya'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi lus yongs su zad pa'am/_gtong ba'am/_yongs su btang bas khyod kyi 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]sems rnam pa gzhan du gyur pa'am/_'gyod par ma gyur grang /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kau shi ka nga la ni 'gyod pa med do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_ji ltar shes par bya/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir nga'i lus kyi phyed bcad 
[\[48a.2\]]pa 'di gnas ji lta ba bzhin du zhog shig_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi phyed bcad pa de gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba'i byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas bden 
[\[48a.3\]]pa gsol bar byed cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar byang chub 'dod gyur nas/_/snying rjes lus ni btang bas na/_/ser sna med cing zhum med de/_/deng ni 'gyod par gyur pa med/_/'gyod pa'i sems kyang med gyur na/_/bden tshig 'di dang legs byas pas/_/brgya 
[\[48a.4\]]byin deng ni nga yi lus/_/'di ni sngon gyi ji bzhin du/_/dbang po ma lus rdzogs gyur cig_/dge slong dag tshigs su bcad pa de smras pa'i rjes thogs nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'phral du sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[48a.5\]]gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ngo mtshar de mthong ba dang /_ngo mtshar kyis mig gdangs te/_ca co dang ga zha'i sgra sgrogs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba dang /_lha dang 
[\[48a.6\]]mi rnams yid sdug par byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong ba dang srog stor ba las slar rnyed pa bzhin du mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_kye ma khyed ni slar 'tsho ba'i/_/ngo mtshar dag ni blta bar gyis/_/sa 
[\[48a.7\]]dang nags su bcas pa yi/_/'jig rten 'di ni skal bar ldan/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur par mthong ba dang ngo mtshar gyis gdungs pa'i mig dang /_spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi bla shin 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]tu des pa dang /_khyod kyi smon lam mi 'gyur ba dang /_khyod kyi sems can la snying rje chen pos rjes su zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/_/gang yang khyod ni yid kun du skrag par byed pa rnams la mi 'jigs pas khyod kyi 'bad pa 'di nyid kyis yun ring por mi thogs par 
[\[48b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma khyod kyi brtson rab drag_/brtan pa nyid kyang bla na med/_/kye ma'o sems can la snying brtse/_/kye ma'o 
[\[48b.3\]]byang chub yid la brtan/_/kye ma'o mi ring 'jig rten 'di/_/mgon po khyod kyis skyong gyur te/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho drag 'jigs las/_/yang dag mya ngan 'da' bar mdzad/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchi ma char bzhin du 'bab cing skad 
[\[48b.4\]]'dzer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te/_rgyal po chen po gang bdag gis nyams bskyed pa'i bsam pas tshor ba drag po las kun du sbyor bar mdzod cig_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[48b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe na yang bdag la dgongs shig_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_kau shi ka bzod kyis de bzhin du byas te ngas kyang dran par bya'o/_/bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de ma thag tu nam mkha' las lha'i rin po che'i char rnam pa sna 
[\[48b.6\]]tshogs pa yid du 'ong ba 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bab par gyur cing 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur pa/_lha'i snang ba bas kyang gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas ri la gnas pa'i drang srong de ngo mtshar 'di lta bu rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang /_ngo mtshar 
[\[48b.7\]]gyis bsdus pa'i yid kyis bsams pa/_sngon ma byung ba'i ngo mtshar byung ba 'di ci zhig yin/_'di lta bu'i mthu su'i yin snyam mo/_/de nas drang srong de la bsti gnas na gnas pa'i lha gzhan gyis gtam 'di rgyas par smras so/_/de nas drang srong de byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu dka' zhing ba 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]spu ldang ba'i skad thos pa dang yang dag par dga' bas ba spu ldang zhing sems can chen po bkur bar 'os zhes bsams nas 'khor lnga brgya dang btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od khrid de rings pa rings par byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin nas/_rgyal ba dang tshe 'phel bar byas te/_
[\[49a.2\]]brgya byin dang lhan cig smras pa/_lha yi bu mo bzang 'dra ba'i/_/bu mo sdug pa 'di rnams la/_/mgon po khyod kyis bskyang ba dang /_/dge ma 'di dang dgyes par mdzod/_/khyim thab mi 'phyo btsun mo sdug_/'di ni khyed la dbul lags kyis/_/khyed kyis yang ni slong 
[\[49a.3\]]ba la/_/nam du yang ni ma stsal cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong de dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pa snying rjes ci yang mi smra bar khas blangs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las sna tshogs pa la smras pa/_las sna 
[\[49a.4\]]tshogs pa lha'i seng ge'i khri myur du shoms shig_/nga nyid kyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka legs kyis de ltar bgyi'o/_/lha'i bu las sna tshogs pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan nas skad cig ma de nyid la rin po che sna tshogs kyis nye bar 
[\[49a.5\]]mdzes pa/_kun nas mu tig dang /_mu tig gi tshogs kyi do shal 'phyang ba'i lha'i seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang nyid kyi lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste/_lha brgya stong du ma rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i rol mo 
[\[49a.6\]]rnams kun du rdung bzhin du bsnyen bkur chen po byas nas rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/_/bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang lha rnams dga' ba dang /_mgu bas yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi char dang /_rin po 
[\[49a.7\]]che'i char yang phab ste/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du me tog dang rin po che'i char pus mo nub tsam gyis g.yogs par gyur to/_/lha dang mi rnams kyis 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de rnams mthong ba dang /_ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung ba skyes te ched du rjod 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]pa ched du brjod de/_e ma'o rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i bsod nams kyi stobs/_e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/ri la gnas 
[\[49b.2\]]pa'i drang srong de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par bstod de bsti gnas nyid du song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos mngon par btud cing yun ring du chos kyi rgyal po byed par gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi dman pa dang /_
[\[49b.3\]]long ba dang bkren pa dang sdug phongs pa thams cad nor gyis tshim par byas nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bzhag ste/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug kun dga' bar byas nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams dang de lhan cig tu dus byas te dga' ldan 
[\[49b.4\]]gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du tha tshom mam yid gnyis su gyur na khyed rnams kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/gzhan du na nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal 
[\[49b.5\]]gyi sde zhes bya bar gyur te/_de'i tshe rang gi lus yongs su btang ngo /_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong 
[\[49b.6\]]dag blon po'i mchog blo gros chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po blo gros chen por gyur to/_/dge slong dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[49b.7\]]dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur to/_/dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang lhan cig tu bden pa mthong ba lha brgyad khri po 'di nyid yin no/_/dge slong dag grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni rgyal po gzugs 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]can snying po gang dag dang thabs cig tu nga'i thad du 'ongs pa'i ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag nyid yin no/_/dge slong dag ri la gnas pa'i drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong du 
[\[50a.2\]]gyur to/_/gang gis nga'i drung du btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od slong ba'i drang srong bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'ur gyur to/_/dge slong dag shing mkhan gnyis por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lhas byin dang /_ko ka li ka 
[\[50a.3\]]'di dag yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na shing mkhan gnyis su gyur to/_/smon lam de'i dbang gis 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang sbyin pa rnams btang ba dang bsod nams dag bya'o zhes de 
[\[50a.4\]]ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[50a.5\]]d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/_sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa//[ {D350}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ka na ka bar+Na pUrba yo ga nA 
[\[50a.6\]]ma/_bod skad du/_gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge 
[\[50a.7\]]slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_mu stegs can sna tshogs dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas shing mchod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[50b.2\]]kyis chos gos dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi yo byad dam pa rab tu mang po yang brnyes te/_de dag la bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga' ste/_pad ma la chu mi chags pa de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 
[\[50b.3\]]'das kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta ste/_rgya che zhing dge la grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pas mngon par 'phags pa ste/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar 
[\[50b.4\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang lha dang 
[\[50b.5\]]mir bcas pa 'di rnams rang gi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon sum du mkhyen par mdzad nas dam pa'i chos ston te/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dge ba/_rnam 
[\[50b.6\]]par byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa/_yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes pa ltar/_sems can rnams kyis kyang 
[\[50b.7\]]sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes par gyis shig_/gang 'di kham phyi ma'i kham phyi ma gcig po de yang /_gzhan dag la ma byin ma bgos par bdag gis mi bza' bar gyis shig_/ser sna'i sems kyi dri ma skyes pas kun nas dkris 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]te ma 'dug cig_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes pa ltar/_sems can rnams ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa mi shes te/_de lta bas na sems 
[\[51a.2\]]can rnams gang 'di kham phyi ma'i kham phyi ma gcig po de yang /_gzhan dag la ma byin ma bgos par bdag nyid za bar byed/_ser sna'i sems kyi dri ma skyes pas kun nas dkris te 'dug go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po gser 
[\[51a.3\]]mdog ces bya ba/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal po gser mdog de phyug ste nor mang la longs spyod che zhing bdag dbang ba mang ba dang /_dbyig dang yo byad mang ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu 
[\[51a.4\]]tig dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru mang ba dang /_gser dang /_dngul mang ba dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_rta rgod ma mang ba dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba yongs su gang ba zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal po gser mdog gi pho brang grong khyer gser can zhes bya bar btags 
[\[51a.5\]]te/_chur ni shar nas nub tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod do/_/zheng ni lho nas byang du dpag tshad bdun yod de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' zhing skye bo dang mi mang po rnams kyis gang ngo /_/rgyal po gser mdog la grong 
[\[51a.6\]]khyer brgyad khri yod de/_/'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang mi mang po rnams kyis gang ngo /_/grong sa ya phrag lnga bdun 'bum yod de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams 
[\[51a.7\]]dga' zhing skye bo dang mi mang po rnams kyis gang ngo /_/ri 'or ba drug khri yod de/_'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' zhing skye bo dang mi mang po rnams kyis gang ngo /_/rgyal po gser mdog gi blon po khri brgyad stong yod do/_/bud 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]med slas nyi khri yod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyis rgyal srid byed par gyur to/_/rgyal po gser mdog thams cad sbyin par byed de/_des tha na rang gi lus kyi sha man chad yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med do/_/
[\[51b.2\]]de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na/_rgyal po gser mdog gcig pu dben par nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas/_sems kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di snyam du skyes te/_gang bdag gis 
[\[51b.3\]]nges par tshong pa thams cad la ni/_la gcan dang sho gam rnams mi dbab par bya'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la ni dpya dang sgyu rnams mi dbab par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/_rtsis pa dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_blon po dang /_
[\[51b.4\]]sgo ba dang /_'khor rnams bos te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/deng phyin cad grong mi dang tshong pa thams cad la la gcan dang sho gam rnams mi dbab par bya'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang sgyu rnams mi dbab par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de'i thabs 'dis 
[\[51b.5\]]lo mang po zhig tu rgyal srid byed pa na/_dus gzhan zhig gi tshe lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab pa'i rgyu skar ngan pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bram ze mtshan nyid 'don pa dang /_ltas pa dang /_mo ba rnams sa dang /_bar snang gi rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_pa ba sangs 
[\[51b.6\]]rgyu ba dag de thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes par byas nas/_rgyal po gser mdog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gser mdog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/dgung lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab pa'i rgyu skar ngan pa de byung bar gyur 
[\[51b.7\]]to/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog dngos po bsgrags pa de thos nas/_rab tu ngus te mchi ma phyung nas e ma'o nga'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams/_e ma'o e ma'o/_/nga'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams e ma'o e ma'o/_/nga'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' zhing skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba rnams ring por mi thogs pa nyid du stong zhing mi dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog yud tsam zhig mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa sangs nas/_'di 
[\[52a.2\]]snyam du gyur te/_gang 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba de dag ni 'tsho bar nus kyi/_gang 'di dbul zhing nor nyung la bza' btung dang /_longs spyod chung ba de dag ni/_ci ltar byed cig gu_/de 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag gis nges par 'dzam bu'i gling gi zas 
[\[52a.3\]]la sogs pa thams cad bsdu bar bya'o/_/zas la sogs pa bsdus te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du bang ba gcig brtsig par bya'o/_/bang ba gcig brtsigs te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad bza' ba mnyam par bgo 
[\[52a.4\]]bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/_rtsis pa dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor rnams bos te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo dag khyed rnams deng la 'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad sdus 
[\[52a.5\]]shig_/zas la sogs pa bsdus te/_gcol la grongs shig_/gcal te bgrangs nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du bang ba bzang po gcig rtsigs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rtsis pa dang sna chen po la gtogs pa 
[\[52a.6\]]dang /_blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor rnams kyis rgyal po gser mdog gi ltar mnyan nas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad bsdus so/_/zas la sogs pa bsdus nas/_gcal bgrangs te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal 
[\[52a.7\]]po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su bang ba gcig byas nas blugs so/_/bang ba gcig byas nas blugs te/_rgyal po gser mdog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po gser mdog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyi zas la sogs pa bsdus so/_/bsdus nas kyang gcal zhing bgrangs lags so/_/gcal zhing bgrangs nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du bang ba bgyis nas stsal 
[\[52b.2\]]lags kyis/_khyod gang gi dus nyid dgongs sam/_de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis grangs pa dang /_rtsis pa dang yi ge pa'i mi rnams bos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo dag khyed rnams deng la/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad grongs shig_/nga 
[\[52b.3\]]man chad legs par grongs la/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi bza' ba legs par mnyam par bgo bar gyis shig_/grangs pa dang rtsis pa dang yi ge pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po gser mdog gi ltar mnyan nas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad legs par 
[\[52b.4\]]bgrangs so/_/rgyal po gser mdog man chad legs par bgrangs nas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la bza' ba mnyam par 'ged do/_/lo bcu gcig gi bar du ni shi ba med do/_/lo bcu gnyis pa byung ba'i tshe zla ba gcig la der mang du skyes pa dang bud med dang 
[\[52b.5\]]khye'u dang bu mo rnams bkres pa dang skom pas shi'o/_/lo bcu gnyis pa byung ba'i tshe/_zla ba lhag ma gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu gcig gi bar du der mang du skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams shi bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na 'dzam 
[\[52b.6\]]bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad yongs su zad de/_/gzhan du na rgyal po gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig yod do/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na/_bskal pa bzhi bcur spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[52b.7\]]'dir phyin par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' des gzhan zhig tu/_nags khrod zhig na/_bu dang ma gnyis nyal po byed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du gyur te/_e ma'o nyon mongs so/_/sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs so/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]zla ba dgu rum de nyid du gnas la/_de nyid kyi nu ma la 'thungs nas/_de nyid du de ltar byed/_'di 'dra ba'i sems can chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyis zhen pa/_log par lta ba 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_
[\[53a.2\]]mar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs la bkur sti mi byed pa rnams kyis bdag chog ste/_'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du/_byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par su zhig spro/_bdag ni nges par bdag gcig 
[\[53a.3\]]pu'i don bsgrub po snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gzhan du shing ljon pa'i drung ga na ba der song ste phyin nas/_shing ljon pa'i drung der skyil mo krung bcas nas lus bsrang ste/_dga' ba dang bde ba dang dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[53a.4\]]sems dpa' de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la/_skye ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_'di ni gzugs te/_gzugs 'di ni skye ba'o/_/gzugs 'di ni 'jig pa'o/_/'di ni tshor ba/_'di ni 'du shes/_'di ni 'du byed/_'di ni rnam par shes pa ste/_
[\[53a.5\]]rnam par shes pa 'di ni skye ba'o/_/rnam par shes pa 'di ni 'jig pa'o zhes de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la skye ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/gang cung zad skye ba'i chos de thams cad ni/_yun mi ring ba nyid du 'gag pa'i chos yin no zhes bya bar 
[\[53a.6\]]rig nas/_de nyid du rang byang chub rjes su thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i rkyen ji lta ba bzhin gyis/_chos thob pa mthong nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras pa/_yang dag bsnyen nas chags gyur la/_/chags las sdug bsngal 
[\[53a.7\]]'di byung ste/_/chags la sdug bsngal 'di 'jug pas/_/de phyir mkhas pas chags sun phyung /_/bse ru lta bur gcig pu spyad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag gis sems can rnams kyi phyir dka' ba mang zhig spyad pas na sul 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]yang phan pa byas pa ma yin te/_bdag gis deng su zhig la snying brtse bar bya zhing /_bdag gis deng su zhig la bsod snyoms blangs te/_yongs su bza' bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de mi las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i spyan gyis 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[53b.2\]]'di kun du bltas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas des 'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa yongs su zad par mthong ste/_gzhan du na rgyal po gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig yod do/_/de 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag gis nges par rgyal po gser mdog 
[\[53b.3\]]la snying brtse bar bya zhing /_bdag gis nges par rgyal po gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig yod pa las blangs te yongs su bza' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de/_de'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bus nam mkha' la mngon sum du song ste/_
[\[53b.4\]]lus snang bar bya bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gser can gang na ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po gser mdog blon po lnga stong tsam dang /_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'khod par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de/_rgyang ring po nas 'di ltar 'ong ba na/_
[\[53b.5\]]sna chen po la gtogs pa gcig gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas sna chen po la gtogs pa dag bos nas/_grong gi gtso bo dag ltos shig_/'di ltar rgyang ring po nas bya dmar po 'phur ba zhig 'ong ngo /_/sna chen po la gtogs pa gnyis pas smras pa/_grong gi gtso bo dag 'di 
[\[53b.6\]]ni bya dmar po 'phur ba ma yin gyi/_'di ni srin po mdangs 'phrog pa zhig 'ong ste/_'dis ni deng bdag cag zos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog lag pa gnyis kas bzhin legs par phyis te/_sna chen po rnams la smras pa/_grong gi gtso bo dag 'di ni bya dmar 
[\[53b.7\]]po 'phur ba ma yin la/_srin po mdangs 'phrog pa yang ma yin no/_/'di ni drang srong ste/_bdag cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de/_rgyal po gser mdog gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du babs so/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]langs nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de bsus nas/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_stan bshams pa la bzhugs par gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/_bcom ldan 'das rang 
[\[54a.2\]]sangs rgyas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong ci'i phyir 'dir byon/_drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po zas kyi phyir ro/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog rab tu ngus te mchi ma phyung nas/_e ma'o bdag dbul te 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug dam 
[\[54a.3\]]pa byas kyis kyang drang srong gcig la bsod snyoms dbul bar ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal po'i pho brang gser can na gnas pa'i lha des/_rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ci zhig sdug bsngal yin zhe na ni dbul ba'o/_/shin tu sdug bsngal gang 
[\[54a.4\]]yin dbul ba de nyid de/_/dbul ba dag ni nang na shi dang mtshungs par gyur pa ste/_/bdag ni shi yang bla yi dbul ba mi 'dod do/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis mdzod pa bos nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo khyim na bza' ba cung 
[\[54a.5\]]zad yod na drang srong 'di la dbul bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_gang lha nyid mkhyen pa lags te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi zas la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bas so/_/gzhan du na lha nyag gcig bshos kyi lhag ma bre'u chung gang zhig mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog 'di 
[\[54a.6\]]snyam du gyur te/_gal te zos na ni 'tsho ci ste ma zos na ni 'chi'o snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du gyur te/_gal te zos kyang nges par bdag 'chi bar 'gyur te/_'tsho bas chog gis ji ltar na 'di 'dra ba'i drang srong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can de/_de nas rgyal po 
[\[54a.7\]]gser mdog gis rtsis pa dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor rnams bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo dag kyi hud/_'di ni gser mdog gi sbyin pa gtong ba tha ma yin te/_rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi dbul ba yang dag par gcod par gyur cig_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis zas bre'u chung gang yod pa de/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i lhung bzed du blugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de'i lag pa g.yas par lhung 
[\[54b.2\]]bzed byin no/_/gang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus kyis chos ston pa ni chos nyid de tshig gis ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas de rgyal po gser mdog gi bsod snyoms blangs nas/_'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog thal 
[\[54b.3\]]mo sbyar nas/_mig rgyang gis sod dag gi bar du mig mi 'dzums par bltas so/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog gis/_rtsis pa dang sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_blon po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor rnams bos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo dag rang rang gi 
[\[54b.4\]]gnas ji lta ba bzhin dengs shig_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bkres pa dang skom pas 'chi ba'i dus ma byed cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_gang gi tshe lha'i dpal dang sku skal dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag lha'i zhabs 'bring na rtse zhing dga' la longs spyod pa lags na/_'di lta 
[\[54b.5\]]ste bdag cag lha'i dus phyi ma dang dus tshod phyi ma yongs su gtang ba ga la zhig bzod/_de nas rgyal po gser mdog rab tu ngus te mchi ma phyung ngo /_/mchi ma de legs par phyis nas rtsis pa dang sna chen po la gtogs pa dang blon po dang sgo ba dang 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[54b.6\]]grong gi gtso bo dag rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin dengs shig_/thams cad kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis 'chi ba'i dus ma byed cig_/de nas rtsis pa dang sna chen po la gtogs pa dang blon po dang /_sgo ba dang 'khor rnams rab tu ngus te mchi ma phyung ngo /_/
[\[54b.7\]]mchi ma legs par phyis nas/_rgyal po gser mdog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gser mdog gi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas/_rgyal po gser mdog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis lha'i zhal lta ba'i phyi ma deng lags te/_
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]bdag cag gis gang cung zad lha'i bka' la 'gal ba ci bgyis pa bzod par gsol lo/_/'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas des bsod snyoms de yongs su zos so/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bzhi kun nas sprin stug po bzhi 
[\[55a.2\]]langs so/_/rlung grang ba yang langs te/_de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling phyags so/_/de nas de'i dus kyi bye brag la bca' bar bya ba dang /_bza' bar bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab ste/_bza' bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu 'bras chan dang /_phye dang /_zan dron dang /_sha 
[\[55a.3\]]dang /_nya sha dang /_bza' bar bya ba'i dngos po 'di lta bu/_bca' bar bya ba la phug dang /_bza' bar bya ba lo ma dang /_bza' bar bya ba me tog dang /_bza' bar bya ba 'bras bu dang /_bza' bar bya ba til dang /_bza' bar bya ba til mar dang /_bza' bar bya ba 
[\[55a.4\]]bur mar dang /_bza' bar bya ba kha ra dang /_gzhan yang bza' bar bya ba dang /_bca' bar bya ba dang /_myang bar bya ba rnam pa mang po'i bza' ba dag gi char bab bo/_/de nas rgyal po gser mdog mgu la dga' zhing yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid 
[\[55a.5\]]bde ba skyes te/_rtsis pa dang sna chen po la gtogs pa dang blon po dang sgo ba dang 'khor rnams bos nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong gi gtso bo dag ltos shig_/kye ma deng bsod snyoms gcig phul ba'i myu gu byung bar gyur te/_'bras bu dang lo ma dang me tog ni phyis 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[55a.6\]]ro/_/de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nyin bdun du nor dang 'bru'i char rab tu bab bo/_/'di lta ste til dang /_'bras thug po che dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_mon sran dkar ru dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran chung dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_'bru'i rigs thams cad dang zhag bdun du 
[\[55a.7\]]mar sar gyi char bab bo/_/zhag bdun du til mar gyi char bab bo/_/zhag bdun du be'u ras kyi char bab bo/_/zhag bdun du zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char bab bo/_/zhag bdun du rin po che sna bdun la/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]rdo'i snying po dang /_spug rnams te/_rin po che sna bdun po 'di dag gi char bab bo/_/rgyal po gser mdog gi mthus/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi dbul ba yang dag par bcad par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan zhig 
[\[55b.2\]]yin snyam du khyed kyis som nyi dang yid gnyis su mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po gser mdog ces bya ba byung ba de ni/_nga nyid yin par blta bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyin pa la 
[\[55b.3\]]'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes pa ltar/_sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa shes par gyis shig_/gang kham phyi ma'i kham phyi ma gcig po de yang gzhan dag la ma byin ma bgos par bdag gi bar mi bya'o/_/ser sna'i 
[\[55b.4\]]sems kyi dri ma skyes pa kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi bya'o/_/ji ltar ngas shes pa de bzhin du/_'di ltar sems can dag gi sbyin pa dang sbyin pa la 'ged pa'i rnam par smin pa mi shes te/_de lta bas na sems can dag gang kham phyi ma phyi ma'i kham gcig po de yang gzhan dag la ma byin 
[\[55b.5\]]ma bgos par bdag nyid kyis bza' bar mi bya'o/_/ser sna'i sems kyi dri ma skyes pas kun nas dkris te 'dug par mi bya'o/_/sngon gyi dge dang mi dge byas pa chud mi za/_/mkhas pa dag la brten pa chud ni mi za ste/_/'phags pa'i skye bos legs par bshad pa chud 
[\[55b.6\]]mi za/_/byas pa gzo la byas pa rnams kyang chud mi za/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang dge slong de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[55b.7\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D351}]@##/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo/_bam po dang po/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas/_zhal gyi sgo nas 
[\[56a.2\]]'od zer kha dog sna lnga dang ldan pa bkye ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring lo nyi shu bgyis kyi bar du de 'dra bar bzhad pa ma mthong na/_
[\[56a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sngon 'das pa'am ma byon pa'am da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la dgongs sam/_de ma lags pa ci la dgongs pa don bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da 
[\[56a.4\]]ltar bzhugs pa la dgongs pa ma yin gyi/_mngon par dran pa nga sngon bskal pa grangs med par 'das pa'i pha rol na sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dngos po la dgongs te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yul ya ba zhes bya bar rgyal po dge ba zhes bya ba drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/_'gro ba mang po la 
[\[56a.5\]]skyong ba zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal po de la blon po ni bzhi stong zhig yod de/_rgyal phran drug cu la dbang bskur ro/_/grong khyer chen po brgyad brgya dang bal gyi glang po che lnga brgya yod de/_rgyal po la btsun mo nyi khri yod kyang sras mi mnga' bas ri dang klung gi lha gnyan po la mchod 
[\[56a.6\]]'brang byas nas btsun mo dam pa la sras mnga' bar gyur te/_btsun mo'i mal ca dang zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad bdam zhing bzang por sbyar nas rgyal po nyid kyis rim gro byas te/_zla ba bcur tshang nas rgyal bu gcig btsas so/_/pho brang gi btsun mo nyi khri snyed 
[\[56a.7\]]kyang rgyal bu zhig btsas zhes thos nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs te/_nu zho yang rang byung bas rgyal bu'i mtshan yang don grub ces btags so/_/rgyal bu la nu zho snun cing rim gro byed pa bzhi zhig bskos te/_gcig ni nu zho snun pa'i las byed/_gcig ni rgyal bu pang du khyer bar 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bskos/_gcig ni rgyal bu bkru ba'i las byed par bskos/_gcig ni rgyal bu rtser 'gro ba'i las su bskos so/_/de ltar bskos nas rgyal bu lo bcu drug lon pa dang /_yig rtsis dang /_'phong rtsal dang /_bzo dpyad dang /_rol mo la sogs pa gang yang mi shes pa 
[\[56b.2\]]med de thams cad kyang lobs/_rgyal po yab dang yum la yang lha btsun 'dra bar rim gro byed do/_/rgyal pos kyang rgyal bu'i pho brang logs shig tu brtsigs so/_/rgyal bu de chung nas sbyin pa la dga' nas mi la sogs te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang 'dab chags bya'i bar du sems 
[\[56b.3\]]can thams cad bde skyid par dga' ste/_tshig tu yang gang mi shes pa gti mug can ni sbyin pa la mi dga' bas bdag gis bdag bslus te phan pa'i don med kyi/_mkhas pa shes rab can ni 'jig rten na gnas kyang sbyin pa la yon tan cher mthong ste/_sbyin pa byin pas snga ma 'das 
[\[56b.4\]]pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu bags kyis cher skyes nas/_/rgyal po zhig gi bu mo man te zhes bya ba mnga' byad 
[\[56b.5\]]bzang la sdug pa/_dpe zla med pa/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa gcig btsun mor blangs nas bu ming sring gnyis shig yod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal bu de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don sems pa la zhugs 
[\[56b.6\]]nas/_yab rgyal po la bdag ni rtse zhing ltad mo ltar mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu pho brang nas byung ba dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang pos grong khyer gyi sgo lam srang dag na dbul phongs pa/_long ba 'on pa/_lkugs 
[\[56b.7\]]pa'i slongs mo pa dag cig sprul nas sdod du bcug go/_/rgyal bus de dag mthong ba dang /_de ma thag tu phyir log nas pho brang du zhugs te/_mya ngan chen pos non nas mi dga' zhing 'dug pa la/_yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rtse zhing ltad mo ltar 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]btang na ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par gyur ces dris pa dang /_rgyal bus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag rtse zhing ltad mo ltar mchis pa las/_slongs mo pa long ba 'on pa lkugs pa mang po dang mjal bas mya ngan gyis 
[\[57a.2\]]non par gyur te/_nga yab rgyal po la gsol ba rnam pa gcig gsol na rgyal pos gnang ngam/_yab rgyal pos kyang rgyal bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa smros shig dang gnang bar bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /_rgyal bus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni yab 
[\[57a.3\]]rgyal po la mnga' ba'i bang mdzod na rin po che mchis pa rnams grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang tshong 'dus su spungs te slongs mo pa thams cad la yid dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa bgyid par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod ci dang ci dga' ba yid dang mi 'gal bar 
[\[57a.4\]]gnang ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal bus blon po rnams la bsgo nas/_nor dbyig rin po che rnams shing rtas bskyas te/_grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang /_tshong 'dus su spungs nas pha rol po 'dod pa bzhin sbyin pa byin pa dang /_yul khams phyogs brgyad kun tu rgyal bu'i yon 
[\[57a.5\]]tan grags par gyur pas/_kha cig ni dpag tshad brgya/_kha cig ni dpag tshad stong /_kha cig ni dpag tshad khri'i pha rol nas lhags te/_kha zas dang skom 'dod pa la ni zas dang skom byin/_gang gos dang bgo ba 'dod pa la ni gos dang bgo ba byin/_gang gser dang dngul dang rin 
[\[57a.6\]]po che 'dod pa la yang ci 'dod pa bzhin yid dang mi 'gal bar gang yang mi gtang ba med do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dgra zlar gyur pa'i rgyal khams gcig cig yod pa des/_rgyal bu sbyin pa sbyin pa la dga' bas pha rol po ci 'dod pa bzhin yid dang mi 'gal bar yongs su gtong ngo 
[\[57a.7\]]zhes thos nas blon po rnams dang mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa kun la sogs pa bsdus te 'di skad ces bgros so/_/yul ya ba'i rgyal po la bal gyi glang po che pad mo'i steng nas 'gro ba su da ya zhes bya ba stobs dang ldan pa zhig yod de de dag nam dgra zla'i rgyal khams gzhan dang 'thab pa'i tshe/_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bal gyi glang po che des rtag tu rgyal bar gyur pas na/_khyed las su zhig der song sta slong bar nus zhes bgros na/_/blon po las gang yang 'gro nus pa ma byung ngo /_/de'i nang na bram ze mi brgyad zhig gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis slong zhing mchi bar 'tshal na 
[\[57b.2\]]bdag cag gi tshogs dang rgyags sbyor cig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos de'i tshogs dang rgyags sbyar nas bram ze de dag la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/gal te khyod kyis bal glang de khugs te 'ongs na bya dga' cher sbyin no zhes gtsigs byas so/_/de nas bram ze brgyad po 'khar ba thogs te 
[\[57b.3\]]la lung bgrod nas yul ya ba gang na ba der song ngo /_/yul der phyin nas/_rgyal po'i sgor 'khar ba la rkom tshugs bcas te rkang pa ya gcig gis 'greng zhing sdod do/_/de nas rgyal bu'i sgo srungs pho brang nang du song nas phyi rol na bram ze dag cig lhags te/_'khar ba la rkom tshugs bcas 
[\[57b.4\]]nas rkang pa ya gcig gis 'greng zhing sdod de/_bdag cag ni lam ring po nas ched du 'dir slong du 'ongs so zhes mchi'o/_/rgyal bus de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_mod la phyi rol du byung nas bsus te phyag byas so/_/dper na pha dang bu phrad pa tsam du gcig la gcig 
[\[57b.5\]]gis spro ba'i tshig gis khyed gang phyogs nas 'ongs/_lam du nyon ma mongs sam/_ci 'dod ci slong na rkang pa ya gcig 'greng zhes dris so/_/bram ze brgyad pos smras pa/_bdag cag ni rgyal bu khyod sbyin pa sbyin pa la rab tu dga' bas pha rol po ci slong yang yid dang 'gal bar mi mdzad do 
[\[57b.6\]]zhes rgyal bu'i yon tan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang /_yar ni steng gi gnam la thug mar ni sa'i mthil la thug pa man cad du grags pas na/_khyod kyi sbyin pa'i yon tan ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_nye ring thams cad kyis bstod cing bsgrags pas gang yang ma thos pa'am mi shes pa med 
[\[57b.7\]]de kun gyis brjod pa yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin la/_da lha'i sras su gyur pas na lha ni ci smra yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin te/_da rgyal bus sbyin pa mi mdzad na bdag cag gi yid dang 'gal bar mdzad dam/_bdag cag ni rgyal bu las me tog pad mo'i steng nas 'gro ba bal gyi glang po che slong du 'ongs so 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus de dag bal glang gi lhas su khrid de bal glang gzhan zhig byin no/_/bram ze brgyad pos smras pa/_bdag cag ni pad mo'i steng nas 'gro ba'i bal gyi glang po che su da yan 'dod do/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bal gyi glang po che 'di ni 
[\[58a.2\]]bdag gi yab rgyal po la gces shing gnang ba yin te/_bal glang 'di dang bdag tu tha mi dad par dgongs pas khyed la sbyin du mi rung ngo /_/gal te bdag gis khyed la byin na/_rgyal po'i dgongs pa dang 'gal bas gal te bal glang 'di'i rkyen gyis bdag yul 'di nas skrod par 
[\[58a.3\]]'gyur ro zhes smras nas rgyal bu yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag sngon yi dam bcas pa na/_pha rol po ci slong yang yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o zhes dam bcas na/_da bdag gis sngar bsams pa las bzlog ste/_sbyin pa 'di ma byin na/_ji ltar yang bla na med pa 
[\[58a.4\]]mnyam snyoms pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te sbyin pa 'di byin na bla na med pa mnyam snyoms pa'i sbyin sems su 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_rgyal bus 'di skad ces smras so/_/shin tu dka' ste de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas/_drung 
[\[58a.5\]]na 'dug pa'i g.yog la bal gyi glang po che la gser dngul gyi sga bstad de myur du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo ba dang /_bal glang khrid de 'ongs nas rgyal bus lag pa g.yon pas ni chu snod thogs te/_bram ze'i lag pa bkrus/_lag pa g.yas pas ni bal glang gi sna thag nas bzung ste bram ze 
[\[58a.6\]]brgyad po la byin pa dang /_bram ze brgyad pos rgyal bu la smon lam btab bo/_/smon lam btab ma thag tu bal gyi glang po che la sprugs te dga' bzhin dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bus bram ze de dag la yang 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyed myur du mgyogs par song shig_/gal te yab 
[\[58a.7\]]rgyal pos gsan na snyags ma gtong ste 'phrog tu 'ong ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /_de'i tshe bram ze de dag gis de ma thag tu mgyogs su dong ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis rgyal bus bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin no zhes thos nas/_thams cad skrag ste khri las rbab tu lhung nas mya ngan gyis non te/_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]'di snyam du yul 'di na bal glang 'di la ltos na/_da dgra zla gzhan la byin par gyur to snyam du bsams nas rgyal po ga la ba der song ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal bus ni phyi'i dgra thub pa'i bal glang rin po che pha rol gyi dgra zla la byin no zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po yab yed yed por gyur pa 
[\[58b.2\]]las/_blon pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/da ltar rgyal po la bal gyi glang po che 'di mnga' bas chab srid che ba lags te/_bal gyi glang po che de ni bal glang drug cu snyed kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa lags na rgyal bus dgra zla la stsal te/_dgra zlas 'tshal bas chab srid kyang stor du 
[\[58b.3\]]mchi na ji ltar mdzad pa'i rigs/_'di lta bu rang nyams su sbyin pa byin pas bang mdzod kyang stongs shing yul gyi srid dang btsun mo dang sras kyi bar du sbyin pa bgyid par dogs so zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_lhag par mi dga' bar gyur te/_blon 
[\[58b.4\]]po gzhan zhig bos nas/_blon po de la rgyal bus bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin pa bden nam zhes dris pa dang /_blon po des kyang byin pa bden no zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos ma thag tu cher dngangs nas gdan khri las lhung ste/_mi dran par brgyal bar gyur 
[\[58b.5\]]pa las chus gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sangs par gyur/_btsun mo nyi khri snyed kyang thams cad mya ngan gyis non par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dang blon po rnams 'dus nas/_da rgyal bu 'di la ji ltar bya zhes bgros pa dang /_de'i nang na blon po gcig gis ni bal 
[\[58b.6\]]glang gi lhas su song ba ni rkang pa gcag par rigs/_bal glang bzung ba ni lag pa gcag par rigs/_/mig gis bal glang la bltas na yang mig dbyung bar rigs zhes gsol/_kha cig gis ni mgo bcad par rigs so zhes blon po rnams so so nas bgros te gsol ba'i tshig rgyal 
[\[58b.7\]]pos thos nas rab tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non te/_blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/nga'i bu 'di legs pa'i don la mos te/_sbyin pa la dga' ba yin na/_ji ltar mtho 'tsham zhing gzung bar bya/_de'i nang na blon po gcig gis blon po snga ma rnams kyis bgros 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]pa mi rung ngo zhes dpyas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po la sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba la rab tu sdug cing gces pas rgyal bu rgyal tshab lags na/_de la mtho 'tsham zhing bzung gdags bya ba'i sems bskyed par mi rigs te/_bdag ni rgyal po chen po'i 
[\[59a.2\]]sras la bzung gdags bya bar mi gsol gyi/_rgyal bu 'di yul 'di nas spyugs te/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du dgon par spangs na sma bab cing ngo tsha bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang blon po chen po de'i tshig mnyan to/_/de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rgyal tshab bkug ste 
[\[59a.3\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin pa bden nam zhes dris pa dang /_rgyal bus gsol pa/_bdag gis stsal ba mad do zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rgyal bu khyod ci'i phyir nga la ma zhus par nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin zhes dris pa 
[\[59a.4\]]dang /_rgyal bus rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngar yab rgyal po dang dam bcas pa na sbyin pa ci byin na yang mi 'gal bar mdzad do zhes gsungs pas da rgyal po la ma zhus pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sngar dam bcas pa ni nor dbyig dang rin po che la dbang bar 
[\[59a.5\]]byas na/_bal gyi glang po che ci gtogs/_rgyal bus gsol pa/_de dag thams cad rgyal po la mnga' ba'i dkor lags na/_ci'i slad du 'di bkol te ma gtogs zhes gsungs/_rgyal pos rgyal bu rgyal tshab la smras pa/_khyod ni ri dan tig tu lo bcu gnyis spangs kyis yul 
[\[59a.6\]]'di nas myur du byung ste song shig_/rgyal bus rgyal po la gsol pa/_bdag rgyal po chen pos bka' stsal pa'i bka' ni mi gcog na/_da dung yang zhag bdun zhig sbyin pa bgyis te/_bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs nas yul 'di nas byung ste mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol lo/_/
[\[59a.7\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis sbyin pa ma 'os par byas pas yul gyi bang mdzod kun stongs te/_nga'i bal glang rin po che yang med par byas pas khyod spangs pa yin te/_da phyir 'dug cing zhag bdun sbyin pa byar mi gnang gis myur du song shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bus gsol 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po'i bka' bdag mi gcog ste/_rgyal po'i btsun mo nyi khri snyed kyang rgyal po gang na ba der lhags nas/_rgyal bu rgyal tshab zhag bdun zhig sbyin pa byin te yul nas mchi bar gsol pas rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis so sor bran 
[\[59b.2\]]g.yog mngags te/_phyogs bzhi nas nor rdzas 'dod pa rnams pho brang sgor 'dus shig_/nor zas thams cad ni rtag pa dang brtan du rung ba ma yin te/_mthar 'jig cing med pa'i chos can no zhes bsgo nas/_phyogs bzhi nas slong ba mang po lhags pa la rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis/_
[\[59b.3\]]zas dang skom dang nor dang rin po che rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du yid bzhin du byin nas/_dbul phongs pa rnams longs spyod dang ldan zhing thams cad bde skyid par byas so/_/de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis chung ma la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]longs la bdag ci zer ba nyon 
[\[59b.4\]]cig_/rgyal po chen pos ni bdag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du ri dan tig ces bya bar spangs so/_/chung mas rgyal bus smras pa'i tshig thos nas/[ (]yed [,]yod [)]ces dngangs te langs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal bu la nyes pa ci zhig mchis na/_rgyal pos de lta de ltar mdzad 
[\[59b.5\]]par gyur/_rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag gis sbyin pa ma 'os pa zhig byas te/_rgyal po'i bang mdzod kyang stongs/_bal glang rin po che yang dgra zla la byin zhes rgyal po dang blon po rnams khros nas bdag spangs pa yin no/_/btsun mo man tes smras pa/_rgyal po'i yul du 
[\[59b.6\]]lo legs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po dang /_blon po dang 'bangs kyi bar du bde skyid pa dang /_longs spyod che bar smon lam legs par btab la bdag cag ri la sgom du 'dong ngo /_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ri ni 'jigs pa'i gnas yin te/_shin tu bya dka' ba 
[\[59b.7\]]bsam dgos la seng ge dang stag la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa yod pas rab tu 'jigs na khyod ni longs spyod myong ba yin pas khyod de lta bu dag bzod dam/_khyod pho brang gi nang na gos su ni phra ba dang 'jam pa gyon/_gnas su ni gur dang yol bas bskor ba na 'dug_/zas su 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]ni ci la dga' ba bzhin zhim pa dang mngar ba la za na/_ri la ni stan du ni rtswa 'dings/_zas su ni 'bras bu za na/_khyod de la mos shing dga' ba ci zhig yod/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang rlung dang char pa dang 'brug dang ser ba che zhing ba mo dang zil pas mi'i spu yang langs pa 
[\[60a.2\]]tsam du grang ba'i tshe na ni grang rab la tsha ba'i tshe na ni tsha rab ste/_shing gi gseb na 'dug pa'i gnas su yang mi rung na/_sa la gze ma dang gseg ma dang rdo ba yang mang zhing sbrul gdug pa yang yod na/_khyod de lta bu dag bzod dam/_man tes smras pa/_bdag la mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang gur dang 
[\[60a.3\]]yol ba dang mngar ba dang zhim pas ci zhig bgyi/_rgyal bu dang bral zhing so sor mchi ba bdag mi bzod de/_nam du yang rgyal bu dang mi 'bral zhing lhan cig 'grogs par dga'o/_/rgyal po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni rgyal mtshan/_me'i thog mar 'gro ba ni dud pa/_chung ma'i thog mar 
[\[60a.4\]]'gro ba ni khyim thab yin pas bdag ni rgyal bu la yid brtan te skyabs su mchi'o/_/rgyal bu ni bdag gi lha lags te/_rgyal bus phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa la sbyin pa byin pa'i tshe/_bdag gis kyang rgyal bu'i grogs bgyis pas/_da rgyal bu lam ring du 'gro ba las/_gal te pha 
[\[60a.5\]]rol po slong ba 'ongs na bdag gis de bzhin du grogs bgyi/_rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzad na bdag gi srog la bab kyang phyir mi nur bas the tsom mi mdzad du gsol/_rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' bas pha rol gyi sems mi zlogs te/_pha rol pos bdag la gal te bu'am khyod 
[\[60a.6\]]nyid slong ba 'ongs na yang bdag gis mi gtong mi nus so/_/ci ste bdag gis bsams pa khyod kyis de bzhin ma byas na ni bdag gi dge ba'i sems 'khrugs par gyur pas 'gro bar mi rigs so/_/man tes smras pa/_rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzad pa ni 'jig rten na gang yang 'di 'dra ba med pas yid 
[\[60a.7\]]bzhin du sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/_rgyal bus smras pa/_khyod de ltar nus na shin tu legs so zhes rgyal bu dang btsun mo dang sras gnyis dang bcas pa 'grogs te/_yum gang na ba der song nas da bdag cag mchi'o zhes mchi phyag byas nas yum la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yum gyis 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]skabs skabs su rgyal po chen po la/_ci nas dkar po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid bde zhing 'bangs mang po gtams las mi gcad par gros gdab par gsol lo/_/yum gyis rgyal bu 'gro'o zhes mchi phyag byas pa mthong nas lhag par mya ngan gyis gdungs te drung na 'dug pa la 'di 
[\[60b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/kho mo'i lus 'di ni rdo ba yin pa lta/_snying ni rdo rje yin pa lta ste/_bdag gis rgyal po chen po'i rim gro bya ba la skyon ma byung na/_da kho mo'i bu gcig pu 'di dang bye bral te/_'gro na ci'i phyir kho mo'i snying 'di gas te shi bar ma gyur/_bu 'di kho mo'i khong pa na 'dug pa 
[\[60b.3\]]na skyed shing gi 'dab ma ltar nyin mtshan cher skyes te/_da skyed rdzogs nas kho mo bor te song bas na/_btsun mo thams cad kyang bdag la snying tshim mo zhes brjod la rgyal pos kyang bkur bar mi 'gyur na/_gal te lha rnams kyis bdag gi smon lam bzhin mi 'gal bar mdzad na bdag gi bu phyir 
[\[60b.4\]]yul du 'khor bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas rgyal bu btsun mo dang sras gnyis dang bcas te/_yab dang yum la mchi phyag byas te dong ngo /_/de'i tshe btsun mo nyi khris ni so so nas mu tig gi chun po re re brdzangs so/_/blon po chen po bzhi stong gis ni rin po che sna bdun 
[\[60b.5\]]las byas pa'i me tog pad mo re re rgyal bu la brdzangs so/_/de nas rgyal bu pho brang nang nas byung ste grong khyer gyi byang sgor phyin nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang do shal yang ril gyis phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa la ma lus par byin no/_/yul de na gnas pa'i mi mang po khri phrag du mas 
[\[60b.6\]]rgyal bu bskyal te/_de dag 'di skad ces gtam du brjod do/_/rgyal bu 'di ni shin tu dge ba yul gyi lha gnyan lta bu yin na/_ci'i phyir yab yum gyis sras rin po che 'di lam ring du spangs shes mthong ba thams cad kyis phangs so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu grong khyer gyi phyi rol du 
[\[60b.7\]]skyed shing gi drung na 'dug ste/_skyel ba'i mi rnams la 'di nas phyir dengs shig ces spro ba'i tshig smras pa dang /_skyel skyel ba che chung thams cad mchi ma blags te ngus nas phyir dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bus btsun mo dang sras gnyis shing rta'i nang du bzhag nas/_rgyal bu nyid kyis shing 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]rta kha lo bsgyur te song ba las rgyangs chad par phyin te/_skyed shing gi drung na ngal so zhing 'dug pa las bram ze dag cig lhags nas/_rgyal bu las shing rta khrid pa'i rta bslangs so/_/rgyal bus slong ba la rta byin nas/_sras bu gnyis shing rta'i steng du bzhag ste/_btsun 
[\[61a.2\]]mos ni shing rta'i phyi nas phul/_rgyal bus ni mdun nas drangs te rkang pas shing rta 'dren cing song ba las/_ring po ma lon par yang bram ze zhig dang phrad nas shing rta bslangs pa dang /_rgyal bus shing rta yang bram ze la byin no/_/de nas yang song ba las ring po ma lon par yang bram ze slong ba dang phrad 
[\[61a.3\]]nas rgyal bus de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag gis khyod la ma byin na ni chags shing ser sna byed par gyur na/_da ni bdag la nor zas zad de ci yang med do zhes smras pa dang /_bram ze na re nor rdzas med na lus la gyon pa'i gos de nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal bus lus 
[\[61a.4\]]la gyon pa'i gos rin po che yang slong ba la byin te/_gos rnying pa zhig gyon te dong ba las ring po ma lon par bram ze yang slong ba zhig dang phrad nas rgyal bus btsun mo'i gos byin no/_/de nas yang dong ba las ring po ma lon par bram ze slong ba dang phrad nas/_rgyal bus sras gnyis kyi gos kyang byin 
[\[61a.5\]]no/_/de ltar rgyal bus rta dang shing rta dang nor rdzas dang bgo ba'i gos kyi bar du ma lus par zad par byin pa yang /_thog ma nas 'gyod pa'i sems skra'i nyag ma tsam mam ba spu tsam yang med do/_/rgyal bus ni sras bu khur du thogs/_btsun mos ni sras mo pang du khyer nas rkang pas song yang 
[\[61a.6\]]rgyal bu dang btsun mo dang sras gnyis kyi bar du dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te ri ga la ba der song ngo /_/ri dan tig ces bya bar yul ya ba nas lam so rab tu ring ste dpag tshad phrag stong zhig yod do/_/de ltar song song ba las 'brog dgon par phyin nas/_bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug 
[\[61a.7\]]bsngal gyis nyen pa las/_sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang pos 'brog dgon pa der grong khyer khyim bzang po tshong 'dus dang lam srang yod pa/_rol mo dang gos dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan pa/_grong khyim de na mi dag gis rgyal bu bsu ba dag sprul to/_/mi mang pos rgyal bu grong 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]khyim du bsus te/_zas dang skom dang bde ba'i yo byad kyis bstabs pa dang /_btsun mos rgyal bu la smras pa/_lam ring por bgrod pas rab tu ngal da thal byung 'dug tu mi rung ngam/_rgyal bus smras pa/_yab rgyal pos bdag cag la ri dan tig tu song shig ces bka' stsal 
[\[61b.2\]]te/_da 'dir 'dug par gyur na yab rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal bar gyur te bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes grong khyer de nas byung ste mod la song ngo /_/de ltar song ba las ring po ma lon par ri dan tig gi ri'i drung du phyin pa dang /_ri de'i drung na chu chen po shin tu zab pa rgal bar mi thar ba zhig dang 
[\[61b.3\]]phrad do/_/de nas btsun mos rgyal bu la re zhig 'dir bsdad do/_/chu chen po bri nas rgal te 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus smras pa/_yab rgyal pos bdag cag la ri dan tig tu song shig ces bka' stsal pas/_da 'dir 'dug par gyur na rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal te/_bu sri 
[\[61b.4\]]zhu can ma yin no zhes smras nas rgyal bu de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang /_mod la chu'i nang nas ri chen po zhig byung nas chu'i rgyun bcad do/_/de nas rgyal bu dang btsun mo gos brjes te/_chu rgal nas phar rgal ma thag tu rgyal bu yang 'di snyam du 
[\[61b.5\]]bsams so/_/thal byung song bar gyur na chu 'khyil pa 'dis sems can mang du 'chi ste/_grog sbur mang po chus khyer bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_rgyal bu phyir chu la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/chu khyod snga mkho bzhin du rgyun du 'bab cing gal te bdag 'dod pa zhig 'ongs 
[\[61b.6\]]na yang thar bar byos shig ces smras ma thag tu chu yang snga mkho bzhin du 'bab par gyur to/_/de nas song ba las ri dan tig tu phyin nas rgyal bus ri de la bltas nas/_ri de rad rod dang zad zed du 'dug la shing mang po rab tu rgyas shing bya sna tshogs kyang snyan pa'i sgra 'byin/_'bab chu dang 
[\[61b.7\]]chu mig dang mtshe'u dang lteng kar ldan te chu ni mngar/_'bras bu ni zhim/_chu bya dang ngang ngur dang 'jol mo dang ri skegs la sogs pa bya rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang gnas pa mthong nas rgyal bus btsun mo la yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/ri 'di la bltas na shing dang tshal gnam la reg pa 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]tsam du skyes na yang /_brngas pa'am bcad pa med pas chu mig zhim po la 'thung zhing 'bras bu mngar ba za ste/_ri 'di la sgom pa dag yod pas 'dir gnas par bya'o/_/rgyal bu ri de la phyin pa na/_ri de la gnas pa'i 'dab chags bya dang gcan gzan dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
