[\[62a.2\]]thams cad rab tu dga' nas rgyal bu bsus so/_/de'i tshe ri de la sgom pa'i dge slong a tshu ta zhes bya ba lo lnga brgya lon pa/_yon tan mchog dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/_rgyal bu de'i drung du song nas/_phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ri 'di la gang phyogs 
[\[62a.3\]]na 'bras bu dang chu mig bzang por ldan pa gnas su rung ba ci yod ces dris pa dang /_a tshu tas smras pa/_ri 'di gnas thams cad du bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi yin pas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/_ri 'di ni shin tu dben pa'i gnas gtsang ma yin pas na ci rgyal bu khyod chung 
[\[62a.4\]]ma dang bu smad du bcas te chos slob tu 'ongs sam/_de la rgyal bus smra ma khom par btsun mo man tes smras pa/_dge slong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa ri la lam bsgoms nas ji srid cig lon/_dge slong gis smras pa/_ri 'dir phyin nas lo bzhi brgya'am lnga brgya 
[\[62a.5\]]tsam lon no/_/btsun mo man tes smras pa/_da dung bdag dang bdag gi bar du 'dzin na nam zhig lam thob par 'gyur/_de srid du ri la gnas kyang rdo shing dang tha mi dad de bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin na gdod lam thob par 'gyur ro zhe'o/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_bdag gis 
[\[62a.6\]]yang dag par don de lta bu mi shes so/_/de nas rgyal bus dge slong la smras pa/_btsun pa yul ya ba'i rgyal bu rgyal tshab don grub ces bya ba thos sam/_dge slong gis smras pa/_bdag gis rgyun du thos kyi mthong ba ni ma yin no/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag ni rgyal bu rgyal tshab don grub 
[\[62a.7\]]ces bya ba yin no/_/dge slong gis rgyal bu khyod gar 'gro ci 'dod ces dris pa dang /_rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag ni theg pa chen po'i lam 'dod do zhes smras so/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_rgyal bu'i yon tan dang sbyar na/_ring por mi thogs par theg pa chen po'i lam thob par 'gyur te/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]rgyal bu bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_bdag ni nye gnas rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smras nas/_rgyal bu khrid de 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to/_/de nas dge slong gis chos bzhin du rgyal bu'i skra slas nas mdud pa bor nas/_zas su ni shing gi 'bras 
[\[62b.2\]]bu shing tog za/_skom du ni chu mig 'thung ngo /_/de nas rgyal bus shing dang rtswa bsdus te/_bdag 'dug pa'i rtswa'i spyil po chung ngu ma gcig byas/_btsun mo man te bu ming sring gnyis 'dug pa'i spyil po re re yang byas so/_/de'i tshe na khye'u'i ming ni ya ri zhes bya ste/_lo bdun lon nas 
[\[62b.3\]]gos rang gyon nus te/_pha'i phyi bzhin du 'gro'o/_/bu mo'i ming ni ge no yan zhes bya ste lo drug lon pas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa gyon cing ma'i phyi bzhin 'gro'o/_/ri de la gnas pa'i gcan gzan dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_'dab chags bya la sogs pa thams cad kyang rab tu 
[\[62b.4\]]dga' nas/_rgyal bu la rten cing gnas so/_/rgyal bu ri de la phyin nas zhag gcig lon pa dang /_sngon skams pa'i chu mig dang /_rdzing yang chus gang bar gyur/_skyed shing skams pa rnams kyang thams cad me tog dang 'dab ma skyes par gyur te/_srin bu gdug pa rnams kyang 
[\[62b.5\]]med par gyur nas/_gcan gzan gcig la gcig za ba yang so so nas rtswa la za bar gyur/_'bras bu'i shing rnams kyang rgyas shing bzang por gyur/_bya sna tshogs snying rje'i skad kyi sgra skad snyan pa 'byin par gyur to/_/btsun mo man tes ni shing gi 'bras bu dang shing tog brngas 
[\[62b.6\]]shing rgyal bu la phul te/_sras ming sring gnyis kyang snyod do/_/sras bu ming sring gnyis ni skabs skabs su pha ma gnyis dang bral te/_ha cang yang mi ring ba'i chu mig 'gram dag tu gcan gzan nam [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag dang lhan cig rtse ste/_bar 'ga' zhag lon par yang rtse'o/_/phyis 
[\[62b.7\]]dus gzhan zhig na sras khye'u ya ri seng ge la zhon pa las/_seng ge rgal nas rdab cig bsnun pas sras bu'i gdong pa cung zad snad de khrag byung ba las/_spre'u zhig gis shing gi lo ma blangs te gdong gi khrag phyis nas chu 'gram du khrid de khrag bkrus pa yang rgyal bus rgyang ma nas mthong ngo /_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]de'i tshe yul kai lai zhes bya bar bram ze dbul po zhig lo bzhi bcu lon nas chung ma blangs so/_/chung ma ni rab tu bzang zhing sdug la/_bram ze de ni rab tu mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma bcu gnyis rdzogs par yod de/_de'i lus mdog sol ba ltar gnag la gdong 
[\[63a.2\]]la 'bur 'bur po gsum yod pa/_sna 'khyor zhing mig gnyis shel ltar sngo ba/_gdong gnyer ma can la ma mchu 'phyang ba/_smra ba'i skad mi snyan pa/_gsus pa che ba/_rkub 'bur ba/_rkang pa gnyis gyol ba/_mgo shu ba can la skra med pa/_'dre ltar mi sdug pa zhig 
[\[63a.3\]]ste/_chung mas kyang mthong mi 'dod pa tsam du shi yang sla zhes rgyun du dmod mo byed pa zhig yod do/_/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de chu chur song song ba las/_lam du khyo ga gzhon nu ma dag cig dang phrad nas khyo ga rnams kyis khyim thab kyi gzugs 'di 'dra'o zhes co 'dri zhing 
[\[63a.4\]]bgad nas/_khyod ni dpe med par bzang zhing sdug na/_ci ltar 'di 'dra ba'i chung ma byed nus ces smras pa dang chung mas khyo ga de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgan po'i mgo ni shing la ba mo chags pa ltar skya ba de nang nub tu shi bar dga' na shir mi btub ji ltar bya/_de 
[\[63a.5\]]nas chu snod thogs nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te/_khyim thab la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag chu chur song song ba las/_lam du khyo ga gzhon nu dag cig dang phrad de/_de dag bdag la co 'dri zhing bgad nas/_da khyod kyis bkol ba'i bran khol yod na chu chu yang mi dgos 
[\[63a.6\]]te/_gzhan gyis dpyas par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim thab kyis smras pa/_bdag cag ni shin tu yang dbul phongs pa yin na bran khol ga las rnyed par 'gyur/_chung mas smras pa/_gal te bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na bdag kyang 'gro ste/_khyod dang lhan cig mi gnas so 
[\[63a.7\]]zhes chung mas yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mos thos na/_rgyal bu don grub sbyin pa ma 'os par byin pas yab rgyal pos ri dan tig ces bya bar spangs so/_/rgyal bu de la bu khye'u gcig dang bu mo gcig yod ces grag gis/_khyod de slong du song shig_/khyim thab kyis smras pa/_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]ri dan tig ces bya ba 'di nas dpag tshad drug stong lhag tsam gcig gi lam so yod la/_sngon la lung bgrod kyang ma myong na da ci ltar bgrod par bya/_chung mas smras pa/_bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na bdag 'gegs te 'chi'o zhes smras pa dang /_khyim thab kyis smras pa/_nyes 
[\[63b.2\]]na kho bo ni gcig gis bsad kyang sla'o/_/khyod shi bar mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/_khyod kyis bdag slong du 'gro bar dad na kho bo'i rgyags dang dgos pa sbyor cig ces bsgo'o/_/chung mas smras pa/_da song shig rgyags dang dgos pa yang med do zhes smras nas/_bram zes rgyags 
[\[63b.3\]]rang sbyar te rkang pas lam du zhugs te song ngo /_/de nas bram ze yul ya ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song ste der phyin pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas sgo srung ba la rgyal bu don grub da ltar ga la 'dug ces dris pa dang /_sgo srung de pho brang gi nang du song nas rgyal po la da 
[\[63b.4\]]ltar phyi rol na bram ze zhig rgyal bu don grub ga re zhes 'dri'o/_/rgyal pos rgyal bu don grub ga re zhes smra ba'i tshig thos pa tsam gyis sems 'khrug cing khros nas/_'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba sha stag gi phyir nga'i sras spangs par gyur na/_da yang slong du 'ongs snyam bsams nas/_
[\[63b.5\]]dpe 'di skad ces brjod par gyur to/_/dper na me ni rang bzhin gyis tsha zhing 'bar ba yin na/_de'i steng du shing bsnan pa dang 'dra ste bdag kyang da ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs te/_me dang 'dra ba las da yang rgyal bu ga re zhes 'dri ba ni me la shing gis bsnan pa dang 'dra'o/_/bram zes 
[\[63b.6\]]gsol pa/_bdag ni lam ring po nas 'ongs pa yang rgyal bu rgyal tshab mi'i yid dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa bgyid do zhes ming yang snyan pa steng du gnam la thug_/'og tu ni chu mig gi gting la thug gi bar du grags pa bdag lam ring po nas re ba yod pas 'ongs so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[63b.7\]]smras pa rgyal bu don grub ni da ltar ri shin tu dben pa na gnas te/_rab tu dbul zhing ci yang med na/_khyod la ci zhig sbyin du yod/_bram zes smras pa/_rgyal bu la ci yang med kyang bdag phrad par dga'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang gzhan zhig la lam ston cig ces 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bsgo'o/_/de nas bram ze de song song ba las dan tig gi ri drung du chu chen po zhig yod par phyin nas/_rgyal bu 'ba' zhig bsams shing yid la byas pas chu'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze ri de la phyin nas thog ma rngon pa zhig dang phrad de rngon 
[\[64a.2\]]pa de la khyod ri la rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba mthong ngam zhes dris pa dang /_rngon pa des kyang rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' bas bram ze 'di dag gi phyir ri la spangs par shes pas/_rngon pa des kyang bram ze bzung nas shing la bcings te brdegs pas lus la rma yang byung ngo /_/
[\[64a.3\]]rngon pas yang smras pa/_khyod rgyal bu dris te ci zhig bya mda' 'phang ngo zhes byas pa dang /_bram ze de 'di snyam du/_da ni 'dis bdag gsod yang dag na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhig bya'o snyam bsams nas/_rngon pa la khyod bdag la 'dri na ci nyes ces smras so/_/de nas rngon pas 'o 
[\[64a.4\]]na ci zhig smra bar sems zhes dris pa dang /_bram zes [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po yab rgyal bu mthong bar dga' bas bdag 'dir rgyal bu phyir 'gugs su 'ongs so zhes smras ma thag tu rngon pas kyang bkrol te btang nas sngar ma rtogs te rgyus ma shes so zhes 
[\[64a.5\]]bzod pa gsol nas rgyal bu gang na 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to/_/de nas bram ze de rgyal bu'i thad du phyin pa dang /_rgyal bus kyang rgyang ma nas bram ze 'ongs pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te bsus nas gus par phyag byas te/_khyod ga las 'ongs lam du nyon mongs shing 
[\[64a.6\]]ngal bar ma gyur tam ci 'dod ces spro ba'i gtam byas so/_/bram zes smras pa/_bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs te lus thams cad rtse zhing ngal te bkres skom mo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus nang du khrid nas stan la 'dug tu bcug ste/_shing thog dang shing gi 'bras bu dang btung 
[\[64a.7\]]ba'i skom mdun du phab nas/_bram zes kyang skom 'thungs shing thog zos te/_thal byung rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni yul kai lai zhes bya ba'i yul mi yin te/_snga zhig nas rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga'o zhes phyogs bcur grags shing thos pas/_bdag ni dbul 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]phongs te rgyal bu la slong du 'ongs so/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag la yod pa las khyod la ma byin na ni chags shing ser sna byed par yang 'gyur na bdag la ci bdog pa sngar btang bas da ni ci yang sbyin du med do/_/bram zes smras pa/_de ltar nor rdzas sbyin du med na khyod kyi bu 
[\[64b.2\]]ming sring gnyis bdag rgad po'i 'khol ba'am bran du byin cig ces de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du smras nas/_rgyal bus kyang khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs la/_bdag gi bu ming sring gnyis 'dod pa rab tu legs kyis sbyin no zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na bu 
[\[64b.3\]]ming sring gnyis rtser song song ba las/_rgyal bus bos nas bu la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/bram ze 'di lam ring po nas bu khyed gnyis slong ngo zhes zer nas/_kho bos kyang sbyin par byas kyis khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin song shig ces bsgo ba dang /_bu gnyis rgyal bu'i 
[\[64b.4\]]mchan du bros nas ngu ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis bram ze du ma yang mthong na 'di 'dra ba dag ma mthong ste/_'di ni bram ze ma lags kyi yang dag par [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lags pas bdag cag gi ma shing thog tshol du mchis pa las/_slar ma 'khor bar 
[\[64b.5\]]bdag cag gnyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di'i zas su stsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'gum mo/_/bdag gi ma slar mchis te bu dang ma mjal na/_ji ltar ba dang be'u bral ba ltar ngu zhing cho nges 'debs te mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal bus bu la 
[\[64b.6\]]bsgo ba/_kho bos sbyin par gnang bas bsdad du mi rung ste 'di bram ze yin gyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma yin pas mi zos kyis khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin song shig_/bram zes smras pa/_bdag ni da chas te 'gro'o/_/gal te bu'i ma 'ongs na 'gror med de/_ma btang na rgyal bus 
[\[64b.7\]]bdag la byin pa'i dge ba'i sems/_bu'i mas zlog cing nyams par 'gyur du dogs so/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag gis sbyin pa ci byas kyang thog ma nas ci la yang 'gyod pa'i sems byung ma myong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bus chu snod thogs nas/_bram ze'i lag par chu blugs 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]nas bu gnyis kyi lag pa nas bzung ste/_bram ze la phul ba na sa yang rab tu g.yos so/_/bu gnyis bram ze'i phyi bzhin mchir ma btub nas/_phyir pha rgyal bu'i drung du 'ongs te/_pus mo sa la btsugs nas pha rgyal bu la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag 
[\[65a.2\]]cag gnyis kyis tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba'i sdig pa ci bgyis na 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/_bdag cag ni rgyal po'i rigs su skyes na ci'i slad du pha rol po'i bran khol du gyur ces pha rgyal bu la sdig bshags nas/_'di'i rgyu 'di'i rkyen gyis sdig pa byang zhing 
[\[65a.3\]]bsod nams skyes te gang nas gang du skyes kyang 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces smras so/_/rgyal bus bu la smras pa/_'jig rten na mdza' zhing sdug go cog mthar bye bral bar gyur te/_thams cad mi rtag pas yid brtan du mi rung /_kho bo nam bla na 
[\[65a.4\]]med pa'i mnyam snyoms pa'i byang chub thob pa na khyod thar pa'i don bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/bu gnyis kyis yang yab rgyal bu la smras pa/_bus ni ma la mchi phyag bya ba lags na da gzhar yang mi phrad de/_ma'i ngo ma mthong ba yang bdag cag gi sngon gyi sdig pa'i las kyis gdungs 
[\[65a.5\]]par zad na/_bdag cag gi ma ci'i phyir mya ngan gyis gdungs shing sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhes smre sngags 'don to/_/bram zes smras pa/_bdag rgas la nyam chung bas bus pa 'di gnyis bdag bor te ma'i thad du bros par gyur na bdag gis byar med par 'gyur gyis/_
[\[65a.6\]]khyod kyis chings la dkris shig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal bus kyang bu gnyis kyi lag pa phying ka log tu bzung ste/_bram ze nyid 'ching du bcug nas phying ka log tu bcings pa'i thag pa bram ze'i lag par byin te sbrel nas khrid do/_/bu gnyis ni de ltar khrid kyang 'gror ma 
[\[65a.7\]]btub ste 'then pa las bram zes lcag thogs te/_ded nas gzhus pa'i lam du khrag byung ba yang sa la chal par gang ngo /_/rgyal bus de ltar mthong nas mchi ma byung ste/_mchi ma sa la bo bas sa yang khol bar gyur to/_/rgyal bu dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang gcan gzan 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]mang po thams cad kyis bu gnyis bskyal te mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_gzod phyir log go/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang gcan gzan la sogs pas rgyal bu bskyal te/_phyir rgyal bu dang rtse ba'i gnas su phyin nas snying rje ba'i skad phyung ste lus sa la rdebs shing 'gro'o/_/bram 
[\[65b.2\]]ze des lam du zhugs te song song ba las/_lam kar skyed shing zhig yod pa la bu gnyis btags te 'dug go/_/de nas chas pa dang bu gnyis ma dang phrad du re nas shing gi phag 'khri zhing 'gror ma btub nas/_bram zes yang gzhus pa las bu gnyis kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[65b.3\]]smras so/_/bdag cag la ma rdeg cig_/bdag cag rang 'gro'o zhes gnam la yar bltas te/_yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/ri gnyen gyi lha dang nags tshal gyi shing gi lha rnams bdag cag la cung zad thugs brtse ba'am dgongs pa mi mnga' 'am bdag 
[\[65b.4\]]cag ni lam ring por gzhan gyi bran khol byed du 'gro ste/_ma dang bral bar gyur na bdag cag gi ma ri la shing thog tshol zhing brdar btang ste/_myur du bdag cag dang ngo phrad par shog cig mi sbran nam zhes de skad smras pa dang /_bu'i ma ri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa 
[\[65b.5\]]g.yon pa'i rkang mthil g.ya' zhing g.yo ba dang mig g.yon pa yang 'gul nu ma gnyis nas nu zho yang rang zag par gyur nas/_'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i ltas ngan pa gna' byung ma myong na bdag gi bu gnyis la ye 'drog ma byung ngam snyam bsams nas/_shing thog gis ci zhig 
[\[65b.6\]]bya snyam ste/_shing thog brnga ba yang btang nas myur bar phyir gnas su 'gro bar chas so/_/de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnam gyi lha'i dbang po/_rgyal bus gzhan la bu byin par shes nas/_btsun mos dge bar bsams pa'i sems kyi bar chad byed du dogs 
[\[65b.7\]]pas/_seng ge zhig tu sprul nas lam gyi srang du bsdad do/_/btsun mos seng ge la smras pa/_khyod ni gcan gzan gyi rgyal po/_kho bo ni mi'i rgyal mo yin te ri la 'khod par 'dra na cung zad lam las byol te bdag thong shig_/bdag la bu chung ngu ma shed ma bye ba 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]gnyis shig yod de/_da tsam gyi bar du ci yang ma zos pas bdag 'ong du re ste sdod do/_/seng ges kyang bram ze de rgyang ring du thal bar shes nas lam las byol te btsun mo btang ngo /_/btsun mo phyir gnas su 'ongs nas/_rgyal bu 'ba' zhig snang 
[\[66a.2\]]gi bu gnyis ma mthong bas/_bdag nyid 'dug pa'i spyil bur bltas na yang bu ma mthong /_bu gnyis 'dug pa'i spyil por bltas na yang bu ma mthong ste/_de nas bu rtse ba'i gnas chu 'gram du btsal na yang ma mthong ngo /_/sngon bu dang rtse ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sha ba dang /_kha sha dang /_gcan 
[\[66a.3\]]gzan seng ge dang /_spre'u la sogs te mdun nas lus sa la rdebs shing sgra 'byin la/_sngon rtse ba'i rdzing bu'i chu yang skams par mthong nas/_phyir rgyal bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rgyal bu la bdag gi bu gnyis ga re zhes dris na/_rgyal bu cang mi smra'o/_/btsun mos yang 
[\[66a.4\]]smras pa/_bdag nam shing thog thogs te phyir gnas su 'khor ba na bdag gi bu gnyis rgyang ma nas rgyug cing mdun du bsus te/_rdeg 'chos na yang phyir langs te dkyu mchong zhing a ma 'ongs a ma 'ongs so zhes 'bod de/_bdag 'dug pa na gnyis ka g.yas g.yon na 'dug cing /_
[\[66a.5\]]phrag pa'am lus la rdul gos na yang 'phyi zhing sprug_/da bdag gi bu ga re ma mthong na gzhan la ma byin nam/_'di ltar ma mthong bas bdag gi snying gas par 'gyur gyis/_bdag gi bu ga la 'dug myur du smros shig_/bdag myos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar lan gnyis lan 
[\[66a.6\]]gsum gyi bar du dris kyang lan ma smras so/_/btsun mos yang smras pa/_lhag par sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/_bu gnyis ma mthong ba lta tshod yod na/_rgyal bus lan ma ster bas lhag par myos shing 'khrugs par gyur to/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_yul kai lai zhes 
[\[66a.7\]]bya ba nas bram ze zhig 'ongs te/_bdag la bu gnyis bslangs pa las bdag gis byin no/_/btsun mos rgyal bus smras pa thos ma thag tu ri rdib pa ltar sa la 'gyel te 'gre zhing cho nges btab bo/_/rgyal bus smras pa re zhig sdod cig_/khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rgyas mar me mdzad kyi tshe dam ji ltar bcas pa mi dran nam/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag ni bram ze'i bu gzhon nu zhes bya/_khyod ni bram ze'i bu mo sun da ri ka zhes bya ste/_khyod ni de'i tshe me tog pad mo bdun zhig thogs/_bdag la dngul gyi dong tse lnga zhig yod de/_khyod 
[\[66b.2\]]las pad mo lnga zhig nyos nas sangs rgyas la phul bar byas pa las khyod kyis pad mo lhag ma gnyis po yang nga la byin te/_sangs rgyas la 'bul gyis smon lam du yang bdag skye ba pha rol tu rtag par khyod kyi chung mar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa las/_bdag de'i tshe 
[\[66b.3\]]khyod dang 'di skad ces dam ma bcas sam/_khyod bdag gi chung mar dga' na bdag gi yid dang 'gal bar ma byed cig_/bdag sbyin pa zhig byed na pha ma gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan sbyin yang bdag gi yid bzhin du sbyin pa las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces dam 
[\[66b.4\]]bcas pa las/_de'i tshe khyod na re de bzhin du bya'o zhes mi zer ram/_da khyod kyi bu gnyis gzhan la byin pa la bdag gi dge ba'i sems dkrug tu yang ci yod ces rgyal bus smras ma thag tu/_btsun mos thos pa tsam gyis sems dang yid kyis sngon gyi gnas dran 
[\[66b.5\]]pa'i mngon par shes pa tshor bar gyur te/_rgyal bu'i bsam pa myur bar rdzogs par 'dod pas yid bzhin du sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal bus sbyin pa byin pa ji ltar sems pa bsams pa'i phyir bram ze zhig tu sprul to/_/
[\[66b.6\]]bram ze de yang mi sdug pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan te/_rgyal bu ga la ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal bu khyod sbyin pa la dga' bas pha rol po'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed ces grag ste/_bdag kyang ched du 'dir slong du 'ongs kyis khyod la btsun 
[\[66b.7\]]mo yod pa de bdag la byin cig_/rgyal bus smras pa/_shin tu legs te de bzhin du sbyin no zhes smras so/_/btsun mos smras pa/_bdag kyang pha rol po la byin na rgyal bu'i g.yog sus bya/_rgyal bus smras pa/_da khyod kyang sbyin pa ma byas na ji ltar yang bla na med 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]pa'i mnyam snyoms pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_de nas rgyal bus chu snod thogs te bram ze'i lag pa bkru ba'i phyir/_lag par chu blugs nas btsun mo yang bram ze la phul lo/_/de ltar rgyal bu la 'gyod pa'i sems cung zad kyang med par 
[\[67a.2\]]brgya byin gyis rtogs nas lha rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags te gnam sa yang cher g.yos so/_/de nas bram zes btsun mo khrid de gom pa bdun tsam du phyin pa dang /_phyir log nas btsun mo 'di rgyal bu la phyir gtams kyis su la yang ma sbyin cig ces smras so/_/
[\[67a.3\]]rgyal bus slar smras pa/_ci'i phyir mi khrid mi 'dod dam/_ci mir skyes pa'i chung ma'i nang na chung ma 'di ni shin tu yang bzang zhing mdzes te rgyal po'i bu mo yin la/_rgyal po de la bu mo 'di gcig pu las med de/_chung ma 'di ni bdag la chu gang che bas kha zas btso ba 
[\[67a.4\]]dang bsreg pa yang lag dar te byed/_bza' ba dang btung ba ngan kyang ngan ces mi 'khang ste/_rtag tu 'grub che la byad bzhin yang bzang la mdzes pas khyod khyer na bdag dga'o zhes smras so/_/bram zes rgyal bu la smras pa/_bdag ni bram ze ma yin gyi brgya byin 
[\[67a.5\]]lha'i dbang po yin te ched du khyod bgam pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no zhes phyir brgya byin gyi lus bzang por bsgyur nas/_khyed ci dang cir smon ces smras so/_/de nas btsun mos gus par phyag 'tshal te smon lam rnam pa gsum zhig gsol to/_/gang zhe na gcig tu 
[\[67a.6\]]bdag gi bu khrid pa'i bram ze phyir yang bdag gi yul du song bar gyur cig_/gnyis su na bdag gi bu gnyis bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig_/gsum du na rgyal bu dang bdag cag gnyis kyang phyir bdag cag gi yul du myur du 'khor bar gyur cig 
[\[67a.7\]]ces smras pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang de bzhin du smon lam grub par gyur cig ces smras so/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag ni sems can thams cad skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /_brgya byin 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_smon lam 'di ni shin tu yang rgya che ste bla na med pa yin no/_/gal te mtho ris su skye zhing nyi zla la dbang ba'i bdag por 'dod dam/_'jig rten gyi rgyal por 'dod dam/_tshe ring zhing yun tu gnas par 'dod na/_bdag gis sbyin nus kyis 
[\[67b.2\]]khyod kyis smras pa'i smon lam khams gsum las mchog tu 'das pa yin pas bdag gis nus pa ma yin no/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_da ltar re zhig shin tu phyug por gyur te sngon bas kyang lhag par rtag par sbyin pa byin zhing /_yab rgyal po dang blon po rnams 
[\[67b.3\]]dang /_bdag cag phrad par shog cig ces smras pa dang brgya byin gyis smon pa bzhin du nges par grub par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/yul kai lai'i bram ze des byis pa gnyis khrid de khyim du 'ongs na/_chung mas 'di skad du khyod ngo so 'di lta 
[\[67b.4\]]bus 'khor te 'ongs pa lta ngo mi tsha'am/_bus pa 'di gnyis ni rgyal po'i gdung la gtogs pa yin na snying rje'i sems kyang med de/_'di ltar btsogs brdegs shing lus la rma dang rnag khrag gis btsog btsog ltar byas pa bzod dam zhes spyos brgyad nas/_bus pa 'di 
[\[67b.5\]]gnyis tshongs la bkol du rung ba khrid de shog cig ces bsgo ba dang /_khyim thab kyang chung mas bsgo ba bzhin tshong 'dus su song ba las brgya byin lha'i dbang pos sprul te tshong 'dus su 'ongs nas bram ze de la bus pa 'di ni shin tu rin che bas su yang nyo mi nus so zhes smras so/_/
[\[67b.6\]]bus pa de gnyis bkres shing skom pa las/_brgya byin gyis lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lha'i dri bsung sprul te/_bus pa gnyis kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas lto 'grangs par byas te/_brgya byin gyis bram ze'i sems kyang bsgyur nas yul ya bar phyin par byas so/_/yul de'i blon 
[\[67b.7\]]po dang yul mi thams cad kyis rgyal bu'i sras/_rgyal po chen po'i tsha bo yin par mi shes pa med pas yul mi thams cad kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs te/_blon po la sogs pas bu gnyis ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_bram ze na re bdag gis bslangs te 'ongs pa la 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]khyod kyis drir ci yod ces smras so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gi yul du 'ongs pas na bdag cag gis dri bar rigs kyi mi 'dri ba ma yin no zhes blon po dang yul mi rnams kyis bgros te/_bram ze las bu gnyis dbrog par 
[\[68a.2\]]byas pa las de'i nang na khyim bdag gcig gis 'di skad ces gros btab bo/_/'di ni rgyal bus sbyin par bsams te byin pa 'di la rgyal bus bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal zhing dbrog par mi rigs kyi/_nyis na rgyal po chen po la gsol na/_rgyal po chen po nyid kyis 
[\[68a.3\]]rin gyis blu bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_gros snga ma btang nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po'i dbon po gnyis da ltar bram ze zhig 'tshong zhing mchis ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos tshig de thos ma thag tu cher dngangs 
[\[68a.4\]]te bram ze dang bu gnyis pho brang nang du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo nas/_bu gnyis pho brang nang du 'ongs pa'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas dang blon po rnams kyis bu gnyis mthong nas thams cad dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du ma ngus pa med do/_/de nas rgyal pos 
[\[68a.5\]]bram ze de la khyod kyis bu 'di gnyis ji ltar thob ces dris na/_bram ze na re bdag gis rgyal bu las bslangs te thob bo zhes zer ro/_/rgyal pos bus pa 'di gnyis bos te/_pang par blang snyam pa las bu gnyis 'ong du ma btub bo/_/de nas rgyal pos bu 'di gnyis 
[\[68a.6\]]kyi rin ci tsam 'dod ces dris na/_bram ze smra ma khom par khye'u yis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag bu pho ni dngul gyi dong tse stong dang ba lang brgya zhig ri'o/_/bu mo ni gser gyi dong tse stong dang ba bzhon nyis brgya ri'o zhes gsol ba dang /_rgyal pos khye'u la 'di 
[\[68a.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten chos kyis mi'i nang na pho ni rin po che dbyig ltar rin che ba yin na/_ci'i phyir bu pho ni rin chung /_bu mo ni rin che bar 'debs/_bu khye'u yis gsol pa/_pho brang gi slas lta bu rgyal po dang nye ba ma lags la/_ma rabs bran las slas su 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]bzhes te/_de la thugs dgyes pas bkur zhing btsun par mdzad de/_rin po che'i gos skon zhing bza' ba dang /_btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa bstabs na/_sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba ri la spangs te/_ya mtshan pho brang gi slas dang rol cing rol mo mdzad kyang sras la 
[\[68b.2\]]cung zad tsam yang dgongs pa'i thugs kyang mi mnga' bas/_de bas na bu pho ni rin chung la bu mo ni rin che bar mngon no/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas lhag par mi dga' ba'i mya ngan skyes te/_mchi ma blags nas 'di skad du bdag ni rab tu gnong na khyed ci'i phyir kho bo'i pang du 
[\[68b.3\]]mi 'ong /_khyed nga la mi dga' 'am 'on te bram zes 'jigs zhes dris na/_byis pa na re bdag cag ni rgyal po chen po la mi dga' ba'am bram zes skrag pa yang ma lags na/_thog ma rgyal po chen po'i tsha bo las da ltar mi'i bran khol du gyur pas/_gang na yang mi'i bran khol 
[\[68b.4\]]rgyal po'i pang du 'dug pa'i chos med pas mi spobs so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_lhag par mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur te mi dga' bar gyur nas/_bus gsol pa bzhin du bram ze la rin byin cig ces bsgo nas/_bu gnyis gdod rgyal po'i pang 
[\[68b.5\]]du blangs so/_/bu gnyis rgyal pos blangs nas phyag gis bu gnyis kyi mgo nas byugs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed ri la gnas pa na/_zas su ni ci za/_gos su ni ci gyon zhes dris na/_bu gnyis na re/_zas su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing thog za/_gos su 
[\[68b.6\]]ni pags pa dang snam bu gyon te/_bya mang po dang rtse dga' bas mya ngan gyi sems med do zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos bram ze de la phyi rol du song shig ces bsgo ba dang /_bu gnyis kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bram ze 'di rab tu bkres skom gyis nyen na/_
[\[68b.7\]]de la kha zas kyis tshim par mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod la mi dga' ba'am 'khon du 'dzin pa med par phyir kha zas sbyin par sems/_bus smras pa/_bdag gi pha byang chub kyi lam la dga' bas nor rdzas kyis sbyin du med de/_bdag gi lus kyis 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]slong ba la byin pa yang bdag cag la dbang ba'i bdag po lags te/_'dis bdag cag la bkol ba'i las tsam byed du ma bcug pa yang thog ma phas bsams pa ltar ma gyur te/_de snying rje'i sems tsam yang ma mchis te ltogs shing skom pa bzhin du 
[\[69a.2\]]'dug pa 'di mig gis kyang su zhig gis bzod/_bdag gi phas ni bu yang mi phangs par pha rol po la sbyin pa byed na rgyal po chen pos mi gcig gi kha zas tsam la ser sna mdzad dam zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang bram ze de la kha zas kyis tshim par byin nas bram ze yang 
[\[69a.3\]]rab tu dga' ste/_phyir bdag gi yul du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang nas/_pho nya yang de ma thag tu chas te rgyal bu ga la ba der song ngo /_/der phyin pa dang chu zhig la ma thar nas pho nya des rgyal bu nyid yid la byas te bsams ma thag 
[\[69a.4\]]tu chu de las thar nas rgyal bu gang na ba der phyin te/_rgyal po'i bkas rgyal bu slar yul du gshegs su gsol zhes bsgo'o/_/rgyal bus pho nya la smras pa/_thog ma rgyal pos lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du ri la sgoms shig ces bsgo ste/_da dung lo gcig ma tshang bas da 
[\[69a.5\]]lo tshang nas bdag 'gro'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas pho nya yang phyir log nas rgyal po la de bzhin du lan gsol pa las/_rgyal po nyid phyag dar te yi ge bris nas phyir pho nya la bskur te 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod ni mi'i nang na mkhas pa shes rab can yin pas 'gro ba la yang 
[\[69a.6\]]bzod cing 'ong ba la yang bzod pa yin na/_ci'i phyir khyod khros te 'ong du mi btub/_khyod dang lhan cig bza' ba dang btung ba gtang dgos kyis myur du shog cig ces pho nya 'gugs su btang ngo /_/de nas pho nya yi ge thogs te/_rgyal bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang rgyal bu 
[\[69a.7\]]la yi ge phul lo/_/rgyal bus yi ge blangs nas mgo bo sa la gtugs te yi ge la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_mod la phyir yul du 'gro bar chas so/_/de'i tshe ri de nas chas pa dang ri de la gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang gcan gzan la sogs pa rgyal bu 'gro'o zhes 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]thos nas/_thams cad lus sa la brdabs nas sa la 'gre zhing ngu ba'i skad phyung ngo /_/chu mig rnams kyang skams te gcan gzan dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu yang mi nu/_'dab chags bya mang po yang snying rje'i skad kyis sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu gos gyon nas btsun mo dang 
[\[69b.2\]]'grogs te/_phyir yul du song ba las dgra zla'i yul gyi rgyal pos/_rgyal bu phyir 'ong ngo zhes thos nas bal gyi glang po che dkar po la gser gyi sga bstad de/_gser gyi snod du dngul gyi nye'us bkang /_dngul gyi snod du ni gser gyi nye'us bkang ba bshams nas/_rgyal bu 
[\[69b.3\]]bsu ba'i phyir nam mkha' la stod de/_rgyal bu bsu nas rgyal po'i phrin du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni mi shes pa'i dbang du gyur te/_rgyal bu las bal gyi glang po che blangs pas/_de'i rkyen gyis rgyal bu spangs par gyur pa da 'gyod pas na mthol tshangs su gsol lo/_/
[\[69b.4\]]da rgyal bu slar gshegs zhes thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_bal gyi glang po che de nyid kyang slar phul zhing gser dngul gyi nye'u rnams kyang phul na/_'di dag rnams kyang bzhes shig_/nongs pa'i skyon rnams kyang sbyang bar gsol to/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_dper na mi zhig gis 
[\[69b.5\]]kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyar te/_pha rol po gcig la byin pa las/_mi des kha zas zos nas phyir sa la skyugs nas/_phyir skyugs pa'i kha zas dri bsung dang ldan pa de bzar rung bar 'gyur ram/_bdag gis sbyin pa byas pa yang skyugs pa dang 'dra bas phyir mi 'dod 
[\[69b.6\]]do/_/pho nya khyod bal gyi glang po che 'di zhon la bdag gi yul du song shig_/khyod kyi rgyal po 'di ltar bdag bsu zhing /_spro ba'i tshig gis snyan par smras pa rab tu dga'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang /_pho nya de yang bal gyi glang po che la zhon te phyir bdag gi yul du song 
[\[69b.7\]]nas/_rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol pa las/_bal gyi glang po che de'i rkyen gyis 'thab pa'i dgra zla de gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems su gyur te/_rgyal po dang yul mi thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyam snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]po yab kyang bal gyi glang po che la bcibs te rgyal bu bsus so/_/rgyal bus mgo dang gdong gis phyag 'tshal nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin phyir yul du song ste/_yul mi thams cad kyang rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_ba dan 
[\[70a.2\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_bla re la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bshams te/_sa gzhi yang spos chu chag chag btab nas bsdad do/_/rgyal bu pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas/_yum gyi drung du phyin pa dang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas spro ba'i tshig gis snyun gsol to/_/
[\[70a.3\]]de nas rgyal pos rin po che'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang rgyal bu la gtad de/_yid bzhin du sbyin pa byed du bcug nas/_sbyin pa snga ma bas kyang lhag par rgyun ma chad par sbyin pa byed du bcug pas/_mngon par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70a.4\]]kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_ngas sngon gyi sbyin pa byas pa mngon du dran pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba ni da ltar nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe yab rgyal por gyur pa de ni da ltar nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i tshe yum du gyur 
[\[70a.5\]]pa de ni da ltar yum lha mdzes yin no/_/de'i tshe btsun mor gyur pa ni da ltar grags 'dzin nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe dge slong a tshu ta zhes bya ba ni da ltar maud gal gyi bu chen po yin no/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar shA ri'i bu yin no/_/de'i tshe 
[\[70a.6\]]rngon par gyur pa de ni da ltar kun dga' bo khyod yin no/_/de'i tshe khye'u ya ri zhes bya ba ni da ltar nga'i sras sgra gcan 'dzin yin no/_/de'i tshe bu mor gyur pa de ni yum sru gau ta mI zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'i tshe bram ze slongs mo pa de ni da ltar lha sbyin nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bram 
[\[70a.7\]]ze'i chung mar gyur pa de ni da ltar bram ze mo tsan tsa ma na yin no/_/de ltar na nga shin tu byed dka' ba yang grangs med dpag tu med/_dge ba'i las byas pa yang grangs med dpag tu med de/_de bas mdo sde 'di dge slong dang bram ze la sogs pa la rgyas par ston cig_/byang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu dag yin no/_/'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo zhes bya ba bam po gcig pa rdzogs so//_//sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i brda rnying par 'dug/_//
[\[70b.2\]{D352}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_brah+ma dzA la sU tra/_bod skad du/_tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_dge 
[\[70b.3\]]bsnyen stong dang /_slongs mo pa lnga brgya rnams dang thabs cig tu yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs gshegs pa las/_mtshan mo rgyal po'i khab dang /_skya snar can gyi grong gi bar de na 'od ma'i lcug phran rgyal po'i gnas su dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[70b.4\]]so/_/de'i tshe kun du rgyu rab dga' rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/_sangs rgyas la mi snyan par brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_kun du rgyu rab dga'i slob ma bram ze'i bu tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba ni/_rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/_sangs 
[\[70b.5\]]rgyas la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa zhig ste/_de ltar slob dpon dang /_slob ma de gnyis phan tshun lta ba dang /_mos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang bzod pa dag gis mi 'thun par smra zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[70b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi bzhin zhabs 'bring du dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong mang po rgyal po'i gnas na 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams na re/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_kun du rgyu rab dga' rnam grangs du ma'i 
[\[70b.7\]]sgo nas/_sangs rgyas la mi snyan par brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_kun du rgyu rab dga'i slob ma bram ze'i bu tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/_sangs rgyas la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa zhig ste/_de 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]ltar slob dpon dang slob ma de gnyis phan tshun lta ba dang mos pa dang bye brag phyed pa dang bzod pa dag gis mi 'thun par smra zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyi bzhin zhabs 'bring du dong ba 'di ni 
[\[71a.2\]]ngo mtshar rab tu che'o zhes skabs kyi gtam de lta bu dag yang dag par brjod par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong mang po dag rgyal po'i gnas na 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi skabs kyi gtam dus la bab pa dag_/bcom ldan 'das nyin mo'i gnas na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i 
[\[71a.3\]]lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas gsan par gyur to/_/gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/_rgyal po'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang 
[\[71a.4\]]dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed rgyal po'i gnas su dge slong mang po rnams 'dus shing 'khod pa rnams kyi skabs kyi gtam dus la bab pa ni gang yin/_khyed gtam gang gis na da ltar 'dus shing 'khod/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po 
[\[71a.5\]]rnams rgyal po'i gnas 'dir 'dus shing mchis pa na/_kun du rgyu rab dga' rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas la mi snyan par brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_kun du rgyu rab dga'i slob ma bram ze'i bu tshangs sbyin zhes bgyi ba ni/_
[\[71a.6\]]rnam grangs du ma'i sgo nas/_sangs rgyas la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa zhig ste/_de ltar na slob dpon dang slob ma de gnyis phan tshun lta ba dang mos pa dang bye brag phyed pa dang bzod pa dag gis mi 'thun par smra zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun dag 
[\[71a.7\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi slad bzhin zhabs 'bring du mchis pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rab tu che'o zhes skabs kyi gtam de lta bu dag gleng slangs pa lags la/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po rnams rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus shing 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]mchis pa'i skabs kyi gtam dus la bab pa ni de lags te/_gtam des da ltar bdag cag 'dus shing mchis pa lags so/_/dge slong dag nga la mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa de la/_gnod sems mi bya'o/_/mi bzod 
[\[71b.2\]]pa mi bya'o/_/ngan sems mi bya'o/_/sems mngon par mi dga' ba mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag nga la mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa de la/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gis gnod sems dang mi bzod pa dang ngan sems dang sems mngon par 
[\[71b.3\]]mi dga' bar byas nas/_des na khyod kyi bar du gcod pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de re zhig khros 'khrugs la rngams te yid mi dga' bar gyur pas/_gzhan rjod pa'i don gyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'am/_mthong bar 
[\[71b.4\]]'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir nga la mi snyan par brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang mi snyan par brjod pa na/_yang dag pa la ni yang dag pa nyid du khas blang bar bya la/_yang dag pa ma yin pa la ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du ste/_'di ltar de ni yang dag 
[\[71b.5\]]pa ma yin zhing de kho na ma yin pas nged kyi chos 'di la ni yod pa ma yin no zhes lan gdab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag nga la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa na/_dga' bar yang mi bya'o/_/yid bde bar yang mi bya'o/_/sems ye ye por yang mi 
[\[71b.6\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag nga la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la yang snyan pa brjod pa na/_dga' ba'am yid bde ba'am sems ye ye por gyur na/_des na khyed kyi bar du gcod pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong de re zhig dga' 
[\[71b.7\]]bar gyur pa dang /_yid bde bar gyur pa dang /_sems ya ya por gyur pas/_gzhan rjod pa'i don gyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'am/_mthong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/dge slong dag de'i phyir nga la snyan pa brjod la/_chos dang dge 'dun la 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]yang snyan pa brjod pa na/_yang dag pa la ni yang dag pa nyid du khas blang bar bya la/_yang dag pa ma yin pa la ni yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du ste/_'di ltar de ni yang dag pa ma yin zhing de kho na ma yin pas/_nged kyi chos 'di la ni yod pa ma yin no zhes lan gdab par 
[\[72a.2\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa cung zad tsam 'di smra zhing rjod pa 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims tsam dang 'dod pa dag las rab tu dben pa yin no/_/ji ltar na tshul khrims tsam yin zhe na/_gau ta ma de ni 
[\[72a.3\]]'phel ba'i tshul khrims can yin la/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed cing ji ltar byed pa de bzhin smra ba yin no/_/gau ta ma de ni 'di ltar srog gcod pa spangs nas srog gcod pa las slar log pa ste/_srog chags su gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan zhing ngo tsha shes pa 
[\[72a.4\]]dang /_dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs pas tha na srog chags grog sbur yan chad la yang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin na/_gau ta ma de ni 'di ltar ma byin par len pa spangs nas ma byin par len pa las slar log pa ste/_ma byin par mi len pa/_byin pa la ni dga' ba yin te/_
[\[72a.5\]]de bzhin du rgya cher ro/_/ji ltar 'di ni dge sbyong dang /_bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod cing /_rig pa yon po dag gis log par 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed de/_'di lta ste nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis lam nas rgyu ba'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 
[\[72a.6\]]lam log pa nas rgyu ba'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/gza' nyi ma dang gza' zla ba'i lam dang skar mda' ltung ba las phyogs 'bar ba dang /_bar snang las lha'i rnga sgra grag pa'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/gza' nyi ma dang gza' zla ba'i lam log pa dang skar mda' ltung ba las 
[\[72a.7\]]phyogs 'bar ba dang /_bar snang las lha'i rnga sgra grag pa dang /_yang nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di lta bu'o/_/'char ba dang 'ong ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par gzhag pa dag tu mi shes pa ni 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]'di lta ste/_lam dang lam log pa'i phyir ro/_/gau ta ma de ni rig pa yon po dag gis log par 'tsho bas log par 'tsho bar byed pa de lta bu dag spangs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na 'dod pa rnams las rab tu dben pa yin zhe na/_gau ta ma de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung 
[\[72b.2\]]po 'di dag dang ldan zhing /_dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa la gnas pa dran pas kun nas bsrungs pa rtag par dran pa dang dran pas yid kun nas bsrungs pa/_gnas skabs mnyam pa la 'jog par byed pa/_de mig gis gzugs rnams la lta ba na mtshan mar 'dzin 
[\[72b.3\]]pa med pa yin te/_yid kyi dbang po'i bar du yang sdom pa blangs pa yin no/_/gau ta ma de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po 'di dang /_dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa 'di dang ldan pa yin la/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba la shes bzhin du gnas pa yang yin zhing /_lta ba dang rnam par lta 
[\[72b.4\]]ba nas gnyid kyis dub pa sel ba'i bar du'ang shes bzhin du gnas pa yin no/_/gau ta ma de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po 'di dang /_dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa 'di dang ldan la/_dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog 'di dang ldan pa'i phyir/_mal stan bde ba la gnas 
[\[72b.5\]]pa nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa'i bar te/_'dod pa rnams las dben pa ni de lta 
[\[72b.6\]]bu yin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin snyan pa smra 
[\[72b.7\]]zhing rjod par byed do/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bzhin snyan pa smra zhing rjod par byed pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig rtag par smra ba rnams sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa yod pa ni 'di lta ste gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang 
[\[73a.2\]]bram ze shes ldan rtag par smra ba de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas/_ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag 'di ni dge sbyong dang bram ze kha 
[\[73a.3\]]cig dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las 
[\[73a.4\]]byung ba dag gis/_sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par byed do/_/de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa phrag nyi shu yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de'i phyir bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa des 
[\[73a.5\]]na/_bdag 'di snyam du/_bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang 
[\[73a.6\]]dag pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dag gis/_sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa phrag nyi shu yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/de ltar bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa ni 
[\[73a.7\]]mi 'gro ba 'gro ba med pa bsgyur du mi rung ba ther zug tu gnas pa lcags kyi sdong po ltar 'dug pa ste/_de ltar na sems can shes ldan 'di dag ni kun du rgyug cing 'khor la/_rtag pa de lta bu dang mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 'di ni gzhi dang po'o/_/gnyis pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi 
[\[73b.2\]]mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan rtag par smra ba rnams dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i 
[\[73b.3\]]rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dag gis sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par byed do/_/de ltar sems mnyam par 
[\[73b.4\]]bzhag pa na/_'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa phrag bzhi bcu yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de'i phyir bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa des na/_bdag 'di snyam du bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas 
[\[73b.5\]]kyang rung ba nas/_rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/gsum pa ni dge 
[\[73b.6\]]sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig ces bya ba nas 
[\[73b.7\]]sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_'jig pa dang chags pa'i bskal pa phrag brgyad cu yang dag par rjes su dran no zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_de ltar na sems can shes ldan 'di dag ni kun 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]du rgyug cing 'khor la rtag pa de lta bu dang mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 'di 
[\[74a.2\]]ni gzhi gsum pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni dge 
[\[74a.3\]]sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya ba dag snga ma bzhin no/_/sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bde 'gro dang /_
[\[74a.4\]]ngan 'gror 'gro ba dag lta ste/_de ltar na bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_rtag par smra ba rnams ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 'di 
[\[74a.5\]]ni gzhi bzhi pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig rtag par smra ba rnams sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi bzhi po 'di dag lta ste/_de las 
[\[74a.6\]]mi lhag mi mang la de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa na 
[\[74a.7\]]mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/mchog tu mi 'dzin pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par yang rig cing de ltar lta bar song ba 'di dag gi 'gro ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/skye ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/tshe phyi ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen nas kyang mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/mchog tu mi 'dzin pas 
[\[74b.2\]]bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par rig nas kun 'byung tshor ba rnams nub par thugs su chud de/_'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal nges par 'byin pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag 
[\[74b.3\]]pa/_yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyan pa smra zhing rjod par byed do/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab 
[\[74b.4\]]par snang ba dag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig rtag go zhes smra zhing /_mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po 'di dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang 
[\[74b.5\]]bram ze shes ldan de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag gang 'jig rten 
[\[74b.6\]]'di 'jig pa'i dus la bab ste/_'jig rten 'jig pa na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der yid las 'byung zhing gzugs can yin la dbang po dman pa ma yin zhing ma tshang ba med pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang 
[\[74b.7\]]ldan zhing kha dog mdzes pa dang ldan pa rnams rang gi mthus nam mkha' la 'gro zhing /_dga' ba'i zas dang ldan la dga' ba'i zas za ba dag tshe ring bas yun ring por 'khod do/_/dge slong dag gang 'jig rten 'di chags pa'i dus la bab ste/_'jig rten chags pa na nam 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]mkha' stong pa la tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang dag mngon par 'grub la/_yang 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris kyi sems can 'ga' tshe zad cing las zad la/_bsod nams zad pa zhig shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skye ste/_de de na 
[\[75a.2\]]gcig pu zla med cing grogs med par tshe ring bas yun ring por gnas so/_/de nas sems can de yun ring po las 'das pa dang sred pa skyes shing mi dga' bar gyur te/_kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan zhig 'dir skyes kyang ci ma rung zhes sems 
[\[75a.3\]]can de'i sems kyis smon pa dang /_'od gsal gyi lha'i ris kyi sems can gzhan tshe zad cing las zad la bsod nams zad pa zhig shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du sems can de dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas sems can de 'di snyam du bdag gcig 
[\[75a.4\]]pu zla med cing grogs med par tshe ring bas yun ring por gnas te/_bdag yun ring por gnas pa las 'das pas sred pa skyes shing mi dga' bar gyur te/_kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan zhig 'dir skyes kyang ci ma rung zhes bdag gi sems kyis 
[\[75a.5\]]de ltar smon pa dang /_sems can 'di dag 'dir bdag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa las na/_sems can de dag ni bdag gis sprul to/_/bdag sems can 'di dag dang dngos po rnams kyi phar gyur pa ste dbang phyug go/_/byed pa po'o/_/'byin pa po'o/_/
[\[75a.6\]]'byin byed do snyam mo/_/sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di dag ni bdag cag gis gcig pu zla med cing grogs med par tshe ring bas yun ring por gnas par mthong ngo /_/de yun ring por gnas pa las 'das nas sred pa skyes shing mi dga' 
[\[75a.7\]]bar gyur te/_kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan zhig 'dir skyes kyang ci ma rung snyam nas/_sems can des de ltar sems kyis smon pa dang /_'dir bdag cag sems can de dang skal ba mnyam par skyes pa las na/_bdag cag ni sems 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]can des sprul pa'o/_/sems can de ni bdag cag dang dngos po rnams kyi phar gyur pa ste/_dbang phyug go/_/byed pa po'o/_/'byin pa po'o/_/'byin byed do snyam mo/_/de nas sems can 'ga' tshe zad cing las zad la/_bsod nams zad pa zhig gnas 
[\[75b.2\]]de nas shi 'phos nas/_'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par gyur la de dbang po rnams yongs su smin cing nar son pa'i rgyus na/_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de dgon pa 
[\[75b.3\]]na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa dag gi rgyu las 
[\[75b.4\]]byung ba dag gis sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par byed do/_/de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa las sngon gyi lus de yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshangs pa de ni dngos po rnams kyi phar gyur pa ste/_dbang phyug go/_/byed pa po'o/_/
[\[75b.5\]]sprul pa po'o/_/'byin pa po'o/_/'byin byed do/_/de ni rtag pa'o/_/brtan pa'o/_/ther zug pa'o/_/rnam par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/yang bdag cag ni tshangs pa des sprul pa'i phyir bdag cag ni mi rtag pa'o/_/mi brtan pa'o/_/yid brtan du mi rung ba'o/_/rnam 
[\[75b.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos can no snyam mo/_/de ltar kha cig ni rtag la kha cig ni mi rtag pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 
[\[75b.7\]]'di ni gzhi dang po'o/_/gnyis pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ste/_tshangs pa de'i lta ba ni 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]'di lta bu'o/_/smra ba ni 'di lta bus 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung de ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa yid brtan du mi rung ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/_yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_sems zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[76a.2\]]yid ces bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can ma yin no/_/yang sems can 'ga' tshe zad cing las zad la bsod nams zad pa zhig gnas de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 
[\[76a.3\]]'gyur la/_de dbang po rnams yongs su smin cing nar son pa'i rgyus ni/_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na 
[\[76a.4\]]gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dag gis sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par byed do/_/de ltar 
[\[76a.5\]]mnyam par bzhag pa dang de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshangs pa de ni lta bar gyur pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bya ste/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung de ni mi rtag pa'o/_/mi brtan pa'o/_/yid brtan du mi rung ba'o/_/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no 
[\[76a.6\]]snyam la/_yang 'di skad ces bya ste/_sems zhes bya ba'am/_yid ces bya ba'am/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni rtag pa'o/_/brtan pa'o/_/ther zug pa'o/_/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can ma yin pa'o snyam mo/_/de ltar kha cig ni rtag la kha cig ni mi rtag pa ste/_
[\[76a.7\]]ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa'o/_/gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan kha cig ci la rten cing ci 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni dge slong dag 'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos zhes bya ba dag yod de/_de dag gang gi tshe 
[\[76b.2\]]shin tu rtse dga' rangs pa dang ldan zhing 'khod de rtse dga' rangs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi nang nas/_lus dub cing dran pa rmongs la/_dran pa'i sems can gnas de nas shi 'phos nas 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste sems can 'ga' tshe zad cing las zad 
[\[76b.3\]]la bsod nams zad pa 'ga' zhig gnas de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur la/_de dbang po yongs su smin cing nar son pa'i rgyus na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/_yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas khyim 
[\[76b.4\]]nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ste/_de dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i 
[\[76b.5\]]rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa dag gi rgyu las byung ba dag gis sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par byed do/_/de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa na sngon gyi lus de yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod pa'i 
[\[76b.6\]]khams na gang lha rtsed mos myos zhes bya ba dag gi nang nas gang dag rtse dga' rangs pa dang shin tu mi ldan par 'khod de/_de dag ni rtag pa'o/_/brtan pa'o/_/ther zug pa'o/_/rnam par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no snyam mo/_/yang bdag cag ni shin tu rtse dga' 
[\[76b.7\]]rangs pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pas bdag cag ni mi rtag pa'o/_/mi brtan pa'o/_/ther zug ma yin pa'o/_/yid brtan du mi rung ba'o/_/rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can no snyam mo/_/de ltar na kha cig ni rtag la kha cig ni mi rtag pa ste/_ci la 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rten nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te/_'di ni gzhi gsum pa'o/_/bzhi pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig rtag 
[\[77a.2\]]go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni dge slong dag 'dod pa'i khams na lha yid 'khrug ces bya ba dag yod de/_de dag gang gi tshe shin tu mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/_/de dag shin tu mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba na/_yid 'khrug cing yid khros pas 
[\[77a.3\]]sems can de dag gnas de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste sems can 'ga' tshe zad cing las zad la bsod nams zad pa zhig gnas de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur la/_de dbang po rnams yongs su smin cing nar 
[\[77a.4\]]son pa'i rgyus na zhes bya ba nas/_sngon gyi lus yang dag pa rjes su dran no zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod pa'i khams na gang lha yid 'khrug ces bya ba de dag gi nang nas/_gang dag mig gis mig tshugs su shin tu mi 
[\[77a.5\]]lta ba de dag ni rtag pa'o/_/brtan pa'o/_/ther zug pa'o/_/mi 'gyur ba'i chos can no snyam mo/_/yang bdag cag ni shin tu mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba dang ldan pas/_bdag cag ni mi rtag pa'o/_/mi brtan pa'o/_/yid brtan du mi rung ba'o/_/rnam 
[\[77a.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos can no snyam mo/_/de ltar na kha cig ni rtag la kha cig ni mi rtag pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing kha cig ni rtag pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par 
[\[77a.7\]]rjod pa 'di ni gzhi bzhi ba'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_bdag dang 'jig rten kha cig rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi bzhi po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la de ltar na 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ces bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi 
[\[77b.2\]]mngon par shes pas/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin snyan par smra zhing rjod par byed do/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs 
[\[77b.3\]]su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin snyan par smra zhing rjod par byed pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 
[\[77b.4\]]dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rgyu med par 'byung ba ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni rgyu med pa las 'byung ngo zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi gnyis pa la'o/_/dge sbyong dag dang bram ze shes ldan de dag 
[\[77b.5\]]ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rgyu med par 'byung ba ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni rgyu med pa las 'byung ba'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi gnyis po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag 
[\[77b.6\]]gzugs kyi khams na/_'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyi 'du shes 'byung ba'i phyir/_sems can de dag gnas de nas shi 'pho bar 'gyur la/_ji ste sems can 'ga' zhig gnas de nas shi 'phos nas/_'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam 
[\[77b.7\]]par 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_sngon 'du shes 'byung ba de yang dag par rjes su dran no zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dang 'jig rten rgyu med pa las 'byung ba de'i phyir/_des na bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag dang 'jig rten 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]rgyu med pa las byung bas/_bdag sngon chad ma byung la da ltar byung ngo snyam pa ni gzhi dang po ste/_ci la rten cing zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhi gnyis pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[78a.2\]]'di na kha cig dpyod pa can rtog ger zhugs pa'i sa la gnas pa/_rang gi spobs pa las byung ba/_so so'i skye bo pa/_rtog ge'i rjes su 'brang ba de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dang 'jig rten rgyu med pa las 'byung ba de'i phyir/_des na bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag dang 
[\[78a.3\]]'jig rten rgyu med pa las byung bas/_bdag ni rtog ge pa dpyod pa can rtog ger zhugs pa'i sa la gnas pa/_rang gi spobs pa las byung ba/_so so'i skye bo dpyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa ste/_ci la rten cing zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge 
[\[78a.4\]]sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rgyu med par 'byung ba pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni rgyu med pa las 'byung ba'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi gnyis po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de ltar na lta bar song ba de 
[\[78a.5\]]dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa na mchog tu mi 'dzin te/_mchog tu mi 'dzin 
[\[78a.6\]]pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par yang rig cing de ltar lta bar song ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/skye ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/tshe phyi ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[78a.7\]]du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen nas kyang mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/mchog tu mi 'dzin pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/_kun 'byung tshor 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]ba rnams nub par thugs su chud nas/_'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal nges par 'byin pa'o zhes bya bar mkhyen to/_/dge slong dag gang dag chos gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par 
[\[78b.2\]]snang ba nas de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i bar du ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa'ang ma yin mtha' med pa'ang ma yin zhes mngon par smra zhing 
[\[78b.3\]]mngon par rjod pa de dag yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa'ang yin 
[\[78b.4\]]mtha' med pa'ang yin zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag 'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan kha cig dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_brtson pa'i rgyu 
[\[78b.5\]]las byung ba dang /_spong ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_sgom pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_lan mang du byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang /_yang dag pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dag gis/_sems zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la reg par byed do/_/de ltar sems mnyam par 
[\[78b.6\]]bzhag pa na/_'jig rten la mtha' yod pa'i 'du shes can du gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'jig rten mtha' dang ldan pa de'i phyir des na bdag ni 'di snyam du 'jig rten ni mtha' dang ldan zhing yongs su chad pas bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na 
[\[78b.7\]]gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste zhes bya ba nas/_'jig rten la mtha' yod pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par bya'o snyam pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de ltar na 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan zhing yongs su chad pa 'di ni gzhi dang po ste/_ci la rten cing zhes bya ba ni 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/gnyis pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba nas/_'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung zhes bya ba'i 
[\[79a.2\]]bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_'jig rten la mtha' med pa'i 'du shes can du gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'jig rten na mtha' med cing tshad med pa de'i phyir des na bdag ni 'di snyam du 'jig rten ni mtha' med cing tshad 
[\[79a.3\]]med pas bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung zhes bya ba nas/_de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa na 'jig rten la mtha' med pa'i phyir 'du shes can du gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar na 'jig rten 
[\[79a.4\]]mtha' med cing tshad med pa 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig dgon pa 
[\[79a.5\]]na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung zhes bya ba nas sems mnyam par bzhag pa na/_steng dang 'og gi 'jig rten la ni mtha' yod pa'i 'du shes can yin zhing /_thad kar ni mtha' med pa'i 'du shes can du gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de 'di snyam du sems 
[\[79a.6\]]te/_steng dang 'og gi 'jig rten la ni mtha' yod cing /_thad kar ni mtha' med do snyam pa de'i phyir des na bdag 'di snyam du steng dang 'og ni mtha' yod la thad kar ni mtha' med do snyam nas/_bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung zhes bya ba nas 'di ni 
[\[79a.7\]]gzhi gsum pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/bzhi pa ni zhes bya ba nas dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan kha cig dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]shing drung na gnas kyang rung zhes bya ba dag dang /_sems mnyam par bzhag pa na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can dang /_mtha' med pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can du gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'jig rten 'di ni mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' 
[\[79b.2\]]med pa yang ma yin pa de'i phyir/_des na bdag 'di snyam du 'jig rten ni mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam nas/_bdag dgon pa na gnas kyang rung /_shing drung na gnas kyang rung /_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste zhes bya ba nas/_sems mnyam par bzhag pa 
[\[79b.3\]]na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes can dang /_mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni gzhi bzhi pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes 
[\[79b.4\]]bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa pa ste/_bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang mtha' med pa'o zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi bzhi po dag la ste/_de las 
[\[79b.5\]]mi lhag mi mang la de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar len pa dang /_'di 
[\[79b.6\]]ltar spyod pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag gang dag chos gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha 
[\[79b.7\]]cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing lha mi spong la lha mi spong ba dri ba dris pa dang gtam rlung bskur ba dag yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing lha mi spong la lha mi 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]spong ba/_dri ba dris pa dang tshig rlung bskur ba ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la'o/_/'di ni dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig mi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes shing /_dge ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam 
[\[80a.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ni mi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes shing /_dge ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes 
[\[80a.3\]]so snyam mo/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig gang dag mi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes shing /_dge ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa dag yod de/_de dag bdag la mi 
[\[80a.4\]]dge ba'i dri ba dri bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dag gi dri ba 'dri bar 'gyur na/_bdag gis de dag gis mi dge ba dri ba dris pa lung bstan pa dang /_dge ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog 
[\[80a.5\]]pa dang /_lam dag gi dri ba dris pa rnams lung bstan du ni bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'gyur bas/_de ltar na dge sbyong dang bram ze de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas 'jigs pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas 'jigs skrag pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yongs su smad pas gzhi de dang gling de dang mgon de dang skyabs de 
[\[80a.6\]]dang gzhol ba de la gnas so/_/lha mi spong ba de dri ba dris pa dang tshig rlung skur bar byed de/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_lha mi spong la lha mi spong ba dri ba dris pa dang tshig rlung bskur ba 'di ni gzhi dang po'o/_/gzhi gnyis pa ni dge sbyong 
[\[80a.7\]]dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig mi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de ni bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'gyur la gang bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]du 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi log par 'gyur te/_de ltar na dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan de ni log par lta bas 'jigs pa dang log par lta bas 'jigs skrag pa dang log par lta ba nyid yongs su smad pas gzhi de la gnas so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/ci la rten cing ci la gnas 
[\[80b.2\]]nas ci la gnas bcas te zhes bya ba nas tshig rlung bskur zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa'o/_/gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'di na dge sbyong 
[\[80b.3\]]dang bram ze kha cig mi dge ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes shing /_dge ba dag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/de ni bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'gyur la gang bdag gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi log par 'gyur zhing gang bdag gi log par 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi shes bzhin ma 
[\[80b.4\]]yin par 'gyur te/_de ltar na dge sbyong dang bram ze de ni shes bzhin ma yin pas 'jigs pa dang shes bzhin ma yin pas 'jigs skrag pa dang shes bzhin ma yin pa nyid yongs su smad pas gzhi de dang gling de la gnas so zhes bya ba nas/_tshig rlung bskur ba 'di ni gzhi gsum pa'o zhes bya ba'i 
[\[80b.5\]]bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/bzhi pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig rang bzhin nyid kyis yid rtul zhing blun pa yin te/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ste bdag gi thad du la la zhig 'ongs 
[\[80b.6\]]nas de 'jig rten pha rol yod snyam nas/_'jig rten pha rol yod dam zhes dri ba dris na bdag gis de la 'jig rten pha rol yod do zhes lung bstan par bya'o/_/'jig rten pha rol med pa ma yin nam/_yod pa yang yin med pa yang yin nam/_yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin 
[\[80b.7\]]nam de 'jig rten 'di lta bu'am 'on te ma yin/_rnam pa gzhan zhig gam 'on te ma yin/_ma yin nam 'on te ma yin/_'di lta bu ma yin nam 'on te ma yin/_de 'jig rten pha rol ma yin nam 'on te ma yin/_'di lta bu ma yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes dri ba 'dri na/_bdag gis 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba ma yin nam 'on te ma yin/_'di lta bu ma yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes lung bstan par bya'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze de gti mug gi 'jigs pa dang /_gti mug gis 'jigs skrag pa dang /_des gti mug nyid yongs su smad pas gzhi 
[\[81a.2\]]de dang gling de dang mgon de dang skyabs de dang gzhol ba de la gnas so/_/lha mi spong ba dri ba dris pa dang tshig rlung bskur ba 'di ni gzhi bzhi pa ste/_ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_lha mi spong la lha 
[\[81a.3\]]mi spong ba dri ba dris pa dang tshig rlung bskur ba de thams cad ni gzhi bzhi po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar 
[\[81a.4\]]song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang 'di ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_sngon gyi mtha' dang ldan pa lta bar song ba dag mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni lta bar song ba 
[\[81a.5\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang zhes bya ba nas lhag par mkhyen to zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba dag 
[\[81a.6\]]gang zhe na zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can du smra ba dag yod de/_de phan chad bdag ni 'du shes can ma yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste gzhi bcu drug po la'o/_/dge 
[\[81a.7\]]sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can du smra ba dag de phan chad bdag ni 'du shes can ma yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni/_'di lta ste gzhi bcu drug po dag la'o/_/dge slong 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ba dag yod de/_de phan chad bdag gzugs dang ldan pa'i 'du shes can dang /_de phan chad bdag gzugs dang mi ldan pa yin pa dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa yang yin la gzugs dang mi ldan pa yang yin pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[81b.2\]]dang ldan pa yang ma yin la gzugs dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes can dang /_de phan chad bdag mtha' dang ldan pa'i 'du shes can dang /_mtha' dang mi ldan pa dang de phan chad bdag mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin pa dang /_mtha' dang ldan pa yang 
[\[81b.3\]]ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes can dang /_de phan cad bdag gcig pa'i 'du shes can dang /_tha dad pa'i 'du shes can dang /_chung ngu'i 'du shes can dang /_tshad med pa'i 'du shes can dang /_gcig tu bde ba can dang /_gcig tu sdug bsngal 
[\[81b.4\]]ba can dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba can dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba can ma yin pa'i 'du shes can 'di dag ni dge slong dag gzhi bcu drug po dag la ste/_ci la rten cing zhes bya ba nas mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi 
[\[81b.5\]]ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_'du shes can du smra ba dag de phan cad bdag gi 'du shes can no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi bcu drug po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[81b.6\]]mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar len pa dang /_'di ltar spyod pa dang /_'gro ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/skye ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/tshe 
[\[81b.7\]]phyi ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen nas kyang mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/mchog tu mi 'dzin pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par rig nas tshor ba rnams kun du 'byung ba nub par thugs su chud de 'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal nges par 'byin pa'o zhes 
[\[82a.2\]]bya bar mkhyen to/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[82a.3\]]du snyan par smra zhing rjod par byed do/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba de dag ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad la/_pha rol pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gang yang dag
