[\[82a.4\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyan par smra zhing rjod par byed pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can du smra ba dag_/de phan cad bdag ni 'du shes can no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi brgyad po 
[\[82a.5\]]'di dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes med pa can du smra ba dag de phan cad bdag ni 'du shes med pa can yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[82a.6\]]gzhi brgyad po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ba dag yod de/_de phan cad bdag ni gzugs can yin zhing 'du shes can yang yin pa dang /_de phan chad bdag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_gzugs can 
[\[82a.7\]]yin la gzugs can ma yin pa yang yin pa dang /_gzugs can yang ma yin la/_gzugs can ma yin pa yang ma yin zhing 'du shes can yang ma yin pa dang /_de phan cad bdag ni mtha' dang ldan zhing 'du shes can yang yin pa dang /_de phan cad bdag ni mtha' dang mi 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]ldan pa dang /_mtha' dang ldan pa'ang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa'ang yin pa dang /_mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing 'du shes can yang yin pa 'di ni gzhi brgyad pa'o/_/ci la rten cing zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge sbyong dang 
[\[82b.2\]]bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes med pa can du smra ba dag_/de phan cad bdag ni 'du shes med pa can yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad ni gzhi brgyad po dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang 
[\[82b.3\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge 
[\[82b.4\]]slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can yang ma yin la/_'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par smra ba dag yod de/_de phan cad bdag ni 
[\[82b.5\]]'du shes can yang ma yin la/_'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi brgyad po dag la'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze de dag ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can 
[\[82b.6\]]yang ma yin la/_'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes smra ba dag de phan cad bdag ni 'du shes can yang ma yin la 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa dag ni gzhi brgyad po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram 
[\[82b.7\]]ze kha cig 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ba dag de phan chad bdag gi gzugs can yin zhing /_'du shes can yang ma yin la 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa dang /_de phan chad bdag ni gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_gzugs can yang yin la gzugs can ma yin pa 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]yang yin pa dang /_gzugs can yang ma yin la gzugs can ma yin pa yang ma yin zhing /_'du shes can yang ma yin la 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa dang /_de phan chad bdag ni mtha' dang ldan pa yin zhing 'du shes can yang ma yin la 
[\[83a.2\]]'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa dang /_de phan chad bdag ni mtha' dang mi ldan pa dang /_mtha' dang ldan pa yang yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang yin pa dang /_mtha' dang ldan pa yang ma yin la mtha' dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing 'du shes can yang ma yin la 'du shes 
[\[83a.3\]]can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni gzhi brgyad la'o/_/ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing 'du shes can yang ma yin 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes smra ba dag de phan chad bdag ni 'du shes can yang ma yin 'du 
[\[83a.4\]]shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa de thams cad gzhi brgyad po dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[83a.5\]]mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag ces bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[83a.6\]]dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing chad par smra ba dag yod de/_de phan chad bdag ni chad par 'gyur te med do zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bdun po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze shes 
[\[83a.7\]]ldan ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing chad par smra ba dag de phan cad bdag ni chad par 'gyur te/_med do zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bdun po dag la'o/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]kha cig 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ba dag yod de/_bdag gzugs can ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po rags pa ji srid du 'tsho zhing gnas la brtan cing 'dug pa de srid du nad dang bcas so/_/shu ba dang bcas so/_/zug rngu dang bcas so/_/rims nad dang bcas so/_/yongs 
[\[83b.2\]]su gdung ba dang bcas so/_/bdag ni nam zhig na yongs su chad par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas pa dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[83b.3\]]mched la gnas pa dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa ci yang med pa'i skye mched la gnas pa dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa yod min med min skye mched la gnas pa dag ji srid du 'tsho zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni gzhi bdun pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/ci la 
[\[83b.4\]]rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te/_phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing chad par smra ba dag de phan chad bdag ni chad par 'gyur te med do zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod do/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing chad par smra ba dag de phan chad 
[\[83b.5\]]bdag ni chad par 'gyur te med do zhes kha cig mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa thams cad kyang gzhi bdun po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ces bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag 
[\[83b.6\]]gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag chos gang dag gzhan zab pa zab par snang ba de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes bya ba dag ni snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ba dag yod de/_gang gi tshe bdag 
[\[83b.7\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor par gyur cing /_rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa de tsam gyis na bdag 'di mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe bdag 'dod pa dag las dben zhing bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas te/_gnas pa de tsam gyis na 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bdag 'di mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhi lnga pa'o/_/ci la rten cing ci la gnas nas ci la gnas bcas te phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra ba dag_/mthong 
[\[84a.2\]]ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod do/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag_/mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon 
[\[84a.3\]]par rjod pa thams cad kyang gzhi lnga po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 
[\[84a.4\]]'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba nas thugs su chud do zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba dag mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa thams cad kyang lta bar song ba bzhi bcu rtsa 
[\[84a.5\]]bzhi po 'di dag ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba nas thugs 
[\[84a.6\]]su chud do zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pas lta bar song ba dag mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa thams cad kyang lta bar song ba bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang 
[\[84a.7\]]la/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang zhes bya ba nas thugs su chud do zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dge slong dag dge sbyong dang bram ze shes ldan kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba dag mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa dag phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba dag mngon par smra zhing mngon par 
[\[84b.2\]]rjod pa thams cad kyang lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag la ste/_de las mi lhag mi mang la/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen/_de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar na lta bar song ba 'di 
[\[84b.3\]]dag 'di ltar 'dzin pa dang /_'di ltar len pa dang /_'di ltar spyod pa dang /_'gro ba 'di ni 'di lta bu'o/_/skye ba ni 'di lta bu'o/_/tshe phyi ma ni 'di lta bu'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/de las lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[84b.4\]]du rab tu mkhyen nas kyang mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/mchog tu mi 'dzin pas bdag nyid mya ngan las 'das par rig nas/_tshor ba rnams kun 'byung ba nub par thugs su chud de 'di ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'di ni sdug bsngal nges par 'byin pa'o zhes bya bar mkhyen to/_/dge slong dag 
[\[84b.5\]]de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams dang phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing /_phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams kyis gyen du dmyugs su zin kyang de thams cad lta ba'i chu'i nang na 'dug pas bdud sdig 
[\[84b.6\]]can gyi dbang du song zhing lag tu song ba ste/_bdud sdig can gyis ci dga' mgur bya ba bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su grol ba ma yin no/_/dge slong dag dper na nya pa'am/_nya pa'i slob ma mkhas pa dag gis rgya mig phra mo thogs te lteng ka'i chu chung ngu bcus pa na/_de srog chags 
[\[84b.7\]]gang rags pa che long rnams kyis gyen du dmyugs su zin kyang de thams cad chu'i nang na gnas pas nya pa'i dbang du song zhing lag tu song ba ste/_nya pas ci dga' mgur bya ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze gang kha cig sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing phyi ma'i mtha' la gnas pa lta bar song ba rnams kyis kyang gyen du dmyugs su zin kyang /_de thams cad lta ba'i chu'i nang na 'dug pas bdud sdig can gyi dbang du song zhing lag tu song ste/_bdud sdig can gyis ci 
[\[85a.2\]]dga' mgur bya ba dag go/_/dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rtag par smra ba dag bdag dang 'jig rten rtag go/_/zhes mngon par rjod pa ni/_'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la ste/_dge slong dag dge sbyong dang /_bram ze mkhas pa 
[\[85a.3\]]ma yin zhing ma rig par gyur pa bag med cing rmongs pa la gnas pa de dag srid par rig par bya ste/_de ni srid pas rnam par bskyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag mthong 
[\[85a.4\]]ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni gzhi bzhi po dag la ste zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa ma yin zhing ma rig par gyur pa/_bag med cing rmongs pa la gnas pa de dag la rig par bya ste/_de ni srid pas rnam par 
[\[85a.5\]]bskyod pa'o/_/dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing rtag par smra ba dag bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi bzhi po dag la ste/_de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par srid kyi rten cing 
[\[85a.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa dag gzhi lnga po dag la ste zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin 
[\[85a.7\]]par srid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/dge slong dag de la dge sbyong dang bram ze gang de dag sngon gyi mtha' la rtog cing /_rtag par smra ba dag mthong ba'i chos la bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag go zhes bya ba mngon par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni gzhi 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]bzhi po dag la ste/_de yang reg pa'i rkyen las byung bar srid kyi reg pa las 'byung ba las gzhan pa'i tshor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog cing zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par smra ba dag mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mngon 
[\[85b.2\]]par smra zhing mngon par rjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi lnga po dag la'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de yang reg pa'i rkyen las byung bar srid kyi reg pa las byung ba las gzhan pa'i tshor bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/dge slong dag gis gang tshun chad rig pa'i skye mched drug po dag ni kun 
[\[85b.3\]]'byung ba nub pa dang ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud pa 'di ni/_'di ltar lhag par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de la gang zag kun nas nyon mongs pa can/_yang srid pa pa rims nad dang bcas pa/_sdug bsngal 
[\[85b.4\]]rnam par smin pa/_tshe phyi ma la rga shi'i rjes su 'thun pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas spangs shing yongs su mkhyen la/_shing ta la'i mgo bzhin rtsa ba nas bcad de/_'gro ba snang ba med pa skye ste/_phyi ma la mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_
[\[85b.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa gsum du g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldegs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 
[\[85b.6\]]'das kyi snam logs na 'dug cing bsil yab thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rgyu'i dra ba zhes 
[\[85b.7\]]bya bar yang zung shig_/don gyi dra ba dang chos kyi dra ba dang tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bas na tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//bar gyi sdom ni/_rtag dang gcig pu rgyu med dang /_/mtha' ldan de bzhin lha mi spong /_/'du shes 'du shes med can dang /_/chad dang mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/dmyugs dang kun nas 
[\[86a.2\]]rmongs pa dang /_/brten dang reg pa dge slong dang /_/rgyu dang don chos 'dra ba ste/_/tha ma tshangs pa'i dra ba'o/_/tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzogs so/[ {D353}]@#/_/rgya'i skad du/_de'i phAng bya na ph+hur po'u in kyeng sU phim de'i a+yir/_bod skad 
[\[86a.3\]]du/_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/_
[\[86a.4\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_klu chen po ltar sems kyi dbang thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_'od srung chen po dang /_rab 'byor dang /_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_mdzes bzang dang /_byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_lam chen brtan 
[\[86a.5\]]dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dang thabs cig ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[86a.6\]]dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa rnams la rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/_smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong snyed khong du chud cing rtogs pa/_gzungs yongs su rdzogs pa/_snying rje chen 
[\[86a.7\]]po mi gtong ba/_sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad la phan par brtson pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'dzugs pa/_so so'i skye bo'i ma bskul ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/_ye shes chen 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun du grangs med pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang /_
[\[86b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun du mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 
[\[86b.3\]]glang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /_byang 
[\[86b.4\]]chub sems dpa' 'od btsan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[86b.5\]]dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang 
[\[86b.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang spos rnams thogs shing /_lha rdzas 
[\[86b.7\]]kyi rol mo dkrol nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do/_/de ma yin pa lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]stong snyed lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor te/_rim gro dang mchod pa byas/_bkur sti dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so/_/
[\[87a.2\]]de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms blangs so/_/de'i dus na bram ze pha ma la sri zhu cher byed pa/_khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa cig kyang ma rgan khur du khyer te/_mthar gyis slongs mo 
[\[87a.3\]]byed de/_de yang kha zas zhim po ro dang ldan pa'am/_shing tog bzang po dag rnyed na pha ma la stobs so/_/kha zas ngan pa ro med pa'am/_shing tog skam po dag rnyed na bdag rang za'o/_/kun dga' bos de lta bu dag mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_mi de la legs 
[\[87a.4\]]so/_/legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas/_rigs kyi bu pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste legs so zhes smras so/_/de nas kun du rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa cig dbang po rno la gtsug lag dang /_rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par 
[\[87a.5\]]gyur pa/_skar ma dang rtsis la mkhas pa/_dge sdig gi ltas rno ba/_mo dang gtsug lag gi rig pas pha rol gyi sems shes pa/_phal mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa/_kun gyis bkur ba cig lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas khe dang grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed/_
[\[87a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma shAka rigs kyi bu nga ni dge ba yin te/_yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de bden pa'i dngos po med do/_/khyod kyi 
[\[87a.7\]]ston pa gau ta ma ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te/_btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na ma yang shi bas sdig pa can yin par mngon no/_rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las pho brang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non te/_sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]te/_zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de cho nges btab nas nga'i lha'i bu gcig deng du stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du ngus nas/_nga'i yul dang srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang bar zad la bu yang khyod gcig pur zad na ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chas zhes smre sngags 'don du 
[\[87b.2\]]bcug pas khyod kyi ston pa gau ta ma drin mi shes te ci la'ang ma bltas par langs te song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no/_/yab rgyal pos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyang chung ma'i las ma byas te mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na khrel med pa yang yin par 
[\[87b.3\]]mngon no/_/kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas ngo tsha zhing skyengs te/_bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas ga na bar 'ongs nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[87b.4\]]ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam/_sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_'di skad du zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/_lha'am mi'am/_mi ma yin pas bstan tam/_'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de 
[\[87b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang /_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bdag la lha'am/_klu'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_mi'am/_mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te/_snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du ston pa drug gi 'khor kun du 
[\[87b.6\]]rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang /_bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o zhes rgyas par gsol to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung bas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 
[\[87b.7\]]'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/_gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/_rin po 
[\[88a.2\]]che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/_shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang tsam du mtho ba/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_yal ga dang 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/_rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/_sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/_skabs skabs na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu 
[\[88a.3\]]yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/_rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/_rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang /_puN+Da ri ka dang /_pA ru Sha ka dang /_de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po shing rta'i phang lo 
[\[88a.4\]]tsam gyis chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/_chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/_de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/_/rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho 
[\[88a.5\]]khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/_lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal po skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs 
[\[88a.6\]]pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang 
[\[88a.7\]]ldan pa/_rab tu gsal ba/_dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/_gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba de thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/_/'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de 
[\[88b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/_'khor 
[\[88b.3\]]mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/_sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las 
[\[88b.4\]]phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par 
[\[88b.5\]]bya ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/_so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pha ma dag la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu 
[\[88b.6\]]snyed stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[88b.7\]]thub pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /_shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad 
[\[89a.2\]]dka' ba spyad de/_snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang /_shang shong dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma dang /_tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/_
[\[89a.3\]]mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/_bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing lhag ma ma 
[\[89a.4\]]lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par 
[\[89a.5\]]bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[89a.6\]]gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo /_/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/_steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab 
[\[89a.7\]]bo/_/'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 
[\[89b.2\]]khrag khrig brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'od ces bya ba snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas mtshan mar dgongs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[89b.3\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las 
[\[89b.4\]]byas pa/_gser btso mas thig re'ur bres pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/_shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab mas brgyan pa/_rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/_sgra de dag so so'i 
[\[89b.5\]]skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/_skabs skabs na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/_yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing /_rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/_rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang /_puN+Da 
[\[89b.6\]]rI ka dang /_pA ru Sha ka dang /_de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/_chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las 
[\[89b.7\]]byas pa'i gru yod de/_de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/_/rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig bshams nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/_lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma dgongs skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la so 
[\[90a.2\]]so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer kha dog bzang po/_kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar por ldan pa rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di/_byang phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag 
[\[90a.3\]]la snang bar gyur te/_gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur par thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung 
[\[90a.4\]]shig dang khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/_/'di nas byang phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu 'das pa'i pha rol na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[90a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/_'khor mang po thams cad thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan 
[\[90a.6\]]bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/_sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing /_brtan par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[90a.7\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i phyir/_sa so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/_'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/_
[\[90b.2\]]bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[90b.3\]]thub pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed 
[\[90b.4\]]mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba dang /_shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad 
[\[90b.5\]]de/_snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/_ri dang /_shang shong dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma dang /_tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su/_sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa 
[\[90b.6\]]dang bcas pa/_mtshams med lnga dang /_mi dge bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/_phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/_chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing /_lhag ma 
[\[90b.7\]]ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/_khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/_ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /_ci ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa dang 'dra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag 
[\[91a.2\]]khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ngo /_/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_'od zer chen po kun du snang bar gyur/_steng gi bar snang 
[\[91a.3\]]las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin du phab bo/_/'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/_/de ma yin pa'i gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad 
[\[91a.4\]]med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas/_zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[91a.5\]]nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba snang bar byas 
[\[91a.6\]]so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na 
[\[91a.7\]]med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/_gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/_shing de dag kyang 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/_rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/_sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa/_skabs skabs na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_khrus 
[\[91b.2\]]kyi rdzing bu yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing /_rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba/_rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang /_puN Da rI ka dang /_pA ru Sha ka dang /_de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /_ser po 
[\[91b.3\]]dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/_chu de'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/_de na sems can mang po 'dod 
[\[91b.4\]]dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/_/rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/_lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/_lha rdzas kyi me tog 
[\[91b.5\]]gi chal par bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[91b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/_rab tu gsal ba/_dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/_gang la 'od kyis reg par 
[\[91b.7\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad lus dang /_sems bde bar gyur pa thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la shin tu yid la legs par zung shig dang /_khyed la dgrol 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]bar bshad par bya'o/_/'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[92a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor 
[\[92a.3\]]nas/_'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa nas 'don pa'i phyir/_sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[92a.4\]]dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab 
[\[92a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/_so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems 
[\[92a.6\]]dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te/_bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag 
[\[92a.7\]]rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /_shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[92b.2\]]zhe na/_sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/_ri dang /_shang shong dang /_gyo mo dang /_
[\[92b.3\]]gseg ma dang /_tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/_phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su 
[\[92b.4\]]bcad de/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[92b.5\]]der phyin nas/_ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_
[\[92b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/_de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu 
[\[92b.7\]]g.yos te/_'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/_steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab bo/_/'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing /_rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[93a.2\]]spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba 
[\[93a.3\]]khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas pad mo le brgan gyi 'od ces bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig 
[\[93a.4\]]pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[93a.5\]]de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/_gser btso mas thig re'u bres pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/_shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/_rlung 
[\[93a.6\]]mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/_sgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa/_skabs skabs na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la/_yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba 
[\[93a.7\]]rdzing gi ngos bzhi na bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_pA ru Sha ka dang /_de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam du chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/_chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]tshogs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/_/rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/_de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do/_/rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa 
[\[93b.2\]]bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/_lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal par bkram pa'i khri'i thog na/_de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i le brgan gyi 'od chags pa/_
[\[93b.3\]]skyil mo krung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang 
[\[93b.4\]]po kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/_rab tu gsal ba/_dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/_gang la 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 
[\[93b.5\]]'gyur ba thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/_/'di nas lho 
[\[93b.6\]]phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang /_zhabs su 
[\[93b.7\]]ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas/_'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/_sems can thams cad kyi zug rngu rtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/_sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog 
[\[94a.2\]]cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyis drin lci 
[\[94a.3\]]ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/_so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i nang na/_gtso bo dang 
[\[94a.4\]]ston par gyur pa/_stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi 
[\[94a.5\]]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub 
[\[94a.6\]]sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /_shin tu phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[94a.7\]]shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad pas/_snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/_ri dang /_shang shong dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma dang /_tsher 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/_mtshams med pa lnga dang /_mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/_phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/_bde ba 
[\[94b.2\]]thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing /_lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas/_khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der 
[\[94b.3\]]phyin nas/_ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_byang 
[\[94b.4\]]chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der dong ste/_de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos 
[\[94b.5\]]te/_'od zer chen po yang kun du snang bar gyur/_steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab bo/_/'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos 
[\[94b.6\]]so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i ri ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs 
[\[94b.7\]]rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /_steng dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_mchod pa dang bkur sti byas/_bstod pa byas nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do/_/de ltar sangs rgyas la bstod nas kyang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe mi 
[\[95a.2\]]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su dag par gyur te/_ri khrad khrod dang /_ri chen po dang /_chung ngu dang /_gtsang po dang /_chu klung dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing dang /_lteng ka dang /_shang shong dang /_ngam grog dag med cing /_de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar 
[\[95a.3\]]byas pas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags te/_dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mig mi 'dzums par chags pa'i yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/_'od zer de dag gis 
[\[95a.4\]]sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas 'khor mang po thams cad kyang the tsom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang /_phyis ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[95a.5\]]skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig skye ba dang /_so so'i skye bo thams cad sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang /_so so'i skye bo dag la pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir stan las langs nas/_gos tshags su bcos nas 
[\[95a.6\]]bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs 'bring na mchis nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste 'di la nges par 
[\[95a.7\]]dgongs pa ni mnga' na 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/_thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o//_//de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i pad ma'i sdong po dngul las byas/_'dab ma ni gser las byas/_gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas/_mu tig gi dra bas kun du brgyan pa gcig sa de nyid nas byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas 
[\[95b.2\]]pad mo de la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/_/de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to/_/sku de las lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/_lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgya stong snyed bstan to/_/gzugs rnam pa de re re la yang sku'i 
[\[95b.3\]]tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/_sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs snyed bstan to/_/gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/_/rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la 
[\[95b.4\]]yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/_/rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/_nam mkha'i 
[\[95b.5\]]dbyings kyis klas pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas kun dga' bo dang phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[95b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa de bka' stsal bar bya'o/_/chos la tshig tu brjod pa med mod kyi 
[\[95b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang /_ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/_de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na/_sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha mar ma gyur pa med/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/_pha mar gyur 
[\[96a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/_shin tu gtang dka' ba yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /_mig dang /_klad rgyas dang /_yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_ban glang dang /_rta dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi 
[\[96a.3\]]shing rta dang /_theg pa dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do/_/shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /_sbyin pa byas pa dang /_mang 
[\[96a.4\]]du [(]thas [,]thos [)]pa dang /_bsam gtan bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab spyad pa nas spyod dka' ba thams cad spyad de/_skyo ba dang /_ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang /_drin shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa dang /_sems 
[\[96a.5\]]can thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang /_de 
[\[96a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams 
[\[96a.7\]]pa bsgoms shing /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas spyod de/_sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /_chos stong pa nyid dang /_phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang /_mi 'bying ba dang /_mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang /_theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te/_
[\[96b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te/_sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to/_/phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas 
[\[96b.3\]]pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to/_/mi bden pa kun tu rtogs pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta/_mi rtag pa la rtag par lta/_mi bde ba la bde bar lta/_mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi bas gzir te skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa 
[\[96b.4\]]lnga dang /_kun nas glags pa bcus kun du glags te/_srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang /_mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye 
[\[96b.5\]]zhing bstan to/_/so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so/_/tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs 
[\[96b.6\]]kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsdus so/_/de ltar las 'thun pa kun 'dus pa 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor der dam pa'i chos mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/_gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing so so'i skye bo thams 
[\[96b.7\]]cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar shes/_dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags 
[\[97a.2\]]so/_/skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do/_/skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/_'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs pa yang ston to/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[97a.3\]]bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi 
[\[97a.4\]]khyab bo/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do/_sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas 
[\[97a.5\]]mthong bar 'dod na de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do/_/gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo /_/de bas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs 
[\[97a.6\]]rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bkye nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar 'gyur/_gang skal ba dang mi ldan pas ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo /_de bzhin 
[\[97a.7\]]gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad/_skabs kha cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_shin tu dpag par dka' ba/_shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na/_ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]gshegs pa la spyod dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba la spobs par gyur/_khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba yin te/_ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas lha dang mi'i lam btod pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo ngas da khyod 
[\[97b.2\]]la pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas legs par nyon la yid la zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[97b.3\]]sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na yul bA rA Na sIr sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[97b.4\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba/_'jig rten gyi gtso bo/_/lha dang mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so/_/dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas 
[\[97b.5\]]so/_/gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so/_/gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe mi'i rgyal po rA dza zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_yul bA rA Na sI la dbang sgyur ro/_/rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/_blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod/_
[\[97b.6\]]bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod/_rgyal phran drug cu la dbang /_grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/_rgyal po de la rgyal bu gsum yod de/_gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na yul bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te/_rtag 
[\[97b.7\]]tu yang drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do/_/rgyal po'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te/_lo tog rgyun du legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do/_/de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de la blon po nag po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la 'di lta ste/_bal glang gi tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams 
[\[98a.2\]]nas bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do/_/de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu rab kyang bsad do/_/de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]thog tu dmag drang bar 
[\[98a.3\]]bshams so/_/rgyal bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang la/_'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge ba/_dul ba/_'dzum zhing smra ba smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don du smra zhing 'gyur gyi gnod pa med pa/_rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/_
[\[98a.4\]]log pas mi 'tsho bas yul gyi mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/_longs spyod dang nor rin po cher ldan pa/_bang mdzod gang ba/_rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa/_bar snang gi lha dang /_'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' 
[\[98a.5\]]zhing bkur ba/_de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod de/_shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa/_gnas bdun mnyam par 
[\[98a.6\]]gang ba/_skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/_lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la/_yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so/_/de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po mkhyen tam/_blon po 
[\[98a.7\]]sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs/_dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas/_rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te/_dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gud du mi 'gro_/de'i tshe rgyal po des de skad smras pa thos nas lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/_lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/_sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_cung zad sangs te dal gyis nam 
[\[98b.2\]]mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin/_smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/_lhas smras pa bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/_rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod 
[\[98b.3\]]nams dang yon tan du bcas pas drang po'i chos kyis yul srid 'dzin te/_de bas na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te/_sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so/_/de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas da ni bdag yul gzhan 
[\[98b.4\]]zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so/_/yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do/_/lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis yul pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur/_lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/_
[\[98b.5\]]ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te/_pho brang gi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang /_phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing dngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na btsun mos 
[\[98b.6\]]de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po/_ci'i slad du 'jigs shing skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston cing sku la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu/_skra yang 'dzings te/_dbugs kyang mi bde ste/_yul stor la 
[\[98b.7\]]thug pa'am/_mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am/_dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyis ma smra zhig btsun mos gsol pa/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bdag dang rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste/_dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis sam/_lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/_mgo'i mig gnyis sam/_de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung /_rgyal pos 
[\[99a.2\]]btsun mo la smras pa/_khyod mi shes sam/_blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas rgyal po la 'khus te yab rgyal po yang bkrongs te gcen rgyal bu gnyis kyi srog gi bar chad byas nas da ltar dmag dang chas te nga la rgol du 'ong bas/_kho bo yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes 
[\[99a.3\]]smras nas rgyal bu dge don pang du blangs te lam du zhugs so/_/de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te/_yid 'khrugs nas zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/_lam de yang bgrod dka' zhing rtswa 
[\[99a.4\]]yang rtsub/_rtswa chu tsam yang med de/_zhag du ma zhig song song ba las rgyags kyang chad do/_/thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor/_mi gsum gyis kyang zos te/_zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du 
[\[99a.5\]]zhugs pas da dung lam ring zhig yod pa las rgyags kyang chad nas de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas ngus so/_/kyi hud kyi hud re sdug thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba da 'dir myong bar gyur te/_da 'dir sdug cing phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgo 
[\[99a.6\]]la brdabs so/_/sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to/_/bdag cag gis tshe snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/_'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam/_'on te dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab bam/_'on 
[\[99a.7\]]te 'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis sam/_'on te rngon pa dang /_nya pa byas sam/_'on te srang dang bre bcos te pha rol la phrog rlom byas sam/_'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/_ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ces de skad smre zhing cung 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]zad bstir ni dgras slebs na srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung /_lam du zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas/_srog la bab tu cha'o/_/rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen te skad phyung ste ngus pa dang sa la 'gyel nas brgyal bar gyur to/_/
[\[99b.2\]]de nas ring zhig lon pa dang sangs nas 'di snyam du gsum char lhan cig tu 'di kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/_btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog thar bar bya'o snyam bsams nas ral gri phyung ste btsun mo bsad par bshams pa dang /_rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i 
[\[99b.3\]]lag pa nas bzung ste/_da ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs zhes gsol to/_/yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo/_/gal te ma bsad kyang /_rang 'chi bar 'gyur 
[\[99b.4\]]te/_kho bo ni 'chi 'am gson yang rung na bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir khyod kyi ma btsun mo bsad snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te btsun mo bsad par gyur na de'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te/_gang na yang ma'i sha 
[\[99b.5\]]la bu za ba mi srid pas bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na yab rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste/_pha ma'i srog thar bar mi mdzad/_yab rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas mod la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gre zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kho bo'i mig 
[\[99b.6\]]dang 'dra na su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste za bar byed/_kho bo ni shi'ang bla bas bu mi gsod do/_/bu bsad de sha za mi nus so/_/de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thogs 
[\[99b.7\]]par rul sungs nas dgos pa ma mchis par 'gyur te/_bdag gis gsol ba gcig cig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar bya bas ci gsol 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ba rnams myur du smros shig ces bsgo ba dang /_rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re re zhing bdag gi lus las sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/_cha gnyis ni yab 
[\[100a.2\]]yum la 'bul/_cha gcig ni bdag rang 'tshal na lus srog gi zungs su 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du gnang nas nyin gcig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum bcad de/_cha gsum du bgos nas/_cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mo za/_/
[\[100a.3\]]cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang za ste/_lus dang srog gi zungs byas nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha zad de rus pa'i tshigs dang chu ba tsam zhig 'brel te srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to/_/de 
[\[100a.4\]]nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu pang du blangs nas skad chen po phyung nas cho nges chen po btab ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/nged gnyis kyis ma rig pas khyod kyi sha zos te khyod 'di lta bu'i na tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/_lam yang da dung ring bas/_khyod kyi lus kyi 
[\[100a.5\]]sha ni zad de/_da ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go/_/de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/da 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te/_bdag ni g.yo zhing bskyod mi nus pas srog 'dir 'dor ro/_/rgyal 
[\[100a.6\]]po dang btsun mo ni mi ma rabs ngan pa ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsung shig_/bdag la byams shing thugs brtse bar dgongs na bdag gis bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/_da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par btogs 
[\[100a.7\]]la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol/_de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa zad par btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/_cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos/_cha gcig ni rgyal bu rang gis zos te/_rgyal po 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo /_/rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin du rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la blta'o/_/rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad phyung nas ngu zhing song nas rgyal bu dge don gyis mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo la chags pa'i sems 
[\[100b.2\]]kyis mig mi 'dzums par blta blta nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir sa la 'gyel to/_/sha dang khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang sha sbrang mang po 'dus nas rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'dzugs te sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog 
[\[100b.3\]]gi lhag ma tsam zhig ma chad de skad phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo/_/bdag gi sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig_/deng slan chad mi bgyid do/_/bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te sbyin pa byas pas bdag gi pha ma snga ma bas lhag 
[\[100b.4\]]pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te bde bar nyal ba dang /_bde bar sad pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa mi rmi ba dang /_lhas srung ba dang /_mis bkur ba dang /_zhal mchu dang /_rkun po dang /_dgra dang /_rku lto byed pa med cing dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog shig_/
[\[100b.5\]]bdag gi lus lhag ma tsam sha khrag sbrang ma la byin pas thams cad du 'grangs shing tshim par gyur te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su grub par shog shig_/sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang chos kyi skus thams cad kyi bkres skom pa'i mu ge dang skye shir 'khor 
[\[100b.6\]]ba'i nad lci ba sel bar shog shig_/rgyal bus de skad ces smon lam btab pa na gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_nyi ma yang 'od mi gsal bar gyur/_gcan gzan dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyug_/rgya mtsho yang rab tu 'khrugs/_ri rab kyang 'gul 
[\[100b.7\]]zhing ldeg_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas rgyal bu dge don bsdigs pa'i phyir seng ge dang /_stag dang /_'phar spyang la sogs pa'i lus 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]su sprul nas mig bgrad kha gdangs/_spu bsgrengs nas skad chen po'i nga ro phyung ste/_rgyal bu la mchong ba bzhin bsdigs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu dge don gyis gcan gzan khro bo de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed rnams 
[\[101a.2\]]kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo zhig_/'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_bdag cag ni seng ge'am gcan gzan ma yin gyi/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te khyod bgam zhing sad du 'ongs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal 
[\[101a.3\]]bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu la smras pa/_khyod kyis shin tu gtong dka' ba btang ste/_lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyod bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/_'on 
[\[101a.4\]]te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/_lha'i dbang po'am/_mi'i rgyal po'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod/_rgyal bus smras pa/_bdag ni bdud kyi rgyal po'am/_tshangs pa'am/_lha'i rgyal po'am/_mi'i rgyal po'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[101a.5\]]gang yang mi 'dod de/_sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_khyod ni shin tu yang gti mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun 
[\[101a.6\]]ring po nas shin tu dka' ba bsgrubs pas gdod 'grub ce'o/_/khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dam/_rgyal bus smras pa/_gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba bdag gi spyi bo'i steng nas rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[101a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/_de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/gal te bdag gis smras pa'i tshig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te/_lha'i dbang po 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bslus par gyur na bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig_/gal te smras pa'i tshig bden na/_bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi rma yang snga mkho bzhin sor chud de/_khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad 
[\[101b.2\]]gzugs kyang snga ma bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so/_/shin tu legs so/_/shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za 
[\[101b.3\]]bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/_/ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa na/_thog mar bdag gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid du mi snang bar gyur 
[\[101b.4\]]to/_/de'i tshe yang rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po des kyang rgyang ma nas bsu nas dgos pa'i yo byad yid bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo des rgyal bu'i lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la ji ltar bstabs pa rgyal po de la zhib tu 
[\[101b.5\]]brjod pa dang /_rgyal po des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thos nas rgyal bu des lus kyi sha khrag gis pha ma la bstabs pas sri zhu cher byas pa'i drin lan bsabs nas/_dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas rgyal po de dang yul bA rA Na sIr dmag drangs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi 
[\[101b.6\]]dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/_rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang /_'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shi na bu'i rus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bkur ro snyam du bsams nas skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i rus bu sdud du song song ba las rgyang ma nas 
[\[101b.7\]]bdag gi bu lus kyi rma yang sos nas snga bas kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so/_/de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs te khyod da dung gson nam zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa/_yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smras so/_/rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste/_thams 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]cad ban glang la zhon nas phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang /_rgyal bu de'i bsod nams kyi mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[102a.2\]]dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems
