[\[102a.3\]]na de de ltar mi blta ste/_de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i 
[\[102a.4\]]dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar kun shes kau Di n+ya zhes bya ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis pha ma la sri zhu byed pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la 
[\[102a.5\]]mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/_/gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rdul phra rab snyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs 
[\[102a.6\]]te theg pa gcig gis mthar phyin par gyur to/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[102a.7\]]de ma yin pa lha dang /_klu dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas nyan 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i phyir lus kyi sha dang khrag gis kyang pha ma la bstabs shing shin 
[\[102b.2\]]tu spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no/_/'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed de/_dga' mgu rangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo /_/thabs 
[\[102b.3\]]mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang 
[\[102b.4\]]na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skar ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu'am/_klu 'khyil pa'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la lta na mig mi chags pa bzhin nam/_bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me/_lhang nger bzhugs te/_dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu 
[\[102b.5\]]me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba'am/_nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snyed yod kyang brgya byin gyi drung na sol phung lta bu'am/_brgya byin la 'od gsal ba yod kyang tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo'am/_gseg ma lta bu'am/_mtshan mo dang nor bu rin po che'i 
[\[102b.6\]]'od du bsgrun pa tsam mam/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog gang gis phyogs 
[\[102b.7\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to/_/de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/_lus sgur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/_dbang po nyams pa rnams ni dbang po tshang zhing yan lag 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dang nying lag dang ldan par 'gyur/_myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par 'gyur/_mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[103a.2\]]bdun cu snyed stan las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/thams cad kyis skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/_
[\[103a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' zhig sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang /_byang chub 
[\[103a.4\]]sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gtsug phud 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang /_
[\[103a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dge gnas blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mtshan med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khro zhi blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bsrung 'gyur dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dad 
[\[103a.6\]]pa btsan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral 'chad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsam du med pa dang /_
[\[103a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grags 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa'i yid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang /_
[\[103b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong 
[\[103b.3\]]po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sde chen mkhas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[103b.4\]]dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngo 'phral yod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge btsan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dus tshod rgyal po dang /_
[\[103b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyang gsal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ri dang /_byang chub sems dpa' srid len sbyin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba sbyin 
[\[103b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'gribs med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[103b.7\]]dpa' 'jigs med dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ma chags lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang /_
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' mun nag sel dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di skad bcas so/_/bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 
[\[104a.2\]]'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas 'od zer de dag las 
[\[104a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab par yang thos par 'gyur/_chos de dag thos nas sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas/_lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par gyur pas thams cad gsal bar snang bar 
[\[104a.4\]]gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag cag gis phan pa dang /_bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so/_/byams pa'i pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran te sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin shes par 
[\[104a.5\]]bgyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang chos thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[104a.6\]]chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun cu po 'di dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 
[\[104a.7\]]sngon rol na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur byas te/_sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/_
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing snying rje chen pos rgyun du phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do/_/sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/_gnyis sam/_
[\[104b.2\]]gsum mam/_bzhi nas bdun cu'i bar du rdzogs par thos te/_de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na tshe 'phos ma thag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing 'dod chags dang yongs su bral ba dang /_mngal 
[\[104b.3\]]gyi gnas nas mi skye ba dang /_mnam zhing btsog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/_lus yongs su dag cing lus dri zhim pa dang /_thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing bkur sti byas pas sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[104b.4\]]sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/_de ltar 
[\[104b.5\]]byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyoms su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/_gzhan yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang /_sgrib pa dang /_
[\[104b.6\]]bar chad du 'gyur ba bsal ba'i sems dang /_nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sems dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang /_'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i sems dang /_mi brjed par yid la byed cing don bzang po 
[\[104b.7\]]gzungs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang /_nyung du thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang /_mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dag pa nyid la dang ba'i sems dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'gyur/_yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/_de 
[\[105a.2\]]ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas sems can de dag thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bdag khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_rkang bzhi 
[\[105a.3\]]dang /_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do/_/ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang /_'bru dang /_gos dang /_zas 
[\[105a.4\]]dang /_skom dang /_ban glang dang /_shing rta dang /_theg pa dang /_yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do/_/gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrog pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du 
[\[105a.5\]]sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/ji ltar bdag gi 
[\[105a.6\]]gzugs dam pa sring mo'am/_chung ma'am/_slas la gzhan gyi mi rigs par byed mi 'dod pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes 
[\[105a.7\]]ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/_ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]srog yal yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o/_/ji ltar bdag rdo dbyug gis rdeg pa dang /_lcag gis gzhu ba dang /_nan la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems 
[\[105b.2\]]dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdo dbyug dang /_lcag dang chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems can rnams la mi 'tshe'o/_/ji ltar bdag lcags sgrog dang /_khong sgril dang /_mtshon cha dang /_bzung ba dang /_btags pa dang /_bcing bas bcings 
[\[105b.3\]]pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lcags sgrog dang /_khong sgril dang /_bzung ba dang /_bcing ba la sogs pa gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do/_/ji ltar 
[\[105b.4\]]bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang /_dbang dang /_drag shul byed pa dang /_dbang rlom btsan byed bsnyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal 
[\[105b.5\]]yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam tshig snyan pas bstod na/_bdag bde ba la dga' ba bzhin du bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang /_zas dang /_
[\[105b.6\]]skom dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do/_/gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig sgrub pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi phyir ram/_chos kyi phyir ram/_dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/_don sgrub pa las blos mi lcogs 
[\[105b.7\]]te don grub par ma gyur nas/_mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis bsgrub pa'i don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig_/khyod 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya ste/_don yid bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/zhes zer na de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/_de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyi grogs bya'o/_/
[\[106a.2\]]ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang /_rkun po dang chu'am/_mes gnod par 'gyur ram/_blon po la sogs pas/_bzung ngam/_btags sam/_bcings na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya 
[\[106a.3\]]ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na/_snyan pa sgra'i tshig gis bdag la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig_/khyod kyi phyir kho bos rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste/_gal te na nor gsug sbyin pa'am/_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ci nas kyang khyod mi 
[\[106a.4\]]bde ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o zhes zer na/_bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar 'gyur te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgyu rtsal dang bzo'i bar du yang mthar phyin par brtson 'grus su slob bo/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[106a.5\]]shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang /_bzo'i gnas dang /_rol mo dang /_rtsed mo dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_mig 'phrul gyi sngags dang /_sman dang /_ban glang dang /_rta dang /_bzhon pa dang /_dgra chos dang /_dmag drang ba dang /_dpyad la sogs 
[\[106a.6\]]pa la mkhas par slob ste/_de ltar sgyu rtsal ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas 'gro ba mang po dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang longs spyod kyi rkyen gos sam/_nor 
[\[106a.7\]]ram/_zas sam/_bza' ba'am/_btung ba'am/_nor bu'am/_gdu bu'am/_lus kyi rgyan nam/_gser ram/_dngul lam/_bai dUr+ya'am/_byi ru'am/_man shel lam/_spug gam/_mu tig gam/_a mra gar b+ha'am/_nor bu 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]rin po che'am/_ban glang ngam/_rta'am/_theg pa'am/_bran po'am/_las byed pa'i mi'am/_chung ma'am/_slas kyang yod/_chu mig gam/_khrus kyi rdzing bu'am/_rin po che'i yang tog bzang po'am/_longs spyod kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yod 
[\[106b.2\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la rlom pa'am rgyags pa'i sems med do/_/de ltar sgyu rtsal kun la yang mkhas/_rin po che'i bang mdzod brgya stong dang yang ldan/_ban glang dang /_rta dang /_theg pa yang yod/_na chung bzang mo yang grangs med par yod/_yang tog 
[\[106b.3\]]bzang po yang yod/_chu mig dang khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/_de la ma chags te rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang /_chog shes pa la dga' zhing /_bas mtha' dgon pa dang /_ri dang /_tshal dang /_shing drung du bsam gtan la 
[\[106b.4\]]zhi bar gnas pa la mos so/_/skye bo mang po dang /_smra zhing gtam zer yang /_sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do/_/so so'i skye bo dang spyod tshul 'thun pa ltar byed kyang sems can la phan pa'i don du nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyis sems can la 
[\[106b.5\]]gnod pa mi phan pa'i don mi byed do/_/gang dbul ba/_phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na de la ci 'dod pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do/_/sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dad de byang 
[\[106b.6\]]chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed dam/_lus bkru ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam/_chag chag dang phyag dar byed dam/_so shing dang khrus chur sbyor ram/_mal stan 'dings shing mal 
[\[106b.7\]]gos sprug pa'i las byed dam/_srod dang tho rangs la mar me 'bud dam/_khye'u sus dang /_dro la kha zas tha na pa na dang /_pu she na dang /_kha da ne 'bul lam/_'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang /_bu la sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang /_rgun chu dang /_kha ra nag po'i chu la sogs 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa sbyar sbyar nas yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nas zhag dgu bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bul bar byed na byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang 
[\[107a.2\]]chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la skyed 'bri'i sems med pa'i phyir/_byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/_mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir 
[\[107a.3\]]ro/_/de bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/_rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed do/_/sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pas tshe'i dus byas na yang lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod 
[\[107a.4\]]mchog dam pa dang ldan te/_rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur/_bsams pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur/_gnas gang du 'gro yang bzhon pa'i rta dang theg par ldan te skyed mos tshal du rtsed mo dang rol mo la rtse zhing 
[\[107a.5\]]longs spyod par 'gyur/_bza' ba dang btung ba dam pa dang dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang tha ma mi rtag pa bsten te/_rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na khyim gyi bu smad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/_la la ni rang rang gi skra 
[\[107a.6\]]'bal te mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'gre'o/_/de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas dur khrod du bskyel te/_de ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te la la ni brgyal nas sa la 'gre_/la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nad du 'gyur/_la 
[\[107a.7\]]la ni mi dran nas myos/_la la ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/_de ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/_shi ba la ni rab tu gnod do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las sems can mya ngan gyis 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]gzir ba mthong nas snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro/_/rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang gis 'gro ba mang po'i dbang sgyur te/_de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams btul te/_'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[107b.2\]]na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mi rtag pas 'jigs pa las thar bar ma gyur na/_bdag gis drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don med do/_/de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes kyang ji skad bya/_byams 
[\[107b.3\]]pa chen po'i pha zhe'am/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po zhe'am/_'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes ji skad du gdags/_'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston te/_'dus ma byas pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do/_/
[\[107b.4\]]bdag cag ni ming dang spyod par mi 'thun te/_dper na mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun brgyugs te/_khron pa skam po zhig dang phrad nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te 'di snyam du sems so/_/da ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba las phyir 
[\[107b.5\]]sos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chu dang ma phrad na srog 'di 'chi ba las yun mi ring ba las da khron pa bzang po dang phrad nas gdon mi za bar chu dong grang mo gtsang ma dang phrad de ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas myur ba myur bar khron pa'i 
[\[107b.6\]]drung du bsnyen to/_/khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lus la gyon pa'i gos phud de/_phyogs gcig tu sbas nas chu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhugs so/_/khron pa'i gting du phyin nas chu ni med kyi sbrul gdug pa dang /_smigs pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_rtsangs pa dang /_sbal pa 
[\[107b.7\]]dang /_gyo mo dang /_de la sogs pa gseg ma dang /_shing dang /_rtswa nyal nyil 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la gdug pa mang pos gzas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]rnyings shing zhig la zabs kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam yod de/_de'i nang na skas sam/_thag srad dam/_'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de/_mas mchong du stsal yang nyam thag la stobs zhan pas 'phar mi nus te/_phyir yang zhabs su lhung nas sbrul gdug pa la sogs 
[\[108a.2\]]pas za zhing 'jib bo/_/de cung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro/_/bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes na lta khron pa 'di la mig gis blta yang mi phod na 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_da ni khron pa 'di'i rkyen gyis sdug 
[\[108a.3\]]bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to zhes smre sngags 'don to/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de ltar so so'i skye bo dag gcig shi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gi bu smad dang /_gnyen rnams kyis sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zer 
[\[108a.4\]]ro/_/bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/_khron pa ming tsam yod kyi chu ni med pas na 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa med pas de lta bu'i lus dang srog stor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to/_/da ltar bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin 
[\[108a.5\]]po che sna bdun dang ldan te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul zhing drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas nas skye bo mang po dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su bkod de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang de dag skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[108a.6\]]dang /_'chi ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_bye bral ba dang /_dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar ma nus te/_gcig la gcig ngu zhing cho nge byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi sems can rnams kyis ma nyes so/_/de ji lta zhe na/_bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[108a.7\]]chos 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med de/_bdag las dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgal mi nus so/_/de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang 'di snyam du sems so/_/da ltar bdag gi lus 'di ni dper na shes 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa med pa gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na lo bdun gyi bar du char ma bab pas than pa chen po byung ste/_rtsi shing yang skams/_'bru yang rab tu dkon par gyur nas mu ge chen po byung ste/_gcig la gcig 'cha' zhing za bar gyur/_
[\[108b.2\]]gcig gi sha khrag la gcig za ste/_la la ni bu'i sha khrag la pha ma za/_la la ni pha ma'i sha la bu za zhing /_pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_khyo shug dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo yang gcig gi sha la gcig za bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na sbyin bdag chen po de 'chag cing 'phyan du song 
[\[108b.3\]]song ba las sems can mang po dag ltogs nas da rod nyams de rid cing skams la nyam chung la mdog ngan pa dang /_skra yang 'dzings nas lus gnag la rke ba dag phrag pa la mi ro khur du khyer te/_kha cig ni mi'i mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_lhu tshigs dang /_lag 
[\[108b.4\]]ngar dang /_phrag pa dang /_tshigs pa dang /_rgal pa dang /_brla dang /_rje ngar dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi bar du khyer/_kha cig ni nang khrol mchin pa dang /_mcher pa dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gzhang rnams khyer ba mthong ngo /_/de lta bu dag mthong nas sbyin 
[\[108b.5\]]bdag des de dag mthong nas/_khyed khur du khyer ba 'di dag ci yin zhes dris so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gi khur du khyer ba 'di dag ni mi ro ste/_mi'i mgo dang /_rkang lag dang /_brla dang /_rje ngar dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi bar du'o/_/khyed mi'i 
[\[108b.6\]]mgo dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag gi bar du khyer ba 'di ci dgos ci zhig bya zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyod mi shes sam/_mu ge chen po byung nas 'bru rab tu dkon par gyur te/_mi kun ltogs nas da ltar gcig la gcig za bas/_bdag cag gi 
[\[108b.7\]]khur bu khyer ba 'di ni bdag cag gi zas yin no/_/de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de skad ces smras pa de thos nas dngangs te/_spu zing zhes byed nas 'khams te sa la 'gyel ba las chu grang mos gdong du gtor nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_sems sor chud nas 'o na khyod kyi 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]zas yin na 'di dag su'i sha yin zhes dris pa dang /_de dag skad chen po phyung nas ngus te/_sbyin bdag la brjod du mi rung ngo zhes smras so/_/kye ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go/_/kye ma'o bdag cag ni sdug go/_/kyi hud kyi hud khyod la drang por mi smrar mi rung 
[\[109a.2\]]ste/_bdag cag khur du khyer ba 'di la la ni pha'i sha_/la la ni ma'i sha_/la la ni bu'i sha_/la la ni phu nu'i sha_/la la ni gnyen bshes kyi sha yin no zhes ltogs pa de dag gis so so nas khyim bdag la drang por gtam byas nas/_bdag cag ni shin tu ltogs pas gcig la 
[\[109a.3\]]gcig nying sha za bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du mi ltogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed rnams deng phyin chad gcig la gcig nying sha za bar ma byed cig_/khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byad gang yang rung /_bgo ba'i 
[\[109a.4\]]gos sam/_bza' ba'am/_btung ba'am/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi'am/_yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste/_zhag bdun na khyed rnams kho bo'i sgor shog shig dang /_yid bzhin du gos sam/_kha zas sam/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi'am/_ji 'dod pa tshim par bya'o zhes bsgo 
[\[109a.5\]]ba dang /_de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas shin tu legs so legs so/_/ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so/_/de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas chung ma dang /_bu rnams dang /_bran khol dang /_las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te/_dga' ba'i mdangs 
[\[109a.6\]]phyung nas/_'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas bu smad dang /_bran khol dang /_las byed pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyed rnams shes par gyis shig_/kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig_/khyed shes sam than pa chen pos mu ge byung nas/_
[\[109a.7\]]mi thams cad ltogs te grangs med pa zhig shi bar gyur to/_/bdag gi khyim na bang mdzod kun gang zhing lud de 'bru yang grangs med pa zhig yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya'o zhes bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas legs so legs so/_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi phangs na bang mdzod dang /_nor rdzas dang /_kha zas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o legs so/_/
[\[109b.2\]]khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang ci bya ba rnams ci dang ci bsgrub pa skol bya ba'i rigs pa yang mod la bya/_bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yang myur du bsgrub ste/_da ste zhag bdun na nges par 'byor bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas khyim gyi phyi rol du byung ste/_gang 
[\[109b.3\]]na sa mnyam zhing yangs la bde ba'i gnas zhig bltas nas mod la sa gzhi dag par nyal nyil dang sa rdo med par byas phyags te khri stan bshams so/_/de ltar mang po 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas ban glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te sbyin pa'i 
[\[109b.4\]]sar bskyal nas/_kha zas ni ri bzhin du spungs/_zho chu ni mtsho bzhin bskyil/_mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa cho ma cho dgu sbyar te/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang gos dang /_gdu bu dang /_phreng ba dang /_lus kyi rgyan sna 
[\[109b.5\]]tshogs dang /_ban glang dang /_rta dang /_rin po che sna bdun la sogs te/_thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar nas zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar nas zhag bdun gyi nyi ma la dril rnga brdungs/_dung bus te/_skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas 'dir 'dus shing 
[\[109b.6\]]shog shig ces bos so/_/de'i tshe na thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam du rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas su lhags te/_yid bzhin du gos dang /_mal cha dang /_zas skom dang /_
[\[109b.7\]]lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang /_nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang /_ban glang dang /_rta dang /_rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus par khyer ro/_/de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]'ongs nas chung ma dang bu rnams dga' ba bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do/_/de nas zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang mi dag na re sbyin bdag des sngar gos dang /_zas dang /_skom la sogs pa sbyin pa byas na kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o 
[\[110a.2\]]zhes zer ro/_/de ltar shi bar gyur pas thams cad tshig tu brjod de ngo mtshar che'o ngo mtshar che'o/_/de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun la snying brtse ba'i phyir ci 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas la sogs pas tshim par byas te lus dang srog gson par byas par gyur na phyis zhag mang po 
[\[110a.3\]]ma lon par dug langs nas thams cad shi'o bar sgra sgrogs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sbyin bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thos nas yi mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te/_chung ma dang /_bu la sogs pa la khyed kyi kha zas ji ltar sbyar na kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs 
[\[110a.4\]]zhes dris pa dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bran khol dang /_las byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchid nas dug mi srid do/_/dug 'di ga las 'ongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so/_/de nas sbyin bdag de khyim gyi zhal ta byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las khron pa zhig steng 
[\[110a.5\]]bkab cing g.yogs pa mthong ngo /_/khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g.yogs zhes dris pa dang /_khron pa 'di ni khyim bdag khyod bus pa chung ngu'i tshe na sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso gso ba las khron pa 'di brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go/_/khron pa 'di ni sbrul 
[\[110a.6\]]gdug pa 'dug pa'i khron pa yin no/_/chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas las byed pa dag la khyed de bar kha zas g.yo ba'i tshe khron chu 'di las bcus te kha zas ma g.yos sam/_las byed pas 
[\[110a.7\]]smras pa/_kha zas mang du g.yos pas [{]rings [,]ring [}]nas chu 'di yang bcus nas kha zas kyi g.yos byas so zhes bsgo'o/_/khyim bdag mi dga' ste/_ngo mtshar che'o/_/bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste/_ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]gdug pa rko zhes 'gyod nas chung ma dang /_bu la bsgo ba/_sbrul gdug pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du tshongs shig_/sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo ba dang /_las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag tu khron pa de yang bsubs 
[\[110b.2\]]nas med par byas so/_/de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas phyi rol du 'chag tu song song ba las sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyi shi bar gyur pa las thams cad tshig 'thun par sbyin bdag 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byin nas 
[\[110b.3\]]bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no/_/bdag cag gis de ltar shes na der ma song yang rung zhes 'gyod pa skyes so/_/de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dge ba bcus sems can btul te/_sems can dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris su skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la 'dod 
[\[110b.4\]]dgur longs spyod mod kyi skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba las mi thar ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de de'i mod la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bsgrubs te/_sems can rnams 
[\[110b.5\]]kyang de la klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_goms par bya ste/_skye shi'i 'khor ba yongs su spang zhing mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so/_/de'i tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/_'dzam bu'i gling na/_
[\[110b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes gnas kun tu bkar btags so/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir gnas kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byung ngo /_/mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu cig tu phyin pa dang /_de na bram ze gcig cig sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[110b.7\]]shes so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram ze de'i steng du pho nya btang nas pho nya des bram ze ga la ba der phyin nas btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris na shes so zhes zer ro/_/de nas pho nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der gshegs su gsol/_/de nas bram ze yang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bde bar byon tam/_lam 
[\[111a.2\]]du nyon mongs par ma gyur tam/_ngal bar ma gyur tam/_zhes gtam dris te pho brang gi nang du khrid nas pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go/_/bram zes kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de bde bar 'dug nas dgos 
[\[111a.3\]]pa'i yo byad rnams kun phul te sbyin pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la ston pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris pa dang /_bram ze na re bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro/_/de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po bdag la bstan cing 
[\[111a.4\]]bshad du gsol zhes byas nas/_bram ze na re rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no/_/kho bos sangs rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na/_yun ring du na dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lobs pa yin na/_da rgyal pos thal byung du thos par 'dod dam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[111a.5\]]ston pa chen po 'o na ci zhig 'dod/_bram zes smras pa/_bdag la mchod pa phul cig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ston pa chen po mchod pa ci zhig 'dod/_gos sam/_mal cha'am/_bza' ba'am/_btung ba 'dod dam/_'on te gser ram/_dngul lam/_rin 
[\[111a.6\]]po che 'dod dam/_bram zes smras pa/_bdag de 'dra ba'i mchod pa mi 'dod do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mchod pa de dag mi 'dod na 'o na ban glang ngam/_rta'am/_theg pa 'dod dam/_'on te yul lam/_grong khyer ram/_chung ma'am/_bu 'dod dam/_rol mo'am/_glu 
[\[111a.7\]]'am/_gar byed pa 'dod dam/_bram zes smras pa/_bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do/_/gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste rma'i nang du mar blugs la me mar snying po btsugs te mar me stong 'bar bas mchod na sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad par bya'o/_/gal te de ltar mi nus 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]na bdag langs te 'gro zhes smras nas rgyal pos skad cig tsam lan ma smras kyi bar du khri las babs so/_/de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs nas ston pa chen po cung zad nyag bsring du gsol/_bdag shes pa zhan zhing bsod nams chung bas cung zad bsams te mchod par bgyid do 
[\[111b.2\]]zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_bdag gi lus 'di thog ma med pa'i dus nas shi ba grangs med par myong na yang chos kyi phyir ma shi'i/_da yang bdag gi lus 'di yang mthar 'jig cing rul bar 'gyur bas phan pa med de/_da ni 
[\[111b.3\]]dus las bab bo snyam bsams nas ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ston pa chen po/_bdag mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas btsun mo rnams la da ni bdag cag bye 'bral lo zhes smras so/_/btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa 
[\[111b.4\]]thos nas dngangs shing 'khams te ci nyes gtol med de rgyal po da ltar ci zhig mdzad snyam dgongs zhes gsol lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag gi lus 'di la mar me stong zhig btsugs te ston pa bram ze la mchod pa bya snyam mo/_/btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas 
[\[111b.5\]]sa la 'gre zhing cho nges btab ste brgyal lo/_/ring zhig lon pa dang /_phyir dran pa rnyed do/_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten na bdag gi lus las phangs pa med de/_nyes te dogs nas gso ba'i rim gro cher byed na ci'i phyir bdag gi lus la tho 'tsham zhing gnod pa bgyid/_rgyal po ni 
[\[111b.6\]]mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na da ltar myos sam/_'on te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis brlams sam/_ci nongs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de lta bu gang yang ma yin no/_/'o na ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnod pa mdzad cing bram ze la mchod par dgongs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag ni 
[\[111b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod de/_sems can thams cad kyi don byed par sems so/_/de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongs na da ci'i phyir bdag cag rnams bkol bar gyur/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'jig rten na mdza' sdug thams cad mthar bye bral du 'gyur te de bas na bdag 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]gis lus kyi mchod pa byas te/_khyed dang sems can thams cad kyi mun gnag gi khang par ye shes chen po'i sgron ma gzugs shing skye shir 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byas la/_kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa bcad de/_'khor ba'i skyon 
[\[112a.2\]]las bsgral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su dgod pa'i ched du bsams kyis khyed rnams bar chad dang bgegs ma byed cig_/de'i tshe btsun mo rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas brnangs pa ltar cang mi smra zhing skad chen po phyung ste ngu zhing rang rang gi skra 'bal lo/_/bdag cag la 
[\[112a.3\]]bsod nams med de bkra mi shis pas gson por bdag cag la lha med par gyur ces smra'o/_/rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod de thams cad kyang mnga' byad bzang zhing sdug pa/_yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_mi'i mtshan dang rdzogs par ldan pa/_rgyal po yang 
[\[112a.4\]]mig bzhin du phangs shing byams so/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la smras pa/_kho bo da mchod pa'i las shig byed snyam na lus dang srog nyam chung ngu dogs te khyed dang bral ba snyam/_yul gyi srid dang 'bangs rnams kyi tshis ni che rims kyis byos shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bu 
[\[112a.5\]]rnams de skad bsgo ba de thos nas lus kyi yan lag dang rtsa rnams bcad pa tsam du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/_dper na mi brnangs pa la skyug tu yang med/_mid du yang med pa bzhin du rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci'i slad du bdag cag rnams spangs te skyabs su ma 
[\[112a.6\]]mchis par mdzad/_la la ni rgyal po'i gnya' ba nas 'khyud/_la la ni lag pa dang /_rkang pa la bzung nas skad phyung zhing ngu /_kyi hud kyi hud ci'i phyir mgon dang skyabs med par 'gyur zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'jig rten na mdza' 
[\[112a.7\]]zhing sdug pa thams cad mthar bye bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid la gcags te 'bral mi phod na bdag gi gsol ba gcig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/bdag cag gi lus dang srog rgyal po la 'bul na ston pa bram ze la mchod pa mdzad 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu khyed rnams ni da dung shed ma bye la chung bas de 'dra ba'i mchod pa byed mi bzod kyis/_kho bo ni ston pa lam ring po nas gnyer te mchod pa bya bar khas blangs pa'i yid dang 'gal bar byar mi rung bas bu sri zhu can ni pha'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed na 
[\[112b.2\]]khyed rnams kho bo'i yid dang 'gal bar byed dam/_rgyal bu rnams de skad smra ba thos nas skad phyung ste cho nges btab pas yul gyi lha rnams kyang dngangs te ri 'gyel ba bzhin du thams cad lus sa la brdabs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po la yul mtha'i rgyal phran thams cad kyis kyang mchi phyag 
[\[112b.3\]]byas nas pho brang gi nang ston pa chen po ga la ba der song ste/_de'i drung du phyin nas lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyang bkrol nas gos kyang phud nas phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug go/_/'dug ma thag tu rgyal phran rnams dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal bu lnga 
[\[112b.4\]]brgya dang /_btsun mo nyi khri la bsgo'o/_/khyed rnams las gang gis kho bo'i lus la rma stong zhig gcod sus nus zhes smras na/_btsun mo dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal phran gyi mi rnams tshig 'thun par bdag cag gis rang gi lus la gri thogs te mig phyung yang bla'i rgyal 
[\[112b.5\]]po'i lus la rma 'byin mi phod do/_/de nas rgyal po mi dga' bar gyur nas da ni bdag ye 'ur gyur pa lta 'khor mang po 'di snyed kyi nang na mi 'ga' yang kho bo'i grogs su 'gyur ba med dam zhes smra bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rigs ngan shen pa rang bzhin gyis khro la kun kyang 
[\[112b.6\]]'jigs su rung ba zhig yod pa zhig bos so/_/shen pa de der 'ongs so/_/shen pa de 'ongs nas rgyal bu rnams la khyed mya ngan ma byed cig_/rgyal po chen po don mi 'grub pa'i thabs bdag la mchis kyis/_don ma grub na snga mkho bzhin du rgyal po'i srid gzung du zad do 
[\[112b.7\]]zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu rnams kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes par gyur to/_/de nas shen pa de rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs nas rgyal po chen po da ltar ci zhig mdzad par dgongs zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_kho bo'i lus la 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]mar me stong btsugs la ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod par sems so/_/shen pas smras pa/_de lta na sku la gcod nus so/_/rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas shan pa la khyod ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i 
[\[113a.2\]]byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas shan pas rgyal po'i drung du 'greng bzhin ngu ngam ngur ba'i skad chen pos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po mkhyen tam/_mi gsad pa'i chos kyis ni sngar mgo bcad par dgos te/_gnya' ba gtubs la rkang lag kyang 
[\[113a.3\]]phral te/_chu ba dang /_rgyus pa yang dbyung dgos na rgyal po chen po de 'dra ba'i na tsha'i sdug bsngal bzod dam/_rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas/_de nas shen pas gnag lce lta bu'i gri thogs te ring po ma thogs par rgyal po'i lus la rma stong 
[\[113a.4\]]tshang bar bcad do/_/shan pa rgyal po'i sems phyir nur ba tsam du sems pa las/_sems ma nur bas de gri yang sa la bor nas bros so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po'i lus la rma stong bcad pa'i nang du mar khu blugs nas ras bzang po'i snying po btsugs te mar me stong btsugs so/_/
[\[113a.5\]]de'i tshe bram ze ston pa chen pos de ltar byas pa mthong nas 'di snyam du da ni myur du chos ma bshad na lus srog 'tsho'am mi 'tsho gtol med pas/_gal te srog ma sos na sus chos mnyan par 'gyur snyam bsams nas/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[113a.6\]]thos par 'dod pas shin tu dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis bya dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pas legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_da rgyal po la sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa thos nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/_dper na bu sri zhu can 
[\[113a.7\]]zhig pha ma shi na rab tu mi dga' ste/_sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa las pha ma phyir sos pa na bu de ji ltar rab tu dga' ba ltar rgyal po de yang rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze des rgyal po la smras pa/_skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'gog pa 'di ni bde ba yin/_/zhes 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]tshigs su bcad pa phyed pa 'di bstan to/_/rgyal pos dam pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/_rgyal bu dang blon po rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyed rnams kho bo la sdug cing brtse ba'i sems yod na chos 'di ma brjed par yid la zung la 
[\[113b.2\]]yul phyogs su gang na mang po 'du ba'i gnas dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshong 'dus su 'gro ba mang po la 'di skad ces bkar thogs shig_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor bying ba dag 'don pa dang /_sems can 
[\[113b.3\]]thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas lus la mar me stong btsugs te/_tshigs su bcad pa'i tshigs bcad phyed thos pa 'di rgyal po chen po 'di'i byams pa dang snying rje'i sems grub par bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyis yi ger bris te gdon pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba dang /_
[\[113b.4\]]'dri ba dang /_goms par byed pa dang /_don yang yid la bya zhing ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du nan tan du spyad par bya'o/_/de'i tshe na mi mang pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur te/_thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par rgyal po la bstod nas shin tu dga'o/_/
[\[113b.5\]]rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi snying rje chen po'i pha yang dag pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi phyir shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad do zhes kun gyis bsngags te/_kun gyis shog shog dang /_dar dang /_shun pa dang /_shing dang /_rdo la yi ger bris te kha ton du slob bo/_/gang na 
[\[113b.6\]]mi mang po 'du ba'i gnas su yang yi ger bris te/_thams cad kyis mthong bar byas nas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos lus la mar me stong btsugs te ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas pa'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i 
[\[113b.7\]]zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/_mar me de'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa'i tshigs bcad phyed kyi chos kyi sgra yang grags par gyur nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/mar me de'i 'od des sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]khang pa yang snang bar byas nas mar me'i 'od des lha'i 'od kun zil gyis mnan pas sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha rnams mar me'i 'od des kun tu snang bar byas pas de dag 'di snyam du gyur to/_/ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di lta bu snang bar gyur snyam/_lha'i 
[\[114a.2\]]mig gis bltas pas 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen pos snying rje'i sems bskyed de/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don du lus la mar me stong btsugs nas ston pa chen po bram ze la mchod pa byas par mthong ngo /_/lha de dag rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas 'jig 
[\[114a.3\]]rten gyi khams su babs nas mi tha mal pa'i lus su sprul nas rgyal po ga la bar lhags te rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po lus la mar me stong btsugs te/_shin tu yang spyod dka' ba spyad cing tshigs su bcad pa phyed cig thos pas ci zhig bya/_rgyal 
[\[114a.4\]]pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sprul pa'i mi de phyir brgya byin gyi lus su bsgyur nas lus kyi 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas te/_rgyal po chen po la 'di skad 
[\[114a.5\]]ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar mchod pa byas pa 'dis lha'i rgyal po 'dod dam/_bdud kyi rgyal po 'dod dam/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'dod dam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos brgya byin la smras pa/_lha'i dbang po bdag ni lha dang mi'i longs spyod gang yang mi 'dod kyi 
[\[114a.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod de/_so so'i skye bo thams cad mi bde ba rnams bde ba'i gnas su dgod pa dang /_ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba dang /_pha rol tu ma phyin pa rnams phyin par bya ba dang /_byang chub ma thob pa rnams thob par bya bar 'dod do/_/
[\[114a.7\]]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod ni rab tu blun pa'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring por shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad pas thob par 'gyur na ci'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_rgyal pos brgya byin la smras pa/_ci ste bdag 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]gi spyi bo'i steng na lcags kyi 'khor los shin tu 'bar ba rgyun du 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_tshig de skad ces smras pa la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/_de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[114b.2\]]pos brgya byin la smras pa/_gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa ma yin la lha'i dbang po khyod bslus par gyur na/_bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di dag nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig_/gal te de lta ma yin na khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig_/rma 
[\[114b.3\]]rnams kyang sos par gyur cig ces dam bcas ma thag tu rma rnams kyang sos par gyur to/_/brgya byin lha'i dbang pos/_rgyal po la shin tu dge'o shin tu dge'o zhes bstod nas/_rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/_snying rje chen po'i spyod pa'o/_/
[\[114b.4\]]de ltar spyod dka' ba spyad pas/_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas/_nam bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa na/_thog ma bdag gi don sngar byas par shog shig ces smras nas/_brgya byin lha'i dbang pos lus kyi 
[\[114b.5\]]'od zer gyis rgyal po'i lus kun tu snang bar byas nas/_lha'i 'khor brgya stong dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rgyal bu lnga brgya rnams de ltar yab rgyal po'i lus kyi rma sos te snga mkho bzhin du gyur pa mthong nas/_rab tu dga' rangs te 
[\[114b.6\]]rgyal po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di lta bu mdzad pa ngo mtshar che ste/_yab rgyal po ni yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad la snying rje che ba'o zhes bstod do/_/rgyal pos smras 
[\[114b.7\]]pa/_bu khyed nga la sri zhu byed pa bden na thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces bsgo nas/_rgyal bu rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de bzhin du btsun mo nyi khri dang pho brang gi slas brgya stong snyed 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bcu bdun snyed kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed par gyur to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[115a.2\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pa rnams 'di lta bur gyur pa mthong thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed de rab tu dga' nas phyir dong ngo /_/thabs mkhas pa chen po 
[\[115a.3\]]sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/_gnyen po'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o//_//de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rgyal po stan las langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas 
[\[115a.4\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na drin shes par bgyi/_ji ltar na drin bsab par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[115a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu legs par nyon cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin shes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/drin lan 
[\[115a.6\]]bsab pa ni sems can pha rol po thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa'o/_/gsol pa/_byang chub tu sems bskyed ces bgyi ba ji ltar sems bskyed par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpas dngos po gang gi rkyen gyis byang 
[\[115a.7\]]chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i tshe/_'di skad du yi dam chen po bca'o/_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]pa'i tshe sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la nges par dgod par dam bca'o/_/gzhan yang sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar dam bca' bar bya'o/_/
[\[115b.2\]]de ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don byed pa zhes bya ste/_de bas na thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya/_/sems can gyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya/_yang dag pa'i don gyi rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos 
[\[115b.3\]]dang ldan pa zhes bya/_dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud pa'i gzhi zhes bya/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba zhes bya/_dge ba chen po zhes bya sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes kyang bya/_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las sbyong 
[\[115b.4\]]ba zhes bya ste/_las ngan pa gsum sbyangs pas 'jig rten na smon lam gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las 'da' ba med de smon lam mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma byang chub 
[\[115b.5\]]tu sems bskyed pa'i tshe dngos po lnga dang ldan par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rang bzhin dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod yul dang /_yon tan dang /_bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/_gdon 
[\[115b.6\]]mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob cing theg pa chen po spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pas dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji 
[\[115b.7\]]ltar spyod pa bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub tu sems ma bskyed na nam du yang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gzhi thob par 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba mthong na byams shing snying rje ba'i sems skye ste/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems kyis rgyu byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[116a.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub pa'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[116a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob ste/_de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni gzhi'am rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims spyod par 'gyur te/_de bas na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/yan lag ces kyang bya/_sdud 
[\[116a.4\]]pa zhes kyang bya/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]zhes kyang bya/_sa bon zhes kyang bya/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang mthar phyin pa dang /_mthar mi phyin pa yod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par byed pa ni nam du yang phyir ldog pa'am/_
[\[116a.5\]]nur ba med pas mthar phyin pa'o/_/mthar mi phyin pa ni ldog pa dang nyams par 'gyur te/_phyir ldog pa la rnam pa gnyis te/_mthar ldog pa dang /_mthar ldog pa ma yin pa yod do/_/mthar phyir ldog pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 
[\[116a.6\]]las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos gang yin pa de bsgrub pa'am nan tan du spyod mi nus pa'o/_/mthar phyir ldog pa ma yin pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas chos gang yin pa bsgrub cing nan tan du spyod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rnam pa bzhi ste/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[116a.7\]]mo'am/_gang zhig sangs rgyas sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos sam/_mthong na de'i tshe dad cing 'dun pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/_'di snyam du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_sangs 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni thob par bya ba yin pas bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya'o snyam sems te/_de bas na sems rtse gcig tu byang chub dran par byed cing byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_kha cig ni sangs 
[\[116b.2\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mthong yang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpas dgongs te gsungs pa'i snying po thos pa tsam gyis dad cing 'dun pa'i sems skyes te/_dad pa'i sems skyes pas/_bla na med pa 
[\[116b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_kha cig ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ma mthong /_dgongs te gsungs pa'i 
[\[116b.4\]]chos ma thos kyang dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur bar mthong na/_de 'di snyam du bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa grangs med pa zhi bar byed cing /_bde ba dang phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' 
[\[116b.5\]]zhig gis yun ring du gnas shing mi nub par mdzad de/_da bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su spong pa'i phyir bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal chen po myong yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par 
[\[116b.6\]]bya'o snyam du sems nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jig pa ma mthong yang dus ngan pa'i sems can rnams nyon mongs pa shin tu lci ba 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa 
[\[116b.7\]]dang /_ser sna rnams dang /_phrag dog dang /_khong khro ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams dang /_ma dad pa dang /_the tsom dang /_le lo la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dngos po 'di dag mthong na/_de 'di snyam du shin tu dus ngan pas sems can 'di dag ni dge ba mi spyod de/_de 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]ltar dus ngan pas theg pa gnyis kyi sems kyang skyed mi nus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci smos snyam sems nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can thams 
[\[117a.2\]]cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la brtson par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' drin lan shes pa ni bdag 
[\[117a.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' drin lan bsab pa ni sems can pha rol po byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'o zhes bgyi na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe thog ma dngos po ci'i rgyus byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur/_
[\[117a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon gyi bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du skye shir 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyon mongs pa'i las chen pos sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad myong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_a ha ha'i 
[\[117a.5\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_a la la'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_a tsha tsha'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_zangs khol ma'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_zangs khol ma chen po'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_rdo nag po'i sems can dmyal ba dang /_rdo nag po chen po'i 
[\[117a.6\]]sems can dmyal ba nas/_me'i shing rta'i dmyal ba'i bar du'o/_/nga de'i tshe na me'i shing rta'i dmyal bar lhung nas gud nas gcig dang gnyis kyis me'i shing rta 'dren te/_dmyal ba'i srungs ma a bang ni shing rta'i steng na 'dug cing mig bgrad so gtsigs te me 'bud pa/_kha 
[\[117a.7\]]dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna nas me 'bar/_dud pa 'thul te srungs ma de yang lus shin tu che zhing gnag la/_shing rta'i steng na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas lag pa na lcags kyi dbyug pa thogs te nga la rdeg go/_/de'i tshe nga na ba'i sdug bsngal ma bzod nas 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]stobs ci nus kyis shing rta drangs so/_/nga'i grogs shig nyam chung ste 'dren ma nus pas dmyal ba'i srungs ma a bang gis lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas brang du btsugs te/_lcags thos brdegs nas khrag char par bab bo/_/de'i tshe mi de na ba'i sdug bsngal mi 
[\[117b.2\]]bzod pas na tsha'i skad chen po phyung nas bar 'ga' ni pha ma zhes 'bod/_bar 'ga' ni chung ma bu zhes bos kyang phan pa med do/_/nga de'i tshe na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba mthong nas snying rje'i sems skyes so/_/de ltar snying rje'i sems chen po skyes pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub 
[\[117b.3\]]tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas sdug bsngal myong ba de'i phyir dmyal ba'i srungs ma a bang la sdug bsngal myong ba'i mi 'di la snying rje'i sems cung zad skyed cig ces gsol ba btab pa dang /_dmyal ba'i srungs ma khros nas zhe sdang gi sems skyes pas lcags kyi mdung 
[\[117b.4\]]rtse gsum pa thogs nas nga'i gnya' bar btsugs nas der tshe'i dus byas pas me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba las thar te bskal pa brgya snyed kyi mi dge ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur to/_/de ltar ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas me'i 
[\[117b.5\]]shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba las thar bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe me'i shing rta 'dren pa de ni da ltar nga yin te/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pas myur du sangs rgyas su grub par gyur to/_/de bas na sems can thams 
[\[117b.6\]]cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni don gyi dngos po ni gcig tu ma zad de/_la la ni snying rje'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni zhe sdang gi rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni ser sna'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni dga' ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/
[\[117b.7\]]la la ni mya ngan gyi rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni 'dod pa dang bye bral gyi rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rkyen gyis skye'o/_/
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]la la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/la la ni chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o/_/de bas na sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni de ltar so sor mi 'thun te/_dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drin 
[\[118a.2\]]lan shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa'i don gyi dngos po 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/de'i tshe chos 'di bstan pa na skye bo khri brgya stong snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/'khor mang mo de dag las la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[118a.3\]]'bras bu thob pa nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed par gyur te/_chos thos pa la rab tu dga' rangs nas 
[\[118a.4\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo /_/thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab 
[\[118a.5\]]pa'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yum lha mdzes dang lha rnams kyi don du zhag dgu bcu'i bar du lha rnams la chos ston du gshegs te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis zhag dgu bcu'i bar du/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bzhugs 
[\[118a.6\]]pa ma rtogs so/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur pas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gtugs te phyogs bcur brtags kyang ma rtogs so/_/'phags pa nye bar skyong lta bu lha'i mig mchog gis phyogs bcur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[118a.7\]]kun tu bltas kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i 'khor lnga brgya'i bar du kun gyis brtags kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bas de dag mi dga' ste mya ngan gyis sems gdungs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po u tra ya nas de bzhin 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gshegs pa ma mthong bas mi dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir glang mgo'i shing tsan dan las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas nas phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum dang 'dra bar bzhugs par 
[\[118b.2\]]dmigs nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug bos nas de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar ga la bzhugs zhes dris na ston pa drug gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po mi mkhyen nam/_dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[118b.3\]]ma ni sgyu 'phrul can yin te de 'dra'o/_/sgyu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma ni bden pa'i dngos po med pas bdag cag gi gtsug lag las lo stong ngam nyis stong na sgyu 'phrul can sgyu ma zhig 'byung ngo zhes 'chad pas dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sgyu ma de kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe 'phags pa nye bar 
[\[118b.4\]]skyong rgyal po chen po ga la bar song nas/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po mkhyen tam/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab 
[\[118b.5\]]tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/_yul mi bsdus nas chag chag dang phyag dar byas te/_spos dang /_me tog kyang bshams/_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs bres te/_zhal zas mang po dang /_rol mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[118b.6\]]bshams shing sbyar ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug der 'ongs nas khyed rnams 'di ltar mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba 'di rgyal po spyan 'dren nam/_'on te rgyal bu spyan 'dren nam/_de dag gis de ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_'o na blon po chen 
[\[118b.7\]]po 'bod dam/_bram ze'am khyim bdag 'bod dam/_de ma yin na gnyen bshes kyi dus ston byed dam/_smras pa/_de ma yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol lo/_/ston pa drug gis smras pa/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba su zhig_/smras pa/_rnam pa 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de su zhig_/smras pa/_byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i yab bo/_/khyed mi shes sam/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rigs mtho zhing btsun la mchog tu gyur pa/_thog ma bskal pa dang 
[\[119a.2\]]po nas btsun mo chen po'i sras gcig cig gis gdung bsabs te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so/_/bar du rabs gnyis kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma byas mod kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po byas so/_/rgyal po de la sras mched gsum zhig mnga'o/_/rab ni rgyal 
[\[119a.3\]]po zas gtsang ma zhes bya/_de'i bar ni bre bo zas zhes bya/_de'i tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ni zas zil dngar gyi zas zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sras gnyis shig mnga'/_chen po ni don grub ces bya/_sras chung ngu ni dga' bo zhes bya/_rgyal po bre bo zas la sras gnyis 
[\[119a.4\]]shig mnga'/_chen po ni lha sbyin zhes bya/_sras chung ngu ni kun dga' bo'o/_/rgyal po zil dngar gyi zas la sras mo gcig yod de/_bu mo zil dngar gyi ro zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe na spun gyi rab rgyal bu don grub pho brang gi phyi rol du 'chag tu ltad mo ltar song song ba las 
[\[119a.5\]]rgas pa dang /_na ba dang /_shi ba dag mthong nas mi dga' bar gyur te/_kha zas kyang mi za zhing snying rje'i sems kyis sems pa la zhugs te/_mir skyes pa la mthon dman med par gzugs su red pa thams cad la de 'dra ba'i nad dang skyon yod de gcig kyang mi 
[\[119a.6\]]thar ro snyam bsams nas/_mtshan mo pho brang nas bros nas byang chub kyi shing drung du lo drug gi bar du spyod pa dka' ba spyad nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes can zhes mngon par sangs rgyas te/_stobs bcu 
[\[119a.7\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i chos [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/bltam nas zhag bdun lon nas yum lha mdzes dus byas te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i nang du skyes nas yum la zhag 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dgu bcu'i bar du chos bshad de/_da ste zhag bdun na 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs so/_/de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas phrag dog gi sems skyes te/_rab tu mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas ston pa drug 
[\[119b.2\]]'khor dang bcas pa lhan cig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces bgros so/_/dag sbyong gau ta ma gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir phyin te 'ongs na mi thams cad kyis bdag cag spong zhing dge sbyong gau ta ma la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bas bdag cag ni brel zhing phongs la srog 
[\[119b.3\]]la bab par 'gyur ro zhes bgros nas/_mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gis yang 'di snyam bsams so/_/bdag cag mi mang po 'dus pa'i gnas su myur du song la mi mang po'i nang du 'di skad ces bsgrag par bya'o/_/de skad kun shes par gyis/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni yang 
[\[119b.4\]]dag par na ci yang shes pa med de/_byis pa chung ngu na kha nyag gcig shAg rigs kyi pho brang nas byung ste/_byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug 'dug nas nga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob po zhes zer te/_tshig de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te bden pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[119b.5\]]na/_rgyal po a khyi tas bsod snyoms sbyin par bos nas rta chas 'ba' zhig byin te ngan du byas kyang ma shes te der song bas na thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang kun dga' bo la da ste zhag du na tshul du 'jug ces dris na/_kun dga' bos zhag bdun zhig lus 
[\[119b.6\]]zhes smras so/_/yang kun dga' bo la kun dga' ra ba na bya mang po ci'i phyir ca co'i skad 'byin ces dris na/_bya mang po zas gtod pa'i phyir ro zhes smras so/_/btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas ma yang shi bar gyur pas de dang sbyar na thams cad shes pa ma yin no/_/bkra mi 
[\[119b.7\]]shis te shin tu sdig pa can yin no/_/der cis mngon zhe na/_btsas ma thag tu ma yang shi'o/_/yang gcig tu na sri zhus pha la rim gro byed pa'i rigs na/_rim gro mi byed par ri la langs te song ba las drin mi shes pa yin no/_/yab rgyal pos btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]blangs pa las chung ma'i tshul du ma byas te/_btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mo sdug bsngal chen po myong bar byas pas drin mi shes shing drin mi dran pa yin no/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma'i 'khor ni bzang ngan med de slob ma lnga brgya po yang so so nas nga ni mchog yin no/_/
[\[120a.2\]]zhes zer te/_mkhan po la yang chos lugs med pas slob ma la yang chos lugs sam spyod pa'i las med do/_/chung ngu na stan 'dings pa'i mi dge slong tha bye'u lta bu yang nga ni kun gyi mchog yin no zhes zer/_yid gzhungs shing shes rab che ba blo rno ba'i mchog shA ri'i 
[\[120a.3\]]bu lta bu yang de na yod/_shes rab rtul ba shes pa med pa dge slong phan thig de yang de la 'jug_/chung ngu na 'dod chags chung ba dge slong ma grags 'dzin yang de la 'jug_/mnyan du yod pa na sbrul 'tshong ma ma rung ma ud pa la'i mdog kyang de la 'jug_/chung ngu na shed ma bye ba 
[\[120a.4\]]shes pa med pa bus pa tsun da yang de la 'jug_/nang gi rgas 'khogs pa de su bar ta la zhes bya ba lo brgya nyi shu lon pa de yang de la 'jug_/rigs btsun pa che ba shAka rigs kyang de la 'jug_/mnyan du yod pa na nang gi rigs ngan phyag dar lung skyed pa yang de la 'jug ste/_
[\[120a.5\]]de bas na dge sbyong gau ta ma'i chos ni go 'dun bsdus pa bzang ngan med pa ste/_mchod par 'os pa'am/_bkur stir bya ba'i gnas ma yin no/_/dper na rlung chen po langs na shing lo ma 'am 'dab ma thams cad lhan cig 'phungs pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[120a.6\]]dper na bya mang po ni mis bor ba'i kha zas sam bar bur la 'du ba ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma'i 'khor yang de dang 'dra ste/_rnyed rnyed len cing za'o/_/de bas na khyed rnams ci'i phyir/_dge sbyong gau ta ma la mchod pa bya bar sems zhes bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na mi mang pos de skad 
[\[120a.7\]]smras pa thos kyang /_dper na sa chen po bskyod du med pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa la skom pas gdungs pa tsam du mos shing 'dud pa'i sems ma nur to/_/'khor mang po rnams su mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gis smras pa'i tshig gis sems phyir ma nur ba ni ji ltar 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]rdo rje ltar brtan par gyur te/_skyed bri med pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos shing dad pas zhag bdun lon nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam nas slar 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs te/_lha'i 'khor grangs med pa brgya 
[\[120b.2\]]stong gis bskor cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis kun tu snang la gsal bar byas nas lha'i rol mo tshad med pa brgya snyed kyis mchod pa nas/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[120b.3\]]chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du thams cad 'dus te phyag 'tshal nas mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po ud tra yan yang 'khor dang bcas te/_rgyang ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa bsu nas mgo bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[120b.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug kyang phyogs gcig tu 'dus nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/bdag cag gi byur zhes bya ba 'dir 'ongs te/_mi mang po'i nang du de skad ces bsgrags kyang yid ches la ma phan pas/_da ni bdag 
[\[120b.5\]]cag gis lha dang mi'i tshogs pa'i nang du bsgrags na bye brag ma phyed do snyam bsams so/_/de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gis de snyam bsams nas 'khor brgya stong snyed dang mdun gyis byas te/_'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod 
[\[120b.6\]]do/_/de'i tshe na dri za'i bu chos kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pi bang thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bar 'ongs te zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas glu dang bcas pa'i rol mo byas 
[\[120b.7\]]nas rol mo'i sgra skad shin tu snyan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par gyur te/_nyan thos shA ri'i bu la sogs pa ma tshor bar lus bskyod cing g.yos te gar byas par gyur/_ri rab lhun po yang 'gul zhing g.yos par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus pi bang gi sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu grags shing /_pi bang gi sgra de las sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[121a.2\]]mi gtsang ba dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/_sems can thams cad kyis rol mo'i sgra de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i drin gzo ba dang /_drin lan bsab pa dang /_bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du pha ma la sri zhu bya ba'i sgra grag par gyur to/_/
[\[121a.3\]]sgra de thos pa'i sems can thams cad 'dzam bu'i gling du sangs rgyas ga na ba der lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa la 'khor mang po rnams mig mi 'dzums par de bzhin 
[\[121a.4\]]gshegs pa la blta zhing cang mi smra bar 'khod pa las/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan grangs med pas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong gis btags pa/_rlung gis bskyod na shin tu 
[\[121a.5\]]sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/_sa'i nang nas byung ba nam mkha' la 'phags te gnas so/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po thams cad rin po che'i mchod rten sa las byung ba de la the tshom du gyur te/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis rin po che'i mchod rten 'di lta bu sa las byung snyam 
[\[121a.6\]]the tshom du gyur te/_shA ri'i bu la sogs pa'i shes pa'i blos gtugs te brtags kyang ma rtogs/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyid na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i bar du yang ma rtogs so/_/de nas mu stegs can gyi ston 
[\[121a.7\]]pa drug 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis rin po che'i mchod rten 'di lta bu byung bar gyur pa/_mi gzhan zhig gis gal te bdag cag la dris la/_ci de dag gis ma shes na thams cad mthong zhing shes pa zhes kyang ji skad bya/_da dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]mas 'khor mang po la myur du bstan cing bshad na ci ma rung snyam par sems par gyur te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang /_seng ge'i khri bshams te lha rdzas kyi gos bting ngo /_/de nas 
[\[121b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la ji ltar ri rab lhun po rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa bzhin skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'khor mang po the tsom du gyur pa yang sems kyis shes/_bdag kyang the tsom du gyur te/_ma 
[\[121b.3\]]rtogs pas stan las langs nas sangs rgyas gang na bar logs su zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis rin po che'i mchod rten 'di lta bu byung bar gyur ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[121b.4\]]chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga sngon 'das pa bskal pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[121b.5\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas so so'i skye bo grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten 
[\[121b.6\]]par byas so/_/sangs rgyas de mya ngan las 'das nas gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'i rgyal po chen po de mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan zhing rtag tu drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'tsho ste/_mi rnams kyang bde skyid/_
[\[121b.7\]]rgyal po chen po de rgyal phran drug cu la dbang bsgyur te/_grong khyer brgyad brgya yod kyang rgyal po la sras med do/_/de ltar sras med pas 'jig rten gyi lha dang /_lha thams cad la lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi ngal mi skyo bar mchod 'brang byas pas btsun mo chen mo la sras shig mnga' 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bar gyur te/_zla ba bcu tshang nas sras bu gcig bltam mo/_/sras bu de yang sdug cing mdzes la mtshan phun sum tshogs pa gcig btsas ma thag tu blon po chen po rnams dang /_mtha'i rgyal po rgyal phran kun bsdus te rgyal bu'i mtshan bltas nas rgyal bu rang bzhin 
[\[122a.2\]]gyis khro mi shes shing dge ba zhig ste/_mtshan yang rgyal bu bzod pa zhes btags so/_/rgyal bu bzod pa de cher skyes nas sbyin pa sbyin pa la dga' zhing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan te/_sems can mang po la snying rje'i sems cher skyes so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po chen po de la blon po 
[\[122a.3\]]chen po rang bzhin gyis khro ba/_g.yo dang sgyus 'tsho ba/_nyes pa med par stabs las gcod pa kun gyis mi 'dod cing snying du mi sdug pa drug zhig yod do/_/blon po chen po drug po de dag bdag gi lus la skyon yod par shes nas rtag tu phrag dog byed do/_/rgyal bu de 
[\[122a.4\]]la mi dga'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po nad tshabs chen pos btab nas nad kyis gzir te/_nyam chung zhing rid par gyur pas srog la bab tu nye ba dang /_rgyal bu bzod pas blon po rnams la yab rgyal po snyun tshabs che'am/_sku tshe'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ram zhes dris na/_
[\[122a.5\]]blon po rnams khros te rgyal bu la rgyal po'i sku tshe ring po mi thogs so zhes smras so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman bzang po mi rnyed pas de bas na sku tshe yang ring po mi thogs so/_/rgyal bus de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu mi dga' ba'i sems su gyur te/_'khams 
[\[122a.6\]]nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_blon po chen po drug po gnas dben par song nas 'di skad ces bgros so/_/rgyal bu bzod pa 'di med par ma byas na bdag cag nam du yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro snyam bsams shing bgros pa las/_blon po gcig gis smras pa/_rgyal bu 'di la nyes 
[\[122a.7\]]pa ye med na ji ltar med par bya/_blon po gcig gis smras pa/_bdag la rgyal bu med par bya ba'i thabs yod do zhes smras nas rgyal bu gang na ba der song nas rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis mtha'i rgyal phran drug cu'i yul dang /_grong khyer brgyad 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]brgya'i nang du sman btsal yang rnyed par ma gyur to/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_rgyal po'i sman du ci zhig dgos na de ltar mi rnyed ces bsgo ba dang /_blon pos smras pa/_rgyal bu mkhyen tam/_rgyal po'i sman du gces pa ni thog ma btsas nas tha ma skyes kyi bar du khro mi shes pa'i mi'i
