[\[162b.1\]]bsab pa'i mdo las snying rje'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//_//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/_bam po drug pa/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas mchod pa dang rim gro byas/_bkur sti dang phu dud 
[\[162b.2\]]du byas/_bsngags shing bstod nas 'khod do/_/de nas kun dga' bos 'khor mang po'i the tsom sems kyis rtogs nas stan las langs nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'gags pa lta bu ma rabs rigs ngan pa yang rab tu 'byung du gnang 
[\[162b.3\]]ma 'gags pa rab tu byung bas rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs thams cad kyi dad pa dang gus pa'i sems nyams par gyur to/_/de ltar dad pa'i sems nyams pas bsod nams kyi dngos po yongs su nyams par gyur/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras dge slong dga' bos kyang brnyas pa'i sems 
[\[162b.4\]]skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed rnams legs par nyon cig_/khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam snyoms pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[162b.5\]]gsum dang /_ye shes lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin med do zhes smras kyang sla'i/_/dge slong ma 'gags pa 'di yang dag par ma rabs rigs ngan yin zhe'am/_spyod pa tha ma'am/_smon lam tha ma'am/_brtson 'grus tha ma yin no zhes byar rung ngam/_khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[162b.6\]]pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/mi rtag pa'o/_/'gyur zhing 'pho ba'o zhes byas kyang sla'i/_dge slong ma 'gags pa ma rabs rigs ngan las rab tu byung ba yin no zhes bya bar mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa bden pa'i tshig 
[\[162b.7\]]gsung bas khyed rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid ches par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes pa gzigs shing mkhyen pas rang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_dge slong ma 'gags pa lta bu rab tu byung bas rig pa gsum dang /_mngon 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]par shes pa drug dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan te/_lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i gnas su gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos srung zhing 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog dam par gyur te/_thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas su gyur pas na so so'i skye bo dag kyang 'bras bu dam pa 
[\[163a.2\]]gsum thob par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_da ltar gyi 'bras bu thob pa dang /_skye ba'i 'bras bu dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed de/_de bas na ma 'gags pa ni spyod pa mchog dam pa dang ldan te/_phyogs gcig tu snying rje che ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus 
[\[163a.3\]]na yang sangs rgyas grangs med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed la bsnyen bkur byas nas sangs rgyas de dag gi chos la yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog byas/_da ltar sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos la yang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong dga' bos 
[\[163a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas 'dug pa las langs te/_mgo bos 'phags pa kauN+Di n+ya'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_mthar gyis ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin nas thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa tsam byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal 
[\[163a.5\]]pa/_dga' bo khyod ni shes par byos/_/dbul zhing sdug par 'gyur ba'am/_/che btsan nyams par mi 'gyur gyi/_/rab tu byung ba'i chos nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar dga' bo la bstan pa dang /_gzengs bstod pa dang /_dga' ba'i chos rnam pa du ma gsungs nas 
[\[163a.6\]]dga' bo rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_gos tshags bcos nas 'phags pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba dang /_de ma thag tu gnam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/lus dang sems mnyen zhing las su rung bar gyur te/_bdag gi don rab tu rnyed cing 
[\[163a.7\]]bya ba byas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la khyod kyis myur du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig_/'di lta ste/_dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi dang /_khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba'i 'khor bdun gyi khyad par dang /_de dag gi skyabs su 'gro 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ba gsum dang /_gtan khrims lnga nas tshul khrims thams cad kyi bar du sems can la phan pa'i tshul khrims dang /_nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i tshul khrims dang /_spyod lam gyis gdul ba'i tshul khrims dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bstan 
[\[163b.2\]]te dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyas par byos shig_/de nas ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bdag la byin gyis brlabs na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig zhu'o/_/gsol pa/_dkon 
[\[163b.3\]]mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba gang lags/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba dkon mchog gsum la mtshan nyid ma mchis na ci'i slad du chos dang dge 'dun bye brag dang khyad par mchis shing /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ji ltar gzungs su gzung /_skyabs su 
[\[163b.4\]]mchi ba gsum gal te gcig lags na gsum zhes gsung ba yang mi rigs/_gal te skyabs su mchi ba gsum du gsungs na/_ci'i slad du 'khor rnam pa bdun mchis par gsungs/_bcom ldan 'das ci la skyabs su mchi na skyabs su mchi ba zhes bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[163b.5\]]'das kyis don de dag so so nas rnam par bkrol te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni tshor ba ste/_chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon sum du tshor ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni khams gsum na rgyun du gnyid kyis myos te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[163b.6\]]ni byang chub kyi spyan bye bas na bdag kyang tshor la pha rol po yang tshor bar byed pas tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la thabs thob pa thams cad gsungs pa'o/_/gsol ba ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis thams cad gsungs pa zhes bgyi ba lags/_'on te dus tshod las 
[\[163b.7\]]ma yol bar dbang po ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du gsungs pa la bgyi ba'am/_'on te so so'i sde tha dad pa bzhin du rjes su gsungs pa la bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas ni dbang po ji bzhin dus las mi yol bar chos thams cad gsungs na phyis nye gnas rnams kyis 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]chos kyi sde snod bsdus pa'i tshe sde sde'i bag la bstan to/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni skabs kha cig tu nye gnas rnams la/_tshul khrims lci ba dang /_yang ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_ltung ba med pa bcas te 'dul ba'i sde snod du phye'o/_/skabs kha cig tu ni rgyu dang 'bras 
[\[164a.2\]]bu'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa skye bas las kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te chos mngon pa'i sde snod phye'o/_/lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du bcas pa la ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan cing gsungs pa ni gzhung gcig nas 'phros pa zhes bya ste/_'dul ba'i 
[\[164a.3\]]skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyis spyod pa'i las su gsungs so/_/sems can dbang po rnon po rnams la don zab mo rnam pa mang po gsungs pa ni gzhung bar ma zhes bya ste/_slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so/_/bsam gtan gyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[164a.4\]]gsungs pa ni gzhung sil bu zhes bya ste/_gang zag bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so/_/mu stegs can mang po gzhig pa'i don du gzhung ring po gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa la gnas na mdo sde las sangs 
[\[164a.5\]]rgyas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du bzhugs te/_shing de'i yal ga gcig gi 'dab ma las bzung nas nye gnas rnams la yal ga bzung ba 'di'i 'dab ma mang ngam/_shing ljon pa chen po'i 'dab ma mang zhes bka' stsal nas shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma mang ngo zhes gsol pa las sangs rgyas 
[\[164a.6\]]kyis kyang ngas mkhyen pa'i chos ni shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o/_/ngas bshad pa'i chos ni lag pas bzung ba'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs na sangs rgyas ni thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bgyir rung ngam/_bka' stsal pa/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa thams cad kyi thams cad dang /_
[\[164a.7\]]mtshan nyid gcig pa thams cad kyi thams cad yod do/_/'dir ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i thams cad la dgongs te sangs rgyas ni thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bshad do/_/de yang sems can gyi zad par gzung mi nus pa la bya'i/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs mi nus pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa la yang thams cad gsungs pa zhes bya'i/_drang thabs su thams cad gsungs pa zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/gsol pa/_gal te sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pas gsungs pa lags na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyang shes pa la brten te smra na ci'i 
[\[164b.2\]]slad du de la yang sangs rgyas zhes ming gdags/_bka' stsal pa/_de lta bu ma yin te sangs rgyas ni mkhyen pa dang gsungs pa gnyi ga'i mthar phyin to/_/theg pa gnyis kyi shes pa dang smra ba ni chos kyi mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad chub par 
[\[164b.3\]]mkhyen pas ming btags pa yang mkhyen gyi/_theg pa gnyis kyis de ltar mi nus so/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas ni chos brnyes pa yang mtha' yas la chos gsungs pa yang mtha' yas te/_theg pa gnyis kyis de ltar mi nus so/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i thun mong 
[\[164b.4\]]ni theg pa gnyis kyis thob pa dang thun mong ba yang yod/_nyan thos kyis thob pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa yang yod do/_/theg pa gsum gyi shes pa thun mong ni theg pa 'bring gis thob/_theg pa gnyis kyi shes pa thun mong ni sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gis brnyes te theg pa gnyis 
[\[164b.5\]]kyis mi shes pa yang sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen to/_/gzhan yang ji tsam du sgrom che na kha gab kyang che ste/_chos che na mtshan nyid kyang mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas ni mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' yas pa'i chos gsungs te/_theg pa gnyis kyi ye shes ni mtha' 
[\[164b.6\]]yod pas chos kyi mtshan nyid ces mi gdags so/_/gzhan yang dbang po dang don du ldan te/_dbang po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/_/don zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo/_/dbang po'i don zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang don 
[\[164b.7\]]gnyi ga rdzogs te/_shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos kyang mthar ma phyin pa med do/_/theg pa gnyis kyis ni dbang po dang don gnyi ga ma rdzogs so/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]brnyes pa yin no/_/theg pa gnyis kyis ni chos kyi gting chub par mi shes pas yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar mi rung ste/_de ltar don rnam pa mang po'i sgo nas theg pa gnyis la sangs rgyas zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni tshig dang sgra'i sgo 
[\[165a.2\]]nas gdags su mi rung gi_/don gyi sgo nas btags pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/_de yang gnyen po'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i sgra skad mi 'thun pas 'jig rten pa rang gis mi shes par zad kyi/_sangs rgyas kyis ni kun mkhyen 
[\[165a.3\]]pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong rtsib logs can bya ba'i gzhung las theg pa gnyis dang so so'i skye bo dag ni kha cig dben zhing zhi ba la dad pa yang yod/_kha cig ni bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la dad pa yang yod/_kha cig ni rkyen gzhan gyis gsang 
[\[165a.4\]]mkhyud de mi ston pa yang yod mod kyi/_sangs rgyas brnyes pa'i chos ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mthur ldan pas gzhan la ston cing gsung bar spro'o/_/gzhan du na gdug pa gsum bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_theg pa gnyis kyang gdug pa 
[\[165a.5\]]gsum bcom na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das zhes mi gdags bka' stsal pa/_de lta ma yin te/_theg pa gnyis ni phyir ldog pa yod kyi/_sangs rgyas la ni phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/phyir ldog pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/_'bras bu phyir ldog pa dang /_'bras bu 
[\[165a.6\]]ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa dang /_spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa'o/_/'bras bu phyir ldog ces bya ba ni nyan thos kyi 'bras bu gsum phyir ldog par zad kyi/_'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog pa dang /_theg pa bar ma la rnam pa gnyis te/_gal te bskal pa brgya'i bar du rnal 'byor 
[\[165a.7\]]spyod pa'i rang sangs rgyas ni 'bras bu phyir mi ldog go/_/gal te thog ma nas theg pa chung ngu'i 'bras bu gsum las rang sangs rgyas su gyur na de'i 'bras bu ni phyir ldog par 'gyur gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni phyir mi ldog go/_/'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa ni gal te 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]theg pa gsum la phyogs pa'i gang zag 'bras bu ma thob par phyir ldog pa dang /_dge slong rnal 'byor can le lo byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus med pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa la nyams te mi brtson pa 'di gsum ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/spyod pa'i 
[\[165b.2\]]las phyir ldog ces bya ba ni ci tsam du thob par bya ba'i chos mngon sum du las su mi rung ba'o/_/dper na sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang /_theg pa chung ngu'i ye shes bcu lta bu gcig la las su byas kyi lhag ma gzhan mi dgos pa'am/_mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa 'bum 
[\[165b.3\]]kha ton du shes pa las gal te kha ton du ma byas pa'i dus na de kun la spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o/_/theg pa chung ngu la yang 'bras bu phyir mi ldog pa yod/_theg pa bar ma la yang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa yod kyi/_sangs rgyas la ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i 
[\[165b.4\]]phyir ldog pa med do/_/de yang chos thams cad la brtson 'grus ma byas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/theg pa gnyis la ni spyod pa las phyir ldog pa yod kyi/_sangs rgyas la ni gcig tu ma nges te/_stobs bcu las gcig las su byas pas chog gi dgu las su bya mi dgos pas ldog pa 
[\[165b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/yang gzhan du na las su bya ba la/_mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de/_dper na mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa khri phrag nyi shu kha ton du 'don shes na gang zag ni mthu zhen pas nyin zhag gcig gam/_nyin zhag gnyis kyi bar du rdzogs par 'don nus kyi/_sangs 
[\[165b.6\]]rgyas ni skad cig tsam gyis rdzogs pas stobs bcu yang de dang 'dra ste/_las su bya dgos na skad cig tsam gyis mdzad pa tshad med pas las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med do/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas la las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de/_dper 
[\[165b.7\]]na na bza' smad g.yogs gsol ba'i tshe so so'i skye bo'i chos lta bur gzhung med par gsol ba ni ma yin te/_de yang sems can mang po la phan pa'i don du phrin las ci mdzad kyang phan pa yod na las de mdzad kyi/_phan pa med na las de mi mdzad do/_/de ltar las su bya ba la 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med kyi/_so so nas dgos pa yod de gcig tu ma nges pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_nyan thos la ci'i slad du 'bras bu gsum ni phyir ldog la/_'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog pa 
[\[166a.2\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'bras bu gsum ni sngon yang thob pas na phyir ldog go/_/'bras bu tha ma ni da dung ma thob pas na phyir mi ldog go/_/dper na gang zag bkren pa zhig kha zas zhim po dang phrad na yun ring por mi brjed pa ltar don 'di yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan yang 'bras 
[\[166a.3\]]bu tha ma ni bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i lam du 'gyur la ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu gsum ni ye shes thogs pa med pa'i lam du ma gyur la ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du ma gyur pa'i phyir phyir ldog go/_/gzhan yang bden pa mthong ba'i lam ni phyir 
[\[166a.4\]]mi ldog gi_/bsam pa'i lam ni phyir ldog ste/_dag pa dang ma dag pa'i 'du shes kyis nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcad pa'i phyir ro/_/sems pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa yod kyi/_bden pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa med de/_bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[166a.5\]]pa med cing bden pa mthong bas/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mthong la don mthong bas don zab mo sems pa yang skye ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa phyir mi ldog go/_/gzhan yang bden pa mthong ba'i ye shes kyi stobs che ba ni dper na sdong po chen pos rdzas mnan pa dang 'dra ste/_
[\[166a.6\]]sems shing yid la byed pa'i shes rab zhan pas phyir ldog pa yod do/_/gzhan yang bden pa mthong bar 'dod pa'i khams kyi bzod pa dang /_shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni dgu pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcod do/_/khams gong ma'i bzod pa dang shes rab 
[\[166a.7\]]kyi sems gnyis kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis gcod do/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mthar phyin pas phyir ldog pa med do/_/don de lta bas na de 'ba' zhig la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas la ni bag chags kyi rnam 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]pa med kyi/_theg pa gnyi ga yi ni bag chags ma zad do/_/dper na dge slong rtag tu bldad pa zhes bya ba rtag par ba lang ltar bldad pa yang tshe rabs snga ma la tshe rabs du mar ba lang byed byed pa las mir skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/dper na dge slong zhig zag pa zad kyang rtag tu me long la 
[\[166b.2\]]blta ba ni tshe rabs du mar bud med sbrul 'tshong ma las mir skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/dper na dge slong zhig khri dang gdang la 'dzeg par dga' ba yang tshe rabs du mar spre'u byed byed pa las mir skyes te/_de dag la ni bcom ldan 'das zhes byar mi rung ngo /_/gsol pa/_'di skad 
[\[166b.3\]]bdag gis thos zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i tshe bdag gis thos zhes gsungs sam/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu thos zhes gsungs/_chos kyi mdzod bsdus pa'i tshig las bdag gis thos zhes bya na sangs rgyas shing bstan pa yang bdag la ma 
[\[166b.4\]]lus par bstan cing bshad par gsol lo zhes ma smras sam/_gsol pa/_lo nyi shu'i bar du chos kyi tshig ci bshad pa de ji ltar bstan par bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis kyang chos grangs med pa ston la/_chos 
[\[166b.5\]]grangs med pa'i don yang tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ston te/_sangs rgyas kyi mdo tsam zhig bstan na yang kun dga' bos ma lus par shes pa ni rno ba'i shes rab kyis gzungs su 'dzin pa'i stobs che ba'i phyir ro/_/chos brgyad khri yod ces bya ba ni dper na shing gi rtsa ba dang /_
[\[166b.6\]]yal ga dang /_lcug ma dang /_'dab ma la spyir sdong po gcig ces bya ba ltar/_sangs rgyas kyi sems can gyi don du thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du chos bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste/_de ltar na brgyad khri'o/_/gzhan du na sangs rgyas gdan gcig las ma g.yos par lo nyi shu'i 
[\[166b.7\]]bar du chos bshad kyang kun dga' bos ma thos na ci'i slad du bdag gis thos zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_lha rnams kyis kun dga' bo la smras zhes kyang bya/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun rdzob 'jig rten pa'i thugs kyis kun dga' bos shes par byas zhes 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kyang bya/_gzhan du na dge slong rnams la chos zhes kyang bya'o/_/gzhan yang kun dga' bos 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la gsol ba btab bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi na bza' rnying pa bdag la mi stsal cing yon bdag gi bsod snyoms bdag la mi stsal bar gsol to/_/
[\[167a.2\]]bdag ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la phu dud dang rim gro bgyid de/_ci bzhed pa sbyor gyi gos dang zas kyi phyir ma yin no/_/dge slong gzhan rnams ni snga dro dang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_sangs rgyas mthong gi_/bdag ni nam lta 'dod pa na mthong bar gsol lo/_/gzhan yang lo nyi 
[\[167a.3\]]shu'i bar du chos gsungs/_chos bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste/_de ltar na brgyad khri'o/_/yang gzhan du na yi ge'i tsheg bar bcu drug la tshigs su bcad pa phyed do/_/yi ge'i tsheg bar sum cu rtsa gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ces bya ste/_de ltar brgyad khri'o/_/
[\[167a.4\]]yang gzhan du na tshigs bcad kyi rkang pa ring thung las yi ge'i tsheg bar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste/_de ltar na brgyad khri'o/_/yang gzhan du na zla ba phyed phyed cing tshul khrims bstan pa la sde snod gcig ces bya ste/_de ltar na brgyad khri'o/_/yang gzhan 
[\[167a.5\]]du na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug khri drug stong la sde snod gcig ces bya ste/_de ltar na brgyad khri'o/_/yang gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa brgyad khri'i gnyen por chos kyi sman brgyad khrir gsungs pas chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri zhes bya'o/_/gsol 
[\[167a.6\]]pa ci'i slad du mdo sde dang chos mngon pa sangs rgyas kyis sngar ma smos la 'dul ba sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos bka' stsal pa/_mchog yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/dper na mdo sde lta bu ni nye gnas rnams kyis chos bstan pa yang yod/_/dper na brgya byin lha'i 
[\[167a.7\]]dbang po lta bu bdag ni sbyin pa byin pa'i nang na mchog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis sbyin pa byin pas lha'i dbang por gyur te bsam pa yid bzhin no zhes smras te/_sangs rgyas kyis kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yang yod/_dus kha cig tu sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]su sprul te/_sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos gsungs pa yang yod kyi/_'dul ba ni de lta bu ma yin te thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas de bas na sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos so/_/yang gzhan du na mdo sde ni gnas gang na bzhugs pa bzhin gsungs kyi/_'dul 
[\[167b.2\]]ba ni de lta bu ma yin te/_gnas gang na nyes pa byung na de nyid du khrims bca' ba ma yin gyi/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du bca' ba dang /_khyim pa'i nang na nyes pa byung na dge 'dun gyi nang du bca' ba dang /_grong khyer gcig tu nyes pa byung na yang dge 'dun gyi nang du bca' ba dang /_'khor rnam 
[\[167b.3\]]lnga'i nang du nyes pa byung na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i nang du bca' ba dgos pas de bas na sangs rgyas kyis sngar smos pa yin no/_/yangs pa can zhes bya ba ni yul kha cig ni rgyal po'i mtshan las btags pa yang yod/_/yul kha cig yul sa las btags pa yang yod/_kha cig 
[\[167b.4\]]ni grong khyer las btags pa yang yod/_yul 'di ni klu las yul gyi ming du btags so/_/ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhes bya ba ni bya las ming du btags te/_grong khyer zhes bya ba ni grong gi bdag po'i ming ngo /_/lha sbyin zhes bya ba yang de'i pha mas lha la gsol ba btab pas bu rnyed 
[\[167b.5\]]pas na lha sbyin zhes ming du btags so/_/btsan phyug ces bya ba ni phyug pa la rnam pa gnyis te/_sems can gyi bag dang /_sems can ma yin pa'i bag go/_/sems can ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gser dngul dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi bang mdzod dang /_nor dbyig dang /_
[\[167b.6\]]zhing dang /_khang khyim mang du yod pa'o/_/sems can zhes bya ba ni bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_bal glang dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_lug dang /_dbang byed pa'i grong khyim mang du yod pa ste/_de ni phyug po zhes bya'o/_/btsan zhes bya ba ni dbang dang 
[\[167b.7\]]ldan pa'am/_legs pa'i yon tan dang ldan te mi'o cog gis phu dud byed cing btsun par byed pas btsan zhes bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyogs shing skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnos pa'o/_/gsol pa skyabs su 'gro ba gsum gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu lags/_ston pa kha 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ni cho ga yin gyi cho ga la mtshan nyid med do/_/skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nod pa'i tshe pus mo btsugs la thal mo sbyar te/_skyabs su 'gro ba gsum kha nas tshig tu brjod pa ni lus dang ngag gi cho ga bstan pa'o/_/gal te sems rtse 
[\[168a.2\]]gcig tu byas nas lus dang ngag yod kyang cho gas bstan pa med de/_de ni cho ga bstan pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan du na skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi rang bzhin gsum zhes bya'o/_/yang gzhan du na skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ni phung po lnga dge ba 
[\[168a.3\]]ste/_sems can gyi phung po lnga dge bas gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/_dkon mchog gsum ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas so/_/skyabs su 'gro zhes bya ba ni mgon skyabs sam dpung gnyen gyi don te/_dper na mi zhig la nyes pa chen po byung ba las yul gzhan du 'phos pa 
[\[168a.4\]]las rgyal po pha rol po la phar skyabs su btsal na/_yul pha rol gyi rgyal pos de la khyod mi 'jigs pa 'dod na nga'i yul 'di nas mi 'gro zhing ngas bstan pa nyan na mgon skyabs bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang 'dra bar so so'i skye bo yang de dang 'dra ste/_bdud kyi dbang du gyur la skye shir 
[\[168a.5\]]'khor ba'i nyes pa yod pas dkon mchog gsum la phyogs te skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te dkon mchog gsum la rtse gcig tu phyogs shing skyabs su song la sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las 'gal bar ma byas na bdud kyi rgyal po sdig pa can gyis ci byar yang med do/_/sngon phug ron 
[\[168a.6\]]gcig khras nyen nas shA ri'i bu'i phag grib mar song ba las 'on kyang skrag cing dngang ba bzhin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i phag tu song ba las 'jigs pa med de 'dar ba yang med do/_/gal te rgya mtsho chen po 'pho zhing 'gyur yang srid kyi phug ron de ni bsgyur du med de/_de bas 
[\[168a.7\]]na sangs rgyas ni byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen por ldan gyi/_shA ri'i bu la ni byams pa dang snying rje chen po med do/_/sangs rgyas la ni bag chags med kyi/_shA ri'i bu la ni bag chags ma zad do/_/sangs rgyas ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dpa'i spyad pa spyod kyi/_shA ri'i bu ni bskal pa drug cu'i bar du dka' thub spyad de/_de bas na phug ron yang shA ri'i bu'i grib mar song ba na 'on kyang skrag cing 'jigs kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi grib mar song na 'jigs pa med par gyur to/_/gsol pa/_gal te dkon mchog gsum 
[\[168b.2\]]la skyabs su song bas sdig pa mi dge ba byang zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur na/_ci'i slad du lha sbyin lta bu dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bas dad pas khyim nas rab tu byung ste tshul khrims kyang rdzogs pa las/_mtshams med pa gsum bgyis nas mtshams med pa'i sems 
[\[168b.3\]]can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_mgon skyabs bya ba yang skyabs bya bar 'os pa la skyabs su bya ba yin te/_lha sbyin lta bu ni mi dge ba'i sdig pa chen po byas la gdon mi za bar myong ba'i las dang yang bcas pas de'i phyir yang mgon skyabs byar yang dka'o/_/
[\[168b.4\]]gsol pa/_gal te sdig pa chen po bgyis pa la sangs rgyas kyis mgon skyabs mi mdzad na sdig pa'i las ma mchis pa la sangs rgyas kyis mgon skyabs bgyi yang ci 'tshal/_dkon mchog gsum la mgon skyabs mnga'o zhes kyang ji skad bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_lha 
[\[168b.5\]]sbyin gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba yang yang dag pa'i sems kyis ma yin te skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ma rdzogs so/_/de ni rgyun du rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes can no zhes sangs rgyas la yang 
[\[168b.6\]]sngo bas na/_de'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mthu stobs chen po yod mod kyi mgon skyabs su mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na rgyal po ma skyes dgra lta bu la mtshams med pa'i sdig pa yod de/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar rigs pa las yang dag pa'i 
[\[168b.7\]]sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol bas mtshams med pa'i sdig pa byang nas/_thig nag po'i sems can dmyal bar lhung nas mi'i nang nas sdig pa lci ba myong bas lci ba dang 'dra bar zhag bdun myong ba tsam gyis sdig pa kun byang bas na de ni dkon mchog gsum 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gyi mgon skyabs kyi mthu zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_lha sbyin gyis sdig pa bgyis pa'i mgon skyabs byar mi rung ngo zhes bgyis pa mdo sde'i nang nas gang su yang rung sangs rgyas la skyabs su song na ngan song gsum du mi ltung ngo zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/_
[\[169a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_lha sbyin gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song bas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar song mod kyi sdug bsngal myong ba yang zhing chung la bsti ba'i dus skabs yod do/_/dper na mi zhig ri'am/_nags tshal lam/_'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa'i 
[\[169a.3\]]gnas su phyin pa las/_gal te sangs rgyas yid la byas shing bsams na de'i yon tan gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa zhi bar 'gyur te/_de bas na dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song na mgon skyabs su 'gyur ba yang mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/gsol pa/_dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba 
[\[169a.4\]]bden pa bzhi la bden pa gang gi nang du bsdu/_dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis la dbang po gang gi nang du bsdu/_khams bco brgyad la khams gang gi nang du bsdu/_skye mched bcu gnyis la skye mched gang gi nang du bsdu/_phung po lnga la phung po gang gi bsdu bar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_dkon 
[\[169a.5\]]mchog gsum ni bden pa bzhi la 'gog pa'i bden par bsdu ste/_lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go/_/dbang po ni mi shes pa kun shes par bya ba'i dbang por bsdu'o/_/khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi khams su 
[\[169a.6\]]bsdu'o/_/skye mched bcu gnyis la yid kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched kyi nang du bsdu'o/_/phung po lnga la zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i nang du bsdu'o/_/de la sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni bden pa bzhi la lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go/_/chos dkon mchog ni bden pa bzhi 
[\[169a.7\]]la 'gog pa'i bden par bsdu'o/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang bden pa bzhi la lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis la kun shes pa'i dbang por bsdu'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni 'gog pa'i bden pa yin pas 'dus ma byas pa ste dbang 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]pos bsdu ba ma yin no/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis la zag pa med pa'i dbang po gsum gyi nang du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la yid kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi khams kyi phyogs cha gcig 
[\[169b.2\]]gi nang du bsdu'o/_/skye mched bcu gnyis la yid kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la zag pa med pa phung po lnga'i phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la chos kyi khams kyi 
[\[169b.3\]]phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/skye mched bcu gnyis la chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni phung po lngar bsdus pa ma yin no/_/phung po lnga ni 'dus byas pas chos ni 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog ni khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[169b.4\]]brgyad la yid kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_chos kyi khams kyi phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/skye mched bcu gnyis la yid kyi skye mched dang chos kyi skye mched kyi phyogs cha gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/phung po lnga la zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga'i phyogs cha 
[\[169b.5\]]gcig gi nang du bsdu'o/_/gsol pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lam/_'on te dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo/_/ji lta zhe 
[\[169b.6\]]na sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku gcig tu 'thun pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas gcig la skyabs su song ba nyid sangs rgyas thams cad la skyabs su song ba ste/_sangs rgyas la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/yang gzhan du na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo zhes bgyi ba lha rnams las kha 
[\[169b.7\]]cig ni bdag sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nye gnas yin par smra/_kha cig ni bdag sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nye gnas yin par smra ste/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas bdun char la yang so so nas bdag ni sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas yin zhes smra bas de bas na sangs rgyas gcig la nga skyabs 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]su gsol bar 'os kyi dus gsum mi rigs so/_/gzhan yang de ltar mi rung ngo zhes smra ba yang yod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dper na rnam thos kyi bus dris pa'i mdo las rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol ba ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa 
[\[170a.2\]]dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol lo zhes gsungs te/_don de dang sbyar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su gsol bar mngon no/_/gsol pa/_gal te de lta bu lags na lha'i bu dag so so nas bdag ni sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas 
[\[170a.3\]]lags so zhes bgyi ba'i don ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bus smras pa la don nges par chad pa yang ci yod/_lha'i bu kha cig ni sangs rgyas gcig la skyabs su 'gro ba yang yod/_kha cig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yang yod de/_mdor na sangs rgyas 
[\[170a.4\]]gcig la bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ci la skyabs su mchis na ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi 'khor lo ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa slob pa med pa'i yon tan la skyabs su song ba'o/_/gsol pa/_gzugs 
[\[170a.5\]]kyi sku la skyabs su mchi'am/_chos kyi sku la skyabs su mchi/_bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi sku la skyabs su 'gro'i gzugs kyi sku la skyabs su 'gro ba ma yin te/_gzugs sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_gzugs kyi sku sangs rgyas ma lags na ci'i slad du 
[\[170a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku la khrag phyung bas mtshams ma mchis pa'i las bgyis par 'gyur/_/bka' stsal pa/_gzugs kyi sku ni chos kyi sku'i snod yin te/_chos kyi sku'i gnas so/_/de bas na gzugs kyi sku la gnod pa byas pas mtshams med pa'i las su 'gyur gyi/_gzugs 
[\[170a.7\]]kyi sku sangs rgyas yin pas mtshams med pa'i las su 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_ci la skyabs su mchi na chos la skyabs su mchi ba zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi 'khor lo ste/_'dod pa dang /_'dod pa med pa'i mthar phyin 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]cing mya ngan las 'das pa la skyabs su song ba ni chos la skyabs su song ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bdag gi lus mthar phyin pa la skyabs su mchi'am/_gzhan gyi lus mthar phyin pa la skyabs su mchi/_bka' stsal pa/_bdag gi lus mthar phyin pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[170b.2\]]gyi lus mthar phyin pa la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos la skyabs su song ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar na dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_skyabs su 'gro ba ni ngag gi 'khor lo ste/_bsod nams kyi zhing slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i nyan thos kyi yon tan 
[\[170b.3\]]la skyabs su 'gro ba ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'am/_don dam pa'i bden pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi/_gal te don dam pa'i bden pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi na ni sngon sangs rgyas 
[\[170b.4\]]kyis de wi dang /_pa ri la skyabs su 'gro ba gsum phog pa'i tshe/_phyis dge 'dun zhes bya ba yod par 'gyur gyis de la skyabs su song shig ces gsung ba'i mi rigs te don dam pa'i bden pa'i dge 'dun ni rtag tu 'jig rten na mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i 
[\[170b.5\]]dge 'dun ni don dam pa'i dge 'dun gyi rten pa'i gnas yin pas na phyis dge 'dun yod par 'gyur gyis de la skyabs su song shig ces gsungs pa yin no/_/yang gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dge 'dun la bkur zhing btsun par bya ba'i phyir yang de skad ces gsungs te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[170b.6\]]kyis ni 'khor thams cad kyi nang na dge 'dun ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor mchog go/_/dper na 'o ma las zho 'byung la/_zho las mar 'byung mar las mar gyi snying po 'byung ste/_mar gyi snying po ni mchog rab gya nom pa dang 'dra ste/_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dge 'dun yang de dang 'dra ste/_nye 
[\[170b.7\]]gnas dge 'dun yod na de'i nang na 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'bras bu bzhi thob pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yod pas na 'khor rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi nang na dge 'dun ni gya nom pa/_mchog rab dpe zla med pa ste/_de bas na phyis dge 'dun yod par 'gyur gyis skyabs su 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]song shig ces gsungs pa la don dang 'gal ba med do/_/gsol pa/_sangs rgyas nyid chos lags la/_chos nyid kyang dge 'dun lags te/_dge 'dun nyid kyang chos lags pas yang dag par na chos gcig tu bas na khyad par ram bye brag ci mchis/_
[\[171a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos de dag mchis mod kyi don gyi sgo nas bye brag yod do/_/dkon mchog gsum zhes bya ba bstan pa med par ye shes chen po dang /_slob pa med pa'i sa non te/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/'gog pa'i bden 
[\[171a.3\]]pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa ni chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi slob pa dang /_mi slob pa'i yon tan dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/chos kyi sgo nas dbye na bstan pa med pa dang /_bslab pa med pa'i chos ni sangs rgyas 
[\[171a.4\]]dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_slob pa yang ma yin/_mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos ni chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi slob pa dang /_mi slob pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/_/dbang po'i sgo 
[\[171a.5\]]nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o/_/chos ni dbang po'i chos ma yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun ni zag pa med pa'i dbang po gsum mo/_/bden pa'i sgo nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go/_/chos ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'o/_/dge 
[\[171a.6\]]'dun yang lam gyi bden pa'i phyogs cha gcig go/_/dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni dge sbyong ngo /_/chos ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'o/_/dge 'dun ni dge sbyong ngo /_/chos dkon mchog ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu'o/_/bram ze'i sgo nas dbye na sangs 
[\[171a.7\]]rgyas ni bram ze'o/_/chos ni bram ze'i 'bras bu'o/_/dge 'dun ni bram ze'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni bram ze'i 'bras bu'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i sgo nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni tshangs par spyod pa'o/_/chos ni tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/dge 'dun ni tshangs 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]par spyod pa'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni rgyu'o/_/chos ni 'bras bu'o/_/dge 'dun ni rgyu'o/_/chos dkon mchog ni 'bras bu'o/_/lam dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbye na sangs rgyas ni 
[\[171b.2\]]lam mo/_/chos ni 'bras bu'o/_/dge 'dun ni lam mo/_/chos dkon mchog ni 'bras bu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ston pa ni chos yin te/_chos las sangs rgyas skyes pas na chos ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin te/_sangs rgyas ni chos la gnas so/_/gsol pa/_sangs 
[\[171b.3\]]rgyas kyi ston pa chos lags na ci'i slad du dkon mchog gsum la chos sngar mi smos/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyis ston pa chos yin mod kyi chos kyang sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan gyis mi ston te/_lam zhes bya ba yang mis bsgrub dgos pas de bas na sangs rgyas sngar 
[\[171b.4\]]smos so/_/de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol ba mnod pa'i tshe/_sngar chos dkon mchog smos la/_phyis sangs rgyas dkon mchog smos na gsum la skyabs su mchi bar 
[\[171b.5\]]rung ngam/_bka' stsal pa/_rtogs shing shes pa med na [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]nor na yang nyes pa med de skyabs su 'gro bar chud do/_/gal te shes bzhin du ched du nor bar smras na nyes pa dang bcas la gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar yang mi chud do/_/gsol pa/_sangs rgyas dang chos 
[\[171b.6\]]smos la dge 'dun ma smos na skyabs su mchi ba gsum du rung ngam/_gal te chos dang dge 'dun smos la sangs rgyas ma smos na skyabs su mchi bar rung ngam/_gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun smos la chos ma smos na gsum la skyabs su mchi bar chud dam/_bka' stsal pa/_de gang 
[\[171b.7\]]yang mi rung ste mi chud do/_/gsol pa/_gsum la skyabs su ma mchis par tshul khrims lnga thob par rung ngam/_gal te gsum la skyabs su ma mchis par yang yan lag brgyad kyi tshul khrims thob par rung ngam/_gal te gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ma mchis par tshul khrims bcu 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]thob par rung ngam/_zhu ba dang gsol ba bzhi'i las ma bgyis par tshul khrims rdzogs par mnod du rung ngam/_bka' stsal pa/_de dag gang yang mi rung ngo /_/gal te tshul khrims lnga nod na sngar gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/gsum la 
[\[172a.2\]]skyabs su song ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga thob par 'gyur te/_de nas khrims lnga gang yin pa brjod de/_pha rol pos khrims lnga'i ming shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gsol pa dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas nas tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de'i 'og tu gnas bzhi 
[\[172a.3\]]dang /_rtsa ba bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum shes shing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brjod cing bstan par bya'o/_/yang gzhan du na skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas srog mi gcod pa'i khrims bstan na khrims thob par 'gyur te/_de bas na khrims gcig bshad pas 
[\[172a.4\]]khrims lnga thob ces bya ste/_gal te khrims gcig thub na khrims lnga char thub ces bya'o/_/yang gzhan du na khrims lnga gcig la gcig 'brel pa yang yin la thog ma nas khrims lnga mnod par dam bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/yang gzhan du na khrims lnga ni mnos pa'i 'og tu 
[\[172a.5\]]khrims thob bo/_/ston pa kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba gsum byas nas khrims lnga thob ces bya ba ni don bden pa ste/_ji ltar gsol pa dang /_zhu ba'i las byas pa bzhin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod pa dang /_khrims bcu nod pa dang /_khrims lnga nod pa 
[\[172a.6\]]bshad pa bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_gal te sngar gsum la skyabs su mchis te/_dge bsnyen du gyur pa slad kyis gal te khrims lnga nod dam/_khrims bcu nod kyang rung /_skyabs su mchi ba gdod bgyi 'tshal lam/_bka' stsal pa/_skyabs su 'gro ba gsum ma 
[\[172a.7\]]byas kyang sngar gsum la skyabs su song bas tshul khrims kun thob bo/_/gsol pa/_gal te gsum la skyabs su mchi ba yang bgyis/_gsol pa dang zhu ba'i las kyang ma bgyis na khrims thob par 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_khrims lnga dang /_yan lag brgyad pa'i 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]khrims dang /_khrims bcu nod pa gsum la skyabs su song nas khrims 'thob bo/_/gal te tshul khrims rdzogs par mnod pa ni gsol ba dang /_zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur gyi gsum la skyabs su song bas ni ma yin no/_/tshul khrims rdzogs 
[\[172b.2\]]par mnod pa ni de'i yon tan dang bsod nams che bas na las cung zad tsam mam/_rkyen cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub par mi 'gyur bas de bas na skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /_dge 'dun bcu'i nang du gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[172b.3\]]khrims lnga dang /_yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims dang /_khrims bcu ni yon tan dang mthu de tsam du mi che bas de bas na gsum la skyabs su song bas na tshul khrims thob par 'gyur te/_las mang po dang /_rkyen mang po mi dgos so/_/gsol pa/_tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos 
[\[172b.4\]]pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum 'ba' zhig ni bstan la gzhan dag rdzogs par mi ston/_bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims rnam pa 'di gnyis ni nang gi lci ba yin te/_rtsa ba bzhi las gcig nyams na yang phyir gsor mi rung ngo /_/lhag ma ni 
[\[172b.5\]]gsor rung mod kyi gso dka' ste/_de yang dge 'dun la mgu ba dang /_chad pa'i las byas la gang na dge 'dun nyi shu yod pa'i mdun du nyes pa bshags dgos te/_'di ni bsrung dka' bas bsrung dgos pa'i phyir smos so/_/gzhan bslab na bsrung sla ba'i phyir smos mi dgos te/_
[\[172b.6\]]de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis smos kyi gzhan ma smos pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_so sor thar pa'i khrims 'di zag pa med pa'i khrims lags sam/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims lags/_bka' stsal pa/_zag pa med pa'i khrims kyang ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi tshul 
[\[172b.7\]]khrims kyang ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs na ni tshul khrims 'di yod kyi/_gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma gshegs na tshul khrims 'di med do/_/zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni sangs 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs kyang rung /_ma gshegs kyang rung dus thams cad kyi thams cad du yod do/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni bcas pa las yod par 'gyur gyi/_zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni bcas pa las yod 
[\[173a.2\]]pa ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob par 'gyur gyi/_zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni gzhan las thob pa ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni gnyid kyis log gam/_ma log pa'am/_dge ba'am/_sdig 
[\[173a.3\]]pa'am/_lung du mi ston pa'i sems kyi dus thams cad du yod do/_/zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni bsam gtan du 'dug pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i sems la nges pa'i tshe tshul khrims yod kyi/_/sems gzhan thams cad la med do/_/so 
[\[173a.4\]]sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni mi'i nang 'ba' zhig na yod kyi/_zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni lha dang mi gnyis la yod do/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni 'dod pa'i khams 'ba' zhig na yod kyi/_zag pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi tshul 
[\[173a.5\]]khrims ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams na rdzogs par yod do/_/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma 'ba' zhig la yod mod kyi/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims ni mu stegs can la yang yod do/_/
[\[173a.6\]]gsol pa/_dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga la du ni rang bzhin gyi sdig lags/_du ni bcas pa'i sdig lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bzhi ni rang bzhin gyi sdig_/chang 'thung ba'i khrims gcig ni bcas pa'i sdig go/_/chang 'thungs pas ni bag med pa le lo'i gnas yin pa ste/_sdig 
[\[173a.7\]]pa bzhi'i grogs su 'gyur ro/_/khrims lnga la chang 'thung ba ni bag med pa'i gzhi yin pas/_khrims bzhi yang nyams par byed de/_dper na sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe dge bsnyen zhig chang 'thungs pa'i rkyen gyis gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yang byas/_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]pha rol po'i bya yang brkus nas bsad do/_/gzhan zhig gis khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar byed ces dris na bdag gis byas pa med ces zer te/_de ltar chang 'thungs pas khrims bzhi char cig car nyams par byas so/_/chang 'thungs na mtshams med pa bzhi yang byed par 'gyur te/_dge 
[\[173b.2\]]'dun gyi dbyen 'ba' zhig byed mi nus so/_/'di yang sngon gyi las kyis gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang smyo ba dang mi dran par smyo ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/chang 'thungs pas ban glang myos pa ltar myos shing 'khrug par 'gyur te/_chang gis myos na yang dag pa'i las su 
[\[173b.3\]]bya ba bsam gtan dang /_mdo sde klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnams shor bar 'gyur te/_rang bzhin gyi sdig pa ma yin mod kyi rang bzhin gyi sdig pa dang 'dra'o/_/de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[173b.4\]]dge bsnyen gyi khrims lta bu sems can 'ba' zhig las khrims thob bam/_sems can ma yin pa las kyang thob par rung /_'on te gsad du rung ba dang /_rkur yod pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyad du rung ba dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smrar rung ba'i sems can las khrims thob par 'gyur ram/_
[\[173b.5\]]'on te gsad du mi rung ba dang /_rkur ma mchis pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyad du mi rung ba dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smrar mi rung ba dang /_sems can las kyang khrims thob par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_sems can las ni khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur gyi sems can ma yin pa las chang 
[\[173b.6\]]mi 'thung ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can du gtogs pa gsod du rung ba'am/_gsod du mi rung ba'am/_mi tshangs par spyan du rung ba'am/_mi rung ba'am/_rkur rung ba'am/_mi rung ba'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smrar rung ba'am/_mi rung ba thams cad las tshul khrims 
[\[173b.7\]]thob ste/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched man chad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du srog dang bcas pa thams cad las tshul khrims 'di bzhi thob par rung 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]ste/_de yang thog ma tshul khrims nod pa'i tshe srog chags thams cad kyi srog mi gcod pa dang /_thams cad ma byin par mi len pa dang /_thams cad la mi tshangs par mi spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]thams cad mi smra'o zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang tshad gzung du med pas de bas na 
[\[174a.2\]]sems can thams cad las tshul khrims mi thob par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshul khrims 'bogs pa cho ga bzhin du byas na sngar khong du chud cing yid ches par bya ba'i phyir chos bshad la sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed du gzhug go/_/de ltar lhag par 
[\[174a.3\]]mos pa'i sems skyes na lhag pa'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang tshul khrims thob pa ni sems can thams cad las so so nas tshul khrims bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_tshul khrims bzhi so sor dbye na tshul khrims bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/sems can las srog 
[\[174a.4\]]mi gcod pa dang /_ma byin par mi len pa dang /_mi tshangs par mi spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra bas bzlog pa'i nyes pa bzhi skye ba yang rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyi phyir te/_de yang 'dod chags las skye ba dang /_zhe sdang las skye ba dang /_gti mug las skye ba'o/_/sems can thams 
[\[174a.5\]]cad la mi dge ba bcu gnyis po 'di yod de/_mi dge ba 'di las bzlog na dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bcu gnyis thob par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad las thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gal te dgra bcom pa khri phrag brgya'am/_
[\[174a.6\]]'bum phrag brgya mya ngan las 'das kyang /_thog mar dgra bcom pa de dag las tshul khrims thob na dgra bcom pa mya ngan las 'das kyang tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/chang mi 'thung ba'i khrims ni lus 'di thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[174a.7\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam tshang du gtogs pa thams cad la rngub re zhing khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs 'thob ste/_thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe chang thams cad mi 'thung ngo zhes byas pas gal te chang thams cad zad kyang tshul khrims ni rtag tu yod pas mi nyams so/_/gsol pa/_
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe bud med thams cad kyi sgo gsum nas 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa'i khrims mnos la phyis chung ma blangs na tshul khrims 'di nyams par 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji lta zhe na/_thog ma bud med la 'dod pas log par 
[\[174b.2\]]mi g.yem pa'i khrims thob la 'di ni bdag gi chung ma yin pas 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ma yin te/_khrims 'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/don 'di dang sbyar na thams cad 'thun te/_khrims brgyad dang /_khrims bcu dang /_sems can dang /_sems can ma yin pa rnams 
[\[174b.3\]]las tshul khrims thob pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu yang sems can kun la so so nas tshul khrims bdun bdun zhig thob ste/_de yang rnam par dbye na tshul khrims nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad la lus dang ngag gi sdig pa bdun 
[\[174b.4\]]'byung ste/_sdig pa 'byung ba 'di yang rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis skye'o/_/de yang 'dod chags kyis skye ba dang /_zhe sdang gis skye ba dang /_gti mug gis skye ba ste/_de ltar na rgyu dang rkyen gsum gyis sdig pa bdun skye ste/_de ltar na mi dge ba'i sdig pa bdun gsum nyi shu gcig 
[\[174b.5\]]go/_/sdig pa de las bzlog na tshul khrims su 'gyur te/_sems can gcig la tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang de dang 'dra'o/_/don de dang sbyar na dus gcig tu tshul khrims grangs med pa thob par ni rung gi_/
[\[174b.6\]]dus gcig tu cig car nyams par 'gyur ba'am/_dus gcig tu med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/tshul khrims nyams zhes bya ba ni gal te tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na gong nas gong du 'phar bar mi 'gyur te/_ji ste tshul khrims phul la phyis nod na yang tshul khrims thob par mi 'gyur 
[\[174b.7\]]ro/_/dper na nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams na phyis khrims brgyad dam/_khrims lnga'am/_khrims bcu'am/_khrims rdzogs pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims sam/_tshul khrims 'di dag gang 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]yang nod du mi rung ngo /_/gal te tshul khrims lnga'i rtsa ba nyams na yang khrims brgyad dam/_bcu'am/_tshul khrims rdzogs pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims mnos kyang thams cad thob par mi rung ngo /_/gal te 
[\[175a.2\]]khrims lnga nyams pa'i 'og tu khrims lnga phul la khrims bcu nod pa de ni gnas ma yin no/_/gal te khrims lnga phul ba'i 'og tu khrims lnga nod kyang rung /_khrims brgyad dam/_khrims bcu'am/_khrims rdzogs pa'am/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims sam/_zag pa med pa'i 
[\[175a.3\]]khrims mnos kyang khrims gang yang mi 'thob bo/_/gal te khrims bcu'am/_khrims rdzogs pa'i rtsa ba nyams na gong nas gong du 'phar ba'am/_khrims phul te khrims nod pa ni ji ltar khrims lnga las bshad pa dang 'dra'o/_/gsol pa/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /_
[\[175a.4\]]zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims 'di gsum las tshul khrims mchog ces bgyi ba gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims mchog ste/_gzhan du na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyang mchog yin 
[\[175a.5\]]no/_/de ji lta zhe na/_gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs na tshul khrims 'di yod par 'gyur gyi/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad kyi dus su yod do/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa las 
[\[175a.6\]]kyang thob par rung gi_/bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad las thob pa ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur gyi/_bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /_
[\[175a.7\]]zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni byams pa'i sems kyis thob pa ma yin no/_/so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin par 'khor rnam pa bdun 'jig rten na yod cing [(]thag [,]theg [)]pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'i gzhir 'gyur ba yin gyi/_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]khrims dang /_zag pa med pa'i khrims ni de lta bu ma yin te/_de bas na khams gsum na mchog rab phul du gyur pa yin no/_/thog ma khrims nod pa'i tshe gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas ma thag tu tshul khrims rdzogs par 'gyur te/_thog ma'i sems skad cig ma dang po'i 
[\[175b.2\]]tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni las zhes kyang bya/_las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o/_/sems skad cig ma phyi ma las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs byung ba ni las zhes bya'i/_las kyi lam ma yin no/_/de lta bas na sems kyi skad cig ma dang po las 
[\[175b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te/_bsam pa dang ldan pas bsam pa'i las kyi lam zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims snga mas rgyu byas te/_tshul khrims lhag ma'i rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs lhun gyis grub pas de bas na de la las zhes bya'i las 
[\[175b.4\]]kyi lam ma yin no/_/dang po'i sems skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni cho ga dang yang bcas la cho ga med pa yang ma yin no/_/phyis rim gyis skye ba'i khrims ni cho ga med pa 'ba' zhig dang ldan gyi/_cho ga dang bcas pa ma yin no/_/thog ma'i sems skad cig ma gcig gi khrims ni tshul 
[\[175b.5\]]khrims zhes kyang bya/_dge bar spyod pa zhes kyang bya/_'dul ba zhes kyang bya'o/_/phyis rim gyis de ma thag tu skye ba'i tshul khrims kyang don de dang ldan no/_/de nas ma 'gags pas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_dus gsum du bkum pa'i nang na dus gang gis tshul khrims thob 
[\[175b.6\]]par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_da ltar gyi dus kyi sems skad cig ma gcig gis khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni chos yin te/_sems can ma yin pas khrims mi 'thob kyi/_da ltar gyi sems skad cig ma gcig ni sems can yin pas na khrims 'thob bo/_/
[\[175b.7\]]gsol pa/_dge ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims thob bam/_mi dge ba'i sems kyis sam/_'on te lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis sam/_sems med pas khrims thob par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_thams cad kyis thob par 'gyur te/_thog ma dge ba'i sems kyis dge 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag byas la chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs te mkhan po gang yin pa la gsol ba gdab bo/_/de nas tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las bar chad med par dge ba'i sems kyis khrims rdzogs pa ni dge ba'i 
[\[176a.2\]]sems kyis tshul khrims thob pa zhes bya'o/_/gal te de ltar cho ga rim gyis byed pa na rtag tu dge ba'i sems dang ldan te/_las byed pa las gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa mi dge ba'i bsam pa byung na sems can de nyid 
[\[176a.3\]]kyis tshul khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan yang de ni mi dge ba'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya ste/_de yang thog ma'i dge ba'i sems dang /_dge ba'i las kyi shugs kyis khrims thob pa yin gyi mi dge ba'i sems kyis thob pa ma yin no/_/sngar dge ba'i sems 
[\[176a.4\]]kyis cho ga'i las byas la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe/_gal te gnyid log gam/_yur na log cing yur ba'i sems las khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs skye ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis khrims thob pa zhes bya'o/_/sngar dge ba'i sems kyis cho ga 
[\[176a.5\]]byas la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshe 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na de'i tshe khrims kyi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs dang ldan pas de ni sems med pa las khrims thob pa zhes bya'o/_/ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa gal te khyim pas khrims lnga ma mnos par 
[\[176a.6\]]thal byung khrims bcu mnos na/_khrims thob par 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_dus gcig du dge bsnyen gyi khrims dang /_dge sbyong gi khrims rnam pa gnyis thob bo/_/gal te khrims lnga yang ma mnos/_khrims bcu yang ma mnos par thal byung khrims rdzogs par mnos na yang 
[\[176a.7\]]dus gcig tu khrims gsum char thob par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'gags pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te khrims rdzogs par mnos pas dus gcig tu khrims rnam pa gsum char thob par 'gyur na/_rim gyis sngar khrims lnga mnos la de'i 'og tu khrims bcu mnos te/_phyis 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]khrims rdzogs par mnod do zhes bgyir yang ci 'tshal/_bka' stsal pa/_dus gcig tu tshul khrims gsum char thob mod kyi/_gang sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par mos pa ni gdon mi za bar rim gyis sngar khrims lnga mnos te/_dul bar byas la dad pa dang /_mos pa lhag par 
[\[176b.2\]]skyes nas de'i 'og tu khrims bcu nod do/_/khrims bcu mnos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag par skyes nas de'i 'og tu tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na/_de ltar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro thob cing mos pa brtan pa mi shigs par 'gyur ro/_/dper na rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa 
[\[176b.3\]]yang bags kyis zab pa dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_tshul khrims rdzogs par cig car mnos na [{]go rims kyang [,]go rim yang [}]shor la spyod lam yang nyams par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na tshul khrims kyang sems can kha cig ni khrims lnga mnos pas lam 
[\[176b.4\]]gyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/sems can kha cig ni tshul khrims bcu mnos pa'i rkyen gyis lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa yang yod de/_de ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa tha dad pas na de bzhin gshegs pas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bstan pa yin no/_/gal te sngar khrims lnga mnos la de'i 
[\[176b.5\]]'og tu khrims bcu mnos na khrims bcu mnos pa'i tshe yang khrims gnyi ga dang ldan no/_/khrims lnga dang khrims bcu mnos pa'i 'og tu khrims rdzogs par mnos na rdzogs par mnos pa'i tshe khrims gsum char dang yang ldan no/_/khrims lnga dang /_khrims bcu dang /_khrims 
[\[176b.6\]]rdzogs par mnod pa rnam pa bdun la gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i khrims 'ba' zhig ni rim gyis dus gsum du thob bo/_/lhag ma rnam pa drug nod pa ni dus gcig gis thob kyi/_dus gsum gyi rim pa med do/_/de ltar tshul khrims rnam pa gsum dus gcig tu thob 
[\[176b.7\]]pa 'gal te tshul khrims phyir dbul ba'i tshe bdag ni deng phyin chad dge sbyong yin te/_dge slong ma yin no/_/zhes smras pas tshul khrims rdzogs pa med kyang tshul khrims gnyis med pa ma yin te yod do/_/tshul khrims lnga dang /_tshul khrims bcu mnos pa las da phyin cad bdag ni 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]dge bsnyen yin te/_dge sbyong ma yin no zhes smras na khrims bcu med par zad kyi/_khrims lnga yod do/_/gal te bdag ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i khrims thams cad dbul te/_bdag la skyabs su 'gro ba'i dge bsnyen du zung shig ces smras na tshul khrims 
[\[177a.2\]]rnam pa gsum cig car med kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum med pa ma yin no/_/[{]go rims kyis [,]go rim gyis [}]tshul khrims rnam pa gsum thob pa dang /_phyir dbul ba'i cho ga dang /_rim pa ni ji ltar dus gcig tu khrims thob pa bstan pa dang 'dra'o/_/gsol pa gal te sngon dge bsnyen las rab tu 
[\[177a.3\]]byung ste khrims bcu mnos na khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_med par mi 'gyur te/_ming dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]brjes par zad kyi/_khrims med par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de yang dge bsnyen gyi ming stor te dge sbyong gi ming thob bo/_/khyim pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]stor gyi rab tu 
[\[177a.4\]]byung ba'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]thob bo/_/gsol pa dge slong gi tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na khrims bcu dang khrims lnga ma mchis par mi 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_med par mi 'gyur te/_de yang ming dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]stor bar zad de/_dge sbyong gi ming stor nas dge slong gi ming thob bo/_/
[\[177a.5\]]dge sbyong gi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]stor nas/_dge slong gi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]thob ste/_thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du tshul khrims yin gyi/_ming tsam ni 'phral la 'dogs so/_/dper na skyed shing dang shing gi lo ma lta bu dpyid dang dbyar ni sngo/_ston ni ser/_dgun ni skya ste/_de yang dus kyis bsgyur bas shing 
[\[177a.6\]]gi lo ma kha dog tha dad par 'gyur gyi/_thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du shing gi lo mar zad de tshul khrims yang de dang 'dra bar rtag tu tshul khrims gcig tu zad na dus kyis tha dad par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dper na 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_mar gyi snying po ni rnam pa bzhir tha dad de/_
[\[177a.7\]]de ltar dus kyi tha dad kyang gcig tu zad pa dang 'dra bar/_tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste/_dus gsum gyis tha dad kyang /_tshul khrims la tha dad pa med do/_/ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen khrims nod pa nyams kyis rdzogs par nod par 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]mi nus pa tshul khrims gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_bzhi'i bar du mnos na tshul khrims mnos par chud dam/_bka' stsal pa/_des khrims mi 'thob bo gsol pa/_gal te khrims mi thob na mdo sde dag las phyogs cha chung ba'i dge bsnyen dang /_phyogs cha che 
[\[177b.2\]]ba'i dge bsnyen dang /_phyogs cha rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen mchis par gsungs na de'i don de ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_de skad ces gsungs pa yang khrims bsrungs pa'i yon tan che chung yod pa las dgongs te gsungs kyi/_de ltar tshul khrims mnod du rung ba ni ma 
[\[177b.3\]]yin no/_/ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khrims lnga nod pa'i nyin zhag gcig gam/_nyin zhag gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu'i bar du de ltar mnos na khrims thob par 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal pa/_de ltar mi rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyis tshul khrims 
[\[177b.4\]]bcas pa yang so so nas dus dang tshad yod de/_de yang tshul khrims lnga nod pa ni gdon mi za bar nam 'tsho'i bar du mnod dgos so/_/gal te yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnod na gdon mi za bar nyin zhag gcig pa mnod dgos te/_de bas na snga ma mi rung ngo /_/gsol ba 
[\[177b.5\]]dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byas te khrims nod pa yang rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma yod do/_/de la khrims lnga ni khrims tha ma'o/_/khrims bcu ni khrims 'bring po'o/_/khrims rdzogs pa ni khrims rab ces bya'o/_/khrims lnga la yang rab 'bring rnam pa gsum ste/_gal te 
[\[177b.6\]]chung zhing zhan pa'i sems kyis khrims mnos pa ni khrims tha ma zhes bya'o/_/sems 'bring gis tshul khrims mnos pa ni khrims 'bring thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te sems rab kyis tshul khrims mnos pa ni khrims rab thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims rdzogs pa la rab 
[\[177b.7\]]'bring gsum yod pa yang khrims lnga bstan pa bzhin no/_/gal te sngar sems tha mas khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu sems rab 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na khrims lnga ni snga ma las skye zhing lhag pa med kyi/_khrims lnga ma gtogs par kha zas dus ma yin par mi bza' ba'i 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bar du khrims lhag ma lnga ni lhag pa'i khrims su 'gyur te/_tshul khrims sngar mnos pa lnga ni tha mar 'gyur ro/_/sems tha mas sngar khrims lnga mnos la/_de'i 'og tu sems rab dang 'bring gis khrims rdzogs par mnos na yang khrims sngar mnos 
[\[178a.2\]]pa lnga ni skye ba'am lhag pa med kyi/_khrims snga ma lnga ma gtogs par tshul khrims gzhan thams cad tshul khrims rdzogs par mnod pa'i tshe rab dang lhag pa'i sems kyis mnos pas lhag pa'i tshul khrims rab thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[178a.3\]]ni nyis rim du thob pa med de rim par dbye na khrims lnga ni tha ma zhes bya'o/_/khrims bcu ni 'bring zhes bya/_tshul khrims rdzogs pa ni rab ces bya'o/_/don gyi sgo nas dbye na sems rab kyi khrims lnga mnos na khrims de ni rab ces bya/_sems 'bring gis khrims bcu mnos na 
[\[178a.4\]]khrims 'bring zhes bya/_sems tha mas tshul khrims rdzogs par mnos na tshul khrims tha ma zhes bya'o/_/don dang sbyar na sems rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma las tshul khrims thob pa mi 'thun te/_nges par gcig tu chad pa med do/_/gal te mkhan po zhig la khrims 
[\[178a.5\]]bcu nod par gsol ba btab pa las khrims bcu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur kyang khrims bcu thob bo/_/gal te khrims bcu nod pa'i tshe mkhan po shi na shi bar shes sam thos na khrims mnos kyang khrims mi 'thob bo/_/gal te shi bar mi shes ma thos na khrims 
[\[178a.6\]]thob bo/_/gsol ba dang zhu ba bzhi'i las byed pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa ni mkhan po mngon sum du ma gyur na khrims mnod kyang khrims thob par mi 'gyur te/_dge 'dun gyi grangs ma tshang ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi grangs tshang na mkhan po med kyang khrims mnod du rung ngo /_/ma 
[\[178a.7\]]'gags pas yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen gyi khrims lnga pas tshong spogs bgyir rung ngam/_bka' stsal pa/_tshong spogs byar rung ste/_las rnam pa 'di lnga ni mi bya'o/_/rkang 'gros phyugs kyi tshong spogs kyi las mi bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyi phyugs yod na tshong du 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]gnang gi_/shen pa la btsong du mi rung ba dang /_mda' gzhu mtshon cha'i bag tshong spogs bgyir mi rung ba dang /_bdag la yod pa ni 'tshong du rung ba dang /_chang gi tshong spogs kyi las byar mi rung ste/_bdag nyid la yod na 'tshong du rung ba dang srin bu mang du 'chi bas 'bru mar 'tshir du 
[\[178b.2\]]mi rung ba dang /_rgya gar gyi chos kyis de bzhin te/_ga bu sha tshun chad ni 'bru mar 'tshir ba'i nang na srin bu med na nyes pa med do/_/kha dog tshon chen po rnam pa lnga btso blag byed pa yang srin bu mang du 'chi bas mi rung ste/_yog sha la sogs pa yul gzhan dag na tshon gyi btso blag byed 
[\[178b.3\]]pa las srin bu mang du 'chi ste/_de bas na mi gnang ngo /_/yul rgya yul yang kha dog mthing ga btso ba ni srin bu mang du 'chi bas btso blag rnam pa lnga'i nang du gtogs so/_/ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag gcig gis khrims brgyad ces bgyi ba dus 
[\[178b.4\]]ma lags par phyem red kha zas mi 'tshal ba ma gtogs pa dgur 'gyur na ji ltar brgyad ces bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_khrims zhes bya ba ni chos kyis phyem red dus ma yin par kha zas mi za ba yin te/_khrims brgyad kyi yan lag yin te/_grogs su gyur pas yan lag 
[\[178b.5\]]gi khrims brgyad ces bya'i/_dgur ni ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos na gang zag de 'khor rnam pa bdun la 'khor gang gi nang du bsdu/_bka' stsal pa/_nam 'tsho ba'i bar gyi khrims ma mnos kyang nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas de la 
[\[178b.6\]]yang dge bsnyen zhes bya'o/_/gzhan du na dge bsnyen zhes byar ni nam 'tsho ba'i bar du tshul khrims mnos pa med la/_dge bsnyen ma yin zhes byar ni nyin zhag gcig gi khrims yod pas de ni gang zag bar ma do zhes mdo sde las kyang 'byung ngo /_/ma 'gags pas yang 
[\[178b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor bdun ma gtogs par so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims mchis sam/_bka' stsal pa/_yod de yan lag brgyad kyi khrims nyid yin no/_/don de dang sbyar na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa 'khor rnam pa bdun gyi nang du ma gtogs so/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pa'i chos kyis ni nyin zhag gcig gi bar du srog mi gcod do zhes tshig de skad chad pas na khrims gzhan nam 'tsho'i bar du mnos pa dang bsrer yang mi rung ngo /_/gsol pa/_yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnod pa nyin 
[\[179a.2\]]zhag gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bcu'i bar du cig car mnod du rung ngam/_bka' stsal pa/_thog ma sangs rgyas kyis nyin zhag gcig gi khrims su bcas pas de las 'dar mi rung ngo /_/gal te nyams kyis mnod nus na nyin zhag gcig cing lan re mnod dgos 
[\[179a.3\]]te/_nyin zhag du mnos kyang rung ngo /_/nyin zhag gcig gi yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnod pa'i thabs ni pha rol po gzhan las mnod dgos te/_de yang gang las mnod ce na/_'khor lnga po gang yang rung ba las mnod dgos so/_/yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos 
[\[179a.4\]]pa'i 'og tu gal te sems can la brdeg btsog byas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin no/_/khrims mnos pa'i nyin par brdeg btsog ma byas la phyi de nyin brdeg btsog bya bar dam bcas na yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma yin te/_mdor na lus dang ngag gis 
[\[179a.5\]]ji tsam du tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i las byas na khrims ma nyams mod kyi rnam par dag pa ma yin no/_/gal te lus dang ngag rnam par dag kyang sems kyis 'dod chags kyi rnam par rtog pa bskyed dam/_zhe sdang gis 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed na yang rnam par dag pa 
[\[179a.6\]]ma yin no/_/gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las gsum rnam par dag kyang rjes su dran pa drug yid la ma byas na de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag ces mi bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad kyi khrims mnos pa'i 'og tu rjes su dran pa drug yid la byas na tshul khrims rnam par dag 
[\[179a.7\]]ces bya'o/_/mdo sde dag las 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po 'dzam bu'i gling gi khams su gtogs pa'i mi thams cad dang /_de'i nang na yod pa'i gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor dbyig thams cad la dbang ba'i bsod nams kyis yan lag brgyad pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]pa'i bsod nams bcu drug char yang dgos pa'i cha gcig tsam yang mi phod do zhes 'byung ngo /_/su yang rung yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims nod par byas la bag med par rang nyam du rol mo'am/_gal te na kha zas zhim po la bag med par bza' ba dang /_rtsed mo rnam pa sna 
[\[179b.2\]]tshogs yid bzhin du bag med par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni snga dro la yang rung phyi dro la yang rung khrims thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te snga nas khrims mnod pa'i sems med la bag med pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'og tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad 
[\[179b.3\]]de khrims mnos na snga dro yang rung phyi dro yang rung dus thams cad du khrims thob bo/_/khrims mnod par chas pa las bgegs sam bar chad byung ste dbang med pa las/_phyis bgegs dang bar chad med pa'i 'og tu khrims mnos na snga dro yang rung phyi dro yang rung dus thams 
[\[179b.4\]]cad du khrims thob bo/_/gsol pa/_gal te nyin par khrims srung la mtshan mo mi srung ba'i khrims mnos na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob bam/_gal te mtshan mo khrims srung la nyin par mi srung ba'i khrims mnos na yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur ram/_
[\[179b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_gang yang khrims mi thob bo/_/de bas na sangs rgyas kyis thog ma nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims su bcas te/_nges pa'i tshad yin pas 'gal bar byar mi rung ngo /_/ma 'gags pas yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ltar khrims mi thob 
[\[179b.6\]]na/_mdo dag las dge slong ig zhi zhig 'brog dgon pa zhig na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha cig sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ste/_la la ni nyin par longs spyod bgyid la mtshan mo sdug bsngal bgyid pa yang mchis/_la la ni mtshan mo longs spyod bgyid la nyin par sdug bsngal myong ba dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[179b.7\]]de bas na de dag kyang sngon mi'i nang na nyin par ni khrims srung la mtshan mo ni sdig pa bgyid pa'am/_yang na mtshan mo khrims srung la nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi 'thun pa'i don de dag ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang rkyen 'ba' zhig la brten du yang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]mi rung ste/_'di skad du bshad pa yang mdo sde'am 'dul ba las bshad pa ma yin te/_de la bden pa'i don nges pa zhes byar yang mi rung ngo /_/gzhan du ni 'di skad bshad pa 'di ni 'phags pa kA ta ya nas ig zhi zhig gdul ba'i phyir sprul pa yin gyi 
[\[180a.2\]]yang dag pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pa las khrims phyir 'bul na nges par 'khor rnam pa lnga la 'bul mi dgos kyi/_pha rol po gang zag gcig la khrims phyir dbul lo zhes tshig gcig smras pas khrims phul bar 'gyur ro/_/so 
[\[180a.3\]]sor thar pa'i khrims thob pa'i sgo nas dbye na lam rgyud lngar gtogs pa la mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa 'ba' zhig gis khrims thob kyi rgyud lhag ma gzhan gyis khrims mi thob bo/_/dper na lha'i rgyud du gtogs pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la chags shing zhen pas khrims mi thob 
[\[180a.4\]]bo/_/dper na sngon 'phags pa maud gal gyi nye gnas shig nad kyis btab pa las 'phags pa maud gal sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du sman pa 'tsho byed la dpyad 'drir song ba las/_de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams rab tu dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal du rtser 'dong ba'i khar 
[\[180a.5\]]babs nas 'phags pa maud gal de dag 'gro ba'i lam kar sdod cing 'dug pa las lha'i bu rnams 'phags pa maud gal la mig gis blta tsam yang mi khom par song ngo /_/'tsho byed kyi thad kar phyin pa dang /_rgyang ma nas maud gal lag pa bteg pa tsam zhig 
[\[180a.6\]]byas nas shing rta khrid de song ngo /_/de nas 'phags pa maud gal 'di snyam du sems so/_/'tsho byed 'di sngon mi'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe bdag gi slob ma yin na nga ni lha'i longs spyod la chags te/_sngon gyi dran pa nyams par gyur to snyam bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[180a.7\]]'tsho byed kyi shing rta 'gro ba med par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 'tsho byed shing rta las babs te 'phags pa maud gal gyi rkang pa la phyag byas nas maud gal gyis rgyu rkyen mang po rnam pa sna tshogs gtams so/_/'tsho byed kyis maud gal la smras pa/_bdag mi'i 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]nang na 'dug pa'i tshe btsun pa'i slob ma yin pas lag pa tsam bteg ste bro dris kyi lha'i bu gzhan dag de ltar byed pa yod dam/_lhar skyes pa ni bde ba'i longs spyod la zhen cing chags pas dbang med de de ltar gyur pa yin no/_/maud gal gyis 'tsho byed la smras pa/_
[\[180b.2\]]slob ma zhig nad kyis btab ste na na de la ji ltar gso bar bya/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_re shig kha zas mi bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas maud gal gyi bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bskul to/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa yang shin tu phrad 
[\[180b.3\]]dka' na ci'i phyir skabs skabs su drung du song ste dam pa'i chos mi gleng /_de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'phags pa maud gal gyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu zhig mngags te/_lha'i bu zhig 'bod du btang ba las lan gsum gyi bar du bos na ma 
[\[180b.4\]]'ongs so/_/lha'i bu de la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang 'dod pa la chags shing zhen pas lha'i dbang po tshig btsan mod kyi gtong ma phod de phyis gdod 'ongs so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris na ji ltar gyur pa drang por 
[\[180b.5\]]gsol to/_/brgya byin gyis maud gal la gsol pa/_lha'i bu 'di la lha'i bu mo gcig dang rol mo byed pa gcig las med kyang gtong mi phod do/_/rtse dga' ni lha'i dbang por gyur te/_gzhal med khang sna tshogs mang po dang lha'i bu mo grangs med pas bskor/_
[\[180b.6\]]lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang lha'i rol mo brgya stong snyed la longs spyod cing rtse dga' bas shar phyogs su bltas na nub phyogs kyang brjed pa de lta ci smos te/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dang phrad pa yang dka'/_dam pa'i chos thos pa 
[\[180b.7\]]yang shin tu dka' bar shes mod kyi 'dod pa'i bde bas bcings glags te rang dbang med pas shes kyang byar med par gyur to/_/tshul khrims mnos pa'i chos ni dpa' zhing rtul phod pa'i sems kyis chad par dam bcas pas khrims thob par 'gyur te/_lha'i bu lta 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]bu ni 'dod pa'i bde ba la chags pas mi dge ba'i sems kyi shas che ste/_dge ba'i sems kyi mthu chung na ci'i dbang gis khrims thob par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu ni bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal te lus dang sems 'bar zhing tshig pa'i 
[\[181a.2\]]phyir ro/_/sems can dmyal ba pa ni tsha grang gi sdug bsngal grangs med pas gzir te mi bzod pa sna tshogs myong zhing lus dang sems gdungs par gyur pas khrims thob pa'i rgyu med do/_/dud 'gro lta bu ni las kyis bsgribs te shes pa med pas khrims 
[\[181a.3\]]mnod pa'i cho ga med do/_/mdo sde kha cig las skabs kha cig tu klus tshul khrims mnos par 'byung ba dge ba'i sems kyis yan lag brgyad pa'i khrims mnos pas nyin zhag gcig gi bar du dge ba'i sems kyis bsod nams ni thob kyi las kyis bsgribs pas 
[\[181a.4\]]tshul khrims ni thob pa ma yin no/_/gling bzhis dbye na lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang /_gling gsum po 'dir gtogs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gling phran na 'khod pa'i mi rnams kyis khrims thob bo/_/dper na nub kyi ba lang 
[\[181a.5\]]spyod na 'phags pa'i 'du la gnas par sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan te/_da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po rgyas par byed pas 'khor rnam bzhi yang yod do/_/shar gyi lus 'phags gling na yang dge slong yod de/_de na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos byed pas 'khor 
[\[181a.6\]]bzhi po dag yod do/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan 'ba' zhig na sangs rgyas kyi chos med de/_tshul khrims kyang mi thob bo/_/de yang bsod nams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bsgribs shing gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur to/_/gang 
[\[181a.7\]]zag la rnam pa bzhi ste/_gang zhe na/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning dang /_mtshan ma gnyis pa'o/_/rnam pa 'di bzhi la skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyis ni khrims thob par rung /_ma ning dang mtshan ma gnyis gnyis kyis khrims mi 'thob/_de yang 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]skyes pa dang bud med la yang gang pha ma bsad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /_dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang /_gca' 'phrang du chom po dang /_
[\[181b.2\]]rkun gnas byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa dang /_gang zag 'di dag ni gang yang tshul khrims mi thob bo/_/de la don chen po'i sgo nas brtags na sangs rgyas kyi chos la shin tu dad cing mos pa ni 'dir mi gtogs te/_lha'am/_klu'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_
[\[181b.3\]]gnod sbyin nam/_byang gi sgra mi snyan nam/_ma ning ngam/_mtshan ma gnyis pa'am/_sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod du rung ngo /_/gsol pa/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams tshul khrims brnyes pa mnyam mam/_bka' 
[\[181b.4\]]stsal pa/_mi mnyam mo/_/tshul khrims thob ces bya ba ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i ris las khrims thob par 'gyur te sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na sems can grangs med pa ji snyed kyi don mdzad de lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[181b.5\]]bzlas pas phyis sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dag sems can de dag gang las kyang tshul khrims brnyes te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams snga phyir tshul khrims brnyes pa mi mnyam mo/_/dper na sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sems can grangs med pa zhig 
[\[181b.6\]]btul te lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las bzlas kyang sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ni sems can de dag kun las tshul khrims brnyes na/_sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas ni sems can de dag gang las kyang tshul khrims ma brnyes so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[181b.7\]]'dra bar dngos po 'di gsum ni mnyam mo/_/gang zhe na/_spyod pa'i tshogs mnyam pa dang /_chos kyi sku mnyam pa dang /_sems can gyi don mdzad pa mnyam pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dra bar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]spyod pa spyad de/_yan lag lnga'i chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs te thams cad kyis sems can grangs med pa ji snyed mya ngan las 
[\[182a.2\]]bzlas so gsol pa/_mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don mdzad do zhes 'byung na/_ci'i slad du sems can grangs med pa'i don mdzad ces gsungs/_bka' 
[\[182a.3\]]stsal pa/_mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas gcig 'jig rten du gshegs na sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu snyed kyi don mdzad ces smos pa ni sangs rgyas de las grol bar gyur pa la bya ste/_grol ba'i sems can de dag kyang la la ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis 
[\[182a.4\]]don mdzad pa yang yod/_kha cig ni slob mas don mdzad pa yang yod/_kha cig ni bzhag pa'i chos kyis grol ba yang yod de/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu zhes smos pa ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa la bya/_sems can grangs med pa lhag ma 
[\[182a.5\]]ma lus pa'i mya ngan las bzlas zhes bya ba ni spyir don mdzad pa la bya'o/_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa ni dus gsum mnyam gyi tshul khrims brnyes pa ni mi mnyam mo/_/gsol pa/_sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims zhes bgyi ba sems can 
[\[182a.6\]]dang sems can ma yin pa las thob par 'gyur ram/_zin pa dang ma zin pa kun gyis khrims thob par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur gyi/_sems can ma yin pa las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims mi thob bo/_/
[\[182a.7\]]gzhan du na gsod du rung ba'i sems can las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob kyi/_gsod du mi rung ba'i sems can las khrims mi thob bo/_/yang gzhan du na gsod du rung ba dang /_gsod du mi rung ba'i sems can gnyi ga las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]ces bya'o/_/dper na shen pa lug gsod pa ni rtag tu gsod pa'i sems dang chas te lug gsod pa 'ba' zhig yid la byed pas de'i tshad gzung du med do/_/ji ste lha dang mir skyes na 'phral du gsod pa'i las mi byed kyang skye ba gcig nas gcig tu 'khor bas phyir lug tu skye 
[\[182b.2\]]ba'i chos yod do/_/de bas na sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims thob par 'gyur te/_sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_shen pa dang /_gshed ma dang /_
[\[182b.3\]]phag gso ba dang /_bya gso ba dang /_nya shor ba dang /_rngon pa dang /_bya shor ba dang /_sbrul shor ba dang /_klu la sngags 'debs pa dang /_btson rdzi byed pa dang /_rkun po byed pa dang /_rkun po 'dzin pa dang bcu gnyis so/_/dar gyi srin bu gso ba yang sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims kyi nang du 
[\[182b.4\]]'dus so/_/sdom pa ma yin pa'i khrims nyams pa'i dus gsum yod de/_shi ba'i dus dang chags shing zhen pa zad pa'i dus dang /_sdom pa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i dus so/_/dper na skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mnod pa'i tshe thog ma'i tshig dang po gcig smras pas sdom pa 
[\[182b.5\]]ma yin pa'i khrims nyams so/_/de'i 'og tu tshig gnyis pa dang gsum pa smras pa'i tshe na dge ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa gang zag gis sdom pa ma yin pa'i las byed pa na dus tshod gang gi tshe dge ba'i tshul khrims nyams shing mi dge ba'i khrims thob 
[\[182b.6\]]par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_shen pa'o zhes tshig gcig dang por smra ba'i tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams par 'gyur la shan pa'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum smras pas mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gzhan du na gang gi tshe dge ba'i khrims btang ba de nyid kyi tshe
