[\[182b.7\]]mi dge ba'i khrims thob bo/_/ji ste dge ba'i khrims srung ba'i gang zag cig bdag shen pa'o zhes dam ni ma bcas/_khe dang rnyed pa tsam la chags te phag phrug gso zhing gsod pa'i las byed na de'i tshe dge ba'i khrims nyams pa zhes bya ste/_de ni dge ba'i khrims gtang 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ba mi dge ba'i khrims thob pa zhes bya'o/_/gal te bdag shen pa'o zhes nges par dam bcas na yang mi dge ba'i khrims thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi dge ba'i khrims nod pa ni bdag gis dam bcas pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur te/_pha rol gzhan las 
[\[183a.2\]]mnod mi dgos so/_/gal te mi dge ba'i khrims nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bcu'am/_lo gcig gam/_lo gnyis kyi bar du mnod par dam bcas na dam bcas pa'i dus ring thung las de bzhin thob par 'gyur te/_de bas na sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ni skye 
[\[183a.3\]]shi 'khor ba la gzhol bar byed kyi gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i don med do/_/de ltar na mi dge ba'i khrims ni dngos po de nyid kyis thob pa yin te/_dge ba'i tshul khrims dang mi 'dra'o/_/thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las ma 'gags pa'i 
[\[183a.4\]]le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o//_//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/_bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin lan shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa chen pos 
[\[183a.5\]]sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed pa dag dus dang skabs shes na bstan cing bcos pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mngon par 'jig rten du byung ba 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[183a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_skal ba dang ldan pa'i don mdzad do/_/skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad 
[\[183a.7\]]nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos la spyod pa'i tshe bram ze'i bu yid gzhungs shing rno ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa gtan khrims lnga srung ba/_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhig byung ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i bu de yul gzhan zhig tu don 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]gnyer du song song ba las 'gron du 'gro ba'i lam de 'jigs sa che bas lam grogs lnga brgya dang 'grogs te song ngo /_/lam grogs de dag dang 'jigs sar phyin nas 'jigs sa de na mi rgod lnga brgya zhig gnas te/_rtag tu 'dron po rgyu ba rnams 'joms so/_/de'i tshe na mi rgod de dag 
[\[183b.2\]]gis 'dron po de dag gzhom par byas nas mi rgod kyi dpon po des mi gcig sngar 'dron po de dag ji ltar 'gro ba lta zhing rtog tu btang ngo /_/de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gi nang na mi gcig cig sngon bram ze'i bu de dang mdza' zhing bshes pas sngar mi de dag gi nang du 'ongs te bram ze'i bu de la 'di 
[\[183b.3\]]skad ces bsgo'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar rig par byos shig_/do nub nam gyi cha stod la dgra 'ong gis/_ci nas kyang khyod nyid la gnod pa dang smas par ma gyur par khyod nyid kyis byol ba'i thabs byos shig par bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des tshig de dag thos nas dper na 
[\[183b.4\]]mi brnangs pa ltar mid du yang med la skyug tu yang med pa bzhin mi bde bar gyur nas grogs po rnams la gtam byar ni grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad kyis dogs/_ci ste grogs po rnams kyis mi de bsad na grogs po rnams ngan 'gro gsum du sdug bsngal grangs med pa 
[\[183b.5\]]myong bar 'gyur te/_gal te grogs po rnams la ma smras na ni dgras grogs po rnams bsad par 'gyur ro/_/gal te grogs po rnams bsad na dgra rnams ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal grangs med pa myong ngo snyam bsams nas bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang /_bde 
[\[183b.6\]]ba'i thabs byas te/_bdag nyid ngan 'gro gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal myong yang sla'o snyam bsams nas ral gri thogs nas sbron pa'i mi de bsad nas grogs po rnams bde bar byas so/_/de'i tshe na grogs po rnams kyis de ltar gyur pa mthong nas bram ze'i bu de la 'di skad ces 
[\[183b.7\]]smras so/_/bram ze'i bu khyod ni mi'i nang na mchog tu gyur pa shin tu dge ba yin na/_ci'i phyir deng 'dir 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed ces smras so/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i bu des pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i sems kyis grogs po dag la 'di skad ces 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]smras so/_/bdag de ring bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te/_de yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_grogs po rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/grogs po rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la nged bde bar byas so zhes brjod du 
[\[184a.2\]]yang ci yod/_bram ze'i bus smras pa/_bdag gis bsad pa'i mi 'di ni dgra ma rungs pa yin te/_dgra 'dis grogs po khyed gsod du 'ongs pas bdag ni grogs po khyed kyi phyir mi 'di'i srog bcad pas na khyed rnams ni bde bar yul du phyin te/_bdag ni sems can dmyal 
[\[184a.3\]]ba'i sdug bsngal myong yang sla'o/_/de nas grogs po lnga brgya rnams kyis skad phyung ste ngus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnam mtha' 'og na phangs par bya ba ni srog las 'da' ba med do/_/'jigs pa'i nang na 'chi ba las 'da' ba med de/_de bas na sems can thams cad 
[\[184a.4\]]ni lus dang srog gi phyir gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_yul sa dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_zas dang gos kyang yongs su gtong ste/_bdag cag ni deng du phyir lan cig 'tsho ba'i srog thob bo zhes smras nas bram ze'i bu khyod sems can gyi phyir ngan 'gro gsum gyi sdug 
[\[184a.5\]]bsngal khyad du bsad pas bdag cag ni khyod kyi drin shin tu lci ba dran par byed do/_/drin lci ba dran pas na deng bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/zhes smras nas thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de'i tshe na mi rgod lnga brgya rnams 
[\[184a.6\]]kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni kun gyi mchog shin tu dge ba yin no zhes zer na ci'i phyir 'di lta bu'i sdig pa chen po byed/_bram ze'i bus smras pa/_bdag ni bya bar mi rigs pa'i sdig pa chen po byas te/_de yang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_khyed rnams kyi lus dang 
[\[184a.7\]]srog gi bskyab bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas mi rgod de dag gis bram ze'i bu la smras pa/_khyod nyid kyis mi bsad pa la bdag cag la phan pa yang ci zhig yod/_bram ze'i bus smras pa/_mi rgod khyed rnams 'di na 'dug par snga nas shes kyang bdag kyang ma smras te/_rgyal po yang ma 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]sbran/_bdag gi grogs po rnams la yang ma smras/_gtam ma byas pas khyed kyi lus dang srog bde bar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i tshe mi rgod de dag gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du gyur to/_/bdag cag gi lus dang srog kyang gzod gson no snyam bsams nas bram 
[\[184b.2\]]ze'i bu la thal mo sbyar te/_skyes bu chen po shin tu legs so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag gis deng phyin chad ci dang ci bya ba bstan du gsol/_bram ze'i bus smras pa/_khyed rnams myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/de nas mi rgod rnams kyang drin 
[\[184b.3\]]lan bsab pa'i phyir de ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la gnas pa byang chub yongs su brgyan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bka' 
[\[184b.4\]]drin gyi lan bsab par 'dod pa dag rtag tu sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed cing dran par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_de'i dus de'i tshe na bram ze'i bu de gzhan zhig yin par ma sems shig_/de ltar mi blta'o/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i 
[\[184b.5\]]bur gyur pa de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis bskal pa dgu bcu snyed kyi 'khor ba las 'das nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen po spyod 
[\[184b.6\]]cing drin lan shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa na/_dge slong gcig lus la 'brum bu'i nad kyis btab nas lus la kun nas rnag khrag rgyun du zag pas thams cad kyis mi 'dod de/_gtsug 
[\[184b.7\]]lag khang gi phyi rol gnas khang zhig par gyur pa tha ma zhig gi nang du bzhag go/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'khor mang pos gcig gis kyang mi shes par byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig dge slong nad pa'i thad du 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]gshegs te/_chus bkru bar dgongs nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams shis par bya ba'i phyir brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i 'khor tshad med pa brgya stong gis bskor te lha rdzas kyi me tog char bzhin du phab/_lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas 
[\[185a.2\]]steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i dbang po bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i bum pa dam pa'i nang na snying rje chen po'i chu gtsang mas bkang nas lag na thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de 
[\[185a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mdun nas bsu ste phyogs gcig tu sdod do/_/de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams brgya dang ldan pa'i phyag brkyang nas phyag sor mnyen zhing ring ba lnga las 'od zer chen po bkye nas lha dang 'khor mang po de dag rnams snang bar byas te/_'khor 
[\[185a.4\]]mang po de dag 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung du gshegs te dbu'i spyi gtsug nas 'od zer bkye nas dge slong nad pa snang bar byas so/_/dge slong nad pa de la reg ma thag tu na ba'i sdug bsngal byang bar gyur te/_rma'i rnag khrag dang bcas pa'i 
[\[185a.5\]]lus kyis skyabs su gsol nas lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ma nus pas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag g.yas pas brgya byin lha'i dbang po las rin po che'i bum pa blangs te dge slong nad pa'i spyi bo nas chu blugs te/_phyag g.yon pas dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi 
[\[185a.6\]]rma bkrus shing byugs pas dge slong nad pa'i rma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi rjes su sos par gyur to/_/de ltar rma kun sos nas dge slong de dga' mgu rangs par gyur te sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs rje chen po'i yab la phyag 'tshal 
[\[185a.7\]]lo/_/bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/_/bdag gi lus kyi nad rnams ni deng du sos par gyur na sems kyi nad 'ba' zhig ma sos pas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la chos kyi sman stsal cing sems kyi nad kyang 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]gso bar gsol to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong nad pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod kyi drin shin tu lci bar dgongs pas na de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi drin lan bsab par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe dge slong nad pa de 
[\[185b.2\]]shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pas spro ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_gzengs bstod pa mdzad nas dge slong nad pa de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas rig pa gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_rnam par grol ba brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/_/brgya 
[\[185b.3\]]byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa lha'i 'khor thams cad the tsom du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid phyag dar te dge slong nad pa'i lus kyi rma khrag kun bkrus te/_dge slong 'di la shin tu drin lci ba yod do zhes 
[\[185b.4\]]gsungs pa'i don bdag cag la bkrol zhing bshad du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang lha'i 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed rnams legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_dngos po de dag bstan par bya'o/_/brgya byin 
[\[185b.5\]]lha'i dbang po sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa'i pha rol na rgyal po sdig pa can chos ma yin par byed pa kun la 'phrog rlom byed pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po sdig pa can de la blon po lnga brgya zhig bkug nas dku gsang gcig tu byas te/_gsang la btags 
[\[185b.6\]]nas blon po de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/gang su yang rung khrims las 'gal bar byas na khyed kyis chad pas bcad par dbang bskur gyis/_khyed kyis nor ci thob kyang rung nga dang thun mong du bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe na lnga brgya po des rtag tu gzhu rdeg byed de nor mang du thob pa ni 
[\[185b.7\]]de bzhin du btang /_gang nor med pa la ni srog la bab kyi bar du gnod pa byed de/_de'i tshe na dge bsnyen gcig khrims las 'gal ba cung zad cig byas pas lnga brgya pa'i gan du khrid nas gzhu brdeg bya bar byas pa las dge bsnyen shin tu dge ba yin no zhes thos pas gnod pa 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ma byas par yan par btang ngo /_/de'i rkyen gyis dge bsnyen de yang shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/kau shi ka 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na lnga brgya po de ni dge slong nad pa 'di yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na dge bsnyen du gyur pa de ni da ltar nga nyid yin no/_/
[\[186a.2\]]de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon rol gyi drin yang ba yang lci bas glan pa yin te/_mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang rtag tu mi brjed do/_/de'i tshe na brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang lha'i 'khor mang po rab tu dga' bar gyur te/_lha'i 'khor bzhi khri brgyad 
[\[186a.3\]]stong snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas te/_phyir rang rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[186a.4\]]drin shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi la nan tan bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang /_sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa dang /_don yid la byed pa dang /_ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi la gnas 
[\[186a.5\]]par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_chos la gnas kyi gang zag gi rjes su mi gnas pa dang /_don la gnas kyi yi ge'i rjes su mi gnas pa dang /_ye shes la gnas kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjes su mi gnas pa dang /_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la gnas kyi bkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi gnas 
[\[186a.6\]]pa ste/_chos 'di brgyad la nan tan byed na ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na drin lan bsab pa zhes bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnyed pa dang /_khe dang /_smad pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_grags pa dang /_'phya ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bde 
[\[186a.7\]]ba la mi blta ba'o/_/gzhan yang dngos po 'di bzhi la nan tan byed pa ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya/_drin lan bsab pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis sems can sdig pa can dag mthong na byams shing snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dang /_snying rje bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams mthong na mi skyo bar lta zhing mi gtong ba dang /_dga' ba bsgoms pa'i rkyen gyis slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_pha ma dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa rnams mthong na dga' ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_btang snyoms bsgoms 
[\[186b.2\]]pa'i rkyen gyis dgrar gyur pa'i sems can mthong na zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed pa'o/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bos gos tshags su bcos nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na drin shes pa dang /_drin lan 
[\[186b.3\]]bsab pa'i don gyi dngos po bzhi ci ltar nan tan du mdzad pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[186b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad do/_/skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi 
[\[186b.5\]]don mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_dam pa'i chos dang gzugs brnyan las chos bya ba yang nub nas yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na mi rnams kyang skyid cing bde la lo yang legs te rgyal po de yang drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'tsho'o/_/yul de na ri drang srong 'phags zhes bya ba 
[\[186b.6\]]zhig yod de/_ri de la rgyun tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/_/de ma yin pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong yang mang du gnas so/_/de'i tshe ri de la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang gcan gzan yang mang du gnas te/_de na seng ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba zhig lus kyi spu gser gyi 
[\[186b.7\]]mdog tu 'dug pa/_mthu stobs dang gzi brjid che ba/_skad phyung na bya rnams kyang sa la ltung ba/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyang 'bros pa zhig yod de/_ri de la 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas dge sbyong gi gzugs dang spyod lam du ldan pa gcig dang phrad nas de la shin tu dga' ba'i 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]sems skyes te/_nyin gcig bzhin du nye bar bsnyen nas rgyun du mdo sde klog pa dang dam pa'i chos 'chad pa thos par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na rngon pa chen po ma rungs pa zhig gis seng ge'i pags pa gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems 
[\[187a.2\]]skyes te 'di snyam du sems so/_/gal te bdag gis gser gyi seng ge de bsad de pags pa bshus la rgyal po la phul na gdon mi za bar bya dga' chen po thob par 'gyur te/_rabs bdun gyi bar du phongs pa med par 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/
[\[187a.3\]]seng ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba 'di ni gcan gzan gyi rgyal po yin pas mda' gzhus kyang mi rdzi/_rnyi dang rgyas kyang byar med de/_da bdag gis thabs 'di lta bu zhig bya'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge 'di ltar dge sbyong gi phyi bzhin 'brang bas bdag kyang dge sbyong gi gzugs su 
[\[187a.4\]]byas la/_chos gos kyi 'og tu mda' gzhu sbas la mig phab la gom pa dal bus song ste shing drung zhig tu 'dug na/_des bdag mthong ma thag tu gdon mi za bar bdag gi drung du 'ong ste/_gal te bdag gi drung du 'ongs na gzhu bdungs bkang ste/_dug mda' 'phangs na gdon mi za 
[\[187a.5\]]bar sod do snyam bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag rgyud kyis rngon pa byed byed de gnas na gcan gzan la spu gser du 'dug pa yang ma thos na mthong ba lta ci smos te/_da bdag gis de bsad pa'i phyir skra dang kha spu bregs la/_chos gos gyon 
[\[187a.6\]]nas phyir yang ri de la song nas shing drung zhig na 'dug na/_de'i tshe seng ge yi dam brtan gyis dge slong mthong nas rab tu dga' ste mchong rgal nas dge slong de'i drung du bsnyen te/_rkang pa la bldag go/_/de nas rngon pa des seng ge la mda' 'phangs so/_/de nas dug mdas sdug 
[\[187a.7\]]bsngal bar gyur te skad phyung nas gzung zhing mchong bar byas pa la 'di snyam bsams so/_/'di ni dge sbyong gi gos kha dog bsgyur ba gyon pa yin te/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan yin pas 'di la bdag gis gnod pa byas na dka' ba ma yin na/_gal 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]te 'di la gnod pa byas te srog gi dbang po dang phral nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan ma rungs par byas pa yin no snyam bsams nas cang ma byas par bsdad pa las/_ring po ma lon par dug langs nas lhag par sdug bsngal mi bzod par gyur te/_yang 
[\[187b.2\]]'di snyam du bza' zhing bca' ba'am/_snyam bsams pa las 'di ni dka' ba ma yin na/_gal te bdag gis 'di la gnod pa byas na sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phags pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur te/_'jig rten na dge ba byed pa dang /_sdig pa byed pa yang bye 
[\[187b.3\]]brag med de/_'di ni sdig pa can yin te bdag gsod du 'ongs pas gal te bdag gis de la bzod pa ma byas na ni sdig pa can de dang tha dad pa yang med de/_gang yang bzod pa sgom pa de la thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/_/gang mi bzod pa de la ni thams cad sdang bar 
[\[187b.4\]]'gyur bas de la nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur te/_nyon mongs pa skyes par gyur na skye shi'i 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/skye shir 'khor ba na mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_mi khom pa'i gnas su skyes na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i 
[\[187b.5\]]bshes gnyen dang bral na dam pa'i chos mi thos par 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos ma thos na the tsom gyi dra bas glags par 'gyur/_the tsom gyi dra bas glags par gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang bral bar 'gyur te/_de bas na bdag ni sdig pa'i sems mi 
[\[187b.6\]]bskyed do snyam bsams nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gi lus srog yal bla yi/_/mi dge sdig pa'i sems mi bskyed/_/bdag ni srog dang bral yang rung /_/ngur smrig gyon la gnod mi bya/_/rab tu byung ba'i mi dag la/_/nam 
[\[187b.7\]]du'ang ngan sems mi skyed do/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas tshe'i dus byas par gyur te/_gnam sa yang lan drug tu g.yos so/_/gcan gzan dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyang skrag nas phyogs bzhir bros so/_/sprin med par char pa bab nas nyi ma yang 'od mi snang bar gyur 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]to/_/de'i tshe rngon pa des gos phud nas gri thogs nas pags pa bshus te phyir khyim du song ngo /_/phyir khyim du song nas rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos pags pa de mthong nas rab tu dga' ste blon po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag 
[\[188a.2\]]skyes nas dud 'gro la lus kyi pags pa spu gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa yod pa yong ma thos te/_da 'dir mig gis mngon sum du mthong ba ngo mtshar che'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes rngon pa de la khyod ji lta bu zhig gi thabs byas te pags pa 'di lta bu thob ces dris so/_/de nas rngon 
[\[188a.3\]]pas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po 'jigs pa med pa stsal na drang por smra'o zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin gnang ngo bar bsgo nas rngon pa des kyang ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang tshig de thos nas 
[\[188a.4\]]shin tu mya ngan gyis non te/_dper na mi brnangs pa bzhin mid du yang med la skyug tu yang med pa ltar mi bde bar gyur te/_/blon po chen po thams cad dang /_rgyal phran dang /_'khor mang po kun bsdus te 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyed rnams shes par gyis shig_/ngas 
[\[188a.5\]]sngon mkhas pa shes rab can dag las 'di skad ces thos te/_dud 'gro'i khams su skyes pa'i nang na lus kyi spu mdog gser lta bur 'dug na gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes zer te/_gal te so so'i skye bo las gcig tsam bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[188a.6\]]sems bskyed na/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don chen po byed pa yin/_ci'i phyir rngon pa sdig pa can 'dis de 'dra ba'i thabs byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' bsad pa 'di gal te bdag gis blon thabs sam/_bya dga'a'am/_bal gyi glang po 
[\[188a.7\]]che'am/_rta'am/_rin po che sna bdun nam/_gos sam/_zas sam/_nor ram/_'bru'am/_nor 'di ltar byin par gyur na sdig can de dang 'thun par gyur te de'i grogs su 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas rngon pa de'i srog gi dbang po bcad do/_/de ltar rngon pa de'i srog 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]gi dbang po bcad nas seng ge'i pags pa thogs te ri de la song nas shing glang mgo'i tsan dan spungs te seng ge'i pags pa dang ro bsregs so/_/de ltar seng ge'i ro bsregs nas rus pa bsdus te mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[188b.2\]]kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na seng ge yi dam brtan zhes bya ba de ni da ltar shAkya thub pa nga nyid yin no/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i phyir lus dang srog gi phyir yal 
[\[188b.3\]]yang sla'i sdig pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_drin shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du thob par 
[\[188b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun du brtson 'grus su dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten te khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa gzhom zhing rgud par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig gcig tsam mam/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_don gcig 
[\[188b.5\]]tsam gyi bar du nyan pa la rab tu brtson par byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab tshol ba na chos 'dod pa'i sems dang shin tu ldan pas lus dang srog kyang mi phangs par me ma mur gyi lcags sam/_sa gzhi las kyang 'bog 
[\[188b.6\]]cing 'gro ste gnod par mi sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni tshigs su bcad pa 'ga' tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang srog mi phangs na mdo sde bcu gnyis lta ci smos/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi phyir yang lus dang srog mi phangs na de ma yin pa phyi'i zang zing lta 
[\[188b.7\]]ci smos/_chos thos pa'i don gyis lus dang sems shin tu bde bar 'gyur te/_shin tu dad pa'i sems skyes pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos ston pa mthong na pha ma mthong ba ltar nga rgyal gyi sems mi skye'o/_/sems can gyi don du chos nyan 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]gyi rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed kyi/_bdag la phan pa'i don gyi phyir ma yin no/_/dam pa'i chos kyi phyir rgyal po dang /_bkres skom dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_stag dang /_
[\[189a.2\]]spyang ki la sogs te/_gcan gzan khro bo dang /_rkun po dang /_dgra la sogs pas 'jigs pa ma yin no/_/sngar dbang po rnams kyi nyon mongs pa btul nas de'i 'og tu chos nyan par byed kyi dus ma yin par nyan pa ni ma yin te/_sems rtse gcig tu nyan 
[\[189a.3\]]par byed do/_/chos la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa la rim gro gus par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang drin lan bsab pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa zhe na/_chos nyan pa la rnam pa 'di 
[\[189a.4\]]bzhi ste/_yang dag pa'i sems dang /_rtse gcig pa'i sems dang /_thams cad du thams cad kyi sems dang /_dge ba'i sems dang bzhi ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[189a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin lci ba dran pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kun tu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kun gyi dam pa'i chos skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/_'jig rten pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad par bya ba'i phyir/_sems can 
[\[189a.6\]]thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sems can grangs med pa dran par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' drin lci ba bsab pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la 
[\[189a.7\]]brtson par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni sems can thams cad dad pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do/_/gzhan yang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad shes par bya ba dang /_mu 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]stegs can gyi ngan par lta ba'i gtsug lag gzhig par bya ba dang /_sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i don dang /_'jig rten pa'i tshig gi don rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[189b.2\]]sems dpa' rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed ce na/_sgra'i tshig yongs su dag par brgyan pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa'i tshig gis don gsal bar ston mi nus pa dang /_don 
[\[189b.3\]]thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba dang /_yang dag pa'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shigs pa dang /_ngan par lta ba las bzlog cing sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sgra'i rig pa'i bstan 
[\[189b.4\]]bcos slob par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob ce na/_sems can rnams mi dge ba'i nad brgya rtsa bzhi dang dbral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can rnams 
[\[189b.5\]]dad pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang /_de ltar nad dang bral bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar bya ba dang /_de ltar dga' ba'i sems skyes pas/_rtag tu sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te/_snying rje chen pos sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang 
[\[189b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni ci'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi bzo'i rig pa slob par byed ce na/_sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_nor zang zing rnyed sla bas sems can rnams dad pa 
[\[189b.7\]]bskyed par bya ba rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba'i dngos po kun shes pas nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /_sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /_srid pa'i chos thams cad kyis bsgribs pa kun bsal ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i rig pa slob par byed do/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i dngos po lngar ma bslabs na nam du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi nus so/_/de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir rig pa'i 
[\[190a.2\]]dngos po lnga bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni drin shes pa dang /_drin lan bsab pa ni sems can la bshad pa'i dngos po bshad cing bstan par bya'o/_/ji ltar bshad ce na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/_rig 
[\[190a.3\]]pa lnga dang ldan par bshad par bya'o/_/bshad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/_rim gyis bshad pa dang /_yongs su dag par bshad pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na rim gyis bshad pa zhe na/_sngar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bshad la de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[190a.4\]]pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bshad pa dang /_drin shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa'i phyir/_don yid la byed cing chos bzhin du gnas pa ni rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na/_nyan pa 
[\[190a.5\]]'dug la 'chad pa 'greng na de la bshad par mi bya'o/_/gal te nyan pa chos la skyon tshol lam bshad pa la skyon tshol na de la bshad par mi bya'o/_/gal te nyan pa gang zag la rten gyi chos la mi rten na chos la mi rten pas de la bshad par mi bya'o/_/gal te nyan pa yi ge 
[\[190a.6\]]la rten la don la mi rten na bshad par mi bya ba nas bkri ba'i don la rten gyi nges pa'i don gyi bar la mi rten na bshad par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i chos la ma gus pa'i phyir ro/_/gal 
[\[190a.7\]]te bshad cing ston pa yang chos la bkur sti byed la/_chos nyan pa gang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu nyan cing nga rgyal gyi sems med pa ni yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad bshad pa'o/_/thams 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]cad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde bcu gnyis nas tshig gcig gam/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi bar du bshad pa ste/_de yang tshig gi sgra dang /_don dang /_chos su ldan la/_chos dang don bstan pa yang spro ba dang /_
[\[190b.2\]]gzengs bstod pa dang /_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir dus su bstan pa dang /_dus kha cig tu gshe zhing spyo ba dang /_dus kha cig tu drang por thad kar bstan pa dang /_dus kha cig tu dpe rnams bstan te ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan pa dang /_dus kha cig tu de bas nye zhing sla bar 
[\[190b.3\]]bstan pa dang /_dus kha cig tu ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'jug sla ba bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i drin shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i mchog chos rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[190b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra sdang ba la byams pa'i sems sgom ste/_byams pa'i sems kyis sems can sdig pa dang bcas pa dang /_gang zag bag med pa dang /_le lo can dag la thabs rnam pa mang po nas chos bstan nas rgyags shing dregs pa dang /_
[\[190b.5\]]gang zag dbul phongs pa'i bar du thabs rnam pa mang pos chos ston par byed kyi bdag stod pa'am/_gzhan smod pa'am/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_grags pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' drin shes shing drin bsab pa la mkhas 
[\[190b.6\]]pa'i chos yongs su dag pa bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na chos bzhin du gnas pa yin zhe na/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las dge ba'i chos sgom zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan te/_drin shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa yang bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[190b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drin shes shing drin bsab pa ni don yid la byed de/_mang du thos pas gzungs thob par byed cing chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/_sems can 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_mang du thos pa la brtson par bya/_chos ston cing 'chad pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya'i chos la skyon mi gdags/_ston cing 'chad pa la skyon mi gdags/_gnod pa 
[\[191a.2\]]dang 'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni drin shes pa zhes bya'o/_/lha dang mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thob pa ni drin shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni/_gzhan yang dngos 
[\[191a.3\]]po bzhis bzod pa bsgom zhing mi bzod pa yongs su spangs te byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir/_sems can mang po bsdus nas bzod pa bsgom pa la bkod de/_bdag kyang bzod pa byed de/_gzhan yang bzod pa byed pa la 'god cing 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni drin shes pa zhes 
[\[191a.4\]]bya'o/_/de ltar bzod pa byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_nyon mongs pa mi 'byung bas 'gyod pa'i sems med de/_lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mya 
[\[191a.5\]]ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni drin bsab pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_le lo yongs su spangs nas byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can yongs su sdud do/_/byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir 
[\[191a.6\]]brtson 'grus rtsom pas nyal na yang bde la/_sad na yang bde ste/_nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bde ba'i chos skye zhing 'phel te/_lus kyis bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom 
[\[191a.7\]]yang sems can la mi 'tshe ste/_'tshog rdeg dang /_gshe ba dang /_spyo ba med pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya ste/_lus 'di dang bral nas kyang /_lha dang mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mthu dang dbang du ldan te/_byang chub kyi lam thob pas 'bras bu 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]chen po thob par 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pas 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spangs te/_byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can yongs su sdud do/_/byang 
[\[191b.2\]]chub kyi lam gyi phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas tshe 'di la yang 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong la/_lus dang sems dben zhing zhi ba ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar lus dang sems dben zhing zhi bas sems can la mi 'tshe ba ni drin bsab pa zhes bya ste/_byang 
[\[191b.3\]]chub sems dpa' lus 'di dang bral nas/_rnam par dag pa'i lus thob cing bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod myong ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sgom pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[191b.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa ni shes rab dang ldan pas ma rig pa bcom ste/_byang chub yongs su brgyan pa'i phyir/_bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su sdud do/_/byang chub kyi phyir shes rab bsgoms pas 
[\[191b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings shes shing rtogs pa'i phyir/_lus kyi bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni bdag la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o/_/sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi don dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don bskyed pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o/_/nyon 
[\[191b.6\]]mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis yongs su spangs pas na 'bras bu chen po zhes bya ste/_'di ni drin shes shing drin bsab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon 
[\[191b.7\]]gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pas sngon 'das pa'i dngos po shes rab kyis rtogs te/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang sdig pa'i las brtags nas dge ba'i ris su 'thun pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas dga' ldan gnam du tshe phun sum tshogs par skyes so/_/de na mchog tu gyur pa gsum dang ldan te/_tshe mchog tu gyur pa dang /_gzugs mchog tu gyur pa dang /_grags pa mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/thog 
[\[192a.2\]]ma gnas de nas babs pa'i tshe 'od zer chen po bkye nas phyogs bcu snang bar byas te yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /_lhums na ji srid gnas pa dang /_lhums nas bltam pa'i dus mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang mis ma brten par gom pa bdun 
[\[192a.3\]]bdun bor te 'di skad ces bsgrags so/_/bdag gi da ltar gyi lus 'di ni nangs kyi tha ma ste/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lta 'phye chen po rnams kyis me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[192a.4\]]spos dang /_rol mo dang /_sil snyan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_gdugs dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas so/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas de'i lus las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do/_/byams pa'i shugs kyis bdud kyi 
[\[192a.5\]]dpung rnams bcom mo/_/lhu tshigs re re la yang gyad mthu bo che'i stobs re re dang ldan no/_/gzhon nu bus pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos po ma bslabs par thams cad kun rtogs shing shes so/_/ston pa med par rang btsal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[192a.6\]]pa'i byang chub lhun gyis grub bo/_/tshangs pa'i lha'i dbang pos bskul nas sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas/_'brug sgra bsgrags kyang ma g.yos so/_/gcan gzan rnams nye bar bsten te pha ma 
[\[192a.7\]]bzhin du sdug par bsams so/_/byol song gis bsod snyoms phul ba yang sangs rgyas kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen to/_/lha dang klus char phab ste lus kyi khrus byas so/_/shing ljon pa'i yal ga yang de'i phyogs su btud de grib mas skyabs byas so/_/mngon 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]par sangs rgyas nas kyang lo drug gi bar du bdud ma rungs pas rgyun du glags btsal kyang glags ma rnyed do/_/rgyun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs te/_rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba dang /_'gag 
[\[192b.2\]]pa la shin tu mkhas pas de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/skye ba thun mong ma yin pa ni sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du dper na gang zag smyos pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rkyen gyis sngon gyi 
[\[192b.3\]]sems sor chud pa'am/_dmus long gis mthong bar gyur pa'am/_mngal mgo log tu gyur pa legs par btsas pa'am/_'on pa rna bas thos par gyur pa'am/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug can dug gsum byang bar 
[\[192b.4\]]gyur pa de lta bu ni skye ba thun mong ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang skye ba thun mong zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_rtag tu glo g.yas pa phab nas gzims pa dang /_seng ge'i rgyal po 
[\[192b.5\]]lta bur rtswa 'jag ma ltar mi 'grug pa dang /_rlung gi rgyal po bai ram bas kyang na bza'i mtha' tsam mi g.yo ba dang /_gshegs pa'i gom stabs [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge'am ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar gshegs pa dang /_gshegs su cha ba na zhabs g.yas 
[\[192b.6\]]pa sngar 'dor ba dang /_gnas gang dang gang du gshegs kyang sa gzhi mtho dma' mnyam pa dang /_bsod snyoms la dri nga ba'i skyon med cing zhal nas phyir mi 'brul ba ni skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis 
[\[192b.7\]]mi khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/_zhabs kyi mthil mnyam zhing gang ba yin/_zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa yod pa yin/_phyag sor phra la ring ba yin/_zhabs kyi rting ba zlum la gang ba yin/_phyag sor gyi bar dra bas 'brel ba yin/_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin/_zhabs kyi byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po e na ya ltar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin/_zhabs kyi long bu phyir mi snang ba yin/_phyag pus mor slebs pa yin/_rta'i rgyal po 
[\[193a.2\]]ltar mtshan sbubs kyi nang du nub pa yin/_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar sku'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa yin/_sku'i ba spu gyen du nyal ba yin/_ba spu re re nas g.yas su 'khyil ba yin/_sku mdog gser btso ma ltar 'dug pa yin/_rtag pa'i 'od 'dom 
[\[193a.3\]]gang dang ldan pa yin/_pags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang dri mas mi gos pa yin/_gnas bdun yongs su gang ba yin/_sku'i stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa yin/_phyag gi lag ngar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin/_sgrog rus mnyam 
[\[193a.4\]]par gang ba yin/_sku'i stod smad 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin/_zhal gyi tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yin/_tshems kyi thags bzang zhing mnyam pa yin/_tshems kyi mdog dkar ba yin/_'gram pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ltar gang ba 
[\[193a.5\]]yin/_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin/_sha'i do ker gyi mtshan dang ldan pa yin/_ljags ring la yangs pa yin/_tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/_spyan gyi mdog mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa yin/_spyan khyu mchog gi rgyal po ltar 'dug 
[\[193a.6\]]pa yin/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po dang ldan pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan te/_dpe byad bzang po re re la yang dpe byad bzang po'i mchog dam pa brgya stong snyed yod de/_dpe byad bzang po de 
[\[193a.7\]]dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' thog ma byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub la shin tu brtan pas drin shes shing drin bsab pa'i phyir spyod pa dam pa de dag spyad de/_de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon yun ring po bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs pas/_zhabs kyi mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma 
[\[193b.2\]]dang /_gang zag yon tan dang ldan pa la mchod pa dang /_bkur stir byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/sems can rnams la mi 'tshe zhing 'phrog pa dang rku ba'i sems med la pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_
[\[193b.3\]]yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rgyang ma nas bsu bskyal byas shing khri stan bting la nga rgyal spangs te/_rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phyag byas pas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo phra zhing ring bar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/gong du smos pa'i 
[\[193b.4\]]bya ba gsum dang ldan pas rting ba zlum la gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba mang po yongs su bsdus pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/mar 
[\[193b.5\]]dang 'bru mar gyis pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi lus la bskus shing mnyes pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang lag mnyen zhing ring la 'jam pa yin no/_/dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mi skyo bas/_de'i 
[\[193b.6\]]rgyu de'i rkyen gyis thal gong mnyam la lag ngar zlum zhing shugs kyis gzhol ba yin no/_/chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par yang mos te/_chos kyi phyir mngag gzhug gi las byas na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis long bu'i rus pa mi snang ba'i 
[\[193b.7\]]mtshan dang ldan no/_/sgo gsum yongs su dag cing nad g.yog dang /_sman gyi sbyin pa byin te/_nga rgyal med la bza' ba dang /_btung ba la chog shes pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis lus drang por 'greng na lag pas pus mor slebs pa yin no/_/'khon 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]gcugs su gyur pa la tshig 'jam pos bsdums te/_/bdag kyang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i chos spyad de gzhan yang spyod du bcug na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_rta'i rgyal po ltar mtshan sbubs kyi nang du nub pa yin no/_/bdag 
[\[194a.2\]]gi sgo gsum yongs su dag la/_gzhan yang yongs su dag par byed cing /_sems can dag 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'khrugs te/_nad du gyur pa'i sman dpyad kyis gsos pas na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_lus kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[194a.3\]]yin no/_/chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par mos pas na/_lus kyi ba spu gyen du nyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin/_chos kyi don zab mo yid la bgyid cing dge ba'i chos sgom par mos la/_pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma 
[\[194a.4\]]dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag la mchod pa byas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang /_lam srang na 'dug pa'i bong ba'am/_rdo ba'am/_tsher ma'am/_mi gtsang ba med par byas na/_de'i 
[\[194a.5\]]rgyu de'i rkyen gyis spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/pha rol po gzhan dag la zas dang /_skom dang /_rgyan dang /_de la sogs pa byin zhing zhe sdang gi sems med na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gser btso 
[\[194a.6\]]ma'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /_'od rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/ci'i las kyis ba spu'i khung bu re re nas spu re re skyes pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhe na/_las de nyid kyi rgyu las gyur te/_las kyi rgyu de nyid kyis lus mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang dri 
[\[194a.7\]]mas mi gos pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/sems can dag la/_dgos pa'i zang zing rgyun du gtong bas na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/bdag gi nga rgyal dang dregs pa bcom nas/_rang 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bzhin gyis mnyen zhing des pa'i sems kyis sems can gyi yid dang sbyor te/_/chos bzhin du spyod la/_mi dge ba'i chos spangs pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos ston na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_ro stod [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge lta bu'i mtshan dang /_smin mtshams 
[\[194b.2\]]dang /_sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang /_sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang /_lus kyi mtha' yang zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/phra ma yongs su spangs te/_rtsod cing 'khon pa'i bsdums byas pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so 
[\[194b.3\]]bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /_so'i thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang /_so mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi byams pa bsgoms pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_so dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/slong ba 
[\[194b.4\]]mthong na dga' ba'i sems kyis bsu bskyal byas pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du 'dra bar lta bas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_ro bro ba'i 
[\[194b.5\]]mchog gi mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/sems can la bla na med pa'i chos kyi ro rtag tu gtong zhing brjed cing mi dran pa la yang dran par byas te/_bdag kyang tshul khrims lnga srung la gzhan yang bsrung bar bskul zhing byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin 
[\[194b.6\]]pa chen po byas na/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan dang lce ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/bden pa'i tshig dang /_chos kyis dga' ba'i tshig dang /_mnyen des pa'i tshig smra'i/_dus ma yin pa'i tshig mi 
[\[194b.7\]]smra bas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no/_/snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas sems can rnams la pha ma lta bur lta bas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mig mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa dang /_mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bu'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/yon tan dang ldan pa'i legs pa mi bcabs shing /_bstod cing bsngags pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[195a.2\]]gnyis 'di dag gi rgyu dang rkyen sa sor bshad mod kyi/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen yang dag pa ni/_tshul khrims dang brtson 'grus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te tshul khrims ma bsrungs/_brtson 'grus ma spyad na/_mi'i lus kyang thob par 
[\[195a.3\]]mi nus na/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang /_sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan gnyis la tha dad pa med do/_/gzhan yang ci byed do cog la gcig tu ma nges te/_'gyod pa'i sems med na/_de'i 
[\[195a.4\]]rgyu de'i rkyen gyis/_rkang mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan thob bo/_/de yang sems rtse gcig tu byas na/_de'i rgyus 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /_mtshan gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_sor mo'i bar 'brel pa dang /_gnas 
[\[195a.5\]]bdun mnyam par gang ba dang /_mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /_phrag pa zlum pa dang /_sgrog rus gang ba dang /_lus drang ba dang /_lce ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no/_/de yang bya brtag tu byas na/_de'i rgyus sor mo ring 
[\[195a.6\]]ba'i mtshan dang /_lag pas pus mor slebs pa'i mtshan dang /_'od rtag pa 'dom gang gi mtshan dang /_so thags bzang zhing ya yo med pa'i mtshan thob bo/_/bya ba yongs su dag par byas na/_de'i rgyus mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob 
[\[195a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sems can dag la dge ba 'ba' zhig gi sems bskyed pas/_de'i rgyus rkang lag mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /_pags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la/_rdul dang dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan thob bo/_/rim gyis 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]bsgom zhing spyod pa dang /_dus bzhin du bsgoms shing spyod pas de'i rgyus/_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'i mtshan thob bo/_/dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mos shing /_'gyod pa'i sems med pas/_de'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser lta 
[\[195b.2\]]bu dang /_'od rtag pa dang /_so dkar ba dang /_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i mtshan thob bo/_/bstod cing bsngags na yang nga rgyal mi skye la/_bdag gi legs pa bcabs te rlom sems med na de'i rgyus rta lta bur mtshan sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan thob bo/_/
[\[195b.3\]]dge ba'i las ci byas pa byang chub tu bsngos na de'i rgyus/_ba spu'i khung re re nas spu re re skye ba'i mtshan dang /_ba spu gyen du nyal ba dang /_so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang /_ro bro ba'i mchog gi mtshan thob bo/_/rtag tu brtson 'grus byas na/_de'i rgyus 'gram 
[\[195b.4\]]pa'i lha nga zlum pa dang /_lus kyi stod seng ge lta bu'i mtshan thob bo/_/sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par bsams pas de'i rgyus so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa dang /_mig mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang /_
[\[195b.5\]]mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan thob bo/_/dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la skyo zhing ngal ba'i sems med pas mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe mtshan 
[\[195b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi las byed do/_/rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod mod kyi/_yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_gsal ba ma yin no/_/spyod pa bcu gsum pa la gnas pa na mtshan rnams kyang mngon 
[\[195b.7\]]par gsal bar yongs su rdzogs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mtshan grangs med mod kyi sems can rnams la mi 'thun te/_rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma yod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pas na/_de bas na/_sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji tsam yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu gcig gi mtshan dang mnyam mo/_/
[\[196a.2\]]ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed cig yod pa/_gcig tu bsdus te spungs nas/_dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyam mo/_/dpe byad bzang po ji tsam yod pa'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas na mtshan 
[\[196a.3\]]gcig dang mnyam ste/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba'i mtshan ni ma gtogs so/_/de ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_stong 'gyur du byas na/_mtshan gong ma 
[\[196a.4\]]gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa gcig tu bsdus spungs te khri phrag stong 'gyur du byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug sgra lta bu'i dbyangs zab cing 
[\[196a.5\]]rgyang ring por grags pa'i mtshan dang mnyam ste/_gsung sgra des ni/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed du grags shing /_sems can gyi don du byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po spyod pas/_drin 
[\[196a.6\]]shes pa dang /_drin bsab pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de ltar mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag re res kyang /_so so'i skye bo tshad med grangs med pa bye ba brgya stong gis sa chen po'i rdul phra rab snyed la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas nas/_byang chub 
[\[196a.7\]]tu sems bskyed du bcug go/_/de ltar mthar gyis/_bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs nas/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam gnyis thob ste/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs nas/_byang chub kyi shing drung du song ste/_bdud kyi dpung 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]rnams btul te/_mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/so so'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'dod pa'i chu'i klung las bsgral nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gram du bkod de/_sems can 
[\[196b.2\]]thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis/_kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs te/_'khor mang po thams cad la/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[196b.3\]]rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams la su zhig sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin rtag tu gzo zhing /_dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir/_thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo 'di/_glegs bam du bri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed 
[\[196b.4\]]par 'gyur/_su zhig gis phyi ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus chen po bskyed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di srung zhing gzungs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_su zhig gis chos bsrung ba'i phyir/_mdo sde 'di rgyas par spel 
[\[196b.5\]]zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don byed par nus/_zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri brgya stong snyed 'dug pa las langs te/_gos tshags bcos nas 
[\[196b.6\]]blo gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_bdag cag gis slad ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe/_bla na med pa 
[\[196b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung zhing /_dam pa'i chos gzungs su bzung ste/_sems can mang po la phan pa'i don byed par spro'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]'das/_bdag kyang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/_sems can gang ngan 'gro gsum du ltung bar 'gyur ba dag_/bdag 
[\[197a.2\]]gis ci nas kyang mi ltung bar bgyi bar spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_sems can rnams ci dang ci 'dod pa/_bdag gis thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[197a.3\]]ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_bdag gis ni/_sems can rnams la ye shes chen po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbyin par bgyi ba spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag 
[\[197a.4\]]gis ni/_sems can rnams la chos yongs su sbyin par spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis ni/_sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin par spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 
[\[197a.5\]]'od kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis ni/_sems can rnams la bsod nams kyi las byed du gzhug par bskul bar spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge sbyong gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis ni 
[\[197a.6\]]sems can rnams la thams cad bag med pa la mi gnas par bskul bar spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis ni/_sems can thams cad la/_zad pa mi shes pa'i dbyings 
[\[197a.7\]]kyi/_don mthong bar bstan par spro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag ni sems can thams cad la/_bla na med pa'i bde ba sbyin pa bgyi bar spro'o/_/zhes byang chub 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sems dpa' de dag_/so so nas dam bcas so/_/byang chub yongs su brgyan cing /_sems can thams cad la phan zhing /_bde ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab pa'i phyir/_
[\[197b.2\]]stan las langs nas/_thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde 'di/_bdag cag la gtad du gsol/_zhes gsol to/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i 
[\[197b.3\]]mtshan ci zhes bgyi/_/ji ltar yongs su gzung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde 'di'i ming /_dge ba'i dngos po kun bsdu ba zhes kyang bya/_thabs mkhas pa chen po zhes kyang bya/_dgongs 
[\[197b.4\]]pa dam pa'i spyod pa zhes kyang bya/_sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis/_kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed rnams 
[\[197b.5\]]ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du/_nan tan du spyod cig_/sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gdams pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_nyan thos bdun khri nyis stong gis/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/gzhan yang /_lha 
[\[197b.6\]]dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_de la sogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/thabs mkhas 
[\[197b.7\]]pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las/_nye bar bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]{D354}]@##/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal 
[\[198a.2\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dang /_lha dang mi'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing sems rtse gcig tu chos nyan pa dag la chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[198a.3\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos sems can rnams kyi ched du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'jig rten na rnam pa gcig tu mir skyes par mtshungs pa la/_kha cig ni sdug cing kha cig ni byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang /_kha cig ni dpa' zhing 
[\[198a.4\]]kha cig ni zhan pa dang /_kha cig ni dbul zhing kha cig ni phyug pa dang /_kha cig ni sdug bsngal zhing kha cig ni bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_kha cig ni ya rabs su gyur cing kha cig ni ma rabs su gyur te/_sgra dbyangs mi mtshungs shing skad tha dad par gyur pa dang /_kha cig 
[\[198a.5\]]ni lo brgya lon kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la kha cig ni lo sum cu lon nas sngar 'gum pa dang /_kha cig ni lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon nas glo bur du 'chi ba dang /_kha cig ni ma'i mngal nyid du 'gum pa dang /_kha cig ni byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang /_kha cig ni dbul zhing ma 
[\[198a.6\]]rabs su gyur la byad bzhin mi sdug pa dang /_kha cig ni phyug cing ya rabs su skye ba dang /_kha cig ni dpa' zhing dman par gyur la/_kha cig ni zhan cing rigs mthon por skyes pa dang /_kha cig ni sdug bsngal zhing tshe ring la kha cig ni bde zhing tshe thung ba dang /_kha 
[\[198a.7\]]cig ni dge ba spyad kyang nongs skyon dang bcas par gyur la/_kha cig ni sdig pa bgyis kyang bsod nams kyi phan yon thob pa dang /_kha cig ni tsho zhing dkar yang mig ya yor gyur cing mi gsal la/_kha cig ni sngo zhing gnag kyang mngal byad dang ldan pa dang /_kha cig 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ni thung zhing bong chung yang sems rtsal dang ldan pa dang /_kha cig ni ring zhing bong che yang gzhan dag gi g.yog bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni bu tsha mang la kha cig ni gcig pu gnas pa dang /_kha cig ni slad rol du rgyu zhing bkres pa dang /_grang ba dag gis nyen par 
[\[198b.2\]]'gyur la/_kha cig ni khyim na gnas kyang gos zas dag la dga' 'byor pa dang /_kha cig ni gzhon pa'i tshe dbul zhing phongs la rgas pa'i tshe gdod phyug por 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig ni yus ma mchis bzhin du yang nongs pa ma mchis par nan gyis go rar stsal ba dang /_
[\[198b.3\]]kha cig ni pha ma yang snying rje dang ldan la bu yang sri zhu che zhing mdo sde dang gtsug lag gi don gleng bar bgyid la/_kha cig ni phu bo nu bo so sor phye nas 'thab cing rtsod par bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni khang khyim dag brtsigs nas 'byor pa sna tshogs dang ldan la/_kha cig ni 
[\[198b.4\]]khang khyim ma mchis pas gzhan dag la rten pa dang /_kha cig ni bya 'dab chags bzhin du shing dang thang la gnas pa dang /_kha cig ni gcan gzan gyi rnam pa dang mtshungs shing spu'i gos dang ldan pa zas su rtswa 'tshal zhing khrag 'thung ba dang /_kha cig ni yi ge ma 
[\[198b.5\]]'tshal ba dang /_kha cig ni ci yang ma bgyis par bde ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur la/_kha cig ni sla ba bgyid pa'i gnas kyang mi rnyed pa dang /_kha cig ni dbang po gsal bas shes pa dang ldan la/_kha cig ni dbang po mi gsal bas shes pa dang mi ldan pa dang /_
[\[198b.6\]]kha cig ni btsal na gdod thob par 'gyur la/_kha cig ni ma btsal bar yang rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig ni phyug kyang ser sna che la/_kha cig ni dbul por gyur kyang gtong ba la dga' ba dang /_kha cig ni tshig smras pa rnams mnyan zhing des la/_kha cig ni tshig 
[\[198b.7\]]smras pa rnams gtum zhing brlang ba dang /_kha cig ni mang po kun gyis bkur zhing snying du sdug par 'gyur la/_kha cig ni mang po kun gyis thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gso bar bgyid la/_kha cig ni srog chags dpag 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]tu ma mchis pa dag gsod par bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni yangs pa mang po kun gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur la/_kha cig ni gzhan dag gis spong bar bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni chung ma dang gyos sgyug la sogs pas sdang bar 'gyur la/_kha cig ni gnyen 
[\[199a.2\]]bshes kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig ni chos kyi tshig mnyan par dga' ba dang /_kha cig ni mdo sde thos nas gnyid log bgyid pa dang /_kha cig ni dpa' zhing rtsal dang ldan yang zhes ma mchis la kha cig ni tshig 'bru dang don dag la slob par mos pa dang /_kha 
[\[199a.3\]]cig ni dud 'gro'i dbyibs tha dad pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag gda' na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu gang lags pa rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol/_'khor mang po rnams kyis thos shing rtogs par 'gyur la sems rtse gcig tu dge ba la gzhol bar 
[\[199a.4\]]'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis ji ltar dris pa de de bzhin te/_rnam par smin pa myong bar mi mtshungs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni tshe rabs snga ma dag_/las kyi spyod pa mi mnyam pa'i dbang gis na 
[\[199a.5\]]tha dad pa'i bye brag brgya stong mang po myong bar gyur pa yin te/_tshe 'di la byad bzhin sdug pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa dang du blangs pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/byad bzhin mi sdug pa gang yin pa de ni khong khro ba las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang dbul por gyur pa gang 
[\[199a.6\]]yin pa de ni ser sna byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang phyug por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa btang ba las 'ongs pa yin no/_/ya rabs mthon por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan dag la gus par phyag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/ma rabs su gyur pa gang 
[\[199a.7\]]yin pa de ni nga rgyal byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lus ring zhing bong che ba gang yin pa de ni gus pas bkur sti byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/lus thung ngu gang yin pa de ni chos la brnyas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang bka' blo mi bde ba gang yin 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]pa de ni sngon lug byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gnag cing rid pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba bsgribs pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mchu mi sdug pa gang yin pa de ni mchod rten gyi zas myangs pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur 
[\[199b.2\]]kyang mig dmar ba gang yin pa de ni me'i ser sna byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mig mi gsal ba gang yin pa de ni khra'i mig brus pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lkugs pa gang yin pa de ni chos la skur pa btab pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur 
[\[199b.3\]]kyang 'on par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos thos par mi dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang so rnon por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rus pa 'cha' zhing sha za bar mngon par dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang sna dgye bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dri mi 
[\[199b.4\]]zhim pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mchu sho rer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nya'i 'gram pa phug pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang skra ser por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phag gi spu btogs pa las 'ongs 
[\[199b.5\]]pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rna ba ral bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan dag gi rna ba phug pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lus kyi sha brur lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gos yang zhing srab pa dag bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 
[\[199b.6\]]'ongs pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mdog gnag pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs khyams dag gi 'og tu bzhag nas dud pas bdugs pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rkang lag zha bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mkhan po 
[\[199b.7\]]dang /_slob dpon dang bla ma rnams mthong yang ldang ba med pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang sgur por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gos yang zhing srab pa dag bgos nas phan tshun du 'gro ba'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la rgyab kyis phyogs pa las gyur pa 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]yin no/_/mir gyur kyang 'phral ba mi sdug pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i tshe phyag kyang mi byed la/_lag pas 'phral bar brdabs pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gnya' ba thung ba gang yin pa de ni bla ma dag mthong nas mgo sbas 
[\[200a.2\]]te bros nas 'byol ba las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rtag par snying na ba gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi lus kyi yan lag bcad cing gtubs pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mdze can du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nyes pa med par gzhan dag gi nor blangs pa las 
[\[200a.3\]]gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang dbugs thung ba gang yin pa de ni dgun grang ba'i dus kyi tshe gzhan dag la zas grang mo dag byin pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang bu khye'u dang bu mo med par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya mang po rnams kyi phru gu bsad pa las gyur pa yin 
[\[200a.4\]]no/_/mir gyur nas bu tsha mang ba gang yin pa de ni sems can gso bar dga' ba las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas tshe ring ba gang yin pa de ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas tshe thung ba gang yin pa de ni srog chags mang po 
[\[200a.5\]]bsad pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas phyug por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa btang ba las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas rta dang shing rta dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni dkon mchog gsum la rta dang shing rta phul ba las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas dbang po 
[\[200a.6\]]gsal ba gang yin pa de ni mdo sde 'dri zhing kha ton 'don pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang dbang po mi gsal ba gang yin pa de ni dud 'gro'i gnas nas 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gzhan gyi bran dang bran mo byed pa gang yin pa de ni bu lon chags pa las 'ongs pa yin 
[\[200a.7\]]no/_/mir gyur kyang mi brtan zhing yang ba gang yin pa de ni sngon spre'u byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mdze nad kyis btab pa gang yin pa de ni dkon mchog gsum rnam par bshig pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rkang lag 'jam 'grus su gyur 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi rkang lag dam du bcings pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lus la rma dang shu ba 'byung zhing yun ring por sman dang dpyad byas kyang sos su mi btub pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la brdeg btsog byas pa las gyur pa yin no/_/
[\[200b.2\]]mir gyur kyang rang bzhin mi srun pa gang yin pa de ni sdig sbrul byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas dbang po drug tshang ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang dbang po rnams ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims 
[\[200b.3\]]'chal pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gtsang sbra med pa gang yin pa de ni phag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas glu gar la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni rol mo mkhan byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang 'dod chen che ba gang yin pa de ni khyi 
[\[200b.4\]]byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas gnya' bar lba ba yod pa gang yin pa de ni gcig pu bsnogs pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas kha'i dri mnam pa gang yin pa de ni tshig ngan gyis gzhan la spyos pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang pho 
[\[200b.5\]]mtshan dang mi ldan pa de ni khyi dang phag rnams kyi rlig pa bcad pa las gyur pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas lce thung ba gang yin pa de ni dben pa dag tu bla ma dag la tshig mi snyan pa brjod pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur nas gzhan gyi chung ma la g.yem par mngon par dga' 
[\[200b.6\]]ba de ni shi 'phos nas bya ngang pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur kyang bdag dang nye zhing gnyen du 'brel pa dag la g.yem par mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas bye'u mchil pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur nas mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag la ser 
[\[200b.7\]]sna byed cing shes kyang sbas nas gzhan dag la mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas shing srin dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur nas mda' gzhu thogs shing gzhom pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas kla klo can du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rngon pa byed 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]cing srog chags gsod pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas 'phar spyang dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo rgyan dang me tog thogs pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas/_gcin rtug gi srin bu byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[201a.2\]]gos ring po gyon par dga' ba de ni/_shi 'phos nas srin bu mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]byed par 'gyur ro/_/nyal zhing za bar mngon par dga' ba de ni shi 'phos nas phag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gos tshon can gyon par mngon par dga' ba de ni shi 'phos nas bye'u khre'u byed par 'gyur 
[\[201a.3\]]ro/_/gzhan gyi tshig zlos shing ku re byed par mngon par dga' ba de ni shi 'phos nas bya ne tso byed par 'gyur ro/_/phra ma byed pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas sbrul lus po che dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes pa med par dgra la rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de 
[\[201a.4\]]ni shi 'phos nas srin bu 'khon du 'dzin pa'i sems dang bcas pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi dbyen byed par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas srin bya dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dmod mo'i tshig smra ba la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas wa dag 
[\[201a.5\]]tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag skrag cing dngang bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sha ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe snga ma la shing gi lham bgos nas dri gtsang khang du zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'di la rta'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[201a.6\]]tshe snga ma la 'phyen gtong ba la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni srin bu mnam po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi gtun dang rang thag yongs su spyod pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'di la srog chags srin bu mgo rdebs pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe snga ma 
[\[201a.7\]]la gzhan dag gi zas kyi gegs byas na tshe 'di la shing srin byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi chu brkus nas yongs su spyad pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'di la nya dang chu srin dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi sa gzhi dag la mi gtsang ba 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni bshang gci'i nang du 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]srin bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pa gang yin pa de ni 'jim rdzab za ba'i srin bu byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi dkor brkus pa gang yin pa de ni rang thag 'dren pa'i glang dang bong bu byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi dkor la nan gyis slong zhing snga 
[\[201b.2\]]skyin byed na [(]phu [,]phug [)]ron dkar po byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun la 'phya zhing dmod par byed na glang gi gnya' ba'i srin bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi tshod ldum zos na tshod ma'i srin bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi khri stan la 'dug na sa'i srin bu mjug [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]skye 
[\[201b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi yo byad sna tshogs dag la yongs su spyod par byed na phye ma leb tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rus pa dag thogs nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par byed na bya mchu [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dmar rtsi dang dkar rtsi dag mchu la bskus nas gtsug lag 
[\[201b.4\]]khang du 'jug par byed na bya mchu dmar ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gos tshon can bgos te/_gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar byed na bya kha dog ser po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/khyo shug gtsug lag khang du gnas nas nyal po byas na bya mgo sngon dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[201b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la brdzis na rnga mo'i lus byed par 'gyur ro/_/lham bgos te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri gtsang khang du 'gro bar byed na sbal par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/chos nyan pa'i tshe klag cor zer na ni bya lce brgya pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma gtsang 
[\[201b.6\]]ma sun par byed na shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas lcags kyi brag phug tu ltung zhing ral gri'i 'khor lo brgya stong du ma dus gcig tu babs nas lus gcod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[201b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs pa ltar dge 'dun gyi rdzas yongs su spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la yang dag par shin tu lci ba zhig lags par gyur na sbyin bdag bzhi po ji ltar gtsug lag khang du mchi zhing bkur sti dang phyag 'tshal bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de/_dge ba'i sems dang mi dge ba'i sems gang yin pa'o/_/dge ba'i sems zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_gang gis gtsug lag khang du phyin nas de 
[\[202a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa mthong na phyag byed pa dang /_dge 'dun mthong na gus par bkur sti byas nas mdo sde'i don 'dri bar byed pa dang /_sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas nyes pa 'chags par byed pa dang /_nor rdzas dag yongs su btang nas dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta 
[\[202a.3\]]byed pa dang /_lus dang srog la phangs pa med par chos chen po yongs su bsrung zhing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag ni gom pa gcig 'dor bar byed na yang lha'i gzhal med khang drung du 'ong zhing /_ma 'ongs pa na khyim bdag shug de ka bzhin 
[\[202a.4\]]du rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni skyes bu mchog tu dge ba zhes bya'o/_/mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa ji lta bu zhe na/_sems can gang la la zhig gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa'i tshe dge 'dun la slongs mo dang /_g.yar po dang /_snga 
[\[202a.5\]]skyin 'ba' zhig bya bar sems pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi skyon tshol zhing rtse gcig tu rnam par bshig pa 'ba' zhig tu 'dod pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zas zos na yang sems la gnod pa ci yang med cing khur ba dang /_shing tog dang /_ldam ldum dag khyer nas rang 
[\[202a.6\]]gi khyim du 'gro bar byed pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag shi 'phos ma thag tu lcags kyi thu lum za ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing zangs kyi nang du btso ba dang /_sbar ba'i mes bsregs pa dang /_ral gri lta bu'i ri lo ma can gyi ljon shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 
[\[202a.7\]]gang yang mi myong ba med par 'gyur te/_'di ni skyes bu mchog tu mi dge ba zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi slob ma dag la rjes su bstan pa yin gyis bag yod par bsgrims te/_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]po dag la nyes pa mi byed pa dang /_nur ba'i sems skye ba med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' stsal pa bzhin byed na/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[202b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_tshe 'di la gzhan gyi lus las gos bshus te phrog par byed na shi 'phos nas grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba dang /_gzhan yang dar gyi srin bur skyes nas 'tshed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sku gzugs dang mdo sde'i spyan sngar mar me sbar bar 
[\[202b.3\]]mngon par mi dga' na shi 'phos nas ri khor yug gi bar na sems can dmyal ba'i gnas mun nag yod pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sems can gyi srog bcad pas dmyal zhing gtub par byed na shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba mtshon ltar rab tu rno ba'i 
[\[202b.4\]]ri la ral gri lo ma can gyi ljon shing 'dzeg pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la kha cig sdig gtong zhing rngon pa byed par mngon par dga' ba de dag ni shi 'phos nas sog les 'dral ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mang du 'dod pas 
[\[202b.5\]]log par g.yem pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas zangs kyi ka ba rab tu 'bar ba la 'ju ba dang /_lcags kyi khri rab tu tsha ba la nyal ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la chung ma mang po 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni lcags kyi rang thag tu 'thag pa'i 
[\[202b.6\]]sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la khyim thab mang po bdog pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas sbrul gdug pa dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sgo nga bsregs pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas me ma mur rab tu tsha ba 
[\[202b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la phag dang bya rnams bshu shing 'thog pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas zangs dag tu 'tshed pa'i sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la phag dang khyi'i rlig pa 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]shi 'phos nas rdo zur dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la chang 'thungs nas myos par byas pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags khu 'thung ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sems can gyi lus kyi 
[\[203a.2\]]yan lag bcad cing gtub pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi thu lum za ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung 
[\[203a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la phag gi rgyu ma dang sha zos pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas ljan ljin gyis gang ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la nya gson por zos pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas mtshon cha dang /_dbyig pa dang /_ral gri'i so 
[\[203a.4\]]can gyi ljon shing dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la ma yar mor gyur nas chung ma snga ma'i bu dag la ner pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas me rab tu 'bar ba'i shing rta dang ldan pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la 
[\[203a.5\]]phra ma byas nas dkrugs ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi thong gshol gyis rmo ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mi snyan pas gzhan dag la spyos pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lce rab tu 'byin pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung 
[\[203a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mang du smras pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lce lcags kyi gzer gyis 'debs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la srog bcad nas log pa'i lha la mchod sbyin byas pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi gtun 
[\[203a.7\]]gyis brdungs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas 'dre gdon gyi tshig 'don cing gzhan dag bslus te nor blangs pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas sha'i ri lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas mig 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]btsums te/_sa la nyal nas gzhan dag la mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes drang po ma yin pa'i 'dre gdon dag gis len pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas rked pa gtub pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas gzhan dag gi srog bcad 
[\[203b.2\]]de/_lha 'dre dang lam lnga'i sa'i bdag po dang srin mo la sogs pa la mchod pa byed du bcug pa gang yin pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni skyes bu blun po rnams 'drid pa yin pas shi 'phos nas sta res gcod pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[203b.3\]]sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis yan lag bcad cing gtub pa dang /_bya lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyis mig gi 'bras bu gnyis la 'thog par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bon mo byas nas mi shi ba'i ro rnams sbed pa dang /_khang khyim rnams kyi bzang ngan dang /_
[\[203b.4\]]rigs lnga po rnams kyis khe 'thob pa dang /_mi 'thob pa lta ba dang /_klu rnams bde bar 'god pa dang /_dar gyi srin bu dag la gtang rag gtong ba dang /_srin mnan nas skyes bu blun po dag bslus te/_nor mang por blangs pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig gis bzang ngan ston pa gang 
[\[203b.5\]]yin pa de dag ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi dra ba can gyi sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur bas bya 'dab chags ma rungs pa tshad med pa snyed de'i lus la 'dus te/_sha rnams ma lus par zos nas rus pa dang rgyus pa rnams kyang 'thog par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med 
[\[203b.6\]]pa dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sman pa byas te/_nad gso bar mi nus bzhin du gzhan dag la bslus te nor blangs pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas gtar ba dang /_me btsas bsregs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur bas lus la kun tu me rab tu 'bar ba'i 
[\[203b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang bshig pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ma nyan pa dang /_pha ma la sri zhu med pa gang yin pa de dag ni shi 'phos nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]po dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dang /_gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chung ngu brgya sum cu rtsa drug po kun tu 'jug cing bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa gnyis sam/_bskal pa lnga brgya'i bar du sdug
