[\[204a.2\]]bsngal myong nas de'i 'og tu gdod thar bar gyur te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur la/_gal te phrad par ma gyur na ni slar yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mir gyur kyang lus 
[\[204a.3\]]kyi bong che zhing shin tu mnam pa dang /_khro skyen zhing dgrol dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sngon gyi rnga mo byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang 'gro ba la dga' zhing zan za ba 'grus pa dang /_nyam nga ba dag la 'byol ba med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon rta byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/
[\[204a.4\]]mir gyur kyang grang ba dang /_tsha ba dag bzod cing sems la 'dzin pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon glang byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang sgra skad che ba dang /_ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa dang /_sred pa dang /_grang ba mang zhing legs nyes kyi bye brag mi phyed pa gang yin 
[\[204a.5\]]pa de ni sngon bong bu byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rtag par sha la brkam zhing bya ba dag la 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon seng ge byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lus ring zhing mig zlum pa dang 'brog dgon pa na mang du rgyu ba dang /_bu dang chung 
[\[204a.6\]]ma la sdang ba gang yin pa de ni sngon stag byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang spun zhing mig chung ba dang /_gnas gcig tu gnas par mos pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon bya 'dab chags byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rang bzhin mi brtan zhing srog 
[\[204a.7\]]chags phra mo gsod pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni sngon gyi wa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang dpa' zhing bshor ba dang /_'dod chags chung zhing chung ma la sred pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon spyang ki byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gos bzang po 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]la mi dga' ba dang /_ma yin pa byas pa dag la rtog pa dang /_gnyid chung zhing zhe sdang mang ba gang yin pa de ni sngon khyi byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang g.yem pa la dga' zhing skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba'i gtam brjod pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa 
[\[204b.2\]]de ni sngon ne tso byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang lus kyi bong chung zhing g.yem pa la dga' ba dang /_sems rtse gcig tu mi gnas pa dang /_gzugs mthong ma thag tu mngon par zhen pa'i sems 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sngon bye'u mchil pa byas pa las 
[\[204b.3\]]'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang mig dmar zhing so thung ba dang /_smra ba'i tshe lbu ba 'byung zhing nyal na gos kyis lus dkri bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sbrul dang rtsangs pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang smras ma thag tu khong khro zhing pha rol gyi don la so sor mi 
[\[204b.4\]]rtog par ngag gi gdug pa 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sdig pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang gcig pu dben par gnas shing zas la brkam pa dang /_mtshan mo gnyid chung ba gang yin pa de ni sngon byi la byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/mir gyur kyang rtsig 
[\[204b.5\]]pa phug nas rkun po byed pa dang /_nor la brkam zhing 'khon 'byung sla ba dang /_nye ring gi mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni sngon byi ba byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mir gyur kyang mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang bshig pa 
[\[204b.6\]]dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor sbas nas bdag nyid kyir yongs su spyod pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba las thar bar gyur na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus 'di lta ste/_phug 
[\[204b.7\]]ron dang /_mchil pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_ne tso dang /_bye'u sngon po dang /_nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_spre'u dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi lus len par 'gyur ro/_/brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang ma ning dang /_bud med dang /_mtshan gnyis pa dang /_dbang po med pa dang /_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]smad 'tshong ma dag tu 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur kyang khong khro ba dag la mngon par dga' ba de ni shi 'phos nas sbrul gdug pa dang /_stag dang /_seng ge dang /_spyang ki dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_byi la dang /_bya khra'i rnam pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya 
[\[205a.2\]]la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang khyim bya dang /_phag gsod pa dang /_shan pa dang /_rngon pa byed pa dang /_bya shor ba dang /_btson srungs byed pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur kyang glen zhing gti mug pa dang /_rigs pa'i tshul gang yin 
[\[205a.3\]]pa mi shes pa de ni shi 'phos nas glang po che dang /_phag dang /_ba lang dang /_chu glang dang /_sro shig dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_grog ma la sogs pa'i lus len par 'gyur te/_gal te mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang 'on pa dang /_long ba dang /_
[\[205a.4\]]lkugs pa dang /_lus kyi yan lag ma tshang ba dang /_rgyab sgur ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dag tu 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur kyang khengs shing nga rgyal che ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas mi gtsang ba'i gnas kyi srin bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_stag dang /_khyi 
[\[205a.5\]]dag tu ltung bar 'gyur te/_gal te mir skyes na yang bran mo'i lus len cing dbul phongs pas slongs mo byed pa dang /_mang po kun gyis brnyas shing smad pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mir gyur kyang bla ma'i mthu bsnyems pa'i rgyus gzhan gyi nor len pa gang yin pa de ni shi 
[\[205a.6\]]'phos nas sha'i ri lta bu'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo brgya stong mang pos lus kyi sha bcad nas za bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la gzhan dag bgrang du gzhug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phos nas glang po che dag tu skye zhing rkang lag drang bas nyal du 
[\[205a.7\]]med pa dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mchod ston dral nas nub mo zan zos pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phos nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dre bkren dag tu ltung bas lo brgya phrag mang por bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang po thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba'i tshe lhu tshigs kun tu me rab tu 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sgren mor 'dug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phos nas grang bas sgribs pa'i srin bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mchod ston gyi zas lhag ma khyer ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lcags kyi sa gzhi rab tu tsha ba'i sems 
[\[205b.2\]]can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la mir skyes par gyur na yang lkog ma nad kyis btab pa dang /_tshe thung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phyag byed na yang mgo bo sa la mi gtug pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas mgo thur du dpyangs 
[\[205b.3\]]pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya lam na mi'i nang du skyes na yang gzhan dag gis mang du slu bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la phyag byas pa na thal mo mi sbyor bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas yul mtha' 'khob 
[\[205b.4\]]dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing 'bad pa mang pos btsal yang ci yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la dril chen gyi sgra thos kyang mi ldang ba gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas sbrul lus chen po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur zhing lus ring la che bas srog chags phra mo mang po rnams kyis bza' 
[\[205b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la lag pa rgyab tu bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas phyin ka log tu bcings pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te/_gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang nyes pa med par gyod 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[205b.6\]]ro/_/tshe 'di la thal mo sbyar nas yan lag lngas sa la gtugs te/_phyag byas pa gang yin pa de ni rtag par cho rigs btsun par 'gyur zhing rgyun du bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la khro skyen zhing lto la 'khong ba gang yin pa de ni sngon smyon pa byas pa las 'ongs pa yin no/_/tshe 
[\[205b.7\]]'di la mig ya yor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sngon log pa'i sems kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la bltas pa las gyur pa yin no/_/tshe 'di la chung ma'i non byas nas pha ma la spyos pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas lce thong gshol gyis rmed pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]tshe 'di la chang gi nang du bsnan te/_gzhan dag la byin pa gang yin pa de ni shi 'phos nas chu'i nang du srin bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_brgya la mi'i nang du skyes par gyur na yang lus skrang zhing dbugs thung bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[206a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_ji skad du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs mang po de dag thams cad ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa bcu'i dbang las gyur pa yin pas rab gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu dang rkyen byed par 'gyur ro/_/'bring gang yin pa de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 
[\[206a.3\]]rgyu dang rkyen byed par 'gyur ro/_/tha ma gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyu dang rkyen byed par 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba des ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mir skyes par 
[\[206a.4\]]gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_tshe thung ba dang /_nad mang ba gang yin pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 
[\[206a.5\]]byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_dbul zhing phongs pa dang /_nor thun mong du 'gyur zhing rang dbang med pa gang yin pa'o/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni sems 
[\[206a.6\]]can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_chung ma gzhan gyis byi ba byed pa dang /_chung ma dang phan 
[\[206a.7\]]tshun rtsod cing bdag gi sems kyis bsams bzhin du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_skur pa mang ba dang /_rtag par gzhan gyis mang du bslus par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/phra ma byas pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa des ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[206b.2\]]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_rtag par sgra mi snyan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang /_gang ci smras kyang rung ste/_rgyun tu rtsod pa can du 
[\[206b.3\]]'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/tshig kyal pa smras pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa 
[\[206b.4\]]gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_bden pa zhig smras na yang gzhan dag yid ches par mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshig smras pa rnams gzhan gyis go bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/brnab sems bskyed pa'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa de ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba 
[\[206b.5\]]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_nor la brkam zhing chog shes pa med pa dang /_mang du tshol zhing rtag par yid bzhin du mngon par 
[\[206b.6\]]grub par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/gnod sems kyi kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa des ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam 
[\[206b.7\]]pa gnyis myong bar 'gyur te/_rtag par gzhan gyis glags tshol bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag par gzhan gyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/log par lta ba'i kha na ma tho ba gang yin pa des ni sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar byed do/_/gal te mir skyes par gyur na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur te/_rtag par log par lta ba'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems g.yo sgyu dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin 
[\[207a.2\]]pa'o/_/kye sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams de ltar na sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po rnams ni sdug bsngal mang po sna tshogs kyi phung po chen po'i rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po de nyid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bcu po dag byas pa gang yin pa de 
[\[207a.3\]]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /_de dag thams cad skad cher phyung ste ngus nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge ba ji lta bu zhig spyad na sdug bsngal 
[\[207a.4\]]'di dag las thar bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi las la gzud par bya ste/_ji ltar bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya zhe na/_sems can gang la la zhig tshe 'di la yongs su bskul ba'i bdag po chen 
[\[207a.5\]]po byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang dri gtsang khang dang /_gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/_ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar rgyal po byed cing skye bo mang po la dbang byed par 'gyur bas gang yang ngag mi nyan pa med par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la grong dang grong gi gtso bor 
[\[207a.6\]]gyur kyang drang dkan che zhing chos bzhin du skyong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar rgyal po'i blon po byed par 'gyur zhing gos zas dang /_rta phun sum tshogs pa dang ci dang ci 'dod pa 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la skye bo mang po bsod nams byed par bskul zhing 
[\[207a.7\]]gzung ba gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar cho rigs btsun zhing shin tu phyug pa'i khyim bdag tu 'gyur bar skye bo mang po kun gyis bkur ba dang /_phyogs bcu po dag tu don gnyer ba rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mar me btsugs nas mchod pa 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]byed pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni nyi zla'i lhar skye bar 'gyur bas 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sbyin pa gtong ba la dga' ba dang /_byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gso bar dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad phyug 
[\[207b.2\]]por 'gyur bas gos zas dag rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la skye bo mang po rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad du lha'i zas rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[207b.3\]]dbang po rno zhing spobs pa dang ldan pa dang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis dud 'gro'i gnas su song ba rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgya 'gyur snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dod chen pa dag la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam 
[\[207b.4\]]par smin pa stong 'gyur snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam par smin pa khri 'gyur snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis theg pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i snying po 'khor mang po la yang 
[\[207b.5\]]dag par bsgrags nas sems kyi mig 'byed pa'i chos smra ba gang dag la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam 
[\[207b.6\]]par smin pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa med pa snyed la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gang zag rnam pa gsum la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_pha ma 
[\[207b.7\]]dang nad pa rnams so/_/zas za gcig tsam yongs su btang bas kyang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/rtag par yongs su btang bas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_tshe 'di la dge 'dun mang po'i sku bsil 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis gos zas dang ldan pa dang /_skye bo mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_mdo sde'i chos klog cing kha ton du 'don 
[\[208a.2\]]par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sgra dbyangs snyan cing thos pa rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la tshul khrims srung bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin sdug cing mi'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/
[\[208a.3\]]tshe 'di la lam kar khron pa brkos nas skyed shing btsugs nas grib ma mang po kun la sgrib par mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad du mi'i rgyal po byed cing ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di 
[\[208a.4\]]la mdo sde bris te/_gzhan dag la byin nas klog tu bcug pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams cad du bdag gi spobs pa mang po dang ldan pa dang /_chos bslab pa la lan cig thos pa tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang 
[\[208a.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob cing yongs su srung ba dang /_rtag par mi'i nang na mchog dam pa gtso bo byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la zam pa dang /_gru gzings bcas nas skye bo mang po sgrol bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba thams 
[\[208a.6\]]cad du rin po che sna bdun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skye bo mang po kun gyis bkur zhing bsngags pa brjod nas mngon par dga' ba dang /_phan tshun 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i tshe mang po kun gyis bsnyen bkur dang /_rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[208a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngas ji skad du mdo sde de dang de dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan nas sems can mang po rnams klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_mngon par bsgrub par bskul nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]de bzhin du 'dir yang de ltar bstan pa yin pas/_gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skur pa 'debs par byed pa de ni tshe 'di nyid la lce'i dbang po ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces 
[\[208b.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ste/_byang 
[\[208b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub par smon lam btab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_lha dang mi stong phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/
[\[208b.4\]]bud med brgya stong du ma tshe 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po med par gyur nas skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par [{]gyurd [,]gyur [}]to/_/sdig pa spyod pa'i skye dgu stong nyis brgya ni gdug pa'i sems spangs nas bdag gi tshe rabs dran par [{]gyurd [,]gyur [}]to/_/dge ba spyod pa'i skye bo tshad 
[\[208b.5\]]med pa dag ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob nas rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to/_/tshe 'pho bar 'gyur ba tshad med pa snyed ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i grogs su gyur to/_/bcom 
[\[208b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor 'dus pa thams cad rang gi gnas su dong ste/_bsod nams mngon par 'du byed cing rab tu dga' bas dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to/_/'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa zhes 
[\[208b.7\]]bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de chos grub kyis rgya gar dang rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]{D355}]@#/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa'i mdo/_bam po gcig go/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na dze ta'i tshal skyabs med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_byang chub sems 
[\[209a.2\]]dpa' tshad med pa dang /_lha dang mi'i 'khor mang pos bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de nas dga' bos 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rigs 'thun pa'i nang 
[\[209a.3\]]'dir skyes pa las/_bzang po yang mchis/_mi sdug pa yang mchis/_drag po yang mchis/_zhan pa yang mchis/_dbul po yang mchis/_phyug po yang mchis/_nyon mongs pa yang mchis/_bde ba yang mchis/_btsan pa yang mchis/_ma rabs kyang mchis/_
[\[209a.4\]]skad ni mi mtshungs/_tshig ni mi 'thun/_la la ni lo brgya lon nas 'chi ba yang mchis/_la la ni sum cu'am/_bcu lon nas 'chi ba yang mchis/_la la ni byad bzhin bzang yang dbul la/_la la ni mi sdug pa la phyug pa yang mchis/_nyams rtsal che ba ni ma rabs kyi 
[\[209a.5\]]nang na yang mchis/_nyams rtsal chung la gral mtho ba yang mchis/_la la ni nyon mongs la tshe ring ba yang mchis/_la la ni skyid cing tshe thung /_la la ni legs par spyod pa la byur dang phrad/_la la ni mi dge ba spyod pa la legs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yang mchis/_dkar 
[\[209a.6\]]zhing sha bzang la mig yo ba yang mchis/_la la ni sngo zhing gnag la mdangs dang ldan pa yang mchis/_la la ni lus chung zhing thung la snying rtsal dang ldan pa yang mchis/_la la ni che zhing ring yang gzhan gyi bran g.yog bgyid pa yang mchis/_la la ni bu tsha mang ba yang 
[\[209a.7\]]mchis/_la la ni rmongs pa yang mchis/_la la ni rtag par phyi rol du 'khyam la bkres pa yang mchis/_la la ni pho brang gi nang na 'dug cing gos dang zas kyis mi brel te longs spyod pa yang mchis/_gzhon na dbul zhing rgas na phyug cing btsan pa yang mchis/_drang 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]dkan che zhing 'gal bar mi byed pa las gyod la thogs pa yang mchis/_pha ni byams bu ni sri zhu che ste/_gtsug lag gi yi ge dang gzhung smos shing bshad pa yang mchis/_spun mi 'thun nas rtsod pa yang mchis/_gnas mtho zhing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan 
[\[209b.2\]]pa yang mchis/_bdag gi khyim med la 'dron thabs su gnas pa yang mchis/_bya dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_gcan gzan dang 'dra bar gnas pa yang mchis/_gos su bal gos gyon zhing zas su sha za zhing yi ge mi shes pa yang mchis/_mi g.yo bar 'dug 
[\[209b.3\]]kyang skyid cing yon tan thob pa yang mchis/_gla za zhing gnas pa yang mchis/_yid gzhungs shing khong grol ba yang mchis/_rmongs shing blun la ngan pa yang mchis/_btsal te ma rnyed pa yang mchis/_ma btsal te rnyed pa yang mchis/_phyug cing btsan la nor 
[\[209b.4\]]dang ldan la ser sna che ba yang mchis/_dbul la sbyin pa la sred pa yang mchis/_tshig smra na bden zhing mnyen par zer ba yang mchis/_tshig smra na gzer ba bzhin du zug pa yang mchis/_gzhan gyis byams shing bkur ba yang mchis/_kun gyis spangs shing 
[\[209b.5\]]bsrings pa yang mchis/_snying rje'i sems kyis sems can gso ba yang mchis/_bag med par srog gcod pa yang mchis/_khong yangs shing kun dang 'thun pa yang mchis/_kun gyis mi 'dod pa yang mchis/_mna' ma dang sgyug mor mi 'thun pa yang mchis/_tshag 
[\[209b.6\]]pa mo dang 'dza' ba yang mchis/_la la ni chos kyi gtam la dga' ba yang mchis/_la la ni mdo sde thos nas gnyid bro ba yang mchis/_la la ni brdal bag can la mdzangs pa yang mchis/_la la ni gtsug lag khang la dga' zhing bsgom pa la 'grus/_la la 
[\[209b.7\]]ni byol song gi gzugs dang mtshungs/_la la ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba yang mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyas par bshad na 'khor mang po kun gyis thos nas sems rtse gcig tu dge ba'i rjes su phyogs par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo khyod kyis ji ltar rnam par smin pa mi 'dra bar 'dri ba de bzhin du/_de dag kun kyang tshe rabs snga ma la spyod pa mi 'thun pas/_de'i phyir na khyad par sna tshogs su gyur to/_/de la da ltar byad bzhin bzang po ni 
[\[210a.2\]]bzod pa las 'ongs so/_/mi sdug pa ni zhe sdang dang khong khro ba las 'ongs so/_/dbul phongs pa ni ser sna las 'ongs so/_/btsan zhing che ba ni sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal ba las 'ongs so/_/mi ma rabs thams cad ni rgyags shing dregs pa las 'ongs so/_/
[\[210a.3\]]lus ring zhing bzang ba ni bkur sti byas pa las 'ongs so/_/lus thung ba ni chos la le lo byas pa las 'ongs so/_/blun pa ni lug las 'ongs so/_/skam zhing gnag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa las 'ongs so/_/mchu dma' ba ni chos ston pa'i zas 
[\[210a.4\]]la myangs pa las 'ongs so/_/mig tshag pa ni me bslangs pa mi ster ba las 'ongs so/_/mun sros nas mig mi mthong ba ni khra'i mig brus pa las 'ongs so/_/lkugs pa ni dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa las 'ongs so/_/'on pa ni chos thos su mi dga' ba las 
[\[210a.5\]]'ongs so/_/so sto ba ni rkang dang rus pa la sred pa las 'ongs so/_/sna bsnyer ba ni spos mi zhim pa bsregs te sangs rgyas la mchod pa las 'ongs so/_/sho re ni nya'i mchu phug pa las 'ongs so/_/skra ser ba ni phag gi spu btogs pa las 'ongs so/_/rna ba ral ba 
[\[210a.6\]]ni rna ba phug pa las 'ongs so/_/thang sbrul 'dra ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gyon te sangs rgyas la snyogs pa las 'ongs so/_/ngams gnag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs khyim mam khyams su bzhag pa las 'ongs so/_/zhar ba dang gyol ba ni mkhan po dang bla ma mthong 
[\[210a.7\]]ste mi ldang ba las 'ongs so/_/sgur ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gyon zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku la rgyab kyis phyogs pa las 'ongs so/_/dpral ba 'bur ba ni sangs rgyas mthong nas phyag gus par mi 'tshal zhing lag pa dpral bar gtugs pa las 'ongs so/_/mjing ba thung 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]ba ni btsun pa dang bla ma mthong nas mgo smad cing byol ba las 'ongs so/_/mchin pa na ba ni sems can gyi lus gtubs shing gtsags pa las 'ongs so/_/mdze can ni gzhan gyi nor ma 'os par blangs pa las 'ongs so/_/lud pa mang ba ni dgun mi gzhan la zas grang 
[\[210b.2\]]mo byin pa las 'ongs so/_/bu tsha med pa ni bya phrug mang po bsad pa las 'ongs so/_/bu tsha mang ba ni sems can mang po gsos pa las 'ongs so/_/tshe ring ba ni snying rje che ba las 'ongs so/_/tshe thung ba ni srog gcod pa las 'ongs so/_/phyug pa ni sbyin pa byas pa 
[\[210b.3\]]las 'ongs so/_/rta dang shing rta bdog pa ni dkon mchog gsum la yon phul ba las 'ongs so/_/dbang po rno ba ni slob pa la 'grus pa dang mdo sde kha ton du byas pa las 'ongs so/_/rmun po ni byol song las 'ongs so/_/bran pho dang bran mo byed pa ni bu lon ma gzhal 
[\[210b.4\]]ba las 'ongs so/_/spro thung ba ni spre'u las 'ongs so/_/yang mdze can ni dkon mchog gi rten bshig pa las 'ongs so/_/yan lag ma tshang ba ni sems can gyi rkang lag bcad pa las 'ongs so/_/gdug pa ni sbrul dang sdig pa las 'ongs so/_/dbang po drug tshang ba 
[\[210b.5\]]ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa las 'ongs so/_/dbang po drug ma tshang ba ni tshul khrims bshig pa las 'ongs so/_/gtsang sbra chung ba ni 'phags pa la ma mchod pa las 'ongs so/_/glu gar dang rol mo la dga' ba ni rol mo mkhan las 'ongs so/_/'dod chags che ba ni bya 
[\[210b.6\]]las 'ongs so/_/lba ba can snog pa las 'ongs so/_/kha dman pa ni tshig rtsub mo smra ba las 'ongs so/_/mtshan dang mi ldan pa ni khyi dang /_phag dang /_rta'i 'bras bu bton pa las 'ongs so/_/lce thung ba ni btsun pa dang bla ma la kha byas pa dang lkog tu 'phyas pa las 
[\[210b.7\]]'ongs so/_/gzhan gyi chung ma la g.yem pa byas pa ni ngang mo dang ngur par skye'o/_/gnyen dgu la g.yo byas pa ni bye'u mchil par skye'o/_/mdo sde dang gtsug lag gi yi ge spyod cing ser snas gzhan la mi ston pa ni tshe'i dus byas nas thang gi srin bur skye'o/_/mda' gzhu 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]thogs pa dang rta zhon pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la 'phar ba dang spyang kir skye'o/_/skra thung ba dang mgo rgyan btags pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin bu mchu [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]skye'o/_/nyal zhing za ba la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la phag tu skye'o/_/dar tshon gyi gos la dga' 
[\[211a.2\]]ba ni bye'u khre'ur skye'o/_/mi snyan pa zlos shing ku re la dga' ba ni bya ne tso ru skye'o/_/phra ma byed pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la lto 'phye mgo drug par skye'o/_/ma 'os par ku re byed pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin bu rmongs par skye'o/_/gtam ngan skyel ba la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la 
[\[211a.3\]]srin byar skye'o/_/mi la gnod pa dang ngan du dga' zhing gtam la sred pa ni tshe phyi ma la war skye'o/_/mi dngangs pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin bu do log tu skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la shing lham gyon zhing lha khang du 'gro ba ni tshe phyi ma la rtar skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la 'phyen bag med par btang 
[\[211a.4\]]bas ni tshe 'di la sbur bar skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi rang 'thag dang gtun la spyad pa ni tshe 'di la srin bu mgo rdebs su skye'o/_/sems can gyi zas la gegs byas pas ni bya shing rta mor skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi chu brkus pas ni nya dang rus sbal la sogs pa 
[\[211a.5\]]chu'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can du skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la dge 'dun sme bar byas pas ni gtsang sbra'i srin bur skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pas ni mchis pa za ba'i srin bur skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pas ni rang 'thag skor ba'i bong bu dang glang du skye'o/_/dge 
[\[211a.6\]]'dun gyi nor nan gyis bskyi brnya byas pas ni bya phug ron du skye'o/_/dge 'dun la spyo ba byas pas ni glang gi gnya' ba'i srin bur skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi ldum skyur zos pas ni ldum bur rtsa ba gang gi srin bur skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi khri stan la 'dug pas ni srin bu mgo dmar du skye'o/_/
[\[211a.7\]]dge 'dun gyi nor sna tshogs la spyad pas ni srin bu 'phye bor skye'o/_/mgo la rus pa'i thur ma btur nas lha khang du 'gro na bya mchu [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]skye'o/_/dkar rtsi dang dmar rtsis byugs te lha khang du 'gro na bya skyung kar skye'o/_/dar tshon gyi gos gyon te lha khang du 'gro na bye'u se rur skye'o/_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]khyo shug zhag lon te lha khang du nyal na srin bu mgo sngon du skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mjug stegs 'cha' zhing 'dug pa ni rnga mor skye'o/_/lham dang 'bob gyon zhing gzhal med khang du 'gro na sbal par skye'o/_/chos nyan pa'i tshe long gtam zer na bye'u 
[\[211b.2\]]lhan dkar du skye'o/_/dge slong khrims dag pa la mi gtsang bar bskyed pa ni lcags kyi sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/ral gri 'khor lo khri phrag brgya snyed du char pa lus kyi steng du 'bebs shing de'i lus gtubs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[211b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar dge 'dun gyi nor la spyad pa sdig lci bar gsungs te/_gal te de ltar dge ba'i las la phyogs pa dang /_sbyin bdag la sogs pa ji ltar gtsug lag khang gi nang du bsti stang bgyid pa dang /_phyag 
[\[211b.4\]]'tshal bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha khang du 'gro ba la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de/_dge ba'i sems dang /_mi dge ba'i sems so/_/de la ji ltar na dge ba'i sems zhes bya zhe na/_lha khang du phyin pa'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong 
[\[211b.5\]]na phyag 'tshal zhing /_dge 'dun la bkur sti byed cing /_mdo sde 'dri'am/_'don nam/_khrims nod dam/_sdig pa bshags pa'am/_dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi nor la sogs pa gtong ngam/_srog la yang mi chags par dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni gom pa gcig 
[\[211b.6\]]bor bas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyim bdag tu zhugs te/_de dang 'dra ba'i longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ni dge ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no/_/de la gang mi dge ba ni lha khang du 'jug pa'i tshe dge 'dun la slongs mo dang bskyi brnya byed pa 
[\[211b.7\]]dang /_dge 'dun la skyon tshol zhing klan ka tshol ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi zhal zas zos kyang tshim pa med cing /_bza' shing dang /_shing tog dang /_ldum skyur la sogs pa khyim du khyer ba de lta bu ni shin tu dmyal ba'i 'khor lo dang /_shin tu 'bar ba dang /_ral gri'i ri dang /_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ral gri'i shing la sogs pa'i dmyal bar shin tu sdug bsngal len par 'gyur ro/_/de ni mi dge ba'i mchog ces bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo khyod ma 'ongs pa'i tshe nga'i nye gnas rnams la dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la ma spyod par 
[\[212a.2\]]'dug cig ces gros thob shig_/de ltar ma gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar byas na sangs rgyas byams pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe gdon mi za bar grol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshe 'di la gzhan gyi nor 'phrog na/_tshe phyi ma la shin tu 
[\[212a.3\]]grang ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/dar gyi srin bur 'gyur te/_btso zhing bzhu bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang mdo sde la mar me yis snang ba med par byed cing mi dge ba ni kho ra khor yug gi mun nag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la shan pa byed 
[\[212a.4\]]cing sems can mang po'i srog gcod pa ni ral gri dang /_ral gri'i nags tshal gyi sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la khra dang khyi la sogs pa gtong zhing rngon pa byed pa la dga' ba ni lcags kyi sog le'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la log par g.yam pa la dad pa che ba 
[\[212a.5\]]ni zangs kyi ka ba dang /_lcags kyi khrag gi sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la chung ma mang du blangs pa ni lcags kyi gtun gyi dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la bud med skyes pa dang mang du nyal ba ni sbrul gdug pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/_tshe 'di la bsreg cing btso ba'i 
[\[212a.6\]]thal ba 'bab pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/_tshe 'di la phag dang khyi'i spu btogs pas ni shin tu bskol ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la phag dang khyi dang rta'i 'bras bu bton pas ni rdo zug rngu'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la chang mang du 'thungs pas ni/_zangs khu 'thungs pa'i 
[\[212a.7\]]dmyal bar skye'o/_/tshe 'di la sems can gtubs shing dmyal bas ni lcags kyi 'khor lo'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pas ni lcags kyi thu lum gyi dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la khyi dang phag gi rgyu ma zos pas ni mi gtsang ba'i dmyal bar ltung 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la nya bshor bas ni ral gri'i nags tshal gyi dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la ma yar mo byas te/_snga ma'i bu la ner pa byed pa ni me'i shing dum gyi dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la dbyen byed pa ni lcags kyi gshol gyi dmyal bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[212b.2\]]tshe 'di la tshig ngan pas mi la spyo bas ni lce med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba ni lcags kyi gzer bus gzer ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la srog gcod cing lha'i srin la rjed pas ni lcags kyi bsnyung bu'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la bon mo byed cing 'dre 
[\[212b.3\]]bos so zhes [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer zhing nor len pa ni shal ma ri'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la bon byed cing mig btsums nas khyod kyi bla ma mchod 'os so zhes zer zhing slu ba ni sked par gtubs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la bon byed cing srog gcod du bcug ste/_lha srin rjed du 
[\[212b.4\]]bcug pa ni sta res gtubs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/_bsrungs mas lus gtubs shing lcags kyi bya mchu can gyis mig gnyis kyi 'bras bu btsogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la bon byed cing gshin rngog tu 'dur ba dang /_khang khyim bzang ngan lta ba dang /_rigs lnga'i khams 
[\[212b.5\]]bde mi bde lta ba dang /_glen pa bslus te nor mang du len pa ni lcags kyi dra bar bcug pa'i dmyal bar skye'o/_/bya ma rungs pa grangs med pas lus kyi steng du 'dug nas steng gi sha zad nas rus pa dang rgyus pa btogs te/_sdug bsngal mu med pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di 
[\[212b.6\]]la sman byed cing nad pa gso mi nus par [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis nor len pa ni lcags kyi thur mas btsugs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste/_lus la kun du me 'bar ro/_/tshe 'di la lha khang dang mchod rten bshig cing dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang mkhan po la bag med par sri zhu chung ba ni mnar 
[\[212b.7\]]med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du mthar gyis 'gro'o/_/de nas sems can dmyal ba chen po brgya sum cu rtsa drug gi nang du 'gro ste/_la la ni bskal pa gcig_/la la ni bskal pa gnyis/_la la ni bskal pa lnga'i bar du 'gro ba nas/_gzod mthar phyin 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te ma phrad na slar yang sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi lus bong che zhing gnag la spro thung ba 'gro ba la dga' ba ni rnga mo las 'ongs 
[\[213a.2\]]so/_/'gro ba la sred la za ba la rngam ste/_nyam nga ba la 'byol ba ni stag las 'ongs so/_/tsha ba dang grang bas mi 'jigs shing gzugs che ba ni glang las 'ongs so/_/sgra che zhing 'dzem bag med la gang 'dod pa dam du 'dzin cing bzang ngan bye brag mi phyed pa ni bong bu 
[\[213a.3\]]las 'ongs so/_/rtag tu sha la sred cing rngam ste 'jigs pa med pa ni seng ge las 'ongs so/_/lus ring zhing mig zlum la ri'am dgon par shin du 'gro la chung ma la sdang ba ni stag las 'ongs so/_/spu ring zhing mig zlum ste gnas gcig tu mi dga' ba ni bya las 'ongs 
[\[213a.4\]]so/_/'gyur ldog che zhing srin bu gsod pa la dga' ba ni wa las 'ongs so/_/dpa' bshor che zhing khrel 'dzem chung zhing chung ma dang bu la sred pa ni spyang ki las 'ongs so/_/g.yon can gyi ngos 'dzin la gnyid chung la khro ba ni khyi las 'ongs so/_/khro ba la dga' zhing smra bar ni 
[\[213a.5\]]'dod la mi kun gyis byams pa ni ne tso las 'ongs so/_/mang por 'dus shing smra ba la dga' zhing mya ngan mang ba ni bya khu byug las 'ongs so/_/bong chung zhing g.yem pa la dad che ste snying mi brtan pa ni bye'u mchil pa las 'ongs so/_/mig tshag la spro thung la kha nas lbu ba 'ong la nyal 
[\[213a.6\]]ba'i tshe na lus sbrid 'dod pa ni rtsangs pa las 'ongs so/_/smra na khro zhing pha rol gyi tshig mi go la khro la mi la gdug pa'i tshig 'byung ba ni sdig pa las 'ongs so/_/gcig pu 'dug cing za ba la brkam ste nub mo gnyid chung ba ni byi la las 'ongs so/_/khyim phugs dang rku ba la 
[\[213a.7\]]dad che ste gnyen ngo mi shes pa ni byi ba las 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang la la zhig gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten 'jig cing /_gang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi rdzas blangs shing spyad na tshe phyi ma la bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]skye ste/_ci ste der skyes nas dmyal ba las thar na yang 'di lta ste/_phug ron dang /_mchil pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_ne tso dang /_bye'u ske sngo dang /_nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_spre'u dang /_phag pa dang /_sha bar skye'o/_/gal te mir skyes na yang /_ma ning dang /_bud med dang /_
[\[213b.2\]]mtshan nyid pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa spun pa la sogs par skye'o/_/mi zhe sdang che ba ni sbrul gdug pa dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_byi la dang /_khra la sogs pa thams cad du skye'o/_/ci ste mi lus thob na yang bya dang /_phag 
[\[213b.3\]]dang /_gsod pa la dad cing /_rngon pa dang /_btson rdzir 'gyur ro/_/gti mug che zhing dge mi dge'i bye brag mi phyed pa ni tshe phyi ma la bal glang dang /_phag dang /_ba lang dang /_lug dang /_ma he dang /_shig dang /_lji ba dang /_sbrang ma dang /_mchu bsnyung dang /_grog mo 
[\[213b.4\]]la sogs par skye'o/_/ci ste mi lus thob na yang /_'on pa dang /_dmus long dang /_lkugs pa dang /_lba ba can dang /_sgur po la sogs par skye'o/_/yan lag ma tshang ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba'i lus su 'gyur te/_chos la nan tan byed mi nus so/_/rgyags shing 
[\[213b.5\]]dregs pa ni tshe phyi ma la mi gtsang ba'i nang gi srin bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_khyi dang /_rta la sogs par skye'o/_/ci ste mi lus thob na yang bran khol du skye'o/_/dbul phongs te slongs mo byed la thams cad kyis brnyas shing dmad par 'ong ngo /_/gang dbang po yod 
[\[213b.6\]]pas bran du gzer zhing gzhan gyi nor la len pa ni tshe phyi ma la shal ma li'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/_sems can khri phrag brgyad stong snyed sos sha gcod cing za bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la pha rol po 'greng du mi dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la ba lang gi lus su skye ste/_rkang 
[\[213b.7\]]lag rengs shing nyal mi shes pas gnyid log tu med par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mchod ston zos pa'i nub mo zas zos na tshe phyi ma la 'dre ltogs su 'gyur ro/_/lo khri brgya stong gi bar du bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/yan man du 'gro ba'i tshe 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]tshigs thams cad du me 'bar ro/_/tshe 'di la sgren mor 'dug par dad pa ni spu nyung ba'i bya rtag tu 'bod par skye'o/_/tshe 'di la mchod ston gyi zas zos kyi lhag ma khyim du khyer ba ni tshe phyi ma la lcags 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/ci ste mir skyes na 
[\[214a.2\]]yang lkog nad can dang /_tshe thung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe dpral ba sa la ma gtugs na spyi'u tshugs kyi dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/ci ste mir skyes na yang mi'o cog gis brnyas shing slu bar skye'o/_/tshe snga ma la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i 
[\[214a.3\]]tshe thal mo mi sbyor ba ni tshe phyi ma la mtha' 'khob tu skye ste/_las mang du byas te 'bras bu 'grub pa chung ngo /_/tshe 'di la zhal ton nyal nas mi langs pa ni tshe phyi ma la lto 'phye'i ris su skye'o/_/lus ring zhing che ba ni srin bu pho mo thams cad kyis za bar 'ong ngo /_/tshe 'di la 
[\[214a.4\]]lag pa bsnol te sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni tshe phyi ma la phyin ka log tu bcings pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/mi ru skyes na yang nye bar gyod la thogs par 'ong ngo /_/tshe 'di la thal mo sbyar te yan lag smad lnga sa la gtugs te/_rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis 
[\[214a.5\]]sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni gang nas gang du skyes par rtag tu btsan zhing skyid par 'ong ngo /_/tshe 'di la 'khong zhing spro thung ba ni byol song las 'ongs so/_/tshe 'di la mig yon por 'dug pa ni gzhan gyi chung ma la mig zur gyis stegs pa las 'ongs so/_/tshe 'di la chung ma'i 
[\[214a.6\]]non byas te pha ma la rgol ba ni lce gtubs pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/tshe 'di la chang gi dbang du sred pa ni tshe phyi ma la chu'i srin bur skye'o/_/ci ste mir skyes na yang lha gor dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' 
[\[214a.7\]]bo ngas ji ltar bshad pa'i sdug bsngal mang po rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyis mi dge ba rnams las gyur te rab ni sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/'bring ni byol song gi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/tha ma ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pas sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_dbul phongs pa dang /_nor thun mong du spyad pa'i dbang med do/_/mi tshangs par spyod pas kyang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_bdag gi chung ma la 'phyo ba dang /_
[\[214b.2\]]chen chun gnyis rtsod pa dang /_bdag gi bsam pa bzhin mi 'grub bo/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_gzhan gyis skur pa 'debs pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa kun gyis slu bar 'gyur 
[\[214b.3\]]ro/_/phra ma byed pa yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do/_/ci ste mir skyes na yang gnyen zhig pa dang /_gnyen ngan pa dang /_phrag dog can du 'gyur ro/_/ngag mi snyan par smra na yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam 
[\[214b.4\]]pa gnyis smin te/_rtag tu sgra mi snyan pa mang po thos pa dang /_smras so cog skyon can rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/tshig khyal pa byed pa yang ngan song gsum du ltung bar 'gyur te/_ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_bden pa'i tshig smras pa yang kun gyis yid 
[\[214b.5\]]mi ches pa dang /_smras pa thams cad mi gsal bar 'ong ngo /_/'dod chags kyi kha na ma tho ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do/_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_nor la chags shing chog mi shes pa'i rang bzhin dang /_mang 
[\[214b.6\]]du tshol yang bsams pa bzhin mi 'grub po/_/zhe sdang gi kha na ma tho ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do/_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_gzhan gyis rtag tu glags tshol ba dang /_rtag tu gzhan gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[214b.7\]]log par lta ba'i kha na ma tho ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo /_/ci ste mir skyes na yang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te/_rtag par log par lta ba'i khyim du skye ba dang /_g.yon can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de lta bu'i mi dge ba bcu ni sdug 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]bsngal mang pos gdung ba'i rgyu yin no/_/de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam byed pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams bshad pa 'di thos nas thams cad kyis cho nges btab ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[215a.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag rnams kyis dge ba ji lta bu zhig gis sdug bsngal de dag las ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed rnams sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi las 'thun par gyis shig_/ji 
[\[215a.3\]]ltar na bsod nams byed ce na/_gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyi sems can gyi don chen po byed pa gtso bor byas pa la mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang brtsigs na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar rgyal por 'gyur te/_'gro ba mang po'i don byed cing 'gro'o cog gi kun la mi 
[\[215a.4\]]'thun pa med do/_/tshe 'di la chos kyi 'gro ba dang /_chos la dad pa ni mi'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar blon che'am/_khams kyi dbang po blon du 'gyur ro/_/gos dang rta dang ldan zhing dgos so cog tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mi mang 
[\[215a.5\]]po la btud cing bsod nams byed pa ni phyug cing btsan pa'i khyim bdag tu 'gyur te/_mang po kun gyis bkur ba dang /_phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro yang bgegs med cing bya'o cog 'grub bo/_/tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdun du me mar 'bud cing snang gsal la dad pa 
[\[215a.6\]]ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyi ma dang zla ba'i lhar skye'o/_/'od kyis bdag la gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la snying rje'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rab tu phyug cing zas dang gos kyang yid bzhin du 'grub bo/_/tshe 'di la zas skom mi la sbyin pa la 
[\[215a.7\]]dga' ba ni gar skyes pa thams cad du yid bzhin gyi zas su 'gyur zhing zas dang /_skom yang ldan la dbang po rno zhing spobs pa che ste tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis byol song la zas byin na ni lan brgya 'gyur 'thob bo/_/log sred la sbyin pa sbyin pas ni lan stong 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]'gyur 'thob bo/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_khrims gtsang ma la sbyin pa byin pas ni lan khrir 'gyur ro/_/chos smra ba'i dge slong theg pa chen po spel zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter bshad pa mang po kun gyi mig phyed nus pa la byin na lan grangs med tshad med 
[\[215b.2\]]pa snyed do/_/gal te sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byin na 'bras bu mthar gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sbyin gnas gsum la sbyin pa byas na rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu zad mi shes so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang /_pha ma dang /_
[\[215b.3\]]nad pa'o/_/de dag la zas gcig sbyin pa byas pas kyang de lta bu'i 'bras bu mi zad pa 'thob par 'gyur na/_rtag tu sbyin pa byin pa lta ci smos/_tshe 'di la dge 'dun mang po la khrus byas na skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin bzang zhing /_yid bzhin gyi gos dang ldan la mang 
[\[215b.4\]]po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la dam pa'i chos kyi mdo sde klog pa dang /_'don pa la bsngags pas ni skye ba thams cad du sgra dbyangs snyan cing kun gyis thos par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la tshul khrims sdom pas ni skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin 
[\[215b.5\]]bzang ba dang /_mi'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la chu dkon pa'i sar khron pa mang po brkos la skom sbyar la/_lam srang du kun shong bar byed de/_bskyed cing mi'o cog sgrol ba ni skye ba thams cad du mi'i rgyal po byed cing zas skom ro brgya dang ldan pa yid bzhin du 'byung 
[\[215b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la mdo sde la sogs pa 'dri'am gzhan la byin te klog tu bcug pa ni skye ba thams cad du tshig la thogs pa med cing slob pa thams cad lan cig thos pas mi brjed par zin par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang rtag tu de la 
[\[215b.7\]]dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i nang na mchog dang phul du 'gyur ro/_/gtso bor 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di la zam pa dang gru la sogs pa byed de/_skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed pa la dga' ba ni skye ba thams cad du rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing phal mang pos bkur te bsngags so/_/
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'gro zhing 'ong ba la bsu bskyal bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo ji ltar ngas mdo sde thams cad las rgyu dang 'bras bur bshad do/_/sems can rnams 'don nam/_klog gam/_rjes su spyod na/_mi khom pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[216a.2\]]las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la skur pa 'debs pa ni tshe 'di nyid la yang lce rtsa ba nas 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i ming cir gdags/_ji ltar 
[\[216a.3\]]gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo mdo sde 'di ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes kyang bya/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang spyod pa zhes kyang bya ste/_de ltar zung shig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad na 'khor mang 
[\[216a.4\]]po'i nang du lha dang mi brgyad khri snyed bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bud med brgyad stong snyed ni mo'i lus las phor gyur te/_mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad kyang dge bar gyur to/_/dge sdig rnam par dbye ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[216a.5\]{D356}]'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i tshul lung bstan pa/_sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri kha rti rtag gi steng na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[216a.6\]]chen po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_bdud sdig can la sogs pa mthu bo che thams cad tshogs pa de'i dus na sangs 
[\[216a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi smin mtshams nas 'od zer shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang /_nub kyi ban glang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_gling 'di bzhir 'od zer kun du khyab par bkram ste/_'od zer btang ba de'i tshe ri rab la 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sogs pa ri chen po dang /_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_sman ljongs/_ri sul/_grag grog kun la yang snang bar mnyam ste/_lag mthil dang 'dra bar gling bzhi car snang bas gsal bar gyur/_'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs 
[\[216b.2\]]'od dang bcas pa phal po che byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_klu la sogs pa sems can mang po kun gyis mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la ba shra wa na la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/_'od zer 'di lta bu de ci'i 
[\[216b.3\]]don du mdzad pa lags zhes zhus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gling bzhir ngas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi gsung rab dang /_ring bsrel dang /_gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/_'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad kyis 
[\[216b.4\]]srungs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i thugs rje chen pos bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgyal po chen po dag la gtad pa shin tu ngo mtshar to/_/snga ma 'das 
[\[216b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo du na lags nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan nub na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di 
[\[216b.6\]]lta bu'i the tshom zhus pa legs so/_/legs par nyon cig dang /_ngas bshad par bya'o/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan lo nyis stong du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos 
[\[216b.7\]]'di tha mar ji ltar nub par 'gyur/_rgyu ci las nyams/_sus ma mchis par bgyid/_bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga brgya'i bar du nga'i bstan pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnam par grol ba mang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mang du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_sems can phal rnams kyang dam pa'i chos la dad cing spyod pa yang phyir zhing nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du dam pa'i chos ston cing sems can 'dren pa dang /_thar bar byed pa'i slob dpon 
[\[217a.2\]]mang du 'byung ngo /_/nyan thos dgra bcom pa ni nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_sems can phal rnams kyang nyan pa tsam du zad de/_nyams su len cing spyod pa'am/_brtson 'grus ni mi byed de/_dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos kyi srungs ma 
[\[217a.3\]]rnams kyang mi dga' bar 'gyur te/_dam pa'i chos la ma dad pa'i sems can rnams ni sngon bas mthu stobs skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig dmag 'dren cing 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi ris kyang 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[217a.4\]]ro/_/de nas yang lo lnga brgya'i tshe lo sum brgyar ni dam pa'i chos la gnas pa'i lha klu la sogs pa sems can srungs ma rnams mi gnas shing dam pa'i chos gang du dar bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_sems can chos la ma dad par 'gyur/_sems can chos spyod pa rnams kyang chos 
[\[217a.5\]]kyi gzhung bzhin mi spyod/_brtson 'grus [{]chungs [,]chung [}]pas grub pa nyung bar 'gyur/_kha dog bzhi dang bzhi las gyur pa yang 'bri/_dri dang /_ro la sogs pa yang chung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_mu ge yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lo nyis brgyar ni dge 
[\[217a.6\]]slong yang chos bzhin mi spyod/_'jig rten gyi khe dang grags pa tshol/_snying rje chung zhing khrims la mi gnas/_dam pa'i chos tshul bzhin spyod pa rnams la ni [{]glan ka [,]klan ka [}]tshol zhing skur pa 'debs/_longs spyod dang yo byad 'phrog/_'jig rten gyi rgyal po'i gsang la rten cing rgyal 
[\[217a.7\]]srid 'dzin/_rgyal po'i phrin pa'i pho nyar ngo 'phral tshol zhing 'gro/_rgyal po dang /_'bangs srid 'khrug pa'i dbyen byed/_nyo tshong dang khe spogs byed thabs tshol/_dam pa'i chos spyod pa yang snying nas nyams su blangs te mi spyod kyi/_phal cher kha gsag dang /_'phral gyi tshul 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]'chos pa'i ya ma brla byed de/_de'i dus na chos la dga' ba'i lha klu thams cad kyis rgyal khams kyi dge slong 'di ltar spyod pa'i sa gzhi bor te mi gnas shing /_bdud kyi ris la sogs pa chos kyi bgegs kyi ris rnams der 'byung ste/_mthu dang stobs skye bar 'gyur/_rgyal po 
[\[217b.2\]]dang /_blon po la sogs pa dad pa 'bri/_dge sdig gi dmigs mi phyed/_dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin/_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dang /_dge 'dun gyi rdzas la spyod cing rku 'phrog byed de sdig la mi 'dzem/_gzugs brnyan dang mchod rten rnams khad kyis bshig_/mchod 
[\[217b.3\]]pa'i yo byad phri/_de'i tshe dam pa'i chos ma nor bar spyod pa dge slong dang /_khyim pa 'ga' 'ga' tsam gnas pa de'i bsod nams kyis yul phyogs su char chu dus su 'bab cing lo legs/_mi rgyags la nad nyung zhing yul bde ba dag kyang bar 'ga' 'byung /_de lta bu mi gnas 
[\[217b.4\]]pa phal cher ni sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung /_de'i dus su rgya gar dang /_rgya ma yin pa'i rgyal po chen po gsum 'byung ste/_gsum la/_ya ba na dang /_balhi ka dang /_sha ku na dang /_'di gsum dam pa'i chos mi spyod/_dmag 'dren cing g.yul 'gyed de/_nub 
[\[217b.5\]]dang byang gi yul khams mang po zhig 'bebs par byed de/_de nas yul khams de'i mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yang bshig cing mes bsregs te/_dge 'dun gyi yo byad dang dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la sogs pa yang phrogs shing bcom ste/_rgyal po 
[\[217b.6\]]'di gsum gcig la gcig gnod pa sna tshogs kyis thab mo byed de/_gsum car gyi rgyal srid mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rjes la rgyal po de gsum nang srid gcig tu byas nas dmag mang po 'dus te rgya gar gyi yul chu bo gang gA'i tshu rol gan da ra dang /_ma d+h+ya de sha la sogs 
[\[217b.7\]]pa'i yul phrogs nas bzung /_de'i dus na chu bo gang gA'i pha rol lho phyogs kyi rgyud na/_yul ko'u shAm bI zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ma hen dra sen zhes bya ba de la sras zhig btsas te/_de'i ming ni du spra sa ha sta zhes bya ste/_smin mtshams na lcags kyi sme ba zhig yod pa/_lag pa gru mo 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]man chad khrag gis bskus pa zhig 'byung ngo /_/de dang dus gcig tu rgyal po de'i blon po lnga brgya la yang bu khye'u lnga brgya btsa' ste/_de ril yang lag pa khrig pa man chad khrag can du 'byung ste/_de'i dus na rgyal po'i rta la rte'u smra shes pa zhig skyes te/_rgyal po 
[\[218a.2\]]dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_rte'u smra shes pa skyes pa'i nub mo yang nam mkha' las khrag gi char pa bab nas/_rgyal po ma hen dra se nas drang srong gi mkhan po lnga mngon par shes pa zhig la bdag cag 'khor gyi bu dang /_rta la ya mtshan 'di lta bu byung ba dang /_khrag gi char pa 
[\[218a.3\]]bab pa 'di ci'i ltas zhes smras pa dang /_drang srong na re khyod kyi bus 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa gzhi 'di mi'i khrag gis gsher bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu khyod kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu de thog ma btsas nas lo bcu 
[\[218a.4\]]gnyis lon pa dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po ya ba na dang /_balhi ka dang /_sha ku na gsum 'dus pa'i dmag sum 'bum rgyal po dang bcas te/_rgyal po ma hen dra se na'i yul du drangs pa las/_yul du dmag phal mo che byung bas rgyal po snying mi dga' ste/_mya ngan byed cing 
[\[218a.5\]]'dug pa la bu du spra sa ha stas pha la dris pa/_yab 'di ltar thugs mi dgyes pa ci las gyur ces zhus pa dang /_pha na re rgyal po gsum gyi dmag byin chen po bdag cag gi yul du byung bas mi dga' zhes smras pa dang /_bus smras pa/_yab mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig 
[\[218a.6\]]dmag 'di bdag gis thub par bgyi'o zhes bgyis pa dang /_pha na re legs so zhes smras nas/_bu dang blon po'i bu ya mtshan can lnga brgya la sogs te/_dmag nyis 'bum bcas te btang nas thab mo byas pa'i tshe/_smin mtshams na lcags kyi sme ba yod pa bskyed 
[\[218a.7\]]nas lus ril lcags su byas nas rab tu khros nas brgal ba dang /_du spra sa ha sta'i dmag rgyal te phyir log pa dang /_pha na re bu khyod kyis rgyal po gsum gyi dmag 'di lta bu dang thab mo byas pa las rgyal ba legs so/_/da phyin chad khyod kyis rgyal srid zung shig_/nga 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ni 'byung ngo zhes bsgo nas rgyal srid kyang bu la byin no/_/de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rgyal po gsum gyi dmag dang 'thabs pa las dmag dpon yang ril gyis gtubs/_rgyal po gsum yang bzung nas med par byas so/_/de tshun cad 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po 
[\[218b.2\]]byas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_nga 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed pa ni dga' na/_gud na mi dga' ba zhig kyang yod ces smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_ci mi dgyes zhes zhus pa dang /_sems can mang po 'di snyed cig 
[\[218b.3\]]bsad pa sdig che bas mi dga' na/_sdig 'di ji lta bu zhig tu byas na sus 'byang bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_yul pa Ta li pu tra ste dmar bu can zhes bya ba na chos kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum la mkhas pa/_bram ze a ga ni da ti pu tra ste mes byin 
[\[218b.4\]]gyi bu zhes bya'o/_/ming ni shi Sh+ya ka ste/_slob ma can zhes bgyi ba zhig dgon pa'i gnas na gnas pa de spyan drangs nas mchod bkur bgyis na sdig pa 'byang rngo thogs so zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po yang dgyes nas dge slong shi Sh+ya ka yang 'gugs pa btang nas rgyal po'i drung du 
[\[218b.5\]]'ongs so/_/de nas mkhan po shi Sh+ya ka la rgyal pos phyag byas te/_mkhan po bdag gis sdig byas pa rnams cis 'byang bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang /_mkhan pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dkon mchog gsum la lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod cing skyabs su song na sdig 
[\[218b.6\]]rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal po du spra sa hastas pho nya mang po phyogs bcur btang ste/_'dzam bu'i gling na dge slong 'dug go cog bkug ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi dge slong ril 'ongs te/_chu bo gang gA'i pha rol yul ko'u shAm bI'i rgyal po du spra 
[\[218b.7\]]sa ha sta'i gnas ga la ba der bsdus pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul khams gzhan na chos spyod pa dang /_dge slong dag med par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bsdus pa de'i tshe na lam du dge slong gyag cing chud zos pa yang mang ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang du ni 'bum tsam zhig phyin par 'gyur 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ro/_/dge slong lam du gyag cing chud zos pa yang gcan gzan sna tshogs dang /_mi rgod dang /_chu la sogs pas phal khyer te chud zos so/_/dge 'dun mang po phyin pa dang /_rgyal pos mchod ston drangs/_yon phul te mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[219a.2\]]dge 'dun rnams gcig la gcig gtam du smras pa/_khyed kyi mkhan po ga re/_slob ma gar song /_grogs po khrims zla ga re zhes so sor gtam du glengs pa dang /_stag dang /_seng ge dang /_mi rgod kyis bsad pa dang /_chus khyer ba dang /_nad kyis btab nas 
[\[219a.3\]]shi ba la sogs pa'i gtam byas nas dge slong so so nas mya ngan langs te ngud mos 'debs te brang rdung ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal pos mya ngan ma bgyid ma ngu zhes bsgo ba dang /_dge 'dun rnams ma nyan pa dang /_rgyal po yang mi dga' nas kha phyogs te nyal lo/_/nyal ba'i 
[\[219a.4\]]tshe smon lam du btab pa/_gang zag gi dge 'dun la ni skyabs su song nas mchod pa byas na/_bdag gis dgra bcom pa'i zhal ma mthong ste/_bdag gis dgra bcom pa zhig gi zhal mthong bar shog shig ces smon lam du btab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi lha zhig 
[\[219a.5\]]gis rmi ltas su bstan pa/_gan d+ha mA da na ste spos ngad ldang zhes bya ba'i ri la su d+ha na pu tra ra rna sha ste tshong dpon nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]bu zhes bya ba rab tu byung ba su ra ta ste des pa zhes bya bar ming btags pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa zhig bzhugs te/_de spyan drangs nas 
[\[219a.6\]]bsnyen bkur byas te/_de la sdig bshags na sdig kyang 'byang /_the tshom yang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes lhas bstan pa rmis pa dang /_rgyal po sad pa dang 'phral du pho nya bkye ste/_spos ngad ldang gi ri las dgra bcom pa su ra ta spyan drangs te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du byon pa dang /_
[\[219a.7\]]rgyal pos kyang tshul bzhin du phyag byas shing mchod de bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de'i dus na tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo dge 'dun ril gyis 'dus pa'i nang nas/_dge slong gsar zhugs rnams kyis sde snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po Sh+ya ka la prA ti mo k+Sha gdon par gsol 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ba las/_shi Sh+ya ka na re mi la mig zhar/_sna dang rna ba med na me long ci dgos/_bltar ci yod/_'dul ba bshad kyang khyed 'dul ba ltar mi spyod/_tshul khrims mi bsrung ba la 'dul ba bshad kyang ci phan zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe su ra ta zhes bya ba dgra bcom pas seng 
[\[219b.2\]]ge'i sgra phyung nas smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshul khrims ngas mnos nas da tsam gyi bar du rtswa mchog tsam yang ma nyams na/_'di skad ma zer bar prA ti mo k+Sha thon cig par smras pa dang /_mkhan po shi Sh+ya ka yang dgra bcom par ngo shes te rab tu skyengs nas cang mi 
[\[219b.3\]]zer ba dang /_shi Sh+ya ka'i slob ma dge slong aM ga da ste dpung gi tshogs 'jigs su rung zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas langs te su ra ta zhes bya ba dgra bcom pa de la khyed ci ste nga'i mkhan po la de skad smra/_khyod khrims kyang med/_'dul ba yang mi shes na/_nga'i mkhan 
[\[219b.4\]]po sde snod gsum la mkhas pa de la ci'i phyir kha zlogs shes khros nas sgo gtan blangs te/_dgra bcom pa brdegs nas bsad do/_/de'i tshe chos la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin da d+hi mu kha zho gdong dir rga mu kha zhes bya bas lag par rdo rje thogs nas mngon du byung ste/_dge slong 
[\[219b.5\]]aM ga da la/_ci ste dgra bcom pa bsad ces zer te rdo rje phyung nas bsad do/_/de'i dus na dge slong ge rad ces bya bas mkhan po shi Sh+ya ka brdegs te bsad do/_/de nas de'i rjes la dge 'dun ril gyis 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig bsad de gcig kyang ma lus 
[\[219b.6\]]so/_/de'i dus na nam mkha' la lha klu la sogs pa chos kyi srung ma phal po che ma dga' nas ngus pa'i mchi ma ni khrag dang me'i char bab bo/_/nam mkha' dag ni ser dang nag por gyur/_glog dang sgra chen po byung /_skar ma d+hU ma ke tu zhes bya ba lus las du ba nag po gtong 
[\[219b.7\]]ba zhig byung nas/_des skar ma dang zla ba la sogs pa 'od kyang med/_gcig kyang bltar mi snang bar 'ong ngo /_/de'i dus na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang /_yum mA yA de bI la sogs pa 'khor phal mo che dang der 'ongs nas dge 'dun gyi gos tshon can ril gyis 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bsdus nas khyer bar 'ong ngo /_/de'i dus na rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i ku co sgra chen po byung ba ci las gyur ces smras pa dang /_dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig gis gcig bsad par gyur to zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po mi dga' ste/_langs nas tho rangs 
[\[220a.2\]]mkhar gyi phyi rol gyi lha khang du phyin pa dang /_dge 'dun la la ni mgo bcad/_la la ni mig phyung /_la la ni rkang lag bcad de/_de ltar sna tshogs su shi ba mthong nas/_dgra bcom pa dang /_shi Sh+ya ka sde snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po'i ro btsal nas gnyis ka'i ro rnyed 
[\[220a.3\]]pa dang /_mchan khung g.yas g.yon du bzhag nas dgra bcom pa ni nga'i pha yin/_shi Sh+ya ka ni chos kyi mdzod yin/_'di gnyis 'das par gyur pa ni da phyin cad nga'i lus dang srog kyang gces pa med/_rgyal srid kyang su 'dod pa la sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_mig kyang 
[\[220a.4\]]ldongs te mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i dus na blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la snying brtse ste/_mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir mi lnga brgya ban de ltar bcos te/_skra dang kha spu breg tu spu gris ma chod nas/_skra dang kha spu mes bsregs/_tshon sna brgya yang de'i tshe nub pas ban de lnga 
[\[220a.5\]]brgya yang chos gos mi bdog nas phyugs nag po dang /_dmar po'i ko ba gyon te/_ban de ltar bcos nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so/_/blon pos rgyal po la ban de lnga brgya 'ongs so zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po dga' nas mig phye ste ban de dag la brtags na/_ban 
[\[220a.6\]]de yang ril gyis phyugs kyi pags pa gos su gyon la/_skra dang kha spu ma bregs par mes bsregs pa ni ma mthong nas rgyal po yang dga' ste/_dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad 'on cig ces bsgo nas ban de de rnams la mchod de/_ban de rnams la rgyal pos zhib 
[\[220a.7\]]tu brtags na/_phyugs kyi pags pa chos gos su gyon la/_skra dang kha spu ma bregs par mes bsregs pa gsal bar mthong nas rgyal po nyid som nyi ru gyur te/_'di dag dge slong ni ma yin mod kyi/_bdag gis cung zad cig dri'o snyam nas dge slong gi lta ba dang /_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]tshul khrims gang yin zhes dris na/_de rnams gang gis kyang dge slong gi lta ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs cung zad kyang mi shes pas rgyal po de la lan ma btab par cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /_rgyal pos bsams pa/_da ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub ste/_
[\[220b.2\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul yang dag par rgyun chad pa lta zhig snyam nas rgyal po yang mya ngan chen po langs te ngu bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po des ban de phal po che btungs te shi ba'i ro rnams blangs te bsregs nas mchod pa byas te/_de'i 'og tu rgyal po nyid kyang bstan pa 
[\[220b.3\]]nub pa'i thugs ngan gyis zhal 'tshos te 'das so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dam pa'i chos ril gyis nub ste/_gsung rab kyi yi ge rnams kyang dung phyis pa bzhin du bltar mi mngon par gyur to/_/gser ni dngul du 'gyur ro/_/dngul ni zangs dang lcags 
[\[220b.4\]]su 'gyur ro/_/zangs dang lcags ni rdor 'gyur ro/_/rin po che dang mu tig ni rwar 'gyur ro/_/kha zas ni ro drug yod pa las mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa'i ro la sogs pa ni nub po/_/kha ba dang /_bska ba gnyis ni lus so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[220b.5\]]shAkya thub pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bstan pa gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i tshul lung bstan pa'i skabs rdzogs so//_//
[\[220b.6\]{D357}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya go shr-ing ga byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gcig go/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal 
[\[220b.7\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rnam par smin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi ljongs kyi yul gzhan 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]du 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad nas yul yangs pa can gyi phyogs thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas rgyal po'i khab na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang /_gnas brtan 
[\[221a.2\]]shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha du ma dang /_lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba du ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po du ma dang /_gnod sbyin mthu 
[\[221a.3\]]chen po mang po dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa dri za mang po dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi'am ci du ma dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi'i rgyal po mang po'i 'khor du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[221a.4\]]so/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas phyi ma'i dus kyi yul dge ba la rjes su dgongs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang phyogs logs na/_ri glang ru dang nye ba chu bo go ma'i 'gram na thub pa drang srong chen po'i 
[\[221a.5\]]pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_der gdon mi za bar bya dgos pa'i phrin las shig yod pas da gshegs pa'i dus la bab bo/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor phal mo che dang nam mkha' la 'phags te/_dri za'i 
[\[221a.6\]]rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa dri za grangs med pa ni mdun na lha'i rol mo sna tshogs byed/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi'am ci du ma ni steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang lha'i skad yid du 'ong bas bstod 
[\[221a.7\]]bzhin du 'khor de dag dang /_mchod pa de dag dang bcas te/_ri glang ru ga la ba der gshegs so/_/gshegs nas lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs bzhin du zhal byang phyogs su mtsho chen po yun ring po nas rgya mtsho ltar 'dug pa la gzigs te/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]sku drang por bsrangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/_bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa smon lam dang bsod nams mngon sum du mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[221b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis ri glang ru dang /_yul dge ba dang /_gser gyi dkyil 'khor nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du byin gyis brlabs te/_bsrung ba dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bkra shis pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_bzlas brjod dang /_dge bar mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i 
[\[221b.3\]]yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_ri glang ru bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang bcas/_yul dge ba dang bcas pa 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 
[\[221b.4\]]phyag mtshan dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dang /_dben pa yin te/_rgyu des na yul 'di ni dge ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dge ba dang /_mkhar dge ba can dang /_dge 'dun so so'i kun dga' 
[\[221b.5\]]ra ba dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_dgon pa'i gnas dang /_yul der so so nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_chos dang ldan pa'i dad pa can dang /_sbyin bdag dang /_li thams cad 'byung bar lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[221b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i yul 'dir ci nas kyang sems can rnams dam pa chen po myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs 
[\[221b.7\]]shig_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mtsho rol nas cung zad cig slar bkyed de/_de'i mod la ri glang ru'i steng na gdan khri bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas zhal nub phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da gang na ba de logs su 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]gzigs so/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong mang po dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su lhags so/_/lhags nas bcom 
[\[222a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang phyag 'tshal/_skyabs su song nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas de'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[222a.3\]]'khor phal mo che 'dus par mkhyen nas 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di la sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung ste/_de dag gis kyang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs so/_/bskal pa 
[\[222a.4\]]bzang po 'di nyid la/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas te 'dir gshegs nas mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa byin gyis rlob cing mtshams gcad pa dang /_bkra shis 
[\[222a.5\]]pa dang /_dge bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/nga yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab pas byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[222a.6\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan pa rnams yongs su skyong bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis kyang sangs rgyas 'od srung gi 
[\[222a.7\]]mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs te/_yul de byung bar gyur pa'i tshe bdag gi gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur bar sa gzhi de byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du smon lam chen pos gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang ri glang ru la gtsug 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]lag khang spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der bsnyen pa byed pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du nam mkha' ltar stobs dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos kyang gtsug lag khang 'jig tshogs spong 
[\[222b.2\]]byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis kyang gtsug lag khang 'od can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[222b.3\]]sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du rtag tu byams pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang gtsug lag khang bi si mo nya zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der bdag nyid bzhugs par byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[222b.4\]]de bzhin du spyod pa shin du rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos kyang gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de phyag bya bar 'os par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams grol bar mdzad 
[\[222b.5\]]pa la thags thogs mi mnga' ba byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang gtsug lag khang ba no co zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[222b.6\]]kun du bzang pos kyang gtsug lag khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang /_dgra 
[\[222b.7\]]bcom pa chen po rnams kyis kyang li yul gang dang gang du gtsug lag khang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_dgon pa'i gnas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi thams cad dper na zla ba nya ba la skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas steng gi bar snang dag pa la rgyu 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ba bzhin du mdzes pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_dga' dga' ltar 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so/_/yang de'i tshe ri glang ru la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[223a.2\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs du ma bkye bas li yul thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la mtsho chen po de'i nang na pad ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum byung bar gyur te/_pad ma re re'i nang na yang 
[\[223a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dang bcas pa bzhugs pa snang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[223a.4\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu mtsho'i nang nas pad ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang bcas te byung ba 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di byung bar gyur pa'i tshe yul 'di nyid du pad ma ji snyed pa'i dgon pa'i gnas dang /_gtsug 
[\[223a.5\]]lag khang na gaN DI brdung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gnas gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed cing yul byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi de dag dang /_de bzhin du ngas de 
[\[223a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dge ba dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi 'dir dad pa can gyi sbyin bdag rnams kyis so so nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur zhing /_gnas de dang de dag tu 
[\[223a.7\]]bsnyen par byas na ci dang ci 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/yang de'i tshe lha rnams stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'di dus ji tsam zhig na ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_su zhig gis ni 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'byin par bgyid pa lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar ni dgon pa chab chen po'i gter lags na/_su zhig gis ji ltar 'byin pa bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyon cig_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[223b.2\]]lo brgya lon pa'i tshe rgya'i yul du rgya'i rgyal po ca yang zhes bya ba bu stong tshang bar bdog pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bu re re la yang yul re re gsar du tshol du bcug go/_/phyis nub phyogs logs nas ri glang ru dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la 
[\[223b.3\]]gan da yod pa'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa du mas byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa zhig yod do zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du ma la bdag la bu cig yod na sangs rgyas phal mo ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der yul 'debs su gzhug go snyam du bsams nas/_de'i tshe rgya'i 
[\[223b.4\]]rgyal pos rnam thos kyi bu la bu cig bslangs so/_/rnam thos kyi bus kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba'i bu zhig btsas pa byin te/_bu de ni gzugs bzang ba/_dbyibs mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig yin no/_/bu de'i don du sa las nu ma 
[\[223b.5\]]zhig byung ba dang /_bu de sngon gyi bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus nu ma de la nu bar byed pas des na bu de'i ming sa las nu ma nu zhes bya ba'o/_/bu de myur bar skyes nas pha rgya'i rgyal pos rgyal srid kyi dbang ni bskur/_nor mang po ni byin/_blon po phal mo che ni lus 
[\[223b.6\]]kyi rim gro bar bskos nas/_rgyal bu sa las nu ma nu de blon po chen po jang sho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dmag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgya'i yul nas byung ste yul 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/'ongs nas 'dir yul 'debs par 'gyur te/_rgyal bu sa las nu ma nu des yul 
[\[223b.7\]]btab pa'i phyir rgyu des na yul 'di'i ming ni sa las nu ma nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dus de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas rgya gar gyi mi phal mo che 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po sa las nu ma nu'i 'bangs su mchid kyis 'tshal zhing chu srid gcig par dum 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bar gyur nas/_rgya'i blon po chen po jang sho la sogs pas rim gyis rgya dang /_rgya gar gyi grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rgyal po sa las nu ma nu de mi rabs du ma'i bar du yul 'di'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[224a.2\]]rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang rim gyis so so nas yul 'dir dgon pa'i gnas dang gtsug lag khang byas na zhing chu dang /_'bangs dang /_zhal ta byed pa yang 'bul zhing /_la la yang bdag nyid kyang rab tu 'byung bar byed do/_/la la ni bu dang bu mo rab tu 'byin par 
[\[224a.3\]]byed do/_/la la ni 'bangs las grangs med pa zhig rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar byed do/_/yul 'dir mi byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mang po zhig 'byung ste/_rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs shing bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po byed 
[\[224a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na yul 'di ni rgyal po sa las nu ma nus yul gtod pa'i tshul de lta bus 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yul 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe yang 'byung zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir yul gzhan dang gzhan dag gi ni zhig nas yun ring mo 
[\[224a.5\]]zhig tu stong zhing dgon par 'dug la yul dge ba ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe mi rnams kyis brgyan cing mdzes par 'gyur zhe na/_'di ltar yul 'di ni thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten go ma sa la gan da zhes bya ba
