[\[224a.6\]]ri glang ru dang nye ba chu bo go ma'i 'gram na yod pa'i phyir ro/_/mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni ming go ma sa la gan da zhes bya'i/_'jig rten phal gyi tha snyad du ni chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/_'di ltar ji srid du mchod rten chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya ba 
[\[224a.7\]]dang /_'od srung gi mchod rten 'di gnyis rgyas shing mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du ni yul dge ba yang rgyas shing bzang por 'gyur ro/_/nam mchod rten 'di gnyis rgud pa de'i tshe yul yang rgud cing stongs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i gsung de thos nas mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru la dad pa dang gus pa chen po rnyed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas spyan sngar 'di skad du bdag cag kyang dus de'i tshe 
[\[224b.2\]]yul 'dir rigs mthon por skyes nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung zhing /_yul chos kyi bka' khrims mi nyams par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'du shes can zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i lha mi pham pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po khyim 'tshig ces bya ba dang /_lha nam mkha'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /_lha gser gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang /_lha mo lcags kyu can zhes bya ba dang /_lha mo 
[\[224b.4\]]gnas can zhes bya ba rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams la mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru yul dang bcas pa dang /_nga'i bstan pa dang /_sras rnams yongs su gtad kyis yongs su bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa 
[\[224b.5\]]dang /_bskyang ba dang /_mchod gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shig_/yul 'di'i rgyal po dang /_yul 'dzin pa'i blon po dang /_sbyin bdag chos dang 'thun pa rnams kyang yongs su gtad kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/ri glang ru lung bstan pa'i mdo 'di yang 
[\[224b.6\]]yongs su gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par gyis shig_/gang gi tshe yul 'di me'am chu'am pha rol gyi dmag gis nyen cing phongs par gyur pa na mdo 'di bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_bsgom pa byas na des na yul de'i gnod pa zhi bar 
[\[224b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yul 'dir sum pa rnams dang bod rnams 'ong bar 'gyur gyis de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig dang /_mdo 'di thos nas mdo 'di'i mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi byin gyis dad pa med pa de rnams 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]yul 'jig par mi byed cing yid kyang 'gyod par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'dir rgya rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig dang /_mdo 'di thos nas dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dad pa'i stobs kyis yul mi 'jig cing 
[\[225a.2\]]phyir zhing bsrung ba dang /_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang byed par 'gyur te/_rgyu des na mdo 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no/_/mdo 'di'i phan yon gzhan yang mang du yod de yun thung ngus ni brjod par mi nus so/_/de'i phyir mdo 'di khyed rnams la 
[\[225a.3\]]yongs su gtad do/_/de nas de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lha rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po dang /_lha mo de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas te langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[225a.4\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos len par 'tshal lo/_/yang gsol pa/_ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru yul dang bcas pa 
[\[225a.5\]]thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal/_bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_chos dang 'thun par yul 'dzin pa dang /_chos dang 'thun pa'i sbyin bdag dang /_gang zhig bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 
[\[225a.6\]]bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar ni 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das ji srid du yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su bgyid pa dang /_yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang 'thun par yul skyong zhing chos dang mi 'thun pa'i sems can 
[\[225a.7\]]rnams kyi mgon mi bgyid pa de srid du ni bdag cag gis yongs su bsrung bar rngo thogs te/_mdo 'di yang li yul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du li yul las nyi 'og tu gyur pa'i rgyal po dang /_blon po rnams la mdo sde 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis li 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]yul gyi ched du ri glang ru la bshad pa yin no zhes rnar grags par bgyi/_sug par thob par bgyi/_sems bsgyur bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nam yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su mi bgyid cing /_chos dang mi 'thun pa rnams kyi mgon lhag par 
[\[225b.2\]]bgyid pa de'i tshe bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bas yul 'di'i ched dang bsrung bar ni rngo mi thogs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag cag gi mthu stobs dang gzi brjid ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /_chos dang 'thun par 
[\[225b.3\]]yul tshul bzhin du skyong ba dang /_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs nas ri glang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas mchod rten go ma sa la gan da gang na ba de logs 
[\[225b.4\]]su gzigs nas/_yang nas yang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten go ma sa la gan da ri glang ru dang bcas pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas li yul thams cad dang /_mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can grangs med pa rnams 
[\[225b.5\]]la 'od zer dang thugs rje chen pos khyab par mdzad de/_'od zer de dang thugs rje chen po des chu na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal ni zhi bar 'gyur/_khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa dang ni bral te/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cing lha'i bde 
[\[225b.6\]]ba dang ldan nas skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag las grangs med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i sa bon rnyed cing byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams la 
[\[225b.7\]]lan gsum gyi bar du bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam bcas pa rnams ni brtson 'grus med par mi 'grub bo/_/rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa 'di dang mchod rten go ma sa la 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gan da yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis yongs su srungs shig_/khyed rnams las gang zhig gis nga rjes su dran zhing gzungs yod pa dang /_bstan pa bsrung ba des ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba rnams yongs su bsrung bar 
[\[226a.2\]]gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi khyim pa la la zhig lo brgya'i bar du nyin re zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams chen po byed la/_'ga' zhig nyin gcig rab tu byung nas bstan pa la gnas na snga mas phyi ma'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang mi chog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[226a.3\]]sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang sngar khyim gyi gnas spangs te rab tu byung nas spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes so/_/nga yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs te/_sa bcu brnyes nas srid pa tha ma'i tshe na ma phyed na rgyal po'i khab nas byung 
[\[226a.4\]]ste nags tshal du gshegs so/_/nags tshal nas bzhon pa rgyal po yab kyi thog tu dkri nas rang gi skra ral gris bregs te/_nga'i gos gya nom pa rin thang med pa rngon pa de dag las chos gos ngur smrig tu brjes so/_/ngas chos gos de gyon nas dus gsum gyi sangs 
[\[226a.5\]]rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang lha thams cad la phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes so/_/de'i phyir bde bar gshegs 
[\[226a.6\]]pa'i bstan pa ni dam pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni bsod nams dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/'jig rten na rab tu byung bas thob pa ma gtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas sam/_bla na med pa'i byang chub thob 
[\[226a.7\]]pa ni sus kyang ma thos ma mthong ngo /_/rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam dam pa 'di ni 'jig rten na lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod gnas yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe lha dang lha mo de thams cad stan las langs nas dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing bsams bzhin du ni bka' las 'gal ba mi 'tshal lo/_/yul 'di sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul 
[\[226b.2\]]mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun du bsrung ba dang /_bskyang ba dang /_rjes su gzung bar 'tshal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag cag rnams la mthu bstang du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ma 'ongs pa rtsod pa'i dus na byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 
[\[226b.3\]]'dir dgra mang po dang /_ma dad pa dang /_phyir rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa'i khyad par mi rnyed cing /_bstan pa gzhig pa'i slad du brtson pa dag 'byung ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang 
[\[226b.4\]]ste/_skyes bu dam pa rnams legs so legs so/_/ngas kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/_byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid kyis mtshams bcad pa yang yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa rtsod pa'i dus na yul 'di gzhom pa'i phyir sum pa'i dmag phal mo che dang /_gru gu rus sna 
[\[226b.5\]]tshogs dang /_hor dang /_gzhan yang dad pa med pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe yul gzhan dang gzhan dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byin gyis brlabs pa dag yul 'dir gshegs nas yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar mdzad de/_bsod nams 
[\[226b.6\]]kyi stobs des na yul 'di gtan brlag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs brnyan de dag gi phyi bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_klu mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang po dag 'ong zhing yul yul du gnod pa rnams zlog par byed/_dgra rnams kyis yul mi choms par 
[\[226b.7\]]byed de/_bde ba can zhes bya ba'i mkhar nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gshegs nas nub phyogs mkhar ko shed du bzhugs shing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs yul she na zha zhes bya ba'i de bzhin 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan she na zha zhes bya ba sa'i 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan ki'u lang zhes bya bar gshegs nas shar phyogs yul phye ma zhes bya ba'i mkhar du zhugs 
[\[227a.2\]]shing yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyi se zhes bya ba gshegs nas/_byang phyogs kyi ri glang ru la 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs shing dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[227a.3\]]pa'i bstan pa dang /_yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang na tshong 'dus ka sa di ze zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rgyal po'i pho brang gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mkhar dge ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa 
[\[227a.4\]]mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/sa gzhi nyo mo nya zhes bya ba gang du rgyal po yo la zhes bya ba sa mkhar brtsig pa'i gros byed par 'gyur ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan cu gon pa na zhes bya ba bzhugs shing mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa 
[\[227a.5\]]mtshams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang di na dz+ya zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan thor khong du byas pa gshegs par 'gyur te/_gzugs brnyan de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzugs brnyan thor khong du byas pa thams cad kyi thog 
[\[227a.6\]]mar 'byung ba yin no/_/gzugs brnyan de la mi rnams kyis ni mtshan bkor ba'i mar me mdzad ces bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/_de ni li yul gyi gzugs brnyan thor khong du byed pa thams cad kyi dper 'byung zhing /_bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yul dang bcas 
[\[227a.7\]]pa yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi gzugs brnyan yul 'di'i dbus su gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i mtshams gcad par mdzad de/_ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyogs phyogs na bzhugs pa 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]de dag mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du yul 'di brlag par mi 'gyur ro/_/yul 'di nas skyes pa'i mi'am/_yul gzhan nas skyes pa'i mi la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag la snying thag pa nas dad pa dang gus pa dang rab tu dang bar byed cing /_'di 
[\[227b.2\]]snyam du bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan 'di dag ni yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gshegs so snyam du yang sems na/_gzugs brnyan de dag kyang sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du don mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs brnyan de dag nga dang dus 
[\[227b.3\]]gsum du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyan chen po shing rtas 'dren pa byas te/_mkhar dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang du bzhag nas mchod gnas chen por byed par 'gyur ro/_/des na 
[\[227b.4\]]yul 'dir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nas tshong dpon chen po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gnod pa rnams kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan nyis brgya rtsa brgyad 'od srung gi mchod rten dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag 
[\[227b.5\]]thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po ston cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba dang /_gnod pa sel bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/yul 'dir gnod pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_skrag pa 'ga' zhig byung na yul 'di'i ched du phyogs lngar sbyor ba byas te/_rgyal po dang 
[\[227b.6\]]blon po rnams yul 'dzin pa gang zhig 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams bskyed par 'dod na gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya bar bsod nams bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul 'di'i mi rnams kyi dad pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[227b.7\]]lta ba ni dang po'i gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nam zhig li'i rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_yul 'dzin pa rnams la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shig byung na/_ri glang ru la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i gzhi de la bskor 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/yul 'di'i sems can rnams las mi dge ba 'chags par 'dod na mchod rten go ma sa la gan da'i drung du bshags par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mchod rten de ni sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba'am/_me tog 
[\[228a.2\]]gam/_bdug pa'am/_dbyangs sam/_rol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas na de'i mtshams med pa lnga yang nyams dmas par 'gyur na/_gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yul 'di'i rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_yul 'dzin pa gang zhig brtul zhugs chen po'i sdom pa 
[\[228a.3\]]len par 'dod pa des ri glang ru la gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan pi se zhes bya ba dang /_'od srung gi mchod rten yod pa de'i dge 'dun las mnod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul 'dir chos kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs 
[\[228a.4\]]su dag pa ni de nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/yul 'di'i mi la la zhig chad pa chen po zhig la thug na des ri glang ru la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar byas te/_des na chad pa de las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas de na thar 
[\[228a.5\]]pa thob pa stong phrag du ma phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shing mi stongs pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyu des na ri glang ru dang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chang byu yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems 
[\[228a.6\]]dpa' nyi khri lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang thabs sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang yul 'di yongs su bskyang 
[\[228a.7\]]bar bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi zhing ji srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la gnas shing /_rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa mi'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang /_yul chos dang 'thun par bgyid pa mchis pa de srid du yongs su mi 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]gtang zhing yul 'dir dus dus spyod lam dang cha lugs ci dang ji lta bus sems can mang po'i bsod nams chen po yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 
[\[228b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba blang ba'i slad du kha cig gis ni rgyal rigs yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ba dang /_khyim pa gzhan gyi cha lugs yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[228b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di ltar bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang yul 'di gang du sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chu gang thob shig_/
[\[228b.4\]]yang de'i tshe lha rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang /_mi pham pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du mthu bstangs pa dang /_
[\[228b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang mthus bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang /_byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'di kun tu bsrung zhing yal bar mi gtang bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs kyis 'bad par 'tshal 
[\[228b.6\]]lo/_/gal te yul 'dir gru gu la sogs pa gtum po dad pa ma mchis pa rnams dang /_hor dang /_sum pa'i dmag dag mchi bar 'gyur na/_de dag phan tshun nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang /_de dag gi 'khor nang mi 'thun par 'gyur ba dang /_'gum par 'gyur bar 
[\[228b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/yang na de dag ci nas kyang 'dir mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/gal te rgya'i dmag dag mchis par gyur na de dag gi sems dad par bgyi zhing /_slar yul 'di la phan 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]'dogs pa dang phyis yul 'dir bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po bgyid du stsal to/_/nam zhig yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid pa de'i tshe na yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing /_mdo 'di yang khong du chud par bgyid du 
[\[229a.2\]]stsal to/_/gang gi tshe de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la dbang 'tshal zhing /_mnga' 'phrog pa dang /_sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe ba de'i tshe ni bdag cag gi 'khor gnod sbyin dad pa can dang dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dbang 
[\[229a.3\]]bskur te bkye nas yul der ci nas kyang yun ring zhig gi bar du rgud par bgyi zhing yul 'di 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad du mu ge dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag mchi bar bgyid du stsal to/_/li yul gyi nor rdzas de dag gis 'tshal ba rnams kyang bkra mi shis par bgyi zhing gang 
[\[229a.4\]]dang gang du phyin pa'i yul de thams cad du yang sman yon mi thogs shing 'khrug par bgyi'o/_/de dag gi yul 'dzin pa dang dmag dpon yang rgud par bgyi'o/_/bod kyi dmag rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/_de gang gi tshe de dag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di 
[\[229a.5\]]'dzin cing srung na ni bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de dag yongs su bskyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/nam zhig de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa dang yul gyi mi la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe ni dmag rnams nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang /_dmag gi dpon 
[\[229a.6\]]po yang che thang du rgud par bgyi ste/_rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang blon po sems gya gyu can/_bsod nams chung ba dang /_dad pa med pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la 'jol nyag tu rlom zhing /_yul gyi rtsis mgo dang 
[\[229a.7\]]'gal bar bgyid pa/_nor rdzas ma brtags pas go 'phang tshol la sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la sun 'byin tu rgol ba/_ngo tsha med pa/_mngan dus can/_'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms mi myong ba/_rab tu 'byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la la dag 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur na de dag ni bdag cag gis kyang yul 'di nas dbyung zhing yul ngan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu spyugs par bgyi ste/_tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod pa'i dus na yul 'di gzhig 
[\[229b.2\]]par brtson pa'i sems can bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa bgyid pa/_mthu stobs dang ldan pa/_yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par bgyid pa/_sems gdug cing brlang ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po du ma zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/_
[\[229b.3\]]de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur na de la bdag cag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed yid skyo bar ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gling bzhi pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha mthu 
[\[229b.4\]]stobs che ba dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin sa thob pa du ma zhig gnas pa de dag la sems 'jam pos mchod pa chen po byas te/_mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_gtsug lag khang tshar ma la sogs pa yul byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa rnams su theg pa chen 
[\[229b.5\]]po'i sde snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_'dus pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas phal po che dang /_dkon mchog brtsegs pa la sogs pa shin du rgyas pa'i sde mang po lhogs shig dang /_yul so so nas byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang /_mthu 
[\[229b.6\]]stobs che ba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas chos kyi ro mnos shing dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig las mi 'gal bar byed/_bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul yang srung bar byed/_yul 
[\[229b.7\]]'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul dge ba 'di'i rgyal po mthu chung bar 'gyur te/_mthu chung ba des na rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul mi thub pas rgyal po dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/_bod kyi rgyal po dang /_
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]rgya'i rgyal po la sogs pa la skyabs btsal nas yul srung bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgya dang bod kyi yul du dkon mchog gsum gnas shing mchod gnas chen por byed pa dang /_yul de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[230a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i gnas su 'gyur zhing /_sems can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lam tshol ba'i ngang tshul can theg pa chen po la dad pa/_ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi mthu stobs kyis li yul gyi mi dang /_dkon mchog gsum brlag par mi 
[\[230a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bod dang rgya'i rgyal po dang blon po dag ci nas kyang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_yul dge ba 'di la ri mo byed par 'gyur ba dang /_yul 'dir bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang /_yul 
[\[230a.4\]]'di'i mi nyi 'og dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang dbral zhing bde bar rang gi yul du bskyal nas phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang /_bsod nams la dga' bar 'gyur bar sems sgyur cig dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stobs kyis 
[\[230a.5\]]skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_mdangs dang /_gzi brjid dang /_'khor 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas nyid du yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/_dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdams ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis 
[\[230a.6\]]shig_/'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ldan pa/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_bden pa dang ldan pa/_gtong phod pa/_phrag dog dang 'khon du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/_byas pa gzo ba/_chos la dga' ba/_yang dag 
[\[230a.7\]]pa'i lta ba can/_log par lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa/_sems 'jam par 'gyur te/_rgyu des na dge ba rnams zhes bya'o/_/yul 'di'i mkhar yang mi byams pa dang 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang du mas brgyan 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir mkhar dge ba can zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang yul gzhan dag nas sems can dad pa med pa sdang ba 'khon du 'dzin pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun yul 'di'i rdul gyis reg cing /_yul 'di nas 'khrungs pa'i 'tsho ba la longs spyod na de 
[\[230b.2\]]dag thams cad kyis sems bsgyur nas sems 'jam pa dang /_mnyen pa dang /_byams pa'i bsam pa dang /_khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang /_dad pa dang /_yang yul 'di'i sdig pa mi byed par 'gyur te/_yul 'di ni yon tan mang po de dag dang ldan 
[\[230b.3\]]pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te bkye ba des chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su dag pa dang /_bde ba dang ldan par byas nas 
[\[230b.4\]]chu'i nang nas slar 'thon te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par gyur to/_/yang 'od zer de dag slar log nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyis yul byin 
[\[230b.5\]]gyis brlabs pa dang /_mtsho'i nang nas byung ba'i pad ma'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa de dang de dag gi 'od zer dang 'dres nas nam mkha' la 'phags te steng gi nam mkha' khebs par gyur cing li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi char 
[\[230b.6\]]phab bo/_lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_shes rab dang /_tshul khrims dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' 
[\[230b.7\]]ba spyad pa dang /_smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_khams gsum gyi srid pa 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]las nges par 'byin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_'du byed 'jig pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_gzugs med 
[\[231a.2\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_dbang po yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sems yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_sa dang /_
[\[231a.3\]]stobs dang /_thugs rje dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_the tshom sel ba dang /_sangs rgyas nyid las mi ldog pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par rtogs pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[231a.4\]]mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_ma byas pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_phyin ci ma log pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i khongs su gtogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang /_rnal 'byor pa rnams 
[\[231a.5\]]kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul dang /_skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang /_rga ba dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /_'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang phung po lnga po dag la sems can med pa dang /_gso ba dang /_
[\[231a.6\]]gang zag dang /_srog med pa dang /_chos bden pa skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_chad pa med pa/_'ong ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /_byin gyis brlabs dang /_'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'khrul ba rmi lam lta bu dang /_'khor ba'i 
[\[231a.7\]]'du byed btson ra lta bu dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_brag ca lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bar gyur te/_gzhan yang dad pa dang mngon par rtogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_'khor bas skyo ba dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa sgra brgya stong du ma byung bar 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa mang po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyogs phyogs nas lhags pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang /_gnod sbyin thams cad sems ngo mtshar du gyur nas rangs pa skyes te/_chos kyi sgo mo'i sgra de 
[\[231b.2\]]dag la yid mi phyed par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag gi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstan pa lags/_
[\[231b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni yul dge ba nas skye ba'i sems can rnams kyi ched dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams kyi ched du yang lhag par byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/_chos kyi sgo mo 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[231b.4\]]tshegs chung ngu dang /_'bad pa chung ngus dbang po dang /_shes pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing /_chos kyi sgo mo de dang de dag kyang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo de dag ni byis pa chung ngu yan cad chos mngon par rtogs par dga' zhing rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag smra bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[231b.5\]]sems can de dag dbang po yongs su brtas nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur/_chos kyi rna ba rnam par dag pas chos yang dag par nod pa yang thos par 'gyur/_de dag 'khor ba na 'du byed dang chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par grol 
[\[231b.6\]]bar 'gyur te/_sems de lta bu des na yul dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa 'dir dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa'am/_yang na ri glang ru la gnas pa de dag thams cad dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/_bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed na gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di lta ste/_lha 
[\[231b.7\]]rnams kyis 'khor gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_mi'am ci chad pas bcad par 'gyur na'ang mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru la 'khras na de dag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la mthong na yang sems zhi bar 'gyur te/_rgyu des na ri glang ru dang /_mchod rten go ma sa la gan da ni mtshams 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bcad pa dang /_gtsang byed dang /_skyabs dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no/_/mchod rten go ma sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru dang /_yul dge ba dang /_mkhar dge ba can dang /_dgon pa byin gyis brlabs 
[\[232a.2\]]brlabs pa'i ming thos nas dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis song la mtsho chen po 'di sha'i ri drol te/_byang phyogs logs su gyi 
[\[232a.3\]]sho gtsang po'i nang du pho la chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnod par srung ba dang /_yul 'dis mtshams mngon par gyis shig_/de nas nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang rnam thos kyi bus de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las sha'i ri gang na ba de logs su 
[\[232a.4\]]chas te/_shA ri'i bus ni lag na khar gsil thogs/_rnam thos kyi bus ni lag na mdung thogs nas sha'i ri phyed stam pas blangs te/_nub phyogs logs su bzhag nas chu srol chen po btod de mtsho srog chags dang bcas par gyi sho gtsang po'i nang du pho ste/_tshul de lta bus mchod rten go ma 
[\[232a.5\]]sa la gan da dang /_ri glang ru dang /_li yul de mngon par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri drang srong dang bcas pa dang /_rnam 
[\[232a.6\]]thos kyi bu dang khyim gcig la sogs pa lha chen po brgyad dang /_'khor sum khri lnga stong lnga brgya dang bcas pa la mchod rten go ma sa la gan da la sogs pa yongs su gtad de/_lha de dag gis kyang de bzhin du mnos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 
[\[232a.7\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]{D358}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shA rdU la kar+Na a ba dA na/_bod skad du/_stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal 
[\[232b.2\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus su chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas 
[\[232b.3\]]nas chu mig gzhan zhig tu chu'i phyir phyin no/_/der phyin pa dang /_yang de'i tshe chu mig de la gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba chu 'chu zhing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo bdag 
[\[232b.4\]]la chu byin cig_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag ni gdol pa'i bu mo lags so/_/sring mo rus dang rigs 'dri ba ma yin gyis/_'on kyang de nas chu chus la byin cig btung bar 
[\[232b.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la chu byin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chu 'thungs nas song ngo /_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i bzhin dang /_lus dang /_skad gdangs 
[\[232b.6\]]rnams rab tu legs par mtshan mar bzung ste/_tshul ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas kun tu chags pa skyes par gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kho mo'i 'dod pa skyes na/_bdag gi mas rig sngags shes pas de'i mthus/_'phags pa kun dga' bo bkug la khyo bya'o snyam 
[\[232b.7\]]du bsams so/_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo chu thogs nas/_gdol pa'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_chu bum phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas rang gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/kun dga' bo zhes bya ba'i dge 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]slong dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos bsnyen bkur ba de bdag khyor 'tshal gyis yum khyod kyis dpyod kyis de 'dir khug shig_/de'i mas smras pa/_ngas kun dga' bo zhi ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin na dgug par nus mod kyi/_'on kyang ko sa la'i 
[\[233a.2\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal dge sbyong gau ta ma la mchog tu dad pas bsten zhing bsnyen bkur byed pas/_gal te des shes na des gdol pa'i rigs rnams brlag par 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod chags dang bral ba thams cad zil gyis gnon zhes thos so/_/de skad ces 
[\[233a.3\]]smras pa dang /_gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma de 'dod chags dang bral ba yin yang rung de'i nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo de ma bkug na bdag lceb bo/_/gal te de khugs na ni bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233a.4\]]mas smras pa/_dge sbyong kun dga' bo dgug gis srog ma dor cig_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo'i mas khang pa'i dbus lci bas byugs nas gru bzhir byas te/_dUr ba brngas nas me sbar zhing me tog dang /_arka brgya rtsa brgyad la sngags bzlas nas re re nas mer 
[\[233a.5\]]bskyur ro/_/de la rig sngags ni 'di yin te/_a ma le bi ma le ku ku se ma ma ne ye na ban d+ho smi bin du na i tsu yA de bo bi ra sha Sha ti bi d+yo ti ta gar dza ti bisma ya pa rA dza ya ma b+hi bar+d+ha yi tuM de be b+h+yo ma nu She b+h+yo gan d+ha ra be b+h+yaHshe ki khi gra ha de bA bi shi ki gra ha do pa A nan dA s+ya a ga ma nA ya 
[\[233a.6\]]kra ma ne ya dzu ho mo swa hA/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sems g.yos te/_gtsug lag khang de nas langs nas gdol pa'i khyim gang na ba der song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyang ring mo nas 'ong ba gdol pa mos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gzugs bzang 
[\[233a.7\]]mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 'ong ba 'o ni ni dge sbyong kun dga' bo yin gyis shes par gyis shig_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mal bshams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gdol 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]pa'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas stegs bu la brten nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis nyam nga ba'i gnas skabs 'di thob na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag la mi dgongs so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[233b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dgongs par mdzad do/_/dgongs ma thag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sngags kyis gdol pa'i sngags nyams par mdzad do/_/de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/_s+thi ti ra tsu ti ra ni swa ti sarba prA Ni b+h+yaH_se ra pra sa naM ni rdo ShaM 
[\[233b.3\]]taM sarba to pA yaM i ta yo ya tra sha s+yan+ta p+ta yA ni tsa li tA ni tsA taM be de bA na maH_sh+yaM ti sarba sid d+ha tsa yo gi na e te na sa t+ya bA kye na swa s+t+ya A nan da ya bik+Sha be/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gdol pa'i rig sngags bkrol nas gdol pa'i khyim nas byung nas rang gi gtsug lag 
[\[233b.4\]]khang gang na ba der 'gro bar brtsams so/_/gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bltas nas rang gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye yum dge slong kun dga' bo 'di mchi zhing gda'o/_/de'i mas smras pa/_bu nges par dge 
[\[233b.5\]]sbyong gau ta mas dran par byas pas des na bdag gi sngags nyams par gyur to/_/gzugs bzang mos smras pa/_yang ci yum dag sbyong gau ta ma'i sngags khyad par du stobs dang ldan la bdag cag gi de lta ma yin nam/_de la mas slar smras pa/_bu dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sngags khyad 
[\[233b.6\]]par du stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/_bdag cag gi de lta ma yin no/_/bu 'jig rten na sngags mthu dang ldan pa'i sngags gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge sbyong gau ta ma 'dod na rab tu 'joms par byed do/_/yang 'jig rten pa'i sngags mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[233b.7\]]ma'i sngags rab tu gzhom par mi nus so/_/de lta bas na dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sngags ni ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_rim gyis phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas phyogs 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas skabs de gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis yi ge drug pa'i rig 
[\[234a.2\]]sngags 'di bstan gyis zung la chongs shig_/lhogs la kun tu bzung na bdag nyid la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la phan pa dang bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i 
[\[234a.3\]]rig sngags ni 'di yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs shing /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[234a.4\]]rgyas ngas kyang gsungs pa yin gyis/_de lta bas na khyod kyis zung shig_/thon cig_/kun du lhogs shig_/'di lta ste/_aN Da re ke yu re d+hi ha ste sa ra ge be ban+ta ma ti d+ha ri bi Sha tsi li mi li sA ta na yu sna tha ya saM b+ha gI lA go la pa ti ka DaM tsi la/_kun dga' bo yi ge drug 
[\[234a.5\]]pa'i rig sngags 'di ni yongs su srung ba dang /_bdag nyid bkra shis par byed pa yin te/_bsad pa'i ni chad pas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/chad pas bcad pa ni brgyad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad par 'os pa ni yang de bzhin du smras pas bral bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' 
[\[234a.6\]]bo ngas lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i tshogs dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams las gang zhig yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas nas/_bsrung skud dpung pa la 
[\[234a.7\]]btags na bkra shis par byed de/_las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par nus pa de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos de nyid kyi mtshan mo lus khrus byas gos sar pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bgos nas mu tig do shal gyis brgyan te/_grong khyer mnyan yod ga la ba de nas byung ste song nas grong khyer gyi sgo drung du bsdad de/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'ong ba la sdod cing nges par 'dir dge slong kun dga' bo 'ong ngo zhes sems so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[234b.2\]]bo snga dro'i dus su chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/gdol pa'i bu mo des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/'dug na 'dug 
[\[234b.3\]]cing 'gro na 'gro bar byed do/_/khyim gang dang gang du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dang der sgor cang mi smra bar sdod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo phyi bzhin du 'brang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo tsha zhing khrel gyis dogs 
[\[234b.4\]]pas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas myur du mnyan yod nas byung nas/_rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang 
[\[234b.6\]]mo 'di phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing mchis la mchi na/_khyim gang dang gang du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa'i khyim de dang de'i sgor mchis nas cang mi smra bar mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_de 
[\[234b.7\]]skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ci gzugs 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bzang mo dge slong kun dga' bo khyim thab tu bya bar 'dod dam/_btsun pa 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs bzang mo pha mas dge slong kun dga' bo la rjes su 'gro bar gnang ngam/_bcom ldan 'das gnang lags 
[\[235a.2\]]so/_/bde bar gshegs pa gnang lags so/_/bdag gis slar yang go bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos bcom ldan 'das la rab tu mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_
[\[235a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas slar song ste gang na rang gi pha ma yod pa der song ste phyin nas/_pha ma'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum dge sbyong gau ta ma rang gis dge slong kun dga' bo 
[\[235a.4\]]stsal to/_/de nas pha mas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo khrid nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos kyang bcom ldan 
[\[235a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[235a.6\]]'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo'i pha ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo gzugs bzang mo dge slong kun dga' bo la ster ram/_de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stsal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa stsal lo/_/de lta na khyed gnyis rang 
[\[235a.7\]]gi khyim du slar song shig_/de nas gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo'i pha mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo'i pha ma song nas ring mo ma lon par thugs su chud nas/_gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzugs bzang mo dge slong kun dga' bo don du gnyer ram/_bcom ldan 'das don du gnyer lags so/_/
[\[235b.2\]]bde bar gshegs pa don du gnyer lags so/_/de lta yin na gzugs bzang mo dge slong kun dga' bo'i cha byad du gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa gzung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung du gsol/_bde bar 
[\[235b.3\]]gshegs pa bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong ma 'dir legs par tshangs par spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs 
[\[235b.4\]]bzang mo skra byi zhing snam sbyar bgos par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo de ltar dge slong mar gyur zhing rab tu byung ba la chos kyi gtam yang ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs 
[\[235b.5\]]stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_gang zhig 'di ltar yun ring por 'khor bar bying ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa mnyan par bya ba 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod 
[\[235b.6\]]pa'i ro myang bar bya ba ma yin zhing smad pa'i gtam dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i gtam dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dge slong ma de la bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par 
[\[235b.7\]]bstan pas/_de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo de la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/_sems dga' ba las su rung ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]sems dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /_tha ba med pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' gang yin pa shes nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo dga' ba'i bsam pa dang /_las su rung ba'i sems dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_
[\[236a.2\]]sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /_tha ba med pa'i sems kyis bsgoms pa'i stobs rab tu ldan pa yang dag par gsal bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa kun tu shes te/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gsal bar byed pa'i chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal 
[\[236a.3\]]dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo la rgya cher bstan pas/_de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_
[\[236a.4\]]'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_gos bkrus pa dri ma med pa tshon gyis bsgyur na tshon yang dag par len pa bzhin du/_dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo stan de nyid du 'dug nas bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_
[\[236a.5\]]'gog pa dang /_lam rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mos chos mthong zhing chos thob la chos rtogs shing chos mthar thug par khong du chud nas/_the tsom las rgal zhing som nyi spangs/_tha snyad rnams dang bral zhing dri ma 
[\[236a.6\]]med pa thob pas gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi bkri bar ston pa'i bstan pa la chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni nongs lags so/_/bde bar 
[\[236a.7\]]gshegs pa bdag gis nongs lags te/_'di ltar byis pa/_'di ltar rmongs pa/_'di ltar mi gsal ba/_'di ltar mi dge ba/_bdag ni shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can lags te/_gang bdag gis dge slong kun dga' bo khyim thab tu 'tshal ba kun nas tshul 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ma lags so/_/de lta bas na btsun pa bdag gis nongs pa la nongs par khums shing /_yang nongs pa la mchog tu nongs par khums nas nongs pa de bshags par bgyi'o/_/slan chad kyang nongs pa bsdam par bgyi'o/_/de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[236b.2\]]nongs par bzung nas nongs pa bsdam par bgyi'o/_/gzugs bzang mo khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par shes nas/_'di ltar byis pa/_'di ltar rmongs pa/_'di ltar mi gsal ba/_'di ltar mi dge ba/_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin gyis gang khyod kyis 
[\[236b.3\]]dge slong kun dga' bo la khyim thab tu 'dzin zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa byas pa la chos 'dul ba rtogs nas gang khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par yang dag par lta zhing /_nyes pa la nyes par yang dag par mthong nas de bzhin du nyes pa 'chags shing phyin cad sdom pa 
[\[236b.4\]]ni ngas kyang khyod kyi nyes pa la nyes par gzung bar bya'o/_/phyin cad sdom la dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba nyid bsgrub par bya'i nyams par ni mi bya'o/_/de nas dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan zhing khyad par du rjes su gdams pas gcig 
[\[236b.5\]]pu dben par gnas shing bag yod pas bsdams shing dran pa dang shes bzhin rab tu nyams pa med pas bdag nyid gnas te/_gcig pu dben par bag yod pas bsdams shing dran pa dang shes bzhin nyams pa med pas bdag nyid gnas pas gang gi don du rigs kyi bu 
[\[236b.6\]]mo skra bregs nas chos gos bgos te/_yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyod pa la kun tu gnas pa ni mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gis mngon par shes pa mngon du byas shing bskyed nas lung ston par byed pa yin pas 
[\[236b.7\]]des tshangs par spyad pas bya ba byas shing skye ba zad de srid par skye ba gzhan mi len par gyur to/_/mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ji ltar gdol pa'i bu mo dge 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]slong rnams dang yang dag par spyod par byed ces smod par byed do/_/de bzhin du dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed ces smod par byed cing /_ji ltar gdol pa'i bu mo la bram 
[\[237a.2\]]ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams blta bar bya zhes zer ro/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gdol pa'i bu mo rab tu phyung zhes grag pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang ji ltar gdol pa'i bu mo zhes 
[\[237a.3\]]bya ba dang /_dge slong rnams yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed/_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang yang dag par spyad pa spyod par byed/_ji ltar bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag shing sa la chen po lta bu 
[\[237a.4\]]rnams kyis blta bar bya zhes smod la sems par byed cing bzhon pa bzang po sbyar te/_bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas mnyan yod nas 'phags te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed 
[\[237a.5\]]kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste/_ji srid bzhon pas 'gro ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas phyin nas bzhon pa las babs nas rkang thang gi 'khor gyis bskor te/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/_/zhugs nas 
[\[237a.6\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi tshogs chen po de dag kyang tha snyad lnga dang ldan pas 'khod do/_/yang bcom 
[\[237a.7\]]ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du phyogs te yang dag par dga' ba dang /_mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam sna tshogs mdzad de mjug brtul ba dang phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/yang gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rang rang gi pha ma'i rgyus dang /_ming dang /_rigs dang /_
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rus rnams bsnyad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/yang gzhan dag gis lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/gzhan dag ni yang 'thun par cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de 
[\[237b.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi tshogs chen po de rnams kyi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir dge 
[\[237b.3\]]slong ma de bkug nas dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon sum du dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam nyan par 'dod dam/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[237b.4\]]ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo'i sngon gyi gnas skabs las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das las slar mnyan 
[\[237b.5\]]nas gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na/_legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol te/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to/_/de dag la bcom 
[\[237b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na a ti mug ta ka dang /_sA la'i tshal gyi nags kyi phyogs gcig yod de/_de na tre shang ku zhes bya ba'i gdol pa'i rgyal po yod de gdol 
[\[237b.7\]]pa stong phrag du ma'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig gnas so/_/yang de'i tshe dge slong dag gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya ba des skye ba snga ma'i rig byed kyi yan lag dang /_nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa dang /_gsang ba dang bcas pa dang /_nges par 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]sbyar ba'i brda dang bcas pa dang /_yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa rnams dang /_bzhad gad ces bya ba dang /_lnga pa dang /_bstan bcos gzhan yang rkyang ba dang /_byA ka ra Na dang /_rgyang pan pa'i gtsug lag dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rabs dang /_
[\[238a.2\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams la rjes su mkhas shing ji ltar chos bshad pa dang /_rig byed kyi brtul zhugs dang /_rten pa med par bshad pa la mkhas pa zhig ste/_yang rgyal po tre shang ku de la gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya ba'i bu yod pa de gzugs dang ldan pa/_rigs 
[\[238a.3\]]dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_kha dog mdzes shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/de nas rgyal po tre shang kus gzhon nu stag rna la skye 
[\[238a.4\]]ba snga ma'i rig byed dran pa bslabs te/_'di lta ste yan lag dang /_nye ba'i yan lag dang /_gsang ba dang bcas pa dang /_nges par sbyar ba'i brda dang bcas pa dang /_yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa dang /_bzhad gad zhes bya ba dang /_lnga pa dang /_bstan 
[\[238a.5\]]bcos gzhan yang chos ji ltar bshad pa dang /_rig byed kyi brtul zhugs bslabs nas/_de nas rgyal po tre shang kus 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rna 'di ni gzugs dang ldan pa/_rig pa dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan 
[\[238a.6\]]dang ldan pa/_yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_kha dog mdzes shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan pa/_sngags dang rig byed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin gyis/_khyim bya ste yang gang bdag gis gzhon nu stag rna dang 'thun 
[\[238a.7\]]par gzugs dang ldan pa/_rigs dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa de lta bu'i bu mo zhig gang nas btsal snyam mo/_/yang dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/_bram ze pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba gyen du 'byung ba'i lung pa'i sgo zhes bya ba na/_khyab par 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sa dang /_chu dang /_shing dang ldan pa rtag tu 'bru rnams smin pa/_rgyal po mi sbyin zhes bya bas bram ze de la byin nas de na gnas so/_/yang bram ze pad ma'i snying po'i pha ma bram ze'i rigs yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/_rigs 'khrugs pa med pa/_rigs 
[\[238b.2\]]dang rus ma smad pa/_pha mes dang ma mes bdun rgyud kyi mkhan por gyur pa/_klog pa dang /_gsang sngags 'dzin pa/_rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yan lag dang bcas pa dang /_nye ba'i yan lag dang bcas pa dang /_brda nges par sbyar ba dang bcas pa 
[\[238b.3\]]dang /_bzhad gad ces bya ba dang /_lnga pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_byA ka ra Na dang /_'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtsug lag dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rabs dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams rjes su sbyar ba rgyas shing grol bar ston pa zhig go/_/yang bram ze pad ma'i 
[\[238b.4\]]snying po de la gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba'i bu mo yid du 'ong ba/_gzugs dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_mdzes shing mchog tu kha dog rgyas pa dang 
[\[238b.5\]]ldan pa/_bdag gi gzhon nu stag rna dang 'thun pas chung mar 'os so zhes bsams te/_de nas rgyal po tre shang kus don de nyid mtshan mo phal cher sems shing mtshan mo 'das nas nang par nam nangs te/_thams cad dkar ba'i shing rta la zhon nas/_gdol 
[\[238b.6\]]pa'i blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas gdol pa'i pho brang nas byung nas byang phyogs su chas te/_gyen du 'byung ba'i lung pa'i sgo ga la ba der song ste/_de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus gyen du 'byung ba'i lung pa'i sgo'i byang shar gyi mtshams na yid bde ba zhes bya 
[\[238b.7\]]ba'i skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs pas khyab pa/_shing sna tshogs pa'i me tog dang ldan pa/_bya sna tshogs pa sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa/_lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal ltar mdzes pa zhig yod de/_der phyin nas bram ze pad ma'i snying po 'ong ba la sdod do/_/bram ze pad ma'i 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]snying po bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bram ze'i sngags 'chad do/_/de nas pad ma'i snying po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas thams cad dkar ba'i rta'i shing rta la zhon nas/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya'i slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te gyen du 'byung ba nas 
[\[239a.2\]]'phags te/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bram ze'i sngags 'chad do/_/gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus bram ze pad ma'i snying po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_me 'bar ba 'od kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mchod sbyin byed pa bram ze'i tshogs kyis bskor ba 
[\[239a.3\]]lta bu/_gangs can sman tshogs kyis mdzes pa lta bu/_rgya mtsho rin po ches mdzes pa lta bu/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu/_rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu/_brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[239a.4\]]bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba mdzes pa rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsu ste chos bzhin du byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye pad ma'i snying po legs par 'dir byon gyis bya ba cung zhig smrar yod 
[\[239a.5\]]kyis de nyon cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze pad ma'i snying pos gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye tre shang ku bram ze ma yin pas kye zhes bod par mi nus shing rigs pa ma yin no/_/pad ma'i snying po bdag gis kye zhes 
[\[239a.6\]]bod par nus shing byar rung ste/_gang gis nus par byar rung bar 'gyur la/_gang gis de mi nus pa ni de ltar yang mi bya'o/_/kye pad ma'i snying po skyes bu'i mnyam par rtsom pa ni sngon gyi mnyam par rtsom pa las 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste bdag gi don dang /_gzhan 
[\[239a.7\]]gyi don dang /_bdag gi 'khor gyi don dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi don bsdus pa ni da ltar 'dir khyad par du don che ba gang yin pa smra yis nyon cig_/bdag la bu stag rna zhes bya ba yod kyis de'i chung mar bu mo byin cig rin gang zhig 'dod pa de sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]tshig de lta bu yang thos pa dang /_gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la bram ze pad ma'i snying po mchog tu khros 'khrugs shing don de la yid 'khrugs shing sdang bas de'i rkyen gyis dpral bar khro gnyer gsum bsdus nas bzhin rnam par gyur pas mig rnam par 'gyur 
[\[239b.2\]]zhing ne le ltar ser skyar gyur te/_gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tha mal pa'i gdol pa/_dman pa/_smad pa/_du ma za ba/_ngan pa ni gang bram ze rig byed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdol pa dman pa/_gcugs pa med par 
[\[239b.3\]]'joms par byed pa/_khyod kyis tshig 'di lta bu smra bar rigs sam/_kye blo ngan mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis tha mal pa yin par sems sam/_dman pa don ma yin pa la don du ma gnyer/_gser nam yang thal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang mun pa gnyis sam/_
[\[239b.4\]]gdol pa'i skye gnas su skyes pa yang bram ze dam pa rnams dang /_dman pa khyod dang 'brel par 'dod pa ji ltar ma rmongs/_gdol pa'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang /_kho bo dam par skyes pas dman pa dang mchog gnyis 'brel par mi 'dod do/_/bram ze mchog dang 
[\[239b.5\]]mchog tu 'brel par byed par 'dod kyi/_mchog dang dman pa gnyis su 'brel par mi 'dod do/_/rigs phun sum tshogs shing rigs yongs su dag cing 'khrugs pa med pa/_sngags kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klog pa dang /_sngags mchog las byung zhing rig byed kyi 
[\[239b.6\]]pha rol tu son pa/_brda nges par sbyar ba dang bcas pa/_bram ze gang gis rig byed bklags pa de lta bu'i bram ze dang 'brel bar bya ba yin gyi/_rigs mchog dang dman par 'brel par byar ni mi 'dod do/_/don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba ni rlung zhags 
[\[239b.7\]]pas 'dzin par rtsom pa la 'jug pa yin te/_gang nga dang khyod 'brel par byed par 'dod pa de bzhin no/_/ro dang rigs dman pa gnyis ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi gtsang ba yin gyis dman pa myur du phar khyed cig_/'di lta bu nyid ji ltar sems gdol pa dang 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gdol par lhan cig pa yin la/_dur bsrungs rnams dang ni dur bsrungs lhan cig pa yin te/_rigs gang dang gang yin pa de dang de 'brel bar byed pa yin te/_rgyal rigs rnams dang ni rgyal rigs lhan cig pa yin la/_bram ze rnams dang bram 
[\[240a.2\]]ze lhan cig pa yin la/_de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams kyang rje'u rigs dang lhan cig pa yin la/_de bzhin du dmangs rigs rnams kyang dmangs rigs dang lhan cig tu 'dra ba rnams phan tshun 'jug pa yin gyi/_gdol pa rnams dang bram ze ni 'brel pa med do/_/
[\[240a.3\]]rigs thams cad las dman pa dang rigs mchog rnams ji ltar 'brel du 'dod/_bram ze pad ma'i snying po las lan du de lta bu'i tshig thos pa dang /_gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar gser dang thal ba'i khyad par dmigs pa ltar bram ze 
[\[240a.4\]]rnams dang /_rigs gzhan de lta bu'i khyad par ni mi dmigs so/_/ji ltar mun pa dang snang ba'i khyad par dmigs pa ltar bram ze rnams dang rigs gzhan de lta bu'i khyad par ni mi dmigs so/_/gang bram ze rnams nam mkha' dang rgya mtsho las skyes pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[240a.5\]]gtsub shing gis me phyung ba ltar sa rnams las skyes pa'ang ma yin no/_/bram ze'i skye gnas gang yin pa de nas gdol pa'i rigs kyang skyes pa yin te/_mchog nyid dang dman pa nyid du bram ze rnams la ci dmigs/_bram ze mchog rnams kyi ro'ang spong zhing mi 
[\[240a.6\]]gtsang bar byed do/_/rigs rnams la de lta bas na gzhan dang de la khyad par ci zhig yod/_'di ltar sdig pa'i las cung zad byed cing rnyog pa dang /_rtsod pas sems can rnams la gnod pa bya bar bram ze rnams rab tu ston to/_/byad dang ro langs kyi las bram ze rnams 
[\[240a.7\]]rab tu ston to/_/las mi bzad pa rnams la yang bsod nams yin par bram ze rnams ston to/_/sha za bar 'dod pas bram ze rnams kyi cho ga sbyar ba sngags bzlas nas ra lug bsad na mtho ris su 'gro bar smra'o/_/gang de lta bu mtho ris kyi lam yin na ci'i phyir bram ze 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]bdag nyid dang /_gzhan yang nye du dang /_pha dang ma dang /_spun zla dang /_sring mo dang /_de bzhin du bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma rnams sngags bzlas nas bsad par mi ston/_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_bdag nyid kyang yul na gnas pa sngags de bzlas nas yang 
[\[240b.2\]]mtho ris su 'gro ba drug po rnams ci'i phyir mi gtong /_thams cad chom pas dus gcig tu dag cing bde 'gro mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur na/_ci'i phyir phyugs rnams kyis mchod sbyin byed kyi bdag nyid kyis ci'i phyir mi byed/_bde 'gro mtho ris su ra lug 'gro bar bstan 
[\[240b.3\]]par mi bya ste/_mtho ris kyi lam de dag pa ma yin te/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bstan pa yin no/_/bram ze rnams sdang ba'i sems kyis sha bza' bar 'dod pas rnam grangs du mas thabs bsams te/_phyugs rnams gsad pa'i cho ga bstan pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bdag gis 
[\[240b.4\]]bram ze rnams kyi cho ga gang yin pa brjod par bya ste/_rig byed bzhi las sdig pa bya bar bstan te/_gser rku ba dang chang 'thung dang /_/bla ma'i chung ma spyod pa dang /_/sdom pa'i tshogs ni 'jig pa ste/_/sdig pa bzhi ru bram ze 'dod/_/gser rku ba ni spang bar bya/_/de 
[\[240b.5\]]bzhin las gzhan sdig yod min/_/bram ze gang gis gser brkus na/_/de dag bram ze min par 'dod/_/chang ni btung bar mi bya ste/_/gzhan ni btung bar bya bar 'dod/_/bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung ba/_/de dag bram zer mi 'gyur ro/_/bla ma'i chung ma spyad mi bya/_/
[\[240b.6\]]gzhan gyi chung ma bgrod par bya/_/bla ma'i chung ma la 'gro ba/_/de dag bram zer mi 'gyur ro/_/bram ze gcig kyang gsad mi bya/_/bram ze min pa du ma bsad/_/gang zhig bram ze gsod byed pa/_/de dag bram zer mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi po de dag gang yin pa/_/
[\[240b.7\]]bram ze rnams la sdig par 'gyur/_/de dag las gzhan sdig med 'dod/_/bzhi po de las gcig byas na/_/de ni bram ze yin mi 'gyur/_/bram ze rnams ni tshogs pa ru/_/chud min phyag kyang mi bya'o/_/stan dang chu rnams mi bstab cing /_/bsu bar yang ni mi 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]bya'o/_/bram ze nyams pa de la yang /_/de ni 'byung ba'i thabs snang ste/_/de yis lo ni bcu gnyis su/_/bong bu'i pags pa bgo bya zhing /_/kha T+wAM ga ni thogs par bya/_/thod pa'i nang du bza' bar bya/_/dka' thub 'di ni yang dag bzung /_/nges par 
[\[241a.2\]]rgyun ni ma bcad par/_/gang gis brtul zhugs yang dag blang /_/phyir yang bram ze 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lo ni bcu gnyis tshang ba na/_/phyi nas de ni bram zer 'gyur/_/de ni 'byung ba'i thabs su bstan/_/bram ze yi ni dka' thub yin/_/rmongs pas las ni ngan pa ste/_/'byung 
[\[241a.3\]]ba med par bstan par bya/_/bram ze de ni 'di lta ste/_/'di shes tha mal tsam nyid du/_/'jig rten gang yin rjod par byed/_/bram ze yang de lta bu'o/_/rgyal rigs kyang de lta bu'o/_/rje'u rigs kyang de lta bu'o/_/dmangs rigs kyang de lta bu yin no/_/de dag thams 
[\[241a.4\]]cad de lta bu yin pas rnam pa thams cad du bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rna la bram ze'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo chung ma'i don du byin cig_/rin gang bab pa de 'dod pa de bzhin du bcal bar bya'o/_/gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku las de lta bu'i tshig thos pa dang /_bram ze pad 
[\[241a.5\]]ma'i snying po mchog tu khros 'khrugs shing don de la yid sdang bas de'i rkyen gyis dpral bar khro gnyer gsum bsdus nas/_kha nas du ba 'thul zhing ne le ltar ser skyar gyur pas mig rnam par sgyur zhing gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dmangs 
[\[241a.6\]]rigs khyod ma brtags par 'di lta bu'i tha snyad kyis 'jig rten rnams mnyam zhing rigs gcig cing tha dad pa ma yin par ston nam/_'di ltar ji ltar dman pa'i rigs/_/bram ze rig byed pha rol phyin/_/dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yis/_/rnam par nyams par khyod 'dod 
[\[241a.7\]]dam/_/rgyal por gyur nas de dman la/_/bye brag gyur par shes pa med/_/'di lta ste yul khrims dang /_grong khyer gyi khrims dang /_grong gi khrims dang /_ljongs kyi khrims dang /_sho gam gyi lugs dang /_bag ma gtong ba'i khrims dang /_bag ma len pa'i 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]khrims dang /_sngon gyi las kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes so/_/rigs ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/_'di lta ste/_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs zhes bya ba ste/_de dag gi bag ma len pa'i khrims kyang bram ze rnams 
[\[241b.2\]]kyi chung ma ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_bram ze mo dang /_rgyal rigs mo dang /_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo yin no/_/kye dman pa rgyal rigs kyi chung ma ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/_rgyal rigs mo dang /_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo 
[\[241b.3\]]zhes bya ba yin no/_/rje'u rigs kyi chung ma ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo'o/_/dmangs rigs kyi chung ma ni gcig ste/_dmangs rigs mo nyid yin no/_/kye dman pa bram ze rnams kyi bu ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_bram ze 
[\[241b.4\]]mo dang /_rgyal rigs mo dang /_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo la skyes pa yin no/_/rgyal rigs rnams kyi bu ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/_rgyal rigs mo dang /_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo las skyes pa yin no/_/rje'u rigs rnams kyi bu ni gnyis 
[\[241b.5\]]su 'gyur te/_rje'u rigs mo dang /_dmangs rigs mo las skyes pa yin no/_/dmangs rigs rnams kyi bu ni gcig tu 'gyur te/_dmangs rigs mo las skyes pa yin no/_/kye dman pa bram ze rnams kyi bu ni lus kyi stod kha nas skyes pa yin no/_/brang las ni rgyal rigs skyes 
[\[241b.6\]]pa yin no/_/lte ba nas ni rje'u rigs skyes pa yin no/_/rkang pa nas ni dmangs rigs skyes pa yin te/_kye dman pa nges par bram ze rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad sgrub par byed pa de las bdag cag skyes pa yin no/_/de nas ni rgyal rigs rnams so/_/de nas ni rje'u 
[\[241b.7\]]rigs te gsum pa'o/_/de nas ni dmangs rigs te bzhi pa yin par 'dod do/_/kye dman pa khyod rigs de lta bu bzhi pa yin par ma mthong ngam/_bdag rigs kyi mchog_/rigs kyi gtso bo/_phul du byung ba/_rigs kyi rab mchog dam par gyur pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]par 'brel par 'dod dam/_dman pa khyod spang bar bya ba yin gyi bdag gi drung nas phyir khyed cig_/yang tshig de lta bu bram ze pad ma'i snying po las thos pa dang /_gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze nyon cig 'dir khyed 
[\[242a.2\]]kyis 'jig rten thams cad sgrub par byed pa de las bdag cag skyes pa yin pas thu bo bdag cag yin la/_de nas rgyal rigs rnams so/_/de nas rje'u rigs te gsum pa'o/_/de nas ni dmangs rigs te bzhi pa yin par 'dod do zhes bstan pa la rkang pa dang bcas pa/_brla 
[\[242a.3\]]dang bcas pa/_lag pa dang bcas pa/_rtsib logs dang bcas pa/_mir gyur pa yin na yang cha cig la khyad par ci zhig yod de/_de bas na rigs bzhi ni mi grub bo/_/de lta bas na de dag la bye brag gang gis khyad par du byed pa smros shig_/de bas na khyad par med pa de'i 
[\[242a.4\]]phyir yang rigs rnams bzhir grub pa ma yin no/_/gang zhig 'di ltar byis pa rtse ba ni lam po cher 'jim pa'i gong bu las bsgongs nas bdag nyid ming 'dogs par byed de/_'di ni 'o ma'o/_/'di ni zho'o/_/'di ni mar ro/_/'di ni sha'o zhes brjod pas byis pa de dag la 'o ma 
[\[242a.5\]]la sogs pa bzhir 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/yang 'jim pa bsgongs pa'i sbyor ba'i bye brag yin par shes pa ltar skras ma yin/_rna bas ma yin/_mgo bos ma yin/_mig gis ma yin/_khas ma yin/_snas ma yin/_mgrin pas ma yin/_dpung pas ma yin/_brang gis ma 
[\[242a.6\]]yin/_rtsib logs kyis ma yin/_/lto dang rgyab kyis ma yin te/_/brla dang de bzhin sgyid pas min/_/rkang pa lag pas kyang ma yin/_/dbyibs kyis ma yin kha dog min/_/gnas dang 'dod pa spyod pas min/_/sna tshogs khyad par thams cad ni/_/mi rnams la ni gang yod 
[\[242a.7\]]pa/_/de ltar rang gi bsod nams rigs/_/skyes pa bud med mtshan mas phye/_/rkang pa lag pa 'thun pa na/_/de la rigs su gang gis 'dod/_/mgo bo dang ni brang rnams dang /_/pags pa dbang po'i bya bar bcas/_/lto bar ldan la yod ma yin/_/cha gcig 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]gnas la bye brag med/_/rigs bzhir gnas pa gang gis rtogs/_/de ltas mchog ni gang zhig yod/_/khyad par gang 'dod 'di ru smros/_/rab mchog bye brag 'dir yod min/_/rigs bzhi bye brag med par bshad/_/'dir nyes pa de lta bu yod pas gang gi 
[\[242b.2\]]tshe/_khyod kyis brjod pa de lta bu de ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/kye shes ldan bdag la slar nyon cig dang legs par bshad pa mchog tu dkar zhing mthar thug pa'i chos kyi gleng gzhi bstan par bshad par bya yis thos nas rigs pa dang mi ldan na slar smros shig_/gang 
[\[242b.3\]]yang 'dir bstan pa nges pa dang ldan zhing rigs pa med par smra na/_phyi phyir bdag las thos nas shes ldan khong du chud na mi rnams la mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi bye brag ni med do/_/bram ze khyod kyis rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gang gis de la rnam par dpyad na bram ze rnams dang 
[\[242b.4\]]gcig yin te/_'dir de lta bas na skye dgu rnams rigs gcig pa nyid de/_bdag dang yang rigs gcig pa nyid ma yin no/_/bdag dang rigs tha dad pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshangs pas 'jig rten 'di thams cad bskyed do zhes smra ba ni/_gal te tshangs pas bskyed ces bya ba 
[\[242b.5\]]'di tshang mas rigs pa ma yin te/_rigs bzhi po bstan pa bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi tshangs pa ni rgyu ma yin te/_bram ze rnams la yang dag par dpyad na/_mi rnams kyi rigs sna tshogs pa'i rgyu 'dus pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_
[\[242b.6\]]mgo bo dang /_kha dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_bzhin dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_rnam pa dang /_skye gnas dang /_zas kyi bye brag tu gyur pa rnams kyis sna tshogs par shes par bya'o/_/kye pad ma'i snying po 'di lta ste/_ba lang dang /_rta dang /_bong 
[\[242b.7\]]bu dang /_khyi dang /_rnga mo dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_ra lug rnams sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_brdzus te skyes pa rnams kyis sems can rnams tha dad par shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_yang rkang pa dang /_gdong 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_zas dang /_skye gnas kyi sna tshogs par yang shes par bya'o/_/yang de lta bas na rigs bzhi po rnams tha dad par shes par mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na 'di dag bram ze rnams dang 'dra zhing gcig pa yin 
[\[243a.2\]]no/_/shing 'di dag kyang gang gis 'bras bu a mra dang /_dzam bu dang /_khardzu ra dang /_pa na sa dang /_pha le pa dang /_dge tsa ka dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_pyi sor dang /_ka pi ta dang /_starga dang /_na li ke ra dang /_ting ni ka dang /_sardza ka dang /_'bras bu dang ldan pa sna tshogs par 
[\[243a.3\]]rig par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_shun lpags kyi cha dang /_me tog dang /_mtha' yas pa ste/_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/'bras bu med pa'i me tog rnams sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/yang de bas 
[\[243a.4\]]rigs bzhi po rnams tha dad pa ma yin no/_/bram ze 'di lta ste/_'di dag ni skams las skyes pas shing ste/_sA la dang /_na da dang /_ta ma la dang /_kar ni ka dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_shi ri sha dang /_'o bo da ra dang /_tsan dan dang /_sha ba dang /_da pa dang /_seng ldeng la 
[\[243a.5\]]sogs pa sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_shun lpags kyi cha dang /_me tog tsam dang /_snying po dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/yang de bas na rigs bzhi po'i rigs rnams la tha dad pa med par 
[\[243a.6\]]shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_'di dag ni 'o ma can gyi shing ste/_u dum bA ra dang /_pa lak+Sha dang /_a shwad tha dang /_n+ya gro d+ha dang /_bal gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_shun lpags kyi cha dang /_me tog tsam dang /_
[\[243a.7\]]snying po dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams tha dad par rig par bya'o/_/yang de bas na rigs bzhi po'i rigs rnams la tha dad pa med par shes par bya'o/_/pad ma'i snying po 'di lta ste/_yang 'di dag ni 'bras bu sman du gyur pa'i shing rnams te/_a ma la 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dang /_a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_a ru sha ka la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang sna tshogs pa'i sman rigs sna tshogs pa las skyes pa dang /_rtswa dang nags nas skyes par tha dad med par shes par rig par bya'o/_/yang de bas na rigs bzhi po rnams la 
[\[243b.2\]]tha dad med par shes par bya'o/_/bram ze 'di lta ste/_'di dag ni thang las skyes pa'i me tog rnams te/_a ti mug ta ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_pa ta la dang /_su ma na dang /_bar Shi ka dang /_da tsu skar la sogs pa sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[243b.3\]]gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/bram ze 'di lta ste/_'di dag ni chu las skyes pa'i me tog ste/_pad ma dang /_ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_so'u gan di ka dang /_dri zhim la sogs pa sna tshogs par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[243b.4\]]'di lta ste/_gzugs dang /_dri dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs tha dad par rig par bya'o/_/yang de bas na rigs bzhi po'i rigs rnams la tha dad pa med par shes par bya'o/_/bram ze bram ze'i rigs kyang de lta bu'o/_/rgyal rigs kyang de lta bu'o/_/rje'u rigs kyang 
[\[243b.5\]]de lta bu'o/_/dmangs rigs kyang de lta bu yin te/_de lta bas na thams cad gcig pa yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod la bram ze rnams kyi rtog pa brjod par bya ste/_'di ltar skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'i nam mkha' skar ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa ni mgo bo yin no/_/lto 
[\[243b.6\]]ba ni ri rnams yin no/_/brla gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis ni sa'o/_/mig gnyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba'o/_/ba spu rnams ni rtswa dang nags kyi tshogs so/_/nam mkha' las char 'bab pa ni mchi ma'o/_/chu bo rnams ni de'i gcin no/_/mtsho rnams ni de'i mi gtsang ba yin no/_/
[\[243b.7\]]de lta bu ni skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs par 'dod do/_/tshangs pa rang gi mtshan nyid ni de lta yin par rigs sam/_khyod rang gis dpyod cig_/tshangs pa gang yin pa de las bram ze rnams kyang byung /_rgyal rigs rnams kyang byung /_rje'u rigs rnams kyang byung /_dmangs 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]rigs rnams kyang byung bar gyur cing de ltar na gal te skyes par nges par gyur na yang 'di ltar 'gyur zhing rigs bye brag tu byas par 'gyur te/_bram ze rnams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing rigs gsum po mtho ris su mi 'gro na ni de ltar na rigs 
[\[244a.2\]]bye brag tu byas par 'gyur ro/_/de lta ma yin na rigs bzhir mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir rigs bzhi po tha dad pa rnams ni dge ba'i las byas pas mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur te/_yang des na drang srong rnams kyang zhi ba'i dka' thub spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir bram ze 
[\[244a.3\]]rnams la khyad par du gyur pa med do/_/gal te bram ze gcig la 'dir lce gnyis yod par 'gyur zhing de bzhin dbang po gnyis dang /_rwa bzhi dang /_mgo gnyis yod na de lta ni bram ze'i rigs khyad par du byas par 'gyur ro/_/chags pas phyin nas gzhan dag gsod 
[\[244a.4\]]pa dang /_de lta bur 'gro zhing gsod par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la las kyi sun 'byin zhing des yang 'di ltar bram ze rnams ni mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/'thab cing rtsod pa dang /_pha dang yang 'khrug cing ba lang gsod par sems pa ni 'dir bram 
[\[244a.5\]]ze rnams kyi lugs so/_/srid srung gi rig byed las sngags kyis skrag par byed pa ni bram ze rnams kyi bya ba yin par bstan to/_/sdig pa byed pa dang /_skye bo du ma slu ba dang /_sgyu dang mi bzad pa de lta bu'i rnyog pas 'di ltar pha rol la gnod pa rjes su sems 
[\[244a.6\]]shing de'i rjes la mtho ris nyid du 'gro bar 'dod na de mtho ris kyi lam ma yin te/_bram ze gang zhig dka' thub mchog gis thul zhing brtul zhugs dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa mi 'tshe zhing zhi ba la mngon par dga' ba'i bram ze de ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye'o/_/
[\[244a.7\]]sha dang rus par bcas pa dang /_sen mo dang bcas pa dang /_pags pa dang bcas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_gcin dang phyi sa ldan par gcig la dbang po rnams la khyad par med pas de'i phyir rigs bzhi nyid du ma grub pa'o/_/bram ze 'di lta ste/_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]yang skyes bu 'ga' zhig la bu bzhi yod par gyur la/_de dag la ming dga' byed ces bya ba dang /_'tsho byed ces bya ba dang /_mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /_tshe brgya pa zhes bya bar btags pas pad ma'i snying po skyes bu de'i bur gyur pa de las dga' byed ces bya ba des dga' 
[\[244b.2\]]bar byed dam/_'tsho byed ces bya ba des 'tsho bar byed dam/_mya ngan med ces bya ba des yid bde bar byed dam/_gang tshe brgya pa zhes bya ba des lo brgya 'tsho bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi/_yang bram ze de dag ni ming gis tha dad par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyis ni ma yin no/_/
[\[244b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha yang gcig las skyes pa'i bu yin te/_de la 'dir bod pa'i ched du pha dang /_ma dang /_spun zla dang /_nye dus btags pa de nyid rigs yin te/_gang de ltar rnam par shes pa de las gzhan du gyur pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/bram ze bdag 
[\[244b.4\]]nyid legs par dpyod cig_/bram ze'i rigs zhes bya ba dang /_rje'u rigs zhes bya ba dang /_dmangs rigs zhes bya ba gang zhig yin/_rgyu thams cad kyis lag pa 'jas pa dang /_sgur po dang /_'gog pa dang /_'brum bu dang /_mdze dang /_sha bkra dang /_tha dad pa 
[\[244b.5\]]rab tu gnas te/_sha dang [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dang /_pags pa dang /_gzhung pa dang /_rtsib logs dang /_gsus pa dang /_bzhin rang rang gi las kyis grub pa yin te/_de lta bu'i 'gro ba la bram zer gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin/_gang gis rigs khyad par du byas pa de bas ni rigs 
[\[244b.6\]]yod pa ma yin/_bye brag yod pa ma yin te rigs bzhi nyid du ma grub bo/_/de lta bas na bram ze khyod la bdag 'di skad smra ste/_gang 'jig rten 'di'i bram ze zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal rigs zhes bya ba dang /_rje'u rigs zhes bya ba dang /_dmangs rigs bya ba 'di dag gcig 
[\[244b.7\]]pa yin te/_thams cad la tha dad pa ni med do/_/de bas na bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rna la bu mo gzugs bzang mo chung ma'i don du byin cig_/rin du gang bab cing 'dod pa de sbyin par bya'o/_/de lta bu'i tshig gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku las thos pa dang /_bram ze 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]pad ma'i snying pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/yang ci khyod kyis nges brjod kyi rig byed kyang bklags/_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed kyang bklags/_snyan dngags kyi rig byed kyang bklags/_srid srung gi rig byed kyang bklags/_tshe'i rig byed kyi 
[\[245a.2\]]cho ga yang bklags/_nang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyis bklags sam/_gzhan yang yan lag gi rig pa dang /_dngos po brtag pa dang /_bkra shis pa'i ltas dang /_la nye brtag pa yang bslabs shing gzhan yang khyod kyis sgra gcan 'dzin gyi 'gros dang /_
