[\[265b.5\]]nyin par la yod do/_/mtshan mo la yang yud tsam bco lnga yod do/_/sor gsum gyis grib ma 'phel zhing nyi ma 'gyed do/_/chu stod dang mtshan mor ldan la mchu dang nyin mor 'grogs shing nag pa dang dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong du 'dzom la smin drug dang 
[\[265b.6\]]tshes bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la yud tsam bcu gsum yod do/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do/_/sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed la rgyu skar tha skar dang mtshan mor ldan la/_chu stod dang nyi mor 'grogs na dgun gyi zla ba dang po'i gnam stong dang lha mtshams 
[\[265b.7\]]su 'dzom zhing mgo dang bco lngar ldan na/_nyin par la yud tsam bcu gsum yod do/_/mtshan mo la yud tsam bcu bdun yod do/_/sor lnga'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyed cing smin drug dang mtshan mor 'dzom la/_nag pa dang nyin par 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]stong dang snron du 'dzom par 'gyur zhing rgyal dang bco lngar ldan na/_nyin par la yud tsam bcu gnyis yod do/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bco brgyad yod do/_/sor drug gi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mgo dang mtshan mor 'dzom la/_sa ga dang nyi mar 
[\[266a.2\]]'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang chu stod du 'dzom la mchu dang bco lngar ldan na/_nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu gsum yod do/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bdun yod do/_/sor lnga'i grib ma 'gribs pas nyi ma 'gyur zhing rgyal dang mtshan mor 
[\[266a.3\]]'dzom la/_snron dang nyi ma 'grogs shing dgun gyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong dang gro bzhin du 'dzom la chu stod dang bco lngar 'dzom na/_nyin par la yud tsam bcu bzhi'o/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu drug go/_/sor bzhi'i grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing mchu dang /_mtshan 
[\[266a.4\]]mor 'dzom la/_chu stod dang nyi ma 'grogs shing dpyid zla ra ba'i gnam stong dang khrums stod du 'dzom par 'gyur zhing nag pa dang bco lngar 'dzom na/_nyin par la ni yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo la yang yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur zhing sor gsum gyi grib mas nyi ma 
[\[266a.5\]]'gyur zhing chu stod dang mtshan mor 'dzom la gro bzhin dang nyi mar 'grogs par 'gyur zhing dpyid kyi zla ba gnyis pa'i gnam stong dang tha skar du 'dzom la sa ga dang bco lngar 'dzom na nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu drug tu 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu bzhi'o/_/sor gnyis 
[\[266a.6\]]kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing nag pa dang mtshan mor 'dzom la khrums stod dang nyi mar 'grogs par gyur cing dpyid kyi zla ba gsum pa'i gnam stong dang smin drug tu 'dzom par gyur la snrums dang bco lngar 'dzom na/_nyin par la ni yud tsam bcu bdun du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[266a.7\]]mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gsum mo/_/sor gnyis kyi grib mas nyi ma 'gyur zhing snron dang mtshan mor 'dzom la smin drug dang nyi mar 'dzom par gyur cing /_dpyid kyi zla ba bzhi pa'i gnam stong dang rgyal du 'dzom par gyur la chu stod dang bco lnga ru 'dzom na/_nyin par 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]la ni yud tsam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo la ni yud tsam bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma phyed skad la sor phyed pa'i grib mas nyi mar 'gyur zhing chu stod dang mtshan mor 'dzom la rgyal dang nyin par 'grogs par gyur cing /_lo btsal bas yud tsam gyi bye 
[\[266b.2\]]brag rnams kyis rgyu skar de thams cad la cha dang cha ru bgo zhing gnam stong dang bco lngar phye bas mtshan mo dang nyin zhag tu shes par bya'o/_/lo lnga lnga zhing zla ba re re lhag par 'gyur zhing zla ba drug nyin mtshan mnyam par gyur la de las gzhan zla ba drug ni nyi ma ring la yang 
[\[266b.3\]]zla ba drug ni mtshan mo ring ngo /_/zla ba drug drug ni yud tsam de dag mnyam par rig par bya ste/_zla ba drug ni nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro la zla ba drug ni lho phyogs su rgyu'o/_/zla ba drug ni rgya mtsho la lhag par 'bab par 'gyur zhing zla ba'i 'gros dang /_nyi ma'i 'gros kyis dus 
[\[266b.4\]]'phel bar 'gyur zhing rtsis dang bral bas shes par mi nus pa de ni 'di ltar lo yin par bshad par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_sgra gcan dang /_phur bu dang /_spen pa dang /_mig dmar dang /_gza' lag dang /_'di rnams kyi gtso bo ni phur bu'o/_/spen pa 
[\[266b.5\]]dang /_gza' lag dang /_mig dmar dang /_pa ba sangs te/_de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'gros so/_/bra nye dang /_smin drug dang /_snar ma dang /_mgo ste/_de dag ni thun mong gi dang po'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/lag dang /_nam sa dang /_rgyal dang /_skag dang /_de 
[\[266b.6\]]dag ni thun mong ba ste/_dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o/_/mchu dang /_gre dang /_dbo gnyis dang /_me bzhi dang /_nag pa ste/_de dag ni thun mong gi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o/_/sa ri dang /_sa ga dang /_lha mtshams dang /_de dag ni thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[266b.7\]]bzhi pa'o/_/snron dang /_snrums dang /_chu smad dang /_chu stod dang /_gro bzhin te/_de dag ni 'jigs pa chen por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga pa'o/_/mon gre dang /_mon gru dang /_khrums gnyis dang /_nam gru dang /_tha skar dang /_bra nye ste de dag ni thun mong 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor drug pa'o/_/gang gi tshe rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor las nad de dang de'i ljongs su de'i nad yin par blta'o/_/yud tsam bcu gnyis pa'i nyin par ni gza' bcu gnyis te/_mtshan mo yud tsam drug drug rgyu ste/_drug gang zhe na/_dbyar zla ba 
[\[267a.2\]]rdzogs pa dang /_nyin par la yud tsam bcu bdun yod cing nyi ma shar nas bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'phags nas ni rnam par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam bcu gsum dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo la yud tsam drug la 
[\[267a.3\]]yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/tsha bas gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du nam nangs pa dang 'gyur ro/_/dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i bco lnga la yud tsam bcu drug nyin par la yod cing nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[267a.4\]]phyed la ni mi 'pham zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma 'phags nas ni drag po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam bcu bzhi dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo la ni nyi ma nub par rtsom pa rnam par rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan phyed la ni 
[\[267a.5\]]sgyu ma chen po zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/nam langs pa na ni me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/rta 'thab pa'i bco lnga ni yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i nyin par la nyi ma 'char ba la ni bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[267a.6\]]nyi ma 'phags nas ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs la dbus ma zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma de las 'phags pa'i lha'i char zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshan mo nyi ma nub pa dang drag po zhes bya ba'i yud 
[\[267a.7\]]tsam du 'gyur ro/_/mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam dang /_'gro ba zhes bya ba'i yud tsam gyi rjes thogs la mtshan mo phyed du gyur nas nam nangs pa na me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/rta 'thab pa'i zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la nyin mtshan mnyam 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i nyin par la yud tsam bco lngar 'gyur zhing mtshan mo la yud tsam bco lnga'o/_/yud tsam nyin mtshan mnyam pa na nyi ma shar ba na bzhi mthon zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/cha mnyam par dbus na gnas pa na mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur 
[\[267b.2\]]ro/_/nyi ma nub nas mtshan mo la bab pa na lha'i cha zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/mtshan phyed la ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa na ni me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/ston zla 'bring po'i bco lnga la yud

[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/bong bu dang /_srin po zhes bya ba'i rjes la mtshan phyed du gyur nas/_nam langs pa na me yis gdungs pa zhes bya ba'i yud tsam du 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar sos ka'i dang po de ltar dbyar dang po/_/ji ltar dpyid ka'i 
[\[268a.2\]]gnyis pa de ltar dbyar gnyis pa/_/ji ltar dpyid ka dang po de ltar ston dang po/_/ji ltar dgun gyi bzhi pa'i de ltar ston tha [{]chungs[,]chung[}]/_/ji ltar dgun 'bring de ltar dgun dang po/_/ji ltar dgun 'bring de ltar sos ka'i gnyis/_/de lta bur ni rgyu skar rnams/_/rgyu zhing rgyu bar

[\[268a.6\]]zhag bcu'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/sos ka'i zla ba dang po la yang dang yang g.yos na zhag bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/sos ka'i zla ba gnyis pa la yang yang g.yos na nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/dbyar zla ra ba la yang

[\[270a.1\]]chu stod la sa g.yos na chu la gnas pa'i nya rnams dang /_shu shu ma dang /_nya phyis rnams dang /_chu srin rnams dang /_rus sbal dang /_rigs dang rus btsun pa rnams dang /_nor dang ldan pa rnams dang /_mkhas pa rnams dang /_gnyis pa

[\[270a.3\]]dang /_shing mkhan rnams dang /_dbul po rnams dang /_gzhan yang bzo sna tshogs pa byed pa dang /_grong dang nye ba'i skam la gnas pa la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin la sa g.yos na mi gang zhig rgyal po mchod pa dang /_klog pa rnams dang /_bstan bcos
