[\[270b.6\]]la nad chen po 'byung zhing rtsod pa 'byung ngo /_/cho lo mkhan dang /_mdud pa 'grol ba dang /_me long gi 'khor los slu bar byed pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du btson bsrungs rnams dang /_zas sdom pa dang /_gnod pa byed pa'i skye bo mi bzad pa rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b.7\]]sa g.yos nas zhag bdun na sprin chen po g.yo bar 'gyur te/_snum zhing gnag la ri bo lta bu ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/gnyid 'phel ba dang /_gzhan yang bkra shis kyi dbyangs dang /_dbang po rdo rje lta bu dang /_de bzhin du der dus 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]tshigs ltar nyi ma dang zla ba sgrib cing de la kun nas sprin chen po'i mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing de dang 'dra bar mthong zhing the tshom skyed pa'i sprin ldang zhing 'brug bsgrags pa 'byung bar rig par bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/de ltar shes nas gdon 
[\[271a.2\]]mi za bar sa bon thams cad gdab par bya'o/_/bya rnams bsrug na tshong pa rnams kyis bya ba 'grub bo/_/de lta bu'i sa g.yos na thams cad du bkra shis par brjod do/_/yang sa g.yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun na sprin ldang ste/_yang 'di ltar ka shi ka'i gos 'dra ba'i 
[\[271a.3\]]sprin gyis khyab cing mi 'thun pa'i sgra sgrogs pas nub phyogs su 'gro la chu la gnas pa'i shu shu ma ra dang /_ba lu ka dang /_nya dang /_chu srin 'dra ba'i sprin snang zhing nyi ma dang /_zla ba sgrib pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa snang na/_de ni chus sprul pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes 
[\[271a.4\]]drang srong chen po rnams kyis de skad bstan pa yin no/_/sgang dang ri'i rtse mo dang /_zhing dang /_rlan dang bral ba de dag rnams la sa bon gdab par bya ste/_dma' bar nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'dam dang chur 'gyur zhing dma' bar 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/de lta 
[\[271a.5\]]bu'i sa g.yos na ni chu'i yin pas shis pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/yang 'di ltar sa g.yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun gyi nang du rlung drag po mi bzad pa ldang dus tshigs ltar ser skyar snang la nyi ma dang zla ba dmar por mthong zhing mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan par snang na/_de ni 
[\[271a.6\]]rlung gi sa g.yos pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de lta bu gyur pa ni drang srong rnams kyis bstan pa yin no/_/de lta bu la mkhas pas 'gro bar mi bya ste/_bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dgra zla las 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bas ra ba dang 'obs kyis mchog tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[271a.7\]]lta bu ni sa'i sa g.yos pa'i yon tan thams cad bstan pa yin no/_/mi rnams kyis me yis sa g.yos pa'i khyad par rig par bya ste/_gal te sa g.yos nas de'i rjes la zhag bdun gyi nang du skar mda' drag po ltung zhing dus tshigs ltar dmar la nyi ma dang zla ba yang 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]dmar bar snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par snang ba ni me yis g.yos pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bud shing las me mched par 'gyur bas nor bsregs shing du ba'i phreng ba snang zhing mtshon mchog tu 'bab la chu 'khyil ba snang ba zla ba dgu'i bar du char mi 'bab po/_/
[\[271b.2\]]de lta bu'i sa g.yos pa mi bzad pa ni me yis g.yos pa yin te/_rgyal po dang rgyal rigs rnams la snga dro'i tsha ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rta dang glang po dang blon po chen po rnams la ni phyed la tsha ba'i nad 'byung la phyi dro ni ba lang dang phyugs rnams la nad 'byung ngo /_/
[\[271b.3\]]mtshan mo rkun ma rnams la gnod pa 'byung ngo /_/nam langs pa na mtha' 'khob pa rnams la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du nam phyed na ni zhag brgyad kyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de nas yang bud med dang skyes pa la 'byung zhing 
[\[271b.4\]]thun gsum pa ni zhing rmo ba'i rang bzhin gyi las byed pa rnams la gnod pa 'byung ngo /_/mar ngo la ni drag shul gyi las byed pa'i gtum po rnams la nad 'byung ngo /_/yar ngo la ni bram ze mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_zhing pa rnams dang /_byis pa rnams dang /_rgan mo 
[\[271b.5\]]rnams dang /_chos la gnas pa'i gtso bo rnams la tsha ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dman pa dang /_dge ba dang dma' bar 'gyur ba rnams shes shing gang gis snga ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa shes pa'i bram ze'i nyi mar gyur par blta'o/_/yang phur bu'i mnyam 
[\[271b.6\]]pa'i dge ba'i las rnam pa bzhi dang /_dmangs rigs kyi las rnam pa bzhi dang /_mnyam pa'i snyan dngags kyi las rnams shes pa dang /_so ma'i las rnam pa bzhi dang /_tshangs pa'i las des mnyam par shes pa rnams la gnod pa 'byung ngo /_/kye gzhan 
[\[271b.7\]]yang pad ma'i snying po rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag gi nad kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/smin drug la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa zhag bzhi nas sos par bstan to/_/de'i lha ni me lha yin pas zho'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad las ldang 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]bar bshad do/_/snar ma la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag lnga'i bar du na bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin pas me tog gi phreng ba gtsang ma'i gtor ma btang bas/_gtor 
[\[272a.2\]]ma'i las des nad las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag brgyad nas nad de las sos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lha ni zla ba yin pas sran sngon gyi khur ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[272a.3\]]lag la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag bcu'i bar du na bar 'gyur zhing de nas sos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lha ni drag po yin pas 'bras dang /_'o thug gi gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/nam so la skyes pa 
[\[272a.4\]]'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag brgyad kyi bar du na zhing de nas sos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lha ni nyi ma yin pas spos dang byug pa'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa 
[\[272a.5\]]ni zhag lnga'i bar du na zhing de nas sos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lha ni phur bu yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/skag la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni sman gyis gso bas mi sos te/_
[\[272a.6\]]de'i lha ni sbrul yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mchu la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag brgyad kyi bar du na zhing de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni mtshun yin pas 'bru dang til btags pa'i ri lu'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las 
[\[272a.7\]]ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/gre la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag bdun na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas nad de las sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni klu yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]dbo la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni gso ba'i sman gyis sos par mi 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni gshin rje yin pa'i phyir ro/_/me bzhi la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag lnga na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni 
[\[272b.2\]]nyi ma yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/nag pa la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni dri za yin pas nas kyi ljang bu'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de 
[\[272b.3\]]las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/sa ri la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zug zer che la zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing /_de'i lha ni rlung lha yin pas sna tshogs phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/sa 
[\[272b.4\]]ga la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni nad lci zhing zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lha ni me lha dang /_dbang po yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 
[\[272b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lha mtshams la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha nyi ma yin pas mar gyis gang ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/snron la 
[\[272b.6\]]skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni nad tshabs che zhing zhag bcu gsum na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni dbang po yin te/_byug pa dang phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/snrum sa la 
[\[272b.7\]]skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zla ba gcig na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni dmangs rigs yin pas sha'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/chu stod la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]kyis btab pa ni/_nad tshabs che zhing zla ba brgyad kyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni chu lha yin pas 'bras dang til btags pa'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de sos par 'gyur ro/_/chu 
[\[273a.2\]]smad la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag bdun gyi bar du na zhing de nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni sna tshogs pa yin pas 'bras dang 'o thug gi gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin la skyes pa'am/_bud med 
[\[273a.3\]]nad kyis btab pa ni nad lci zhing lo gcig gi bar du na bar 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni khyab 'jug yin pas byug pa dang phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las sos par 'gyur ro/_/mon gre la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni nad lci zhing zla ba bcu 
[\[273a.4\]]gsum gyi bar du na bar 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni ba su de ba yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/mon gru la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni zhag bcu gsum gyi bar du na bar 'gyur zhing /_de 
[\[273a.5\]]nas sos par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni chu lha yin pas 'bras dang 'o thug gi gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/khrums stod la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab par gyur na/_zhag bdun na bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas sos 
[\[273a.6\]]par 'gyur te/_de'i lha ni klu yin pas byug pa dang /_phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/nam gru la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab pa ni nad yang zhing zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad na bar 'gyur zhing /_/de nas sos par 
[\[273a.7\]]'gyur te/_de'i lha ni rgyal yin pas spos dang me tog gi phreng ba'i gtor ma btang na/_gtor ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/tha skar la skyes pa'am/_bud med nad kyis btab par gyur na zug zer che la zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du na bar 'gyur la/_de'i 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]lha ni nyi ma yin pas mar dang sran sngon gyi gtor ma btang na/_gtong ma des nad de las ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/bra nye la skyes pa'am/_bud med gang nad kyis btab par gyur na sman gyis mi 'tsho ste/_de'i lha ni gshin rje yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mkhas pas tshul khrims 
[\[273b.2\]]la sbyar bar bya ste/_des mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kye pad ma'i snying po de ni nad kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u yin no/_/gzhan yang kye pad ma'i snying po bcings pa thar pa zhes bya ba'i le'u bshad kyis nyon cig/_kye pad ma'i snying po smin 
[\[273b.3\]]drug la btson du bzung ba ni zhag gsum nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bstan to/_/snar ma la btson du bzung ba ni yang zhag gsum nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo la btson du bzung ba ni zhag nyi shu nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lag la btson du bzung ba ni zla 
[\[273b.4\]]ba phyed nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nam so la btson du bzung ba ni zhag gcig nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal la btson du bzung ba ni zhag gsum nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/skag la btson du bzung ba ni yang zhag gsum nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/mchu la 
[\[273b.5\]]btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu drug nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gre la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dbo la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bdun nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/me bzhi la btson du bzung ba ni zhag lnga nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nag 
[\[273b.6\]]pa la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bdun nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sa ri la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu gnyis nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sa ga la btson du bzung ba ni zhag nyi shu rtsa drug nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mtshams la btson du bzung ba ni zhag nyi shu rtsa 
[\[273b.7\]]dgu nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/snron la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/snrums la btson du bzung ba ni zhag nyi shu rtsa drug nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/chu stod la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu bzhi nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]chu smad la yang brjod par bya'o/_/gro bzhin dang /_mon gre dang /_mon gru dang /_khrums stod dang /_khrums smad dang /_nam gru ste/_de dag la btson du bzung ba ni zhag bcu bzhi nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tha skar la btson du 
[\[274a.2\]]bzung ba ni zhag gsum nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bra nye la btson du bzung ba ni nyon mongs shing mi shor bar bstan to/_/kye pad ma'i snying po de dag ni bcings pa thar pa zhes bya ba'i le'u yin no/_/kye pad ma'i snying po gzhan yang sme ba'i mtshan ma bshad par bya 
[\[274a.3\]]yis de nyon cig_/mgo dkyil na sme ba phra zhing sa dkar po'i kha dog lta bu yod na/_bud med de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/_/de ni mchu pad ma ltar dmar bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang gi mgo la sme ba phra zhing lig bu mig gi kha dog lta bu yod 
[\[274a.4\]]na/_de ni dmag dpon gyi chung mar 'gyur te/_nu ma gnyis kyi dkyil na thig le lta bu'i sme ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/smin ma gnyis kyi mtshams na sme ba yod na/_de ni khyim thab las 'phyo zhing bag med par spyod la/_khyo lnga yod par 'gyur zhing /_zas dang 
[\[274a.5\]]skom mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba'i gnas na sme ba'i thig le yod na khyo lnga par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mkhur tshos la sme ba yod na/_de ni khyim thab las 'phyo bar 'gyur zhing /_bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/_/brla'i phye gsham 
[\[274a.6\]]na sme ba thig le lta bu yod pa dang /_rna ba la sme ba yod pa ni thos pa mang zhing bag med par bstan to/_/gang gi mjug to na thig le lta bu'i sme ba yod pa ni thos pa mang zhing khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi ya mchu la sme ba nag po yod pa de 
[\[274a.7\]]ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra zhing khyim thab las 'phyo la sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi brla la sme ba yod pa de ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/_/gang gi mchu la sme ba yod pa de ni bag chung zhing khyim thab las 'phyo bar bstan to/_/gang gsang ba'i nang na 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]sme ba yod pa de ni zas dang /_skom mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kos ko dang gsang ba'i nang na sme ba yod pa ni khyim thab las 'phyo zhing /_zas dang gos mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/kye pad ma'i snying po de ni sme ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u'o/_/kye pad 
[\[274b.2\]]ma'i snying po gzhan yang skyes pa'i yon tan gyi le'u bshad kyis nyon cig_/smin drug la skyes pa'i mi ni dka' thub dang ldan zhing rkun ma la dga' la dpa' zhing gtum pa dang /_lugs ston pa'i skyes bur 'gyur ro/_/snar ma la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni nor dang ldan 
[\[274b.3\]]pa dang /_chos la dga' zhing brtson 'grus brtan zhing dpa' la bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mgo la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni 'jam zhing mdzes la blta bar 'os pa dang /_khyad par du bud med la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lag la skyes pa ni gsod cing 
[\[274b.4\]]gtum la pha rol 'jigs par byed cing /_las drag po la sbyor la khang pa bzang po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/nam so la skyes pa ni 'dod pa chung zhing blo dang ldan la/_chos dang tshul khrims dang bcas shing spro thung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal la skyes pa ni bram ze 
[\[274b.5\]]chen po gzi brjid dang ldan pa'am/_rgyal rigs su gyur nas rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/skag la skyes pa ni sna 'bud cing khro la spro thung zhing skyes bu ngan pa rnams la lung gsal bar bstan to/_/mchu la skyes 
[\[274b.6\]]pa ni shes rab dang ldan zhing lag pa gtsang la bsod nams che zhing /_de bzhin du nor dang /_longs spyod du ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gre la skyes pa ni chos ma yin pa'i blo dang ldan zhing rtag tu bla ma la smod par 'gyur ro/_/dbo la skyes pa ni longs spyod dang ldan 
[\[274b.7\]]zhing lha'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi skal ba can gyi skyes bur 'gyur ro/_/me bzhi la skyes pa ni bdag nyid skyon med cing rnam par gnon la zas bzang po za zhing dmag dpon byed cing 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/nag pa la skyes 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]pa ni mig mdzes shing gtam sna tshogs la mkhas la/_blta na sdug cing dbang dang ldan la tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sa ri la skyes pa ni gnyen dang ldan zhing mkhas la 'jam zhing dad pa che la grogs dad che bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275a.2\]]sa ga la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni gzi brjid dang ldan la nor mang zhing dpa' zhing pha rol gnon la/_gtong ba dang ldan zhing skal ba che bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mtshams la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni grogs po dang ldan zhing khyim dang ldan la/_dag cing byas pa gzo la chos kyi bdag 
[\[275a.3\]]nyid can du 'gyur ro/_/snron la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni grogs dad che la kun nas rgyal zhing 'phong gi bstan bcos la mkhas shing /_bud med la dga' ba'i blo can du 'gyur ro/_/snrums la skyes pa ni byas pa mi gzo la chos la mi dga' zhing dpa' zhing brtan la sdig 
[\[275a.4\]]pa can du 'gyur ro/_/chu stod la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni ser sna che la dbang po rgod pa dang /_nya'i sha la sred cing shan par 'gyur ro/_/chu smad la skyes pa'i skyes bu ni spro thung zhing gtong ba la dga' zhing mkhas la/_dga' mdza' dang ldan zhing gnyen bshes mang bar 
[\[275a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin la skyes pa ni bstan bcos la mkhas shing bya ba dang ldan la tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/mon gre la skyes pa ni blo rgod cing nor mang la skyes bu thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/mon gru la skyes pa ni zhe sdang che zhing tshul khrims dang mi ldan la byi 
[\[275a.6\]]rgyug par 'gyur ro/_/khrums stod la skyes pa ni spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing byas pa gzo la de kha ra bar 'gyur ro/_/khrums smad la skyes pa ni shin tu mkhas shing blo dang ldan la bu mang zhing chos dang tshul khrims ldan zhing /_nor mang bar 'gyur ro/_/nam gru 
[\[275a.7\]]la skyes pa ni chos shes shing rig pa sten la dbul zhing nor nyung la gtong ba la dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/tha skar la skyes pa ni mkhas shing skye bo'i tshogs dga' la dpa' zhing skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bra nye la skyes pa ni sdig pa la spyod cing mi mkhas 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]la sngar zhing sbyin pa la dga' zhing gzhan la rten pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/kye pad ma'i snying po de ni skyes pa'i yon tan gyi le'u'o/_/gzhan yang bram ze bdag gis sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas mngon sum du byas nas/_sems kyis rig pa rnams gtan la 
[\[275b.2\]]phab cing sna tshogs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/_tshangs pa mchog tu gyur pa de khyod gzhan zhig yin snyam na/_de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lha rnams kyi tshangs pa mchog tu gyur to/_/bdag de nas shi 'phos nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 
[\[275b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas shi 'phos nas bram ze dgon pa pa mu khyud gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas shi 'phos nas drang srong dkar po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/de nas shi 'phos nas tha mal pa'i pan Di ta ne tso zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bdag gis rig byed bzhi bklags 
[\[275b.4\]]te/_'di lta ste/_rgyal zhes bya ba'i gnod pa'i phyogs dang /_sdeb sbyor gyi gnod pa'i phyogs dang /_cha nyi shu rtsa gcig pa byas shing srid srung rnams bdag gis byas so/_/bram ze khyod yang de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong ba su zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du de de 
[\[275b.5\]]ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong ba su zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe ngas shing mkhan gyi bu mo ser skya mo zhes bya ba chung ma'i don du blangs so/_/de la bdag kun du chags pas rdzu 'phrul nyams shing bsam gtan dang bral te/_des bdag nyid 'gyod 
[\[275b.6\]]nas de'i tshe dag byed kyi sngags 'di dag smras te/_oM b+hur b+hu ba swa/_tad sa b+hi tu ra ba re N+yaM b+har go de ba sa d+h+ri ma hi d+hi yo na bra dzo da ya/_de bas na bram ze ngas khyod la bshad par byas te/_bdag ni tha mal pa tsam nyid de/_'jig rten du 'di ltar bram ze zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[275b.7\]]rigs zhes bya ba dang /_rje'u rigs zhes bya ba dang /_dmangs rigs zhes bya ba 'di thams cad gcig pa nyid de/_thams cad tha dad pa ma yin no/_/de bas na bdag gi bu gzhon nu stag rna la bu mo gzugs bzang mo chung ma'i don du byin cig_/gang rin ji snyed bab pa de 'dod 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa bzhin du gzhal bar bya'o/_/gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku las tshig de lta bu de thos pa dang /_bram ze pad ma'i snying pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni gcig tu gyur pa'i gtso bo mnyam pa med pa/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na mnyam pa 
[\[276a.2\]]med pa'i bram ze chen por gyur te/_khyod kyi bu la nga'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo sbyin par byas te/_gzhon nu stag rna dang /_gzugs bzang mo gnyis tshul khrims dang gzugs dang yon tan dang ldan zhing bzang zhing mdzes pa yin te/_'di ni bdag kyang 'dod pa yin no/_/
[\[276a.3\]]de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag gis sgra chen pos kye rig pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze rnams gdol pa dang gnyen ma mdzad cig_/mkhan po rig pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze rig pa gsum rnams gdol pa dang lhan cig tu gnyen mdzad dam/_de nas bram ze pad ma'i snying pos 
[\[276a.4\]]gleng gzhi bshad cing lan gyi tshigs su bcad pa rnams smras pa/_tre shang ku des gang smras pa/_/de bzhin de nyid de lta bur/_/de nyid yin te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa min/_/yang dag mthar gyur bden pa nyid/_/de nas bram ze pad ma'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u de dag la smad nas/_
[\[276a.5\]]gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye tre shang ku tshangs pa 'di/_/mi mjed bdag pos 'byung bzhi las/_/skyes bu rnam par sprul pa ste/_/mgo ni skar tshogs nam mkha' yin/_/de bzhin lto ba bar snang yin/_/ri bo rnams ni brla gnyis te/_/
[\[276a.6\]]rkang pa gnyis ni sa ru gnas/_/nyi ma zla ba mig gnyis yin/_/rtswa dang shing rnams ba spu ste/_/mchi ma bar snang char pa'o/_/rgya mtsho rnams ni gcin du 'dod/_/ri bo rnams ni phyi sa yin/_/de ni tshangs pa mi mjed bdag_/khyod dang shes pa mnyam pa med/_/de de bzhin du 
[\[276a.7\]]bdag gis brjod/_/kye tre shang ku de la ni 'dir bdag nyid ci zhig smra ru yod/_yang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du dpyad pas pha dang mas sbyor ba byas pa las gyur cing /_bde ba 'dod pas bslus nas sems can rnams mngal du 'jug pa yin te/_'ga' yang ma skyes 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pa ni med do/_/'jig rten thams cad ni skye ba yin te/_bram ze'i rigs dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs de dag thams cad la zhar ba dang /_lag pa 'jas pa dang /_'theng po dang /_mdze dang /_'brum bu dang /_brjed byed rnams dang /_sha bkra 
[\[276b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin du sems can thams cad tha dad par gnas pa'i phyir te/_rus pa dang /_pags pa dang /_sen mo dang /_sha dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang ldan zhing dbang po rnams ni rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir rigs bzhi 
[\[276b.3\]]'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/bram ze gal te bram ze'i sngags kyi 'bras bu mtho ris su 'gro ba yin na/_dge sdig gi las kyi 'bras bu med cing chud za bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig 'gro ba lnga rnams la dge sdig las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par ni mthong ngo /_/de nas gdol 
[\[276b.4\]]pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus bram ze pad ma'i snying po grags pas tshar bcad do/_/de nas bram ze des gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku la smras pa/_khyod ni tshangs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po kau shi ka dang /_gau ta ma rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang /_dkar po'i tog dang /_ne tso mkhas pa'i rig byed 
[\[276b.5\]]rnams bshad par gyur cing /_lha'i drang srong chen por grags pa dang ldan pa'i mchog da ltar yang khyod nyid yin te/_'dir rig pa mchog gis bstan bcos thams cad byed cing mchog tu khyad par can 'jig rten 'di'i mchog tu gyur pa rigs pa dang ldan par spyod pa khyod yin 
[\[276b.6\]]pas/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzugs dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mna' ma'i don du bdag gis khyod la sbyin par bya'o/_/gzhon nu stag rna dang /_gzugs bzang mo gnyis mdzes shing 'thun pas kyang 'di la mos shing dga'o zhes 
[\[276b.7\]]smras nas/_gser gyi bum pa chus bkang ba thogs nas/_bram ze mngon par dad cing dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang ldan pas chu sbrengs nas bu mo byin te/_'di skad du yang bu mo gzugs bzang mo 'di gzhon nu stag rna'i chung ma ru dga' ba'i sems kyis long shig_/de 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]nas gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang kus bu mo de rang gi bu de la blangs nas/_rang gi grong khyer du phyir log ste/_chos dang ldan par grags pas rang gi rgyal srid bskyangs par gyur to/_/yang dge slong dag khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya 
[\[277a.2\]]ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya ba gdol pa'i rgyal po tre shang ku zhes bya ba'i bur gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du 
[\[277a.3\]]sems na/_de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu stag rna zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yang khyed de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze pad ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_dge slong shA 
[\[277a.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze pad ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba bram ze pad ma'i snying po'i bu mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_dge slong ma gzugs bzang mo 'di nyid 
[\[277a.5\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na pad ma'i snying po'i bu mor gyur te/_der gcugs pa dang /_mdza' ba'i rgyus da ltar dge slong kun dga' bo 'gro na rjes su 'gro zhing /_'dug na 'dug la khang pa gang dang gang du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/_sgo de dang der mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/de 
[\[277a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das gleng gzhi'i rnam pa 'di nyid bstan nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_skye ba sngon gyi bag chags kyis/_/da ltar yang ni brtse nyid de/_/de yis gcugs pa skyes gyur pa/_/chu nang nas skyes ci bzhin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag 'phags pa'i 
[\[277a.7\]]bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa mngon du ma byas pas brtson 'grus dang mngon par 'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_'dun pa drag pos tshig tu ma yin par rtogs par bya zhing dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis spyad par bya'o/_/bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]pa sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang /_'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal dang /_lam 'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal te/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mngon par ma rtogs pa mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 
[\[277b.2\]]dang /_mngon par 'bad pa dang /_spro ba dang /_'dun pa drag pos tshig tu ma yin par rtogs par bya zhing dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyis sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_dge slong drug cu len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[277b.3\]]mnyan yod kyi skye bo'i tshogs chen po bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to/_/dge slong de dag dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_mnyan yod kyi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_lha dang /_klu 
[\[277b.4\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa stag rna'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[277b.5\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong a dzi ta shrI b+ha dra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba seng kar dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur//[ {D359}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_dwI da sha lo tsa na nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_grub par gyur cig 
[\[277b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe glog byung /_skar mda' ltung /_gnam lcags bab pa dang /_de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas ltas mkhan bram ze rnams bkug nas smras pa/_ci'i rgyu ci'i 
[\[277b.7\]]rkyen gyis gnam kun 'khrug par 'gyur/_bram ze rnams kyis gsol pa/_ltas 'di lta bu dag mig bcu gnyis zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag las 'byung ste/_bdag gis khrel bar rngo mi thogs so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_mig bcu gnyis kyi ltas kyi gtsug lag bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab tu byung bas ni phyi rol pa 
[\[278a.2\]]'jig rten gyi gtsug lag 'di lta bu dag bshad pa'i cha ma yin no/_/de nas yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la bskyar te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te the tshom 'di dgrol du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[278a.3\]]bshad par gnang nas sngon gyi gleng gzhi bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sngon 'das pa'i dus na gangs kyi ri drung na drang srong b+ha ga ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na stag mo gzhon nu zhig 'khyam pa mthong ba dang 'dod chags skyes te/_drang srong gis 'khrig pa'i chos 
[\[278a.4\]]spyad pa las lo dus su bu bcu gnyis byung bar gyur to/_/bu btsas nas lo bdun lon pa dang pha ma gnyis shi nas phru gu rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du tshangs pa'i dngos grub bsgrubs nas/_bsam pa dang re ba bskang bar gsol ba dang /_de nas tshangs pas snying rjes 
[\[278a.5\]]bltas te/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas par 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags te/_de nas tshangs pas byis pa de rnams la smras pa/_bu khyed rnams ci 'dod/_de nas byis pa rnams kyis tshangs pa la smras pa/_lha bdag cag rnams ni byis 
[\[278a.6\]]pa'i rang bzhin shin tu blo dman pa lags te/_legs nyes ma 'tshal lags na/_nyi zla dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar gyi ltas dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_gtsug lag ji lta bu lags pa bshad du gsol/_de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos tshangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[278a.7\]]lha'i ston pa khyod kyis byis pa 'di rnams la dngos grub stsal ba'i rigs so/_/de nas tshangs pas byis pa rnams la smras pa/_byis pa nyon cig_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_skar ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_ltas dang /_nyi zla dang /_gza' dang /_gnam lcags 'bab pa dang /_sa 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang /_ltas kyi gtsug lag ji lta bu yin pa dag bstan par bya'o/_/dgun zla ra ba yar gyi ngo dang /_mar gyi ngo dang /_tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga la nyi ma'i 'od mun pa 'dra ba nag por gyur na mi ya rabs mdzangs shing mkhas pa rnams la bgegs chen 
[\[278b.2\]]po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar a shwi nI'i nyi ma la nyi ma las du ba 'dra ba byung ste/_'khor zhing 'thul na lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i nyi ma la nyi ma gser gyi mdog 'dra bar gyur na nye skor gyi rgyal khams kyi yul 'jig pa dang /_dbus su mu 
[\[278b.3\]]ge chen po 'byung ngo /_/dgun zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar kArti kA'i nyi ma la nyi ma lhag par gsal bar gyur na mtha'i yul khams 'jig cing dbus su char mi 'ong ngo /_/dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar A grA'i nyi ma la nyi ma 'khyims pa dang /_nyi ma gnyis su snang na mi nad 'byung /_rgyal po sde 
[\[278b.4\]]gnyis la gnod pa'i bgegs 'byung /_dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar pu Sh+ya'i nyi ma la nyi ma mun pa 'dra bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma nub kar kha dog skya bor gyur na rgyal po chen po la bgegs 'byung /_dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i dus la nyi zla gzas zin na blon pos rgyal po bsad 
[\[278b.5\]]par 'ong ngo /_/dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pU ra ba b+ha dra pA dA'i dus la nyi ma dmar por gyur na/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_de'i yul 'khor du gnod pa'i bgegs chen po 'byung /_dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar bUrbA shA D+hA'i dus la zla ba nya la gzas zin na yul 'khor 'khrug pa dang /_mi nad 
[\[278b.6\]]dang mu ge 'byung /_dbyar zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar mU laM'i dus la nyi zla gas shing ser ga byung bar snang na yul der gnod pa chen po 'byung /_ston zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar a shwi nI'i dus la nyi zla dus gcig tu shar na yul 'khor der khrag 'khrug chen pos khrag 'bab par 'ong ngo /_/ston zla 'bring 
[\[278b.7\]]po'i ngo rgyu skar kArti kA'i dus zla ba nya la zla ba me'i kha dog 'dra bar gyur na yul 'khor der dgra'i dmag gis yul 'jig par 'gyur/_dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i nyi ma la rlung dmar nag po byung la nyi ma mi gsal bar gyur na/_dgra'i tshogs kyis yul 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla tha 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar pUr ba phal gu nI'i nyi ma la sa bab cing rlung dmar chen po byung na rgyal po chen po la gnod pa 'byung /_dpyid zla ra ba dang 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar bi shA khA'i nyi ma la ser ba bab na yul 'khor der khrag nad dang gnod pa 'byung /_dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar 
[\[279a.2\]]dz+yeSh+ThA'i nyi ma la nam langs kar skar ma nyi ma bas 'od bzang por gsal bar byung na gza' thams cad la bgegs chen po 'byung /_dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA shA D+hA'i nyi ma la sa bab cing nyi ma mi gsal na rgyal po stong 'khrug cing 'thab par 'gyur/_yang dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA shA 
[\[279a.3\]]D+hA'i nyi ma la rlung chen po byung na chu dkon/_kha zas dang /_'bru zan ma rung bar 'gyur/_dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar shra ba NA'i nyi ma la rlung drag por langs shing nam mkha' mun par gyur na nyen kor gyi yul khams gzhan du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA b+ha drA 
[\[279a.4\]]pA dA'i nyi ma la ser ba bab/_gnam lcags grum na yul 'khor der nad dang mu ge 'byung /_dbyar zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar pUrbA b+ha drA pA dA'i nyi ma la byang phyogs nas rlung dmar chen po langs nas lha khang dang /_mchod rten dang /_khang khyim dang /_shing sdong po chen po bsgyel na yul khams su gnod 
[\[279a.5\]]pa chen po 'byung ngo /_/ston zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar A shwi nI'i nyi ma la thog bab bam/_skar mda' ltung ngam/_ser ba bab na yul khams der thab mo chen po 'ong /_dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar ma g+hA'i nyi ma la char pa bab na yul khams thams cad kha zas mod par 'ong /_dgun zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo 
[\[279a.6\]]rgyu skar A grA'i nyi ma la gnam me'i kha dog 'dra bar gyur na ltas rab tu ngan te/_yul khams su mi bde ba dang 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo /_/dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i nyi ma la byang phyogs nas sgra chen po byung ngam/_gnam ser por song na dgra thams cad kyis yul khams 
[\[279a.7\]]gshig par 'gyur ro/_/dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar swA tI'i nyi ma la char bab la rlung ma langs par 'ja' byung na grong khyer chen po mes tshig par 'gyur ro/_/dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pu Sh+ya'i nyi ma la glog dang /_sbur ma dang /_nyal nyil gyi char bab na yul khams der mu ge 'byung /_dbyar zla 'bring po'i 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ngo rgyu skar mU laM'i nyi ma la char cher bab la 'ja' byung na/_rgyal rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur/_dbyar zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar ut+ta ra b+hadra pA dA'i nyi ma la sa las sgra byung ngam/_rlung nag po langs na yul der mu ge 'byung /_dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo phyogs mtshams dag nas sgra chen po byung na 
[\[279b.2\]]yul phyogs der khrag khrug chen po 'byung /_ston zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar b+ha ra NI'i nyi ma la gnam las sgra chen po byung na btsun pa dang /_dka' thub can rnams la gnod pa 'byung /_ston zla ra ba'i ngo dbang po'i nyi ma la gnam nas sgra byung na mi le lo can dang /_phyugs la gnod pa 'byung /_ston zla tha 
[\[279b.3\]{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar d+ha ni Sh+thA'i nyi ma la gnam las rol mo'i sgra byung na rtswa dang /_lo tog legs par 'gyur/_char dus su 'bab/_mjug tu mi nad 'byung /_dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar swA tI'i nyi ma la gnam las sgra chen po 'byung zhing gnam 'khrug na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_dgun 
[\[279b.4\]]zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar dz+yeSh+ThA'i nyi ma la tshub ma langs shing sa g.yos na dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar pUrbA b+ha drA pA dA'i nyi ma la nyin par sa g.yos na lo gnyis kyi bar du dus su yul khams der dmag 'ong /_dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu 
[\[279b.5\]]skar pUrbA shAD+hA'i nyi ma la sa 'gul na blon pos rgyal po bsad pa dang /_yul khams der 'khrug pa chen po 'byung /_dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar mU laM dbang ba la nub mo sa g.yos na khams kyi dbang po rnams la gnod pa 'byung /_dbyar zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar ro hi NI dbang ba la nub mo sa g.yos 
[\[279b.6\]]shing rlung dmar byung /_char ma bab na 'bru zan ma rungs par 'gyur zhing dmag 'ong /_ston zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar ut+ta ra b+ha drA pA dA'i nyi ma la nyin par sa g.yos na pha rol gyi dgras rgyal po de pham par 'gyur/_yul phyogs kyang chom rkun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ngo rgyu skar kArti 
[\[279b.7\]]kA'i nyi ma la sa g.yos na grong khyer chen po dang /_khang khyim 'jig cing mu ge 'byung /_dgun zla ra ba'i ngo rgyu skar a shwi nI dang /_ut+ta ra phal gu NI dbang ba'i nub mo sa g.yos na byis pa chung ngu dang /_bud med sbrum ma la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_dgun zla 'bring po'i ngo rgyu skar mr-i ga shi rA dang /_pUrbA 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]b+ha drA pA dA'i nyin par sa g.yos na rkang 'gros la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_dbang po'am/_ma g+hA'i nyi ma la gtsug lag khang sku gzugs g.yos shing 'gul lam/_sa 'phos na yul khams de myur du 'jig par 'gyur/_gtsug lag khang gi sku gzugs gdan las 'phos 
[\[280a.2\]]sam/_dngul lta bu byung ngam/_'gyel na yul khams de rgyal po dang bcas par rgyal khams gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur/_gtsug lag khang gi sku gzugs 'phos sam/_spyan nas mchi ma byung na yul khams de'i mi dpa' bo gces pa bu smad dang bcas par yul byung bar 'gyur/_gtsug lag khang gi 
[\[280a.3\]]sku gzugs gdan las 'phos sam/_'gul la lha khang nas dud pa 'dra ba byung na/_yul khams de'i rgyal po la gnod par 'gyur/_gtsug lag khang chen po dang /_gnas khang lta bu g.yos na/_grong khyer de phyogs rgyal khams gzhan gyis gnangs su bcad pa'am mes tshig par 'gyur/_zla ba'i zur 
[\[280a.4\]]la gza' phur bu byung na mi phyug po la rgyal pos nor 'phrog cing gnod par 'gyur/_nyi zla dmar por song na khams kyi dbang po la gnod pa 'byung /_gza' spen pa zla ba'i steng du byung na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po dang bgegs 'byung /_ltas 'di rnams byung ba'i dus su zla ba gzas zin na rgyal po 
[\[280a.5\]]chen po rnams la gnod pa dang bgegs 'byung /_rgyal po dang po skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi steng du zla ba byung zhing /_zla ba'i steng du yang gza' mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]byung na/_yul khams de'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal khams nye ba gzhan gyi rgyal po dang 'thab mo 'ong /_gza' spen pa rgyu skar ro ha NI dang /_kArti kA'i dbus su shar 
[\[280a.6\]]na rgyal khams de'i mi thams cad la gnod pa chen po dang /_bgegs byung nas mi sum cha cig lus par 'gyur/_gza' pa ba sangs dang /_rgyu skar ma g+hA dang pUrba phal gu ni zla ba'i dbus su shar na lo tog la gnod pa 'byung /_gza' phur bu dang /_pa ba sangs dang /_spen pa rnams dmar por song na yul khams der 'jigs 
[\[280a.7\]]pa chen po 'byung /_gza' mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]rgyu skar puSh+yA'i steng du shar na ring po mi thogs par phyogs bzhi nas dmag chen po 'byung /_gza' phur bu dang /_mig dmar rgyu skar shra ba NA'i steng du shar na lo gsum gyi bar du yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po dang gnod pa 'byung /_gza' phur bu dang /_spen pa rgyu skar bi shA khA'i 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]steng du shar na mi mang po 'thab mo la 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha khang dang khang pa chen po'i steng du bya rog gar byed cing 'phyang mo nyug na yul khams der 'thab mo chen po 'byung /_bud med la mi ma yin pa'i bu byung ngam/_yang na phyugs la mi'i bu byung na yul khams de'i bud med la bgegs dang gnod pa chen po 'byung /_ma'i mngal na 
[\[280b.2\]]bu yod pa rgod dam/_smra'am/_ngu na yul khams de 'jig par 'gyur/_bud med kyi mngal nas bu rkang gcig pa'am/_rkang gsum pa'am/_rkang bzhi pa byung na yul de'i rgyal po la gnod pa 'byung /_bud med kyi lto nas bu ma ning mtshan gnyis pa byung na yul khams de'i rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/_bud med las byol song gi bu 
[\[280b.3\]]dang bu mgo mang po can byung na yul khams de 'jig par 'gyur/_bud med las bu mgo gcig la gdong gnyis mig gsum pa byung na yul khams de myur du 'jig par 'gyur/_bud med las bu grul bum mgo bzhi pa byung na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_bud med las bu phag gi gdong can byung na phyogs bzhi 
[\[280b.4\]]nas yul khams de 'jig par 'gyur/_bud med las bu gdong nyi ma'i 'od bzhin 'bar ba byung na nang 'khrug gis yul khams de 'jig par 'gyur/_byis pa tshem bu na gnas pa chen po bzhin tshig smra na yul 'khor de 'jig par 'gyur/_ma nyid kyis ma tshor bar mngal nas bu byung na yul khams der bgegs dang gnod pa chen po 
[\[280b.5\]]'byung /_bud med kyi lto nas bu phag gam sbrul lta bu byung na 'dre gdon dang /_bgegs nad kyis yul khams de 'jig cing 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_bud med las bu skye nub pa dang /_so skyes pa byung na yul khams de dgon par 'gyur te/_mi thams cad kyang phyogs gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur/_bud med las bu mgo med 
[\[280b.6\]]pa lag pa gcig pa byung na yul khams der gnod pa chen po 'byung /_yul khams su me tog dang shing tog 'bras bu lan gnyis 'byung zhing /_shing dang 'bras bu las khu ba 'dzag na rgyal po'i rgyal tshab la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_dus ma yin par bza' shing las me tog dang 'bras bu skye na rgyal po dang /_yul 
[\[280b.7\]]mir bcas pas yul bor bar 'gyur/_bza' shing gi 'bras bu lhag par mdog bzang por gyur tam/_yang na khrag 'dra ba 'dzag na yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po dang /_nad dang mu ge 'byung /_bskyed shing gi grib ma mi 'khor bar phyogs gcig tu 'dug na dgra'i dmag byin chen pos yul phyogs de bcom 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]par 'gyur/_bskyed shing 'gro ba ltar snang na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_bskyed shing lhag par bgyid cing gsal bar snang na yul khams de'i rgyal po tshe thung bar 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i lha mchod pa'i tshe lha smra'am 'dzum na/_rgyal po la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_
[\[281a.2\]]me tog gi char 'bab pa'am/_rlung dmar langs shing gnam las srin bu bab na yul khams der chom rkun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/_'jig rten pa'i lha khang du me ma bus par du ba byung zhing /_lha yang mtshan dang cho 'phrul ston na rgyal po la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_'jig rten pa'i lha khang du me 
[\[281a.3\]]mar ma bus par me mar 'dra bar snang na rgyal po'i gnang chen la bgegs dang gnod pa 'byung /_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste 'dod chags mi ldang na rgyal po'i pho brang mes tshig cing rgyal po la mi dge ba sna tshogs 'byung /_char pa dang ser ba 'bab la/_gnam la kha dog gsal ba dag byung na yul 
[\[281a.4\]]khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_grong khyer tshub mas bskor cing 'gro ba dang /_rlung dmar langs shing char pa khrag 'dra ba bab na yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_glog 'byung zhing char pa 'bab la sprin 'khor ling 'khor ling du chad de/_sprin 'khor ling du chad pa'i bar bar na dri za'i grong khyer 
[\[281a.5\]]'dra ba snang na yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_zla ba dmar por gyur na yul khams der grong khyer mes tshig pa dang /_rims kyis mi ngas par 'gyur/_zla ba mtha' dmar la dbus nag por song na yul khams der 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur/_zla ba'i kha dog btsag 'dra bar dmar por snang la slar 
[\[281a.6\]]yang 'phral du dkar po'i rang bzhin du gyur na rlung mi ldang bar drag por 'bab/_ri skam lta bur chu mig byung na lo tog legs par 'gyur/_me ma bus par yul khams der du ba byung na yul khams der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung /_mda' gzhu skyis kor la me'am dud pa byung na yul khams der dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung 
[\[281a.7\]]ngo /_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]{D359a}]@#/_/rgya nag skad du/_h+pho ba sho za shI i la TAd kying /_bod skad du/_'phags pa dum bu zhe gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon du 
[\[281b.2\]]mdzad de 'di ltar dgongs so/_chags pa dang bral zhing rab tu zhi ba ni khyad du 'phags te/_ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas nas bdud ste thams cad bcom pas/_da ni sems can rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dgongs te/_drang srong lhung 
[\[281b.3\]]ba ri dwags kyi nags su gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau N+Di n+ya la sogs pa'i lnga sde la bden bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor bas de dag lam dang 'bras bu la bkod par mdzad do/_/de nas dge slong gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du lhags te rang rang gi sems kyi rtog pa bcom ldan 
[\[281b.4\]]'das la zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par bstan pas de dag sems kyi rtog pa las rnam par grol bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ga la ba de lags su thal mo sbyar ba gtad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la gus pas mnyan par gyur to/_/
[\[281b.5\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos du ma bu bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_nye du dag spangs khyim nas rab tu byung te bslab pa la gnas nas sems kyi de nyid mthong bar byed cing 'du ma byas pa'i chos rtogs 
[\[281b.6\]]par byed pa la dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum ma lus pa la gnas shing brtson pas bden pa bzhi'i lam 'bad pas bsgrubs nas yongs su dag par byas pa la dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_/
[\[281b.7\]]dgra bcom pa ni steng gi nam mkhar 'phags te rdzu 'phrul dang sprul pa sna tshogs ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun nas g.yo bar nus pa dang /_tshe'i 'du byed kyang ji 'dod du yongs su 'dzin nus pa'o/_de'i 'og ma ni phyir mi 'ong ngo /_/
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]phyir mi 'ong ni tshe 'phos nas lha gnas pa bcu dgu pa la skyes nas gnas de nyid du dgra bcom 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de'i 'og ma lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ni tshe 'phos nas khams gong mar skye bar 'gyur zhing de nas phyir 
[\[282a.2\]]'ongs nas dgra bcom 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/de'i 'og ma rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa ni tshe lan bdun 'pho zhing skye ba lan bdun blangs pa'i mthar dgra bcom 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/'dod sred yongs su spangs pa ni lus kyi yan lag yongs su 
[\[282a.3\]]bcad pa dang 'dra ste/_phyis yongs su bsten du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams 'dod sred dang bral zhing rang gi sems nyid yongs su shes nas sangs rgyas kyi lam zab mo'i don 'dus byas pa rtogs par byas 
[\[282a.4\]]pas/_thob pa med pa/_tshol ba med pa/_lam gyis bcing du med pa/_lam gyis sbyor du med pa/_bsam du med pa/_byed du med pa/_bsgom du med pa/_mngon du byar med pa/_thams cad du mi gnas pa/_rang bzhin gyis mchog phul du byung ba de la 
[\[282a.5\]]lam zhes bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skra dang kha spu bregs te dge slong du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing spangs te bsod snyoms la spyod cing nyin phyed du zas gcig bza' zhing gnas 
[\[282a.6\]]mal shing drung du 'cha' zhing bag yod pas zas phyis len par mi bya'o/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa la sred pas skye bo dag rmongs par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can dag gis rnam pa bcus dge ba sgrub par 
[\[282a.7\]]'gyur la rnam pa bcus mi dge ba sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_lus kyi gsum dang /_ngag gi bzhi dang /_yid kyi gsum mo/_lus kyi rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]pa'o/_ngag gi rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na/_rdzun du smra ba dang /_tshig 'khyal smra ba dang /_tshig rtsub smra ba dang /_phra ma smra ba'o/_/yid kyi gsum gang zhe na/_brnabs sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmongs pas mchog gsum la yid mi ches te shing phyin ci log 
[\[282b.2\]]lta ba'o/_/dge bsnyen rnams chos rnam pa lnga las le los mi ldog cing rnam pa bcus dge ba la spyad pas nges par 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag nyes pa mang po byas la 'gyod pa med par rim gyis bsags pa'i sdig 
[\[282b.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu rang nyid la smin par 'gyur te/_dper na/_chu klung rnams rgya mtsho chen por babs pa na rang gis zab cing yangs bar gyur te brgal dka' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/skye bo dag nyes pa mthong nas slan chad bsdams pas dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 
[\[282b.4\]]'gyur zhing sdig pa rim gyis zhi bar 'gyur te lam rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_skye bo rmongs pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas kyang byams pa tshad med pas yongs su 'dzin cing phyi phyir 
[\[282b.5\]]tshul min gyis tho btsams kyang phyir zhing byams sogs tshad med pa'i thugs rjes bskyangs par mdzad do/_/gzhi des de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams dang yon tan gyi dpal la mnga' brnyes so/_skye bo de dag la gnod pa dang sdug bsngal ba 'byung ngo /_/yang 
[\[282b.6\]]rmongs pa 'ga' zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos nyid ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid ni 'di lags pas tho btsams kyang phyir zhing byams par mdzad do zhes thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs te spyos kyang cang mi gsung bar bzhugs 
[\[282b.7\]]te/_'di ni gti mug can mi gsal ba rmongs pa'o zhes thugs rje chen pos dgongs so/_/spyos rnyes par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_bu khyod kyis gzhan zhig la bsnyen bkur byas pa la des dang du ma blangs na ji ltar bya/_des gsol ba/_phyir 'brangs 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_bu khyod kyis da bzod spyos pa de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gir ma mdzad pas phyir khur zhig khyod la sdug bsngal 'byung ngo /_/dper na/_brag cha sgra'i rjes su 'brangs pa 
[\[283a.2\]]dang /_grib ma lus kyi rjes su 'brangs pa ltar nam yang rnam smin de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la 'joms par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_dam pa dag la sdig can rnams kyis 
[\[283a.3\]]'tshe bar byed pa ni/_dper na/_nam mkhar mchil ma 'dor ba dang 'dra ste/_mchil mas nam mkha' sbags mi nus shing rang nyid sbags par 'gyur ba dang /_rlung gi rdzi phyogs su gzhan la thal ba 'thor ba ltar rdul pha rol po la bsgo mi nus shing 
[\[283a.4\]]phyir zhing rang nyid la 'gos par 'gyur ba dang mtshungs so/_/dam pa dag la skur pa 'debs par mi bya ste/_dam pa dag la gnod pa byas pas rang nyid nyams par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_spyod pa la slob pa dag gis 
[\[283a.5\]]byams pa dang snying rje la brtson par bya zhing sbyin pa yang sbyin par bya ste/_sbyin pa'i phan yon shin tu che'o/_/bsdams pa'i yid kyis legs par chos spyad na de'i bsod nams shin tu che'o/_/gzhan gyis chos spyod pa mthong ba'i tshe phan 'dogs shing rjes 
[\[283a.6\]]su yi rang byas pas kyang bsod nams kyi rnam smin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bri bar mi 'gyur ram/_bka' stsal ba/_dper na/_gnas zhig na dpal 'bar sbar ba zhig yod la 
[\[283a.7\]]phyogs bzhi'i skye bo mang pos dpal 'bar mang po khyer te de las sbar te bza' bca' dag 'chod par byed/_mun pa dag sel bar byas kyang me de zad par mi 'gyur ba ltar bsod nams kyi phung po de yang de bzhin no/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]skye bo tha mal ba brgya la zas byin babs dam pa gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_/dam pa stong la zas byin pa bas las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin pa gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga 'dzin pa khri phrag la zas byin pa bas rgyun tu 
[\[283b.2\]]zhugs pa gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_rgyun tu zhugs pa khri phrag brgya la zas byin pa bas lan cig phyir 'ong gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_lan cig phyir 'ong khri phrag stong la zas byin pa bas phyir mi 'ong gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_
[\[283b.3\]]phyir mi 'ong bye ba la zas byin pa bas dgra bcom pa gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_/dgra bcom pa dung phyur la zas byin pa pas rang sangs rgyas gcig la zas byin pa'i char mi phod/_rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya la zas byin pa bas sangs rgyas gcig 
[\[283b.4\]]la gdugs tshod gsol ba'i char mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su 'tshol cing slob par 'dod pa dang sems can thams cad la phan pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na dam pa rnams la zas phul ba'i bsod nams 
[\[283b.5\]]kyi phung po shin tu che'o/_/gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre 'byung po dag la bsnyen bkur ba bas pha ma la gus pa dang sri zhu bgyid pa mchog ste/_pha ma gnyis bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur ba'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[283b.6\]]'jig rten na dka' ba rnam pa nyi shu yod de/_/de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dbul bos sbyin pa gtong ba dka'/_phyug 'byor ldan pas lam la slob pa dka'/_srog blos nges par gtong ba dka'/_/gsung rab dam pa'i chos blta' ba dka'/_/
[\[283b.7\]]sangs rgyas byung ba'i zhing khams su skye ba dka'/_'dod pa la mi chags shing sran tshugs pa dka'/_yid 'ong mthong bas mi re ba dka'/_stobs 'byor can stobs 'byor gyi dbang du mi 'gro ba dka'/_smod phyir byed pa la mi khro ba dka'/_bya 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ba'i yul dang 'phrad pa'i tshe sems 'du mi byed pa dka'/_mang du bslabs kyang mthar phyin pa dka'/_ma bslabs bdag la mi brnyas pa dka'/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa dka'/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dka'/_
[\[284a.2\]]sems kyi rang bzhin shes nas lam la slob pa dka'/_yul dang phrad pa'i tshe kun nas mi g.yo ba dka'/_blo dang 'tshams pa'i thabs kyis spyod pa dka'/_khams dang mthun par gdul ba dka'/_sems btang snyoms su 'jog pa dka'/_bya ba dang bya ba ma yin 
[\[284a.3\]]pa mi smra ba dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong zhig gis gsol pa/_rgyu gang gis byang chub thob par 'gyur/_rkyen gang gis sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub la rtags dang mtshan ma med pa zhes 
[\[284a.4\]]pa tsam gyas mi phan pas sems kyi spyad pa bsrung ba gal che'o/_/dper na/_me long phyis pas g.ya' dag ste dwangs shing gsal bar gyur bas gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa yongs su spangs shing stong pa'i chos la kun tu spyad pas 
[\[284a.5\]]'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur zhing sngon gyi gnas kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba'i mchog gang zhe na/_lam la spyod pa nyid dge ba'i mchog go_/che ba'i mchog gang zhe na/_blo chos 
[\[284a.6\]]dang mthun par sbyor ba che ba'i mchog go_/stobs dang ldan pa'i mchog gang zhe na/_bzod pa gang yin pa ste/_bzod pa dang ldan na sdig pa'i las mi byed pas nges par mi rnams kyis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu gsal ba gang zhe na/_gang sgrib pa med pa dri ma dang 
[\[284a.7\]]bral ba/_nyes spyod med pa yongs dag pa/_thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar gyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ma mkhyen pa'am/_ma gzigs pa'am/_rnam par ma mkhyen pa'am/_ma gsan pa cung zad tsam yang mi mnga' zhing 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa de la gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyis bsgribs pas tha ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_dper na/_chu 
[\[284b.2\]]rnyogs pa can la tshon rtsi sna lnga btab ste ci nus pa'i stobs kyis dkrugs pa la skye bo gang dag der bltas pa'i tshe rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan mthong mi nus so/_/de bzhin du 'dod chags kyis 'khrul ba'i sems rnyogs pa can du byas pas lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'on 
[\[284b.3\]]kyang skye bo gang dag mos pas nyes pa rim gyis bshags shing bsdams te dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnyes par byas pa na chu'i rnyogs pa'i dri ma dag ste gzugs brnyan gsal bar 'gyur ba ltar lam mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang 'di lta ste dper na/_zangs kyi 'og tu me lce mched par byas nas 
[\[284b.4\]]nang gi chu shin tu khol ba'i steng du ras kyis bkab pa la skye bo gang dag zangs kyi thad du 'ongs nas bltas pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs brnyan mi mthong ba lta bu ste/_rgyud du thog ma med pa nas gnas pa'i dug gsum gyis dkrugs shing sgrib pa lngas g.yogs par byas pas lam mthong bar mi nus so/_/
[\[284b.5\]]sems kyi dri ma yongs su zad pa na rnam par shes ba gang nas 'ongs shing skyes pa dang /_shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba shes shing lam gyi yon tan rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spyod pa la slob dpon gyis 
[\[284b.6\]]dper na/_lag tu sgron me thogs te mun khang du zhugs pa na mun pa sel zhing snang ba nyid du bya ba dang 'dra ste/_lam la bslabs te bden pa mthong ba'i tshe gti mug rmongs pa'i mun pa sangs pas gang yang mi gsal ba med do/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 
[\[284b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pas gang dgongs pa thams cad lam la dgongs pa'o/_/gang mdzad pa thams cad lam mdzad pa'o/_/gang gsungs pa thams cad lam gsungs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dran pas lam yang dag pa mi bsnyel ba'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]stsal pa/_nam mkha' dang sa mthong ba'i tshe mi rtag pa'o zhes sems par bya'o/_/ri dang lung ba mthong ba'i tshe 'di ni mi rtag pa'o zhes sems par bya'o/_/dngos po rnams kyi dbyibs dang gzugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa mthong ba'i tshe de yang mi rtag pa'o zhes sems 
[\[285a.2\]]par bya ste/_'di ltar bsams pas ring por mi thogs par lam rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyin re bzhin rgyun du lam la sems pa dang spyad par bya ste/_des dad pa'i dbang po rjes su 'thob pas bsod nams kyi rnam grangs tshad med 
[\[285a.3\]]do/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi 'byung ba chen po dag la bdag ces pa'i tha snyad gdags kyang de dag bdag med pa'o/_/bdag ni re zhig tsam du zad kyi rtag tu gnas pa ma yin te/_dper na sgyu ma bzhin no/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[285a.4\]]sems can 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brangs te grags pa don du gnyer ba ni/_dper na/_bdug spos kyis bdugs pa dang 'dra ste/_gang dag de'i dri tshor nas bdug spos kun tu bdugs par byas pa las bdug spos de yongs su mdzad pa las mi 'da'o/_/de bzhin du blun po dag 'jig rten 
[\[285a.5\]]tha mal ba'i snyan grags la chags te bden pa yang dag pa'i grags pa la brtson par mi byed pa dag grags pa dang rnyed pas phongs par gyur te 'gyod pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzugs dang nor ni/_dper na/_gri'i so la chags pa'i sbrang rtsi dang 'dra ste 
[\[285a.6\]]khye'u chung dag gis de'i ro myangs pa tsam gyis lce smas pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung ngo /_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can gang dag bu dang chung ma dang nor dang khyim gyis bcings pa'i 'jigs pa ni/_dper na/_btson rar bcug pa'i mi la gdos dang lcags 
[\[285a.7\]]sgrog sogs kyi 'jigs pa las che ba'i 'jigs pa'o/_/btson ra'i 'jigs pa las stes dbang gis thar ba 'byung la/_bu dang chung ma sogs la chags pa ni stag gi khar tshud pa dang 'dra ba'i 'jigs pa yod bzhin du rmongs pa dag bag med par 'jug pas na de las thar bar mi nus so/_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod yon la chags pa'i nang na gzugs la chags pa ni chags pa gzhan las lhag go_/gzugs la chags pa las lhag pa'i chags pa med do/_/stes dbang gis gzugs la 'dod cing chags pa ni gcig nyid de/_de 
[\[285b.2\]]'dra ba gnyis pa zhig grub na 'jig rten na lam la slob nus pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dod chags kyi yul la 'jug pa ni/_dper na/_rmongs bdag lag tu sgron me thogs te rlung gi rdzi phyogs su gtad nas 'gro ba dang mtshungs te/_sgron 
[\[285b.3\]]me de ma 'dor na lag bsreg pa'i nyes pa nges par 'byung ngo /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum rgyud la yod pa sngon du lam gyis ma bsal na rmongs pa dag lag tu sgron me thogs pa ma btang bas lag pa sre pa dang mtshungs pa'i nyes dmigs che'o/_/de nas lha zhig gis tshod 
[\[285b.4\]]bag mas pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha'i bu mo zhig btang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i rgyal ba khyod ci'i phyir du 'ongs/_skye bo tha mal ba bslu nus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan 
[\[285b.5\]]pa rnam pa thams cad du g.yo bar ga la nus/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la dgos pa med do song zhig_/de nas lha de bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur nas sems kyi rtog pa zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste bstan pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[285b.6\]]bu la bkong bar mdzad do/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag lam la slob pa'i tshe chu'i kha la g.yengs pa'i shing dang mtshungs te/_gal te shing de chu'i rgyun phyogs su khyer ba phar 'gram du yang ma reg tshur 'gram du yang ma reg_/mis ma blangs/_
[\[285b.7\]]lha 'dre dag gis kyang ma bzlog_/klong du'ang ma lus/_rul bar yang ma gyur na nges par rgya mtsho chen por 'babs par 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/_/de bzhin du gal te skye bo gang dag lam la slob pa'i tshe 'dod chags kyis rmongs par ma gyur/_phyin ci log dag gis ma zin/_nem 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]nur mi byed cing 'bad pas 'grus par byas na skye bo de nges par lam thob par 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge sbyong dag sems la yid ma ches shig_/sems la gtan nas yid ches par mi bya'o/_/bag yod 
[\[286a.2\]]bar gyis shig_/gzugs la chags par ma byed cig_/gzugs la chags pas sdug bsngal 'byung ngo /_/gang tshe dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa de'i tshe gdod sems la yid ches par rigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[286a.3\]]sbyong dag bag yod par gyis shig_/bud med la blta bar mi bya'o/_/gal te 'phrad pa'i tshe yang blta bar mi bya bag dang ldan par bgyis te gtam smra bar mi bya ste/_gal te gtam smra tshe bsams bab dag ni dge sbyong ste/_snyigs ma'i 'jig rten du pad ma'i dam gyis ma gos 
[\[286a.4\]]pa ltar gnas par bya'o snyam nas rgan mo la ma'i 'du shes/_rang las cung zad rgan pa la a phyi'i 'du shes/_rang las gzhon pa la sring mo'i 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /_na tshod chung ba dag la tshul min gyis brnyas par mi bya'o/_/gal te tshul min yid byed byung ba'i tshe 
[\[286a.5\]]zhib tu dpyad cing brtag par bya'o/_/'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_lus kyi spyi bo nas rkang mthil gyi bar du brtag par bya'o/_de nas lus kyi nang du brtag par bya ste/_lus kyi nang mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis kun nas gang zhing 'dzag pa nyid yin no zhes tshul min yid byed de yongs 
[\[286a.6\]]su bsal bar bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dper na/_rtswa skam la me mched pa'i tshe de las [{]rings [,]ring [}]rtabs kyis bzlos dgos pa ltar lam la slob pa'i skye bo dag 'dod chags kyi yul rnams rgyang ring du 'dor bar bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[286a.7\]]stsal pa/_skye bo zhig yid 'dod chags kyis gdungs te chags sems de zhi ba'i thabs ma rnyed nas rang gi mtshan ma sta gris bcad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod kyis mtshan ma gcod pa las sems gcod pa mchog go_/sems ni 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gtso bo ste gtso bo chod na 'khor ngang gis 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/phyin ci log gi sems ma bcad par mtshan ma bcad pas ci la phan zhes gsungs so/_/de nas mi de shi bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten gyi skye bo log lta can dag mi gti mug 
[\[286b.2\]]can 'di dang 'dra ba'i blun po'o/_/yang gzhon nu ma zhig skyes pa zhig dang dus btab pa las skyes pa de dus su ma slebs pas gzhon nu ma de 'gyod nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_'dod chags khyod kyi rtsa ba nga yis shes/_/khyod ni rnam par rtog las byung ba yin/_/khyod la nga yis 
[\[286b.3\]]rtog par ma byas tshe/_khyod ni nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe lam de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pas gsan te/_/dge sbyong dag la gsungs pa/_dge sbyong dag zungs shig_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 
[\[286b.4\]]'od srungs kyis gsungs pa 'jig rten du grags shing rgyun 'byams pa'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can 'dod yon la chags pas sdug bsngal 'byung zhing sdug bsngal las 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chags pa med pas sdug 
[\[286b.5\]]bsngal mi 'byung /_sdug bsngal med pas 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag lam la slob pa'i tshe mi gcig mi khri phrag mang po dag dang g.yul 'gyed pa lta bu ste/_dper na/_mi zhig go gyon mtshon thogs 
[\[286b.6\]]nas phyir thon pa dang 'jigs sngangs kyis phyir ldog pa'am/_lam gyi bar mdor ldog pa'am/_g.yul bkyes pas bsad pa'am/_rgyal nas rang yul du 'khor te gtso bor 'gyur ba'ang yod do/_/de bzhin du shin tu brtan pa'i yid kyis spyod pa la 'bad cing brtson pas 
[\[286b.7\]]gti mug gis bslus par ma gyur na 'dod chags nges par spangs te 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dge sbyong zhig mtshan mo klog pa byas pa'i tshe gdangs drag la myur ba las gdungs pas 'gyod de khyim du 'bab bo snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]kyis de bos nas bka' stsal pa/_khyod sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe las ci zhig bgyid/_gsol pa/_pi wang brdung ba'i las byed pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyud lhod na cir 'gyur/_gsol pa/_sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[287a.2\]]rgyud dam na cir 'gyur/_sgra 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/rgyud ran par bcas na cir 'gyur/_rgyud mtho dman med cing snyoms par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong de la bka' stsal pa/_lam la slob pa'i tshe yang de lta bur sems snyoms par bsdams 
[\[287a.3\]]pas lam thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam la slob pa dang /_/dper na/_lcags bzhu sbyang byas te rim gyis brdungs pas g.ya' dag par byas pa de las snod ci byed kyang las su rung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/_lam la slob pa dag 
[\[287a.4\]]sems kyi dri ma rim gyis dag par byas te brtson pas byang chub sbyang bar byas pas gdon mi za bar byang chub 'grub par 'gyur te/_gzhan du na rang nyid skyo bar 'gyur/_skyobs nyon mongs par 'gyur/_kun nas nyon mongs pas lam las ldog par 'gyur/_lam las log pas ldig pa'i 
[\[287a.5\]]las gsogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag la mal spyod kyang sdug bsngal la lam la mi spyod kyang sdug bsngal lo/_sems can skyes nas rga ba'i bar dang /_rgas nas na ba dang 'chi ba'i bar sdug bsngal 'byung ba ni dpag par dka' ste/_
[\[287a.6\]]sems nyon mongs pas dkrugs shing sdig pa'i las bsags pas skye 'chi brgyud mar 'byung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal brjod kyis longs pa ma yin no/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can ngan song las grol te mi'i lus rten thob pa dka'/_mi'i lus rten thob kyang bud 
[\[287a.7\]]med kyi rten las log ste skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa dka'/_skyes pa'i lus rten thob kyang dbang po kun tshang ba dka'/_dbang po thams cad tshang yang yul dbus su skye ba dka'/_yul dbus su skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rjes su slob pa dka'/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rjes 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]su bslabs kyang chos ldan gyi rgyal po dang 'phrad pa dka'/_chos ldan gyi rgyal po dang phrad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i khyim du skye ba dka'/_byang chub sems dpa'i khyim du skyes kyang mchog gsum la dad cing sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba dka'o/_/yang bcom 
[\[287b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong dag la bka' stsal pa/_mi'i srog ji tsam du gnas/_dge sbyong zhig gis gsol pa/_zhag bcu tsam du gnas so/_/bka' stsal pa/_bu khyod kyis da dung lam la sbyang ba ma byas so/_/yang dge sbyong zhig la bka' stsal pa/_mi'i srog ci tsam du 
[\[287b.3\]]gnas/_des gsol pa/_'tshal ma 'tshal ba'i yun tsam du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_song zhig khyod kyis kyang lam la sbyang ba ma byas so/_/yang dge sbyong zhig la bka' stsal pa/_mi'i srog ji tsam du gnas/_des gsol pa/_dbugs 'byung 'jug gi yun tsam du 
[\[287b.4\]]gnas lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_legs so/_/de'i phyir bu khyod kyis lam la sbyang ba byas so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa las thag ring dpag tshad stong du phyin yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[287b.5\]]kyi 'dul ba'i bslab pa yid la byas na gdon mi za bar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te ston pa'i spyan sngar gnas kyang don ma yin pa yid la byas na nam yang lam gyi 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i gnad ni spyod pa la rag las te/_ston pa'i drung du gnas kyang rang gis 
[\[287b.6\]]ma sbyang na don cung zad tsam yang mi rnyed do/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag lam la spyod pa ni sbrang rtsi lta bu ste/_mtha' dbus kun nas ro mngar ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de ltar kun nas dga' ba dang bde ba'i don dang ldan pa spyad pas lam thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[287b.7\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skye bo dag la mal spyad pas 'dod chags kun drung nas 'byin par 'gyur te/_/dper na/_bar snang la bkal ba'i phreng ba'i rdog po re re nas blangs pas phreng ba rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba ltar/_des kyang sgrib pa thams cad rim gyis zad de lam 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]gyi 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge sbyong dag la mal slob pa'i tshe khal bkal pa'i ba lang 'dam dbyin nas ji tsam ngal yang 'gram gnyis gang rung du phyin te ngal bso snyam pa med pa ltar/_dge sbyong 'dod pa la 
[\[288a.2\]]'dam gyi 'jigs pa de lta bu las kyang ches 'jigs shing drang po'i sems kyis gcig tu lam la 'grus pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bskyab par bya'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po dang blon po'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa thams 
[\[288a.3\]]cad mchil ma dang thal ba lta bur gzigs so/_/gser dngul sogs rin po che rnams gseg ma dang gyo mo lta bur gzigs so/_/gos dar sogs rin thang can gyi gos rnams gos hrul lta bur gzigs so/_/stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyu ru ra lta bur gzigs so/_/rgya 
[\[288a.4\]]mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu rkang mthil mnyed pa'i 'bru mar lta bur gzigs so/_/thabs mkhas kyi sgo rin po ches gang ba'i gzings lta bur gzigs so/_/theg pa chen po rmi lam gyi gser dang gos lta bur gzigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi lam 'tshol ba mig sngar gnas pa'i me tog lta 
[\[288a.5\]]bur gzigs so/_/ting nge 'dzin 'tshol ba lhun po ltar brtan pa'i ka ba lta bur gzigs so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'tshol ba nyin mtshan kun tu sad pa lta bur gzigs so/_/yang dag dang yang dag ma yin pa klu drug gi gar lta bur gzigs so/_/btang snyoms pa bden pa 
[\[288a.6\]]nyid lta bur gzigs so/_/dar rgud dus bzhi'i ljon shing lta bur gzigs so/_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/'khor gyi dge slong thams cad yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de yang Ti'u To'u wang gi lo nyer bzhi ba shing pho stag 
[\[288a.7\]]lo'i zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes brgyad la lho nub kyi mtshams nas 'od kyi phung po zhig pho brang du byung ba rgyal pos blon po ltas shes pa dag la dris pas de phyogs su bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba'i ltas yin pa dang /_lo stong nas de'i bstan pa yul 'dir dar bar lung bstan to/_/de nas mu wang gi lo nga 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]gsum pa chu pho sprel lo'i zla ba gnyis pa'i tshes bco lnga la ston pa mya ngan las 'das tshul bstan/_de nas lo chig stong bcu gsum pa la hAn ming d+hi rgyal po yung phing gi lo bdun pa'i zla ba dang po'i tshes bco lnga'i mtshan mo rgyal po'i rmi lam du skyes bu chen po srid du 'dom do lhag mnga' ba 
[\[288b.2\]]gser gyi mdog can nyi 'od lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba zhig pho brang du babs te nga'i bstan pa yul 'dir rim gyis dar bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/phyi nyin blon po rnams la dris pas blon po h+phu yi zhes bya bas/_sngon Ti'u To'u wang gi dus kyi lung bstan zhus shing rgyal po'i rmi lam de dang mthun no 
[\[288b.3\]]zhes gsol/_de nas rgyal pos yig rnying rnams bklags pa sa Ti'u To'u wang gi dus kyi lung bstan de rnyed nas dgyes shing /_rgyal pos blon po wang tsun sogs mi bco brgyad mngags te nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'tshol bar btang /_de dag yA shi zhes pa'i rgyal 
[\[288b.4\]]khams su 'byor ba dang /_de skabs rgya gar nas 'od srungs kyi rigs las dgra bcom pa ma tang gi ba dang /_paN+Di ta go b+ha ra na gnyis kyis rta dkar po cig la ston pa'i bris thang gcig_/gsung rab mdo dum bu zhe gnyis pa sogs theg pa che chung gi mdo dang /_ston pa'i rang 
[\[288b.5\]]bsrel bum pa gang bcas byon pa lam thog tu 'dzom ste/_gong pheng gi lo bcu pa'i zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i gnam gang la le'u yang mkhar du 'byor/_de nas lo drug na dgra bcom pa dang /_paN+Di ta gnyis kyis rgya'i bon po btul/_de nas dgra bcom pa dang /_paN+Di ta gnyis kyis 
[\[288b.6\]]bar snang la 'phags te/_rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/_wa skyes seng ge'i rigs ma yin/_/sgron me nyi zla bzhin gsal min/_/rdzing bur rgya mtsho shong ba min/_/ri 'bur lhun bzhin ltar mdzes min/_/chos sprin 'jig rten kun la khyab/_/chos char 'gro 
[\[288b.7\]]rgyud myu gu brlan/_/rdzu 'phrul rmad byung mngon du bstan/_/phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro ba 'dul/_/zhes gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis rgya gar du gshegs so/_/de lta bu'i khungs dang ldan pa'i mdo 'di sngon bod du ma 'gyur zhing rgya'i bka' 'gyur na bzhugs pa las gnam skyong gong ma'i 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bkas many+dzu'i skad du bsgyur zhing bod skad du bka' bcu su b+hag shre yang+h+wa dza dang bka' bcu d+h+yA nA riSh+DaM byAs gnyis kyis bsgyur/_sog skad du rab 'byams pa pradz+nyod ya byA sas bsgyur ba/_rgyal bstan la lhag par dad pa'i sbyin bdag hIng lIn gyis chos sbyin rgya cher spel 
[\[289a.2\]]ba'i phyir dngul srang brgyas skad bzhi shan sbyar ba'i sbar bsgrubs te ci lcogs shig sbar nas zhing mchog dam par 'gyur ba rnams la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal bstan rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su nad dang mu ge 'khrugs rtsod nam yang mi 'byung 
[\[289a.3\]]zhing ma gyur sems can thams cad myur ba nyid du bla na med pa'i byang chen thob par gyur cig_/sarba mang+ga laM/_/
